1b1(rgyud): // rgyag skad du/ Ar 'adz+ra Nas glag/ 
1b2(rgyud): ma hAtan+tu/ bod skad du/ 'jig sang lag na
1b3(rgyud): rdorje dadang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po/ bamado dang
2a1(rgyud): / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
2a2(rgyud): 'tshalo// 'di skad pa dag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dra
2a3(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
2b1(rgyud): kyi spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rin po che'i rgyal po chen pos shin tu rnam par spras pa'i khang ba'ang chen po rin po che
2b2(rgyud): rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i khang pa na/ pad+mo'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po nor bu chen po dbang / 
2b3(rgyud): gi rgyal bres gnyis rnam pa/ ra smras pa la bzhugs nas lham me lhan ne lhung nge'o// 'di lta
2b4(rgyud): ste/ dper na nya ma'i dkyil 'khor ni na mthang ba'i nam mkha' la lham mo lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du
2b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyang pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po de la lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs nas
3a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos kun nas bskor te/ sems kyi dbang tha/ 
3a2(rgyud): cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs ni mnyam par byin gyis brlab
3a3(rgyud): g.yo ba dang rlom sems tham ngas cad dang ni brel zhing lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi dgongs
3a4(rgyud): pa mdzad pa la 'jug cing 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa nyid kyi ge nas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam
3a5(rgyud): grangs dang / ngag mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / de bzhin du yid mnyam pa nyid kyi/ 
3a6(rgyud): gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' di dag gis chos kyi rnam
3b1(rgyud): grangs 'di thos nas/ lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de thob pa dang / bcom ldan
3b2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sengs
3b3(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor nas// 'di lta ste/ lus
3b4(rgyud): dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gon/ sa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi tshe// sa ston pa dag mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir
3b5(rgyud): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe 'chen po gang la la dag me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi kham
3b6(rgyud): rab 'byams du ma nges par ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang // spyod pa la nan tan byed pa dang / sa sgrub pa dang / byang chub mngon
3b7(rgyud): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa de thams cad ni bcom
4a1(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis so// mdor na sems can gang la la ngag dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa
4a2(rgyud): dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang
4a3(rgyud): snyan par smra ba dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pas bsdus pa sha stag ste// de dag ni rgyu nyid dang / dmigs pa de nyid kyis dge ba mngon par 'du byed do// 
4a4(rgyud): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de// dgra bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes chen po shin tu rgyas pa de thams ca
4a5(rgyud): mthong zhing 'jug ste/ rnam par blta zhing nye bar sems te dge ba ji tsam mngon par 'du byed ba ye nga rgyu de nyid dang dmigs pa de nyid kyis so// 
4a6(rgyud): ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar rmad du byung zhing ya mtshan gyis mdun pa'i snying du gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/ 
4a7(rgyud): snyam ste/ cang mi smra bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la rnam par blta zhing nye bar sems so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
4b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de dag gis snying 'dun pa mkhyen nas// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor 'od zer stong phrag du ma mgur/ 
4b2(rgyud): nas byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad par byas te/ na mkha'i khams raba'i byams ngag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na/ byang
4b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' gang dag dbang dang ldan par gyur pa// 'khod pa de dag la thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// bcom ldan rim nad bral ba de// dbang bsgyur rgyal po'i
4b4(rgyud): khang pa ni// skyon kun rnam par spangs pa na// snying da'athang chen po seng ge'i khri// dpag tshad sum pargyu yod pa la// pad+mo'i snying por rang bzhugs nas// bya
4b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor// gnas dar thub pa chen po yis// bkod pa chen po gang sprul pa// de dag gi ni grangs tshad dang // dbyibs dang kha dog gang
4b6(rgyud): yin pa// de ni bskal pa grangs meng du// bstan par nus pa ma yin no// de ru de la dpa' bo che// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ yid gnyis som nyi spangs
4b7(rgyud): pa yi dgongs pa gcod pa blta bar gyis zhes bskul lo// de nas 'od zer de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bskul nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
4b8(rgyud): bar snang mdzad kyis mgur du rang gi gnas su zhugaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang mdzod spu nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bkod pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer sangs
5a1(rgyud): rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba// 'khor 'od zer brgya stong dang ldan pa phyung ste// de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang
5a2(rgyud): de dag la/ 'dren pa bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la// blta ba dang ni mchod pa bgyi ba dang // sems can phan par bzhed pas chos brjod phyir// khyed cag thams cad ma shol de
5a3(rgyud): ring gshegs// zhes yang dag par ston to// de nas 'od zer du dag yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod spu nyid du zhug so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
5a4(rgyud): de dag 'od zer des bskul ma thag tu rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangasargyas rnams la bcom ldan 'das dag/ bcom ldan 'das
5a5(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba'i slad du rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen
5a6(rgyud): por mchi ba na/ rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po de ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhig na mchis// gang du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de mngon par rdzogs par sangs
5a7(rgyud): rgyas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi/ de'i byang chub kyi snying po ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags zhes zhus// de skad ces gsol ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa
5a8(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud me tog gi/ 
5b1(rgyud): gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams du ma nges par ston pa yod de// 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams re re nges par ston pa re re
5b2(rgyud): la yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams sbyor ba nges par ston pa'i bkod pa rab 'byam du ma yod par khong du chud par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag de la mtshams sbyor ba
5b3(rgyud): bkod pa rnams kyi tshad ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten bye ba phrag brgya dang ri'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya dang rgya mtsho bye ba phrag brgya dang // zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag
5b4(rgyud): brgya dag gang gis khongasu 'dus shing rje su zhugs pa de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag gang
5b5(rgyud): gi khongasu 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi ga/ zhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byam gyi mtshams sbyor ba rnams kyi khongasu 'dus shing rjes su zhugs
5b6(rgyud): par gcig go// me tog gi gi zhe'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byam gyi mtshams sbyor ba bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongasu 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i ste
5b7(rgyud): po'i brgyan bkod pa rab 'byam gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig go// me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya rnams gang gi khongasu 'dus shing rje su zhugs
5b8(rgyud): pade me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud bar ma gcig go/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam par ma bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs
6a1(rgyud): su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi bzhi'i snying po'i rgyun bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa gcig ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nges
6a2(rgyud): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yongasu sbyangaso// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
6a3(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas gcig po de nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de nyid yin te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor
6a4(rgyud): lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sa las ni shin tu 'das shing na mkha' nyid byang chub kyi snying por byin gyis brlab ngas nas 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma de na rgyal po dbang
6a5(rgyud): bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po nu bzhugs so// rigs kyi/ bu dgra bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de ni de 'dra ste/ de'i yon tan nam/ spyod pa 'am
6a6(rgyud): smon lam mam/ ye shes kyi mtha' ni nged kyis bskal pa grangs med par yang rtogs par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu dag dad kyang bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub
6a7(rgyud): sems dpar gyur pa na bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud de/ nged ni bcom ldan 'das de la byas pa gzo ba/ byas pa shes pa dag go/ rigs
6a8(rgyud): kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sngon gyi spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / ngag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgyun mi gco
6b1(rgyud): pa nas brtsams te bstan pa gnas par mdzad pa dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba dang / 
6b2(rgyud): ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las brtsams te/ ngag sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil
6b3(rgyud): 'khor rgya chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rab 'byam go bar mdzad par bzhed nas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po'i phyung ngo // de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gsheg
6b4(rgyud): bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri na chen tog gis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gro/ su la rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di ni byin no// 
6b5(rgyud): nam sa man+ta mu khe b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta b+hUHsar+b+ba/ thA adzan rigs kyi bu khyod rin po che rdo rje chen bo'i snying po 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams gnas par gyis
6b6(rgyud): shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros kyis snying po 'di blangs te 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma
6b7(rgyud): yongasu bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mchod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / rin po che rdo rje chen po la snying po 'dis
6b8(rgyud): mchod pa'i sprin chen po sngon ma mthong ba mngon par sprul nas 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa ga
7a1(rgyud): la ba der song ste phyin nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po yang rin po che dang / 
7a2(rgyud): rdo rje me tog gi sprin chen pos mngon par bkab bo// de bzhin du bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phye
7a3(rgyud): ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / rdo rje'i sprin chen po dag gis bkab bo// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der yang song nas byang chub sems dang
7a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du ma bskor ba byas nas ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar phyogs nyid du gnas te/ rin po che
7a5(rgyud): dang rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po dang / rin po che'i/ rgyal po chen po dang / rdo rje'i dbyug gu dang / pad+ma'i/ snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po dag mngon par sprul nas rin
7a6(rgyud): po che rdo rje chen po'i yi ge'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gangs shong 'dug go/ lho phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
7a7(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la rdo rje chen po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs nas
7a8(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la phyag bya ba dang / blta ba dang / mchog
7b1(rgyud): pa'i phyir song shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos rdo rje chen po
7b2(rgyud): snying po 'di gsung so// na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba Sha thA ga te b+h+ya sar+b+ba ma hA mdzu gra pa ra hU~M/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhin nur gyur pas rdo rje mchog gi snying po 'di thob
7b3(rgyud): cing / bcom ldan 'das nges gnang bas byang chub sems dpa 'bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang
7b4(rgyud): bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tig gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyun bkod pa ga la ba de dang / rgyal
7b5(rgyud): po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / btso/ ma ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas 'jig/ rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams
7b6(rgyud): cad rin po che rdo rje mchog gi snang ba chen pos snang bar byas so// rdo rje chen po'i mchog gi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / nu
7b7(rgyud): bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / rdo rje chen po'i mchog dang / rin po che mchog gi 'od zer gyi snang bas rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po
7b8(rgyud): snang bar bya'o// mchog sbyin pa chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi sgras phyogs bcur go bar byas so// go bar byas nas kyang ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du lho phyogasu gnas te byang chub sam
8a1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag lhan cig tu rdo rje chen po mchog las byung ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po rnams la 'dug go/ nub
8a2(rgyud): phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
8a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma'i mchog gi/ snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do// nga
8a4(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco/ dam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dang dag med kyis rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma mchog gi dkyil 'khor
8a5(rgyud): thugs rje'i stobs kyi snying po 'di gsungaso// na maHsa man+ta mu kha b+h+ya sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA kA ru Na ba la badz+ra pad mA gra sa/ de nas de bzhin
8a6(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis snying po 'di gsungs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs
8a7(rgyud): kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams ma tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
8a8(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
8b1(rgyud): ras gzigs dadang phyug byang chub 'a ma pa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bang / 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas khyang
8b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang bgal ba dang bcom ldan 'das pa
8b3(rgyud): la bder song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas pad+med+ma chen po
8b4(rgyud): rgyal por 'dug ste rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi 'ang ba'ang thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi kham sa me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rkyen bkod pa thams cad
8b5(rgyud): thugs rje chen po'i rdo rje mchog stobs kyis ring gi lu/ sa rnam par rig byed kyi sprin rnams kyis kun tu/ kang nas snang bar byas so// byang phyogs na de bzhin
8b6(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la rdo rje chen pos rnam par gnon pa/ rdo rje chen po rnam
8b7(rgyud): par rol pa/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
8b8(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas byang chub kyi snying po chen po mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+hu sar+b+ba thA ba rang
9a1(rgyud): mAnar a gri gri/ 'di gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan
9a2(rgyud): bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces gtang ngo // de nas byang
9a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas/ yongasu bskor cing mdun du bangar to// 
9a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi kha
9a5(rgyud): pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de/ ra song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan/ brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa
9a6(rgyud): bzhin du byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub kyi snying po chen po'i rgyan bkod par byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog gi lus kyi sprin rnams kyis phyogs bcu
9a7(rgyud): rgyas par 'gengs so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin
9a8(rgyud): gyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che cod pan la dkon mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje 'byung gnas rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
9b1(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis dkon mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po 'di gsung so// / na ma/ 
9b2(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sar+b+ba thA oM oM dza sa 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang
9b3(rgyud): bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i
9b4(rgyud): cod pan/ bcom ldan 'das nges gnang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor
9b5(rgyud): cing mdun du bdar nas byang chub sems dpa' sam sa dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga
9b6(rgyud): lwa ba dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la be dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par smang mdzad ga le ba ngar song nas ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang shar gyi
9b7(rgyud): phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas/ dkon mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan gyi pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po la 'dug ste/ dkon mchog gsum pa'i sku'i sprin rnams kyis
9b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
10a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas sbyin gyi dpal zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po la/ sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkong nga'i snying po zhes bya ba'i snying
10a2(rgyud): sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dpal gyis sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkod pa'i
10a3(rgyud): snying po'i snying po 'di gsungaso// na ma/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sar+b+ba thA ma hA badz+ra ma g+ha bi krI Di ta bi shwa sa b+ha be ha/ 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi
10a4(rgyud): me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / la po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang / phyag bya
10a5(rgyud): ba'i phyir song shig ces gtang ngo // de nas byang chubasems dpa' sprin gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas// byang chub sems dpa'
10a6(rgyud): ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bangar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
10a7(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas sprin chen po rdo rje mchog gi lus kyi rnam
10a8(rgyud): par rig pa'i sprin rnams kyis pad+ma chen po'i rgyal po'i sprin byin gyis brlabs nas mchod pa chen po'i mchog gi sprin rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs shing 'dug no/ 
10b1(rgyud): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje chen po'i tog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
10b2(rgyud): chen po rdo rje dpa' bo la rdo rje las byung ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i tog
10b3(rgyud): gis rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i snying po 'di gsungaso// na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+rod b+ha ba swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // byang chub sems dpa
10b4(rgyud): rdo rje dpa' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyu ra nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang
10b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan/ cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi
10b6(rgyud): khang pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mas bskor ba byas nas ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du
10b7(rgyud): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i rgyan rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing rdo rje'i gzungs kyi
10b8(rgyud): rgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma la 'dug go/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyad
11a1(rgyud): snyan pas byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
11a2(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pas rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra
11a3(rgyud): rak+Sha ni r+g+ho Sha bkrIn+da swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'brug sgra'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das nges gnang bas 'jig rten
11a4(rgyud): gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sem sa dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bsko/ dar cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sem/ 
11a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi kham/ sa me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang / btso
11a6(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub byung gi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas te dbyangs kyi rig byed mtha' yas pas sangs
11a7(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad go bar byed cing rang gi smon lam las nges par byung ba rin po che chen po'i pad+ma la 'dug go// 'og gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
11a8(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma rnam par dag pa'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i yan lag la spyod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i
11b1(rgyud): rdorje'i snying po 'di gsungaso// na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ha he swAhA// 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i yan lag la bcom
11b2(rgyud): ldan 'das nges gnang nas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sesna par bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sem
11b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa gal ba dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom
11b4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga/ dal ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya sto/ 
11b5(rgyud): du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i
11b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs shing pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la 'dug go/ steng gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
11b7(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba la byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying po sbyin par mdzad
11b8(rgyud): do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying po 'di gsung so// na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bo d+h+ye ga ra d+harma swA hA/ 'di/ 
12a1(rgyud): byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba/ bcom ldan 'das nges gang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur/ 
12a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi kham
12a3(rgyud): me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
12a4(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song na su/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du steng gi phyogs nyid du
12a5(rgyud): gnas nas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mtha'ayas pa go bar byed pa'i sgos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing chos nyid las byung / 
12a6(rgyud): pa'i pad+ma chen po la 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus shing 'khod pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing
12a7(rgyud): 'di dag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa sngon ma mthong ba mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad shin tu lham ma/ lhan na/ lhang nge ba dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par
12a8(rgyud): rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing na mkha' ltar bzod ma nas zhi ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ltar bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par mdzad pa yang mthong
12b1(rgyud): nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ sgra skad gcig tu tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o// gdong nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa// mgon po rmad byung dam pa 'di// ji ltar sa/ 
12b2(rgyud): la snang zhig gu// sku yis phrin las mi mdzad la// gsung dang thugs kyis mdzad cing // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// shin tu dag pa'i shel dang 'dra// sku yis sems can
12b3(rgyud): thams cad la// sangs rgyas mdzad pa rnams mdzad la// sku la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste// thub pa de ni 'gyur med mnga'// gsung ni brag cha 'dra bas ste// bstan du med cing gzugs med/ 
12b4(rgyud): kyang / lha yi rnga chen ji bzhin du// 'gro ba thams cadatshim par mdzad// thugs ni rlom sems bral ba ste// / de la yul ni mnga' ma lags// yul rnams dang ni
12b5(rgyud): de bral yang // sems can rnams kyi yul du gyur// gsung ci de bzhin sems can te// de bzhin sku dang / bzhin thugs// mtshan nyid gcig dang rab ldan zhing // 
12b6(rgyud): smra ba'i nang na mchog tu snang // skye ba med las grol ba yi// de bzhin gshegs pa yod min pas// gang dag skye ba med shes pa// de dag 'dren pa rnam par shes// mgon po rtag tu mnyam
12b7(rgyud): bzhag cing // lus dang ngag dang yid bral yang // rtag par lus ngag spyod yul du// thub pa rgyun tu rab tu snang // byang chub sems dpa' che ba nyid// shin tu dka' ba byed pa dag/ 
12b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas ye shes che 'bar ba// 'di 'dra yongasu tshol bar byed// de la mig ni mi snang zhing // rna ba dang ni snang yang min// lce dang lus dang yid kyang ni// de phyir de yi yul ma yin// gzugs
13a1(rgyud): min sgra yang ma yin te// dri dang ro dang reg ma yin// dbang po ma yin rnam shes min// thams cad du ni rtag tu ni// yul can dang ni yu le dag rnam par brtags
13a2(rgyud): pas yod ma yin// yul can yod pa ma yin pas// yul rnams srid pa ma yin no// byis pas ji ltar brtags pa bzhin// de ltar gang tshe yod ma yin// de tshe mgon po yod 'gyur te// / 
13a3(rgyud): rnam par ma brtags tshul du'o// de ni kun tu thams cad la// bsam pa ji bzhin rdzogs mdzad pa// stong pa yid bzhin nor bu ltar// kun gyi mdun na bzhugs pa yin// gzugs brnyan
13a4(rgyud): 'byung ba'i tshul gyis su// ting 'dzin dbang bskur rnam das la ni// blta smra 'bel gtam thams cad kyis// ku na tu longs spyod 'os su 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad mgon
13a5(rgyud): mthong nas// de tshe kun gyi ting 'dzin dang // gzungs dang ri/ ga pa rnam par thar// bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad/ thob// gzugs la dbang ni thob 'gyur cing // sangs rgyas
13a6(rgyud): ye shes tshol byed pa// bdag cag rnams ni thams cad kyang // phyogs bcu dag nas lhags pa yin// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs// de ni gzugs kyi mchog yin te// yang
13a7(rgyud): dag rdzogs sangs rgyas dag par// da ni bdag cag thob par shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis tshig su bcad pa de dag smras nas// 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi
13a8(rgyud): ma'i mtha' med pa dang / de bzhin du ngag dang / yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' med pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyis gang yin pa
13b1(rgyud): la 'jug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid yongasu shes pas lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmig so// de bzhin du ngo bo nyid yongasu shes pas ngagra dang // yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma
13b2(rgyud): mtha' mi dmig so// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
13b3(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag kyang mkhyen/ rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi
13b4(rgyud): khang pa chen po na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dad pa dag kyang mkhyen nas/ ting nge 'dzin gang gi mthus de/ bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
13b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas kyi dkyi la 'khor thams cad du skad cig thang cig yud tsam ci ga la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongasu mya ngan
13b6(rgyud): las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byin gyis rlob pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhug so// bcom ldan
13b7(rgyud): 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / 'dzi/ 
13b8(rgyud): rten gyi khams mtshams sbyor ba'i bkod pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / stong thams cad dang / 
14a1(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chos thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gtan la bab pa thams cad dang / me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pani
14a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsam pa sna tshogs dang / re ba sna tshogs dang / 'dod pa sna tshogs dang / theg pa sna tshogs kyi tshul rnam par gnas pa dang
14a3(rgyud): 'gro ba sna tshogs dang / skye gnas sna tshogs dang / ljongs sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs ngag la sgra dang / tshig brjod pa rnam pa
14a4(rgyud): bzhag pa sna tshogs rnams kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po nga'i mtha'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang dag par ston
14a5(rgyud): cing / rang gi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor las/ byung ba sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis
14a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po yang dag par byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa dang / bstan pa gnas par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
14a7(rgyud): mdzad pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir dus kyi dbang gis skye ba rim gyis gzung bar byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba chen po dang / rdo rje
14a8(rgyud): chen po'i snying po dang / rdo rje chen po'i 'od 'phro ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snang ba dang / zag pa chen po spyod pa dang / gsang sngags rnam par dag pa'i sgos rdo rje'i 'khor yu ge chen po'i dkyil 'dre/ 
14b1(rgyud): dulag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba mdzad pa mthong ngo // de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad spros pa thang dang bral ba'i phyir thang du spros pa med pa'o// rtog pa thad dang bral ba'i phyin
14b2(rgyud): rnam par mi rtog pa'o// ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o// gdong ma nas dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o// skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa'o// bsam pa'i sa las shin tu 'das pa'i
14b3(rgyud): phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// yul dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o// tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin pa te/ rnam pa thang du sems can thams cad yang
14b4(rgyud): dog par 'du ba'i sa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po rnams kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar bas/ ma pa thang yong su rdzogs par mdzad pa thams cad rjes su
14b5(rgyud): 'thun pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par sems can thams cad kyi mdun na/ 'dug pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po rin thung med pa gos dri ma can
14b6(rgyud): gyis bkris pa lta bu ni 'di su'i yin/ 'di ci zhig ces sems can rnams kyis mi shes te ya mtshan ci zhig tu gyur to// gang dag blo gros rnam par dag pa yid gnyis dang / the tshom dang bral ba/ sdon
14b7(rgyud): gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags dang spyod pa'i tshul la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje 'chang ba thad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bcom ldan
14b8(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rgyan gyi snying po'i 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas pas ngangag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la zhugs pa dag ste/ de dag ni
14'a1(rgyud): / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul 'di mnyen pa dang / brlabs pa dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po bri ba dang / dngos grub chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i skal pa yod do// de nas/ 
14'a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan gyis gling bzhi pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling du bdud phram par mdzad nas byang chub mngon/ 
14'a3(rgyud): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa nas bzung ste mthar gyis spyad pa spyod cing yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du byin gyis brlabs nas chos bstan
14'a4(rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das de yang bstan pa rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byam das pa dang / 'jam dang lo dang / spyan ras gzigs dpa
14'a5(rgyud): phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / nam kho'o snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / byang chub se mos dra 'angan song thams cad spong ba la sogs pa/ byang chub
14'a6(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams bsdus nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs te thams cad kyi mdun du rdo rje'i dkyis
14'a7(rgyud): 'khor chen po bris nas/ lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur bas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dbang bskur nas de nyid la bstan pa gtad do// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil
14'a8(rgyud): 'khor chen po las sngon gyi spong pa yang dag par sgrub po'i gtam gyi tshul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// bam po gnyis pa/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
14'b1(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po dang la yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas na/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po de bzhin gshegs pa thams
14'b2(rgyud): cad kyi sngon gyi spyod pas rnam par rol pa'i rgyu 'thun pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i nags tshal chen po mchog na/ dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig
14'b3(rgyud): tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs po med pa/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan
14'b4(rgyud): bab 'ang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa dbang chen dang / tshe dang lnga/ ngan pa nyin gung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe/ dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang // tshe dang ldan pa dag
14'b5(rgyud): bo dang tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po/ dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kra bi la chen po dang / tshe dang ldan
14'b6(rgyud): pa yul 'khor skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ye 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa ldeng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa tshem can dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga'
14'b7(rgyud): dang / tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu'i nor dang / tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa bsod snyoms len b+ha ra dA dza dang / tshe dang ldan pa srung spyod dbang po'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sbyor dang / 
14'b8(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya dang thabs gcig go// byang chub
15a1(rgyud): / sems dpa'i tshogs chen po 'dris ste/ 'jam dpal gnon nun gyur pa dang / dra bcan gyi gnon dur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbyen mchog 'thung sanas dang bya
15a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson pa
15a3(rgyud): chos la gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
15a4(rgyud): bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa sa phan byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang
15a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' spos kyi glang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' na/ mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / 
15a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sang sang po'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dri ma med pa dang / 
15a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros mi bzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bla ma'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
15a8(rgyud): cod rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
15b1(rgyud): chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang thabs gcig ste/ de dag thams cad kyang sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gzungs
15b2(rgyud): dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / dbang thob pa dang / sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can
15b3(rgyud): thams cad tshim par byed pa sngon gyi smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du nges par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro ba ba la mkhas pa dang / dag pa rgyun mi 'chad par
15b4(rgyud): dam pa'i chos yongasu tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag ste/ byad chub sems dpa' di lta bu de dag gis yongasu bskor ci nga mdun gyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po
15b5(rgyud): seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'irje garten zil gyis mnan nas shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lha ngi'o// gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams kyang de nyid du 'dus te
15b6(rgyud): 'khod do// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bus kun nas bskor cing de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su
15b7(rgyud): bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim dang / thag bzangs ris dang / zhi mchog dang / ba Ti dang / rnga chen dang / dus kyi 'khor lo can/ 
15b8(rgyud): dang / dri ma med dang / tog dang / zla gdong dang / rnam par 'joms dang / zab mo dang / stobs can dang / sgra can dang / tog dregs dang / rnam par snang ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sna tshogs phreng ba
16a1(rgyud): can dang / de dag la sogs pa dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan stong dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag thams cad rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi mthu chen po dang
16a2(rgyud): lha ma yin gyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / sil snyan dang / 
16a3(rgyud): pheg rdob rnams mngon par sprul nas shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
16a4(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ ji ltar sprul pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
16a5(rgyud): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / sil snyan dang / phag rdob pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag
16a6(rgyud): 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer rgyas pa dang / klu'i rgyal po thog lU dang / klu'i rgyal po rin po che'i cod pan dang / 
16a7(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / klu'i rgyal po so ga ma med dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu dang / klu'i rgyal po rna rdum dang / klu'i rgyal po pad+ma dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i
16a8(rgyud): rgyal po pad+ma chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po dus can dang / klu'i rgyal po rigs can dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gcig pa dang / klu'i rgyal po brdzun pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i sgra dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs
16b1(rgyud): ldan dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po khri rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ klu'i mthu chen po dang / klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos tsan dan gor shi Sha'i chu'i sprin mngon par sprul nas/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi
16b2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshol stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ lhags nas ji ltar sprul pa'i spos chu'i sprin rnams kyis shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mchu
16b3(rgyud): bkod pa'i nags tshal stug por char mngon par phab bo// phab nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / 
16b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yul 'khor srung dang / gnod sbyin gyi desde dpon chen po 'phags skyes po dang / gnod sbyin gyi snga
16b5(rgyud): dpon chen po mig mi bzang dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon / na po bzang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang pi bzang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rmongs byed
16b6(rgyud): 'dzin pa chu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag brgyad pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtsen dang / de dag la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen po rang rang gnas/ 
16b7(rgyud): nas byung te/ me tog dang / bdug po dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan rnams thogs nas shing sa
16b8(rgyud): la sna tshogs kyis rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar song ste/ lhags nas ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos
17a1(rgyud): / dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / nu bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag
17a2(rgyud): 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor me 'am ci du ma dang ldan pa yang mi 'am ci'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phyi ma
17a3(rgyud): dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdo du mu thogs pa brgya stong du ma dag rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshon
17a4(rgyud): bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'ad sa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / 
17a5(rgyud): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag
17a6(rgyud): 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnam par 'dud kyi bu dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'jigs 'gro dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'dab brgya dang / na mkha'
17a7(rgyud): lding gi dbang po gtsug bud can 'khor na mkha' lding brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// srin po'i
17a8(rgyud): bdag po 'khros bzhin dang / srin po'i bdag po mche ba bzang dang / srin po'i bdag po drag po dang / rab tu gtum pa dang / 'jigs 'jigs lta dang / skrag byed dang / 'jigs byed chen po dang / 
17b1(rgyud): gdong bcu dang / gshin rje dang / gshin rje'i dril bu dang / rnam par 'jigs 'jigs lnga dang / zla ba'i sde 'khor srin po du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shings la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags
17b2(rgyud): tshal stug po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te ngogs gcig tu 'khod do// drang srong chen po me 'khor drang srong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing
17b3(rgyud): sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
17b4(rgyud): gcig tu 'khod do// rlung sprin gyi phreng ba can dang / rlung 'jig byed ra dang / rlung 'chags byed dang / rlung kun tu 'jogs byed dang // rlung rnam par 'thor dang / rlung dus ldan dang / rlung rnam par
17b5(rgyud): 'thor rlung dang / rlung rlung dmar dang / rlung 'jig rten 'dzin tu/ nga bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags na sa/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
17b6(rgyud): 'khod do// skar ma'i rgyal po zla ba 'khor skar ma brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga lo ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga
17b7(rgyud): la der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// nyi ma'i 'od zer phreng ba can dang / tsha bar byed pa dang / skems byed dang / du ba 'byin
17b8(rgyud): dang / rab 'bar dang / nyi ma sreg byeng 'khor lha'i bu gzi brjid 'phags pa brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po g.yo pa
18a1(rgyud): dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// klu'i rgyal po chu lha 'khor klu'i/ 
18a2(rgyud): rgyal po du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
18a3(rgyud): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom
18a4(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gci/ ga tu 'dug go// drag po yi dgas kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yang
18a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan/ 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor 'byung po brgya stong du ma nga
18a6(rgyud): ldan pa yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyis rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
18a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// gzi'i rgyal po chen po smin drug gi bu 'khor bza' brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga
18a8(rgyud): la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// sprin lha'i bu skye bo zhes bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu/ 
18b1(rgyud): skya bo zhes bya ba dang / sbyin lha'i bu glog phreng zhes bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu sprin gyi dra ba stug po 'jig byed ces bya ba dang / sprim m+b+ha'i bu char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'khor lha'i bu ba rgya sbyong dum dang ldan pa/ 
18b2(rgyud): ngag kyang shongs la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug pa gal ba da / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// glog dpag tu ma ces
18b3(rgyud): bya ba dang / glog gzi brjid can zhes bya ba dang / glog sdug 'od ces bya ba dang / glog mdzes phreng can zhes bya ba 'khor brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa na
18b4(rgyud): nags tshal stug po ga la ba der dong ste ljags nas/ bcom 'dus kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gci gra tu 'khod do// ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngang
18b5(rgyud): ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po gangs ri dang / ri'i rgyal po'i bags khyed dang / ri'i rgyal po ma la ya dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang / chan dang / ri'i rgyal po mi mjed can dang / ri'i rgyal po rtse mo
18b6(rgyud): brgya pa dang / ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs brtsegs dang / ri'i rgyal po rigs sngags 'chang dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang gzhan dag kyang shi nga sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug
18b7(rgyud): po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// gshin rje dang / mtshan mo nag mo dang / be tsan
18b8(rgyud): nag po can dang / skyes bu nag po dang / 'chi bdag dang / dpal min dang / rna nag ma yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la
19a1(rgyud): ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bka' thub bzlog ma dang / tsA muN+Da dang / drag po'i chung ma dang / 
19a2(rgyud): tshangs pa'i chung ma dang / khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang / gzhon nu'i chung ma dang / lus ngan gyi chung ma dang / phag gi chung ma dang / 'jigs byed chen po'i chung ma yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal
19a3(rgyud): mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
19a4(rgyud): chuklung chen po gang ga dang / chu klung chen po si ta dang / chu klung / chen po dbyangs can dang / chu klung chen po bi da sta dang / chu klung chen po zla ba'i cha can dang / chu klung chen po ya mun dang / 
19a5(rgyud): chu klung chen po kun gyi bshas gnyen dang / chu klung chen po ma gyogs ldan dang / chu klung chen po mtsho stan dang / chu klu nga chen po ba lang sbyin mchog ldan dang / chu klung chen po brtsa
19a6(rgyud): ba sbyin yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// dri za'i rgyal po sna tshogs phreng ba can
19a7(rgyud): dpo dri za'i rgyal po 'brog po dang / dri za'i rgyal po shugs chen dang / dri za'i rgyal po rnam par gnon pa dang / dri za'i rgyal po chu skyes dang / dri za'i rgyal po ud pa la lta bu'i mig dang / dri za'i
19a8(rgyud): rgyal po tsan dan brtsegs kyang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
19b1(rgyud): nabs la mgo bos dag 'chal 'drogs gcig tu 'khod do// rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thog dang / rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po nye ba'i thog dang / rigs sngags 'amang gi rgya
19b2(rgyud): bo rab tu gtum pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po bsnyems ldan dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po shugs 'chang dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sna tshogs sde dang / rig sngags
19b3(rgyud): 'chang gi rgyal po de dag dang / gzhan yang 'khor rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po
19b4(rgyud): gugral ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gral ba der dong ste ldeg/ sa nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos bya/ ga 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// srin mo so can
19b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / srin mo g.yangs byed ces bya ba dang / srin/ mo mtshan mo rmu zhes bya ba dang / srin mo so 'cha'o ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rmongs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / srin
19b6(rgyud): mo dgong ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rdo rje lta bu'i lto zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bum lto me zhes bya ba dang / srin mo zangs 'dab can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo glog lce ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo btsa'i
19b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bong mo zhes bya ba dang / srin mo 'jig su rung ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo zhi ba ma lta bu'i sen mo can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo chen po de dag dang gzhan 'khor srin mo du ma
19b8(rgyud): dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sa la sna tshogs kyis rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mag
20a1(rgyud): / bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'byung po'i rgyal po mdung can dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gshol can dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po btun shing can dang / 'byung po'i
20a2(rgyud): rgyal po gshol 'dzin dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po 'gugs byed dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po yang dag 'gugs byed dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gnya' drag 'khor 'byung po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang
20a3(rgyud): shing sa la sna tshogs kyis rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsha
20a4(rgyud): te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sha za thams cad dang / mdangs 'phrog pa thams cad dang / gnon po thams cad dang / grib gnon thams cad dang / yi dgas thams cad dang / bdud thams cad
20a5(rgyud): dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang / stobs po che'i tshe// gas kyi bdag po dang / de dag thams cad shing sa la sna// tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la
20a6(rgyud): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// srin mo bzhi gang yin pa de dag kyang phyogs
20a7(rgyud): bzhi nas lcags te gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ta phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe shing
20a8(rgyud): sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po shin tu yangs shing thag gru che la ka tsa lini di ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur cings gzhi rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / sdug gi kha khyer gyi
20b1(rgyud): rnam par bye ba ngos gnyis sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung gis rgyan te mdzes par byas pa/ steng du rin po che chen po'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bres pa/ mu tig gi do shal mang po sbyangs
20b2(rgyud): ga dar rdzi lnga ldi mang po bres pa/ sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa// lha'i me tog ud pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog gis sa phyogs de bkran
20b3(rgyud): par gyur te/ 'dir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad rdo rje chen po'i khor
20b4(rgyud): yug gi ris bskor ba/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyamasu gyur pa/ chu nang dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu pa/ dus thams cad pa'i me tog gis legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i
20b5(rgyud): chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas phyogs cha yongasu gang ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyis byung ba ste/ dper na ga zhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rgyal po'i gnas las byung ba/ lham
20b6(rgyud): mi lhung nge 'dug pa de bzhin/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus lhan ner rnam par mdzes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
20b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
20b8(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lagaso zhes bya ba'i gsung phyung te rdo rje 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsung so// dpa'o chen po lagaso legs// 
21a1(rgyud): / rdo rje byung gnas stobs po che/ shAkyas dge skyob pa yi/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni// rdo rje stobs chen srung bar gyis/ nam/ sarba ta thA ga teb+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHswAhA/ 
21a2(rgyud): 'byung gnas kyi snying po'i mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po'i sgra gcig nas
21a3(rgyud): gcig tu 'ur ces grags par gyur te/ rdo rje 'byung gnas dbang po che// sems can kun la phan mdzad pa// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni// thub pa chen pos byin gyis rlobs// rtag tu srog chags
21a4(rgyud): thams cad kyang // snying po 'di ni 'dzin gyur cig/ des ni 'dir ni de dag kun// tshul chen dngos grub thob par shog/ ces pa sgrag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thams cad
21a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang // 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sa/ yas dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom
21a6(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang rnam par dag pa'i sgo la 'jug pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags la 'jug pa dang / gsang sngags kyi sku
21a7(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjesu 'brang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i gnas rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur snying po zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
21a8(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ston pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po lta bu 'bras bu mang ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i gsang chen byang chub sems dpas lags par brjod pa/ byang chub sem/ 
21b1(rgyud): dnga'i mig 'phrul/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu ma'i rnam par rol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongasu mi shes
21b2(rgyud): na sems can gzhan dag gis shes par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu
21b3(rgyud): 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag ni ma gtogs te/ rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba zhes
21b4(rgyud): bya ba gsang ba'i mchog yod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang / thams cad dang de ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom
21b5(rgyud): ldan 'das 'di ni dus lag so// bde bar gshegs pa 'di ni tshod lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
21b6(rgyud): le snyoms par zhugs nas sngon gyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo rdo rje chen po'i 'byung gnas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsung so// na ma/ sar+b+ba mu khri b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga teb+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA Sha/ 
21b7(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs mo thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i snying gi mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ kye ma ye shes skyid pa che// bsam gtan
21b8(rgyud): bde ba mchog thob pas// kun kyang de yi ngang du gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar rtsa gcig tu gyur par mkhyen nas/ dpal be'u las byang
22a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas te yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal gyi
22a2(rgyud): be'u nyid du zhug so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad du bcom ldan
22a3(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa bstan par smon lam btab nas gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ dbus kyi 'dzam bu'i gling mi mjed 'dir lcang lo can gyi gnod sbyin gyi
22a4(rgyud): sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyi gnas na gnas pa de 'od zer gyis snang ba des snang bar gyur pas mig dang bzhin rgyas bar gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di chad du brjod do// de bzhin
22a5(rgyud): gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid yid la byed cing cangami zer bar 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'ong bar 'gyur
22a6(rgyud): ba'i brda' mdzad de/ tshigasu bcad pa yang gsung so// sems can dag pa zla bzhin tshur shog shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin rlabs byang chub gzhol// bsams pas mnyam nyid lags rtogs khong
22a7(rgyud): chung byed/ rtag tu sangs rgyas byas gzo tshur shog shig/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la rtag gnas pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje mchog tshur shog/ phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas ji skad cig/ sems can
22a8(rgyud): den mdzad bsam yas gzugs mnga' ba// de dag ma lus don gyi mdun 'gro khyod// gsang ba'i bdag po sems can mchog tshur shog/ gsang ba'i dam pa sems can snying po tshur// gdul dka' rtag
22b1(rgyud): 'dul dbang thob tshur shog shig/ brten te byung las skyes pa po// dus dang chod shes tshur shog shig / dam pa thob pa tshur shog shig/ dam pa sbyin byed tshur shog shig/ dpal byed dpal sdud dpal ldan pa/ 
22b2(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa'i sras tshur shog/ sems can bzang po stobs po che/ rdo rje lta bu tshur shog shig/ sangs rgyas sras po 'jigs med po// stobs can rnams kyi mchog tshur shig/ rtag tu srid
22b3(rgyud): pa gsum po yi// snying dga' byed pa tshur shog shig/ yang dag lam ni ston byed pa/ stobs bcur gnas pa tshur shog shig/ sems can dag pa rdzu 'phrul cha// kun tu bzang po chur shog shig/ kun
22b4(rgyud): mdzes pa tshur shog shig/ srid gsum dbang phyug chur shogashig/ khyed ni gzugs bzang shin tu rgyun// glang po rna ba khye ngar tshur sheg/ sna tshogs gzugs can 'khrul mang khyed// ma
22b5(rgyud): na dga' ba chur shog shig/ 'gro lding ba yi gzugs can tshur// tshur shog na da ku ba ra// rtag tu sna tshogs gos phreng 'o/ chang // cod pan mgul pa tshur shog shig/ mi 'jigs thob/ 
22b6(rgyud): pa tshur shog shig/ 'jigs pa 'jigs pa tshur shog shig/ sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul te// byi shol ma byed tshur shog shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungs
22b7(rgyud): nas/ 'ong ba la 'jigs pa med pa'i sgo'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba muM khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a bIsma ye bai sha ra d+ya mu khe b+ha ga ba ti badz+ra a ma li ni mA bi
22b8(rgyud): la ba swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'jigs pa'i sgo'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bka' stsal nas cang mi gsungs par bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs
23a1(rgyud): // sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dis bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gnod sbyin gyi tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag tshur shog/ bcom ldan 'das
23a2(rgyud): de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bskur bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ nyan thos brgya stong du mas ni bskor/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za
23a3(rgyud): dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / me 'amo ci dang // lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa du mas ni yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bko
23a4(rgyud): nga'i nags tshal stug po gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa der dong ngo // de nas
23a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin gzhon nu rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ sems can chen po bka' stsal pa bzhin/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
23a6(rgyud): de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal
23a7(rgyud): mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba der bzhud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos de'i tshe rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa
23a8(rgyud): ston pa la snyoms par zhugaso// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas ngo'i mong la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkong pa'i
23b1(rgyud): rang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du yangs shing rgya chen po nor bu chen po'i ka ba bye ba khrag khrig bcu stong du ma jug pa/ sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / 
23b2(rgyud): sngags bu du mas rgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las shing sa la gcig pa lta bur byas pas rnam par smras pa/ mtha' mthar phug ron lta bu'i phreng gis mdzes par byas pa/ mu tig sna gnyi/ 
23b3(rgyud): kyi dra ba bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas steng gi bar snang yongasu bskor ba/ lha'i ras bcos ma dang / dar gyi lda ldi mang po bris pas mdzes par byas pa/ lho'i sil snyan dang / ngeg
23b4(rgyud): rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba/ de khrag khrig brgya stong glu len gar byed rol mo byed cing / dasnyan par smra la gdu bu dang / rna cha gdung 'khor gyis brgyan
23b5(rgyud): cing lha'i lus dang ldan pa rnams kyis gang ba/ rin po che che na po'i blar kun tu bres pa/ phyogs bai DUr+ya chen pos la gas par smras pa ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ dus
23b6(rgyud): thams cad pa'i me tog gi shing ljon pas legs par rgyan pa/ lha'i rin po che'i them skas kyi phreng gis rnam par spras pa/ ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang ti'u dang / ne tso dang / re skag
23b7(rgyud): dang / rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / bya'i tshogs du ma sgra 'byin pa dang / lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / pad+ma dang / ka lha ra ka dang / yan lag brgyad dang
23b8(rgyud): ldan pa'i chus gang ba'i rdzing byang chub sems dpa' yongasu spyod par bya ba lha'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i rdzab kyi rnyog ma can dag gis kun nas mdzes par byas pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang ba/ 
24a1(rgyud): khang pa brtsegs pa der lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / sa brtol dang / sa brtol chen po'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bab pa/ a ga ru/ 
24a2(rgyud): nag po'i bdug pa'i sprin mang pos khebs pas rnam par mdzes pa byung bar gyur te khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad so so'i gnas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
24a3(rgyud): du las kyi bskyed pa dag mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag ra ra la yang rin po che dbang gi rgyal po la sogs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu bcu drug rin po che'i rgyal mo la sogs pas
24a4(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yongasu spyad par bya ba sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'i no/ ra bu rin po che chen po dag bkod do// rnam par snang mdzad kyi
24a5(rgyud): brgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad gdugs/ dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng bas mdzes par bya/ so// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu yang pad+ma'i snying po'i sang
24a6(rgyud): ge'i khri rnams sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyang bai DUr+ya chen po gsal ba'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shin tu phyis pa'i me long ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad
24a7(rgyud): kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal ba ste/ bai DUr+ya gsal ba'i phyir der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
24a8(rgyud): gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du snang ngo // dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri 'gro ba thams cad kyi bkod pa'i snying po rin po che chen po'i rgyal po las byas pa mngon par sprul to// 
24b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi sprin dag khang pa brtsegs pa der kun nas rtag tu babs par mngon par sprul te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom
24b2(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho spyad pa'i phyir ro// de ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba/ 
24b3(rgyud): dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu gnod sbyin gzhon nu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 
24b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sa/ mas dpa'i mthu chen pos khong pa brtsegs pa de la dag pa gnyis kas blangs te/ steng gi bar snang las babs
24b5(rgyud): te/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
24b6(rgyud): rgyas shAkya thub pa ga ba la der song ngo // khang pa brtsegs pa de'i 'od kyis shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur nas gang
24b7(rgyud): dag 'khor der 'dus shing 'khod pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag snang ba des snang bar byas pas phyogs bzhir rnam
24b8(rgyud): par bltas pa dang / steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba/ nyi ma stong ltar lham mar mdzes par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ya mtshan du gyur
25a1(rgyud): pa'i snying gis phan tshun rnam par bltas nas cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thob pa dang / bzod pa thob pa dang / 
25a2(rgyud): stobs thob pa de dag gis kyang rnam par bltas na ma'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ga/ nyi ma stong ltar lham mer rnam par mdzes pa mthong nas de dag kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis bcom
25a3(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nas dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi stang gi bar
25a4(rgyud): snang la lham ma/ lhan na/ lhang ngar gda' zhing bcom ldan 'das rtogs par dka' la mi mdzes par dka' ba 'di ci la gus/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
25a5(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/ rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag/ dang lha'i 'khor chen po de la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
25a6(rgyud): dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba du nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'o/ 
25a7(rgyud): teng la mchod pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan dkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho 'phrul sngon gyi
25a8(rgyud): spyod pa sgrub pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ste/ 'don chos gang gis yon tan bskol pa brgyar yang mthar rtogs par mi nus pa de'i 'od lham me/ ldan ne/ lhang nger 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa'
25b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de yang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i sgo rnam par dag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun tu 'dri'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di bka' stsa/ 
25b2(rgyud): ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug nas shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal
25b3(rgyud): stug po thams cad du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phag rdob pa'i sprin mngon par sprul
25b4(rgyud): ti char du pab nas steng gi na mkha' las babs te khang pa ba rtsegs pa de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// phul nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ sku da
25b5(rgyud): gsung dang thugs mkhyen pas// rnam dag brtul zhugs pa/ zang po pa// rtog pa kun gyis rnam dag pa// phyag 'tsha/ la sems can dag khyod la// mig dang de bzhin rno ba dang // 
25b6(rgyud): sna dang de bzhin lha dang ni// lus dang de bzhin yid kyang ni// smra ba'i mchog la phyag mi 'tshal// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya yul can btsal ba yi// dngos po kun las rnam grol ba// 
25b7(rgyud): rgyal ba mchog la phyag 'tsha'o// bzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes la// sku gsung thugs la sogs pa yis// gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten du// mnga' bdag khyod ni rtag tu ganga'// khyod ni sam
25b8(rgyud): can srog ma lags// gang zag kun gni khyod ma lags// dus dang rang bzhin las ma byung // ji ltar ma lags ci ma lags// khyod ni brtan nas byung ba tsom// sgyu ma lta bur dngos po
26a1(rgyud): spangs/ chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur ni// thug su khyod chung rkang gnyis mchog khyod ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong // stong pa nyid kyang cis ma lags// stong dang mi stong rnam par grol// namakha'
26a2(rgyud): 'dra la phyag 'tsha'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas g.yog 'khor dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la
26a3(rgyud): brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dang / dkod
26a4(rgyud): pa de dag dang / sil snyan dang / pag rdob de dag las theg pa chen po'i spyod pa'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces drag go// bzod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med// chos nyid gcig po
26a5(rgyud): dag pa ste// khyed cag the tsom dogs spongs la/ kye ma 'di/ la brtson par gyis// theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di ni// sngo/ na gyi spyad pa bla na med// spyod pa'i rgyal po bskyed che ba/ kun gyi
26a6(rgyud): shin tu thob par gyis// sngon gyi spyad pa rgya mtsho rnams// yongasu dag pa'i rgyu yis ni// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ni// rtag tu 'di la mdzes la ltos// ston pa gong du'ang mi gnas la// gang du'ang
26a7(rgyud): spyad par mi gnas kyang // gang dag spyod pa rnam sbyangs pa// de dag kun la gnas par gyur// 'gro ba'i mnga' bdag mig dang ni// rna ba de bzhin sna dang ni// lha dang de bzhin lus dang yang // yid du sna
26a8(rgyud): ba ma lag so// dang po 'byung ba'i spyod pa ni// gang gi tshe na sbyangs gyur pa// de tshe bcom ldan 'das snang mdzad/ rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong // ring ba ma lags nyi ma lags/ nang dang phyi/ 
26b1(rgyud): ni ma lags te/ rtag tu na mkha' 'drar gnas par/ rnal 'byor pa ni chen po snang // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos tshig su bcad pa de dag brjod ma thag/ 
26b2(rgyud): tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la
26b3(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
26b4(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//  skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la
26b5(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod/ pa dris shig/ ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa
26b6(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i
26b7(rgyud): chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags// thag pa chen po la 'jug pa de'i spyod pa ni ji lta zhig lags/ spyod pa de rtogs par khong du chud pa ni su zhig lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
26b8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can chen po leg so lag so// sems can chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dra ba la
27a1(rgyud): / leg so// de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig/ ngas theg pa chen po la 'jug pa dang / theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i gnas bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di la theg/ 
27a2(rgyud): pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dag so// de'i 'jug pa ni byang chub pa// rigs kyi bu gnas zhes bya ba ni gzhi'o// de yang snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i spyod pa
27a3(rgyud): ste/ sems can 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas yul dang dus kyi dbang gis de'i rnam pa ston pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang theg pa chen po ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba
27a4(rgyud): dang 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu bya ba'o// de la 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba ni spyod pa'i ngo bo'o// 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i theg pa chen po nyid ni theg pa chen po'o// rigs kyi bu
27a5(rgyud): gzhan yang 'dus byas ni rkyen gyis bskyed pa ste/ rten cing 'a/ brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'dus// ma byas ni mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang / stong pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo'i
27a6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang spyod pa'i ngo bo'i theg pa chen po gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid mngon du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yul
27a7(rgyud): dang dus kyi dbang gis sems can 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ bya ba dang las kyis kun tu bslangs pa'i tshul gyis 'dogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni spyod pa'i ngo bo'i theg pa chen po'o// gas
27a8(rgyud): kyi bu la 'dus ma byas kyi reg pa chen po nyid dag pa chen po gang non 'di lta ste/ ji ltar gnas po'i chos nyid kyi tshog blangs so// rigs kyi bu ji ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid ces bya ba 'don das
27b1(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi tshig bla dag so// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas gang yin pa de ni mtha' gnyis la mi bltos pa ste/ de la gdags/ 
27b2(rgyud): pa'i ngo bo nyid med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo yang med do// gang la gdags pa'i ngo bo med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo med pa de la spyod pa meng ngo // gang la spyod pa med pa de brjod par bya ba ma yino// 
27b3(rgyud): gang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'o// gang dngos po thams cad dang bral ba de mi 'khrugs pa'o// gang mi 'khrugs pa de cho so// chos gang yin pa de de bzhin
27b4(rgyud): gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bden pa'o// rigs kyi bu bden pa gang yin
