27b5(rgyud): pa de yod pa'o// yod pa gang yin pa de brdzun ma yin pa'o// gang brdzun ma yin pa de yang dag pa'o// yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid do// chos nyid gang yin pa de mi rtog/ 
27b6(rgyud): rnam par mi rtog go// gang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ye shes so// ye shes gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'o// rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid gang yin pade
27b7(rgyud): ni btags pa'o// btags pa gang yin pa de ni rtog pa'o// rtog pa gang yin pa de kun rdzob ces bstan te/ kun rdzob yod pas btag so// btags pa yod pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
27b8(rgyud): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bston to// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdud bani pham par byed pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yongasasu mya nganas
28a1(rgyud): 'das pa chen po la thug pa'i bar dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / nA ba dang / 'byor pa dang / rgud pa 'jig rten du kun tu ston to// rigs kyi bu/ 
28a2(rgyud): de la sogs pa dus dang yul gyi dbang nye bar bzung nas spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bcas te thabs sna tshogs kyi tshul rnams kyis sems can rnams la chos ston to// chos bstan pa de ni yang dag/ 
28a3(rgyud): phul ba yin te/ theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du g.yul gcig yang dag par thob par byed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu
28a4(rgyud): chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni gdags pa'am/ rnam par rig dpe med cing mi dmigs te ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// de la ni spyod pa yang med/ mi spyod pa yang med/ bslab
28a5(rgyud): pa yang med/ bslab pa ma yin pa yang med/ 'dul ba ya nga med/ 'dul ba ma yin pa yang med do// de la ni lus sam/ ngag gam/ yid kyi 'jug pa 'am ldog pa mi dmigs so// / 
28a6(rgyud): de de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'am/ nyan thos zhes bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/ chos zhes bya ba 'am/ dge 'dun nas
28a7(rgyud): bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ klu zhes bya ba 'am/ gnod sbyin zhes bya ba'am/ dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phya chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i
28a8(rgyud): bar ram yod ces bya ba 'am/ mad ces bya ba 'am/ bsod nams nas bya ba'am/ 'khor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'ching ba zhes bya ba 'am/ thar pa zhes bya ba med do// 
28b1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de la ni dus zhes bya ba'am/ chod ces bya ba'am/ skad cig ces bya ba'am/ yud tsam zhes bya ba'am/ thang cig ces bya ba med do// de la ni zla ba zhes bya ba'am/ skar ma zhes bya ba'am/ 
28b2(rgyud): nyi ma zhes bya ba'am/ me zhes bya ba 'am/ rlung zhes bya ba'am/ chu zhes bya ba 'am/ sa zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan mo zhes bya ba 'am/ nyin mo zhes bya ba 'am/ dus tshig zhes bya ba'am/ lo khyud kor zhes bya/ 
28b3(rgyud): ba dang / zla ba zhes bya ba meng do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na rtogs pas brtags pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi mthar ltung ba ji snyed pa dang // 'jig rten las 'das po'i brtags pa'i sgo ji snyed// 
28b4(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad ni de la mi 'gyur zhing ming de mi dmigaso // da ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid de gnyi su med nga'i mtshan nyi du yin pa'i phyir te/ de la gnyis mi 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu
28b5(rgyud): 'di lta ste dben na mkha' gnyis pa ma skyes pa'i phyir nam/ kha'i khams ni gnyisu med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos nyid kyang gnyi su med pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na gang
28b6(rgyud): chos nyid 'di lta bu la spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnamasu
28b7(rgyud): bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spyod pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o// slob pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o// thob pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
28b8(rgyud): kyi thob pa'o// rtsom pa meng po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsom pa'o// 'dul ba ma yin pa ni 'dul ba'o// gangagasu med pa ni gdags pa'o// mthong ba med pa ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o// 
29a1(rgyud): bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o// mi nyan pa ni chos nyan pa'o// khong du chud pa med pa ni khong du chud pa'o// 'gro ba med pa ni 'gro ba'o// gnas med/ 
29a2(rgyud): pa ni gan so// stong pa nyid ma yin pa ni stong pa nyid do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shes pa med pa/ mngon par rtogs pa med pa dang / mngon sum du byed pa med pa'o// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs
29a3(rgyud): 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni spyod pa spyad pa'o// gang du yang mi chag so// gang du yang rjesu chags pa mang ngo // gang du yang khong khro ba medo// gang
29a4(rgyud): du yang zhe sdang ba med do// de mi snang ma rmongs phyin ci ma lo dag par rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ rnam par mi rtog pa zhi ba legs par gnas pa/ zla med pa/ mi g.yo ba
29a5(rgyud): rab tu mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / sems can gyi don bya ba la yongasu mi skyog/ dus gsum yang skyid/ lug pa med pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rnam pa'i
29a6(rgyud): khams ni rdul 'am/ du ba 'am/ sprin gyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ sgyid lug par mi 'gyu ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ na mkha'i khams rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du
29a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu spyad pa yang sgying lug par mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de la spyod pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chen
29a8(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rgyan rdo rje chen po'i tog gi spyod pa rdo rje chen po las 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams sog pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzung bar bya/ bklag par byag
29b1(rgyud): dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshang bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
29b2(rgyud): to/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'adi dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed
29b3(rgyud): pa lags na gang dag nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yid la bgyid pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa
29b4(rgyud): lagaso// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po de dag ni bla na me dra ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tungs pa la gso// / bcom ldan 'das de dag ni zag pa chen po bla na ning pa de bani
29b5(rgyud): gshegs pa mngon par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa ni gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul la skal pa ma/ sa lag so// bdag la thugs brdze bar dgongs te/ bcom
29b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen po bla na med pa 'phral du 'bras bu mang ba bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs te/ rdo rje chen po 'byung gnas
29b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du
29b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chen po'i sgra sgrogs te/ gsung gcig tu rdo rje chen po 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba rdo rje'i 'byung gnas rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brjod cing shings
30a1(rgyud): la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdo rje chen po pad+ma'i gdan la skyil/ 
30a2(rgyud): mo krung bcas te bzhug so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam zhes bsnyun gsol te/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs
30a3(rgyud): dang ldan nam// 'tsho 'am bde ba la gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang
30a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad blong nas rdo rje'i dal 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsung so// na maHsar+b+ba mu kha b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya
30a5(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA oM badz+ra ka ra khaM swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de ngag gis rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa 'i gsang sngags gsungs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
30a6(rgyud): brlabs kyi rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de ya mtshan du che'o snyam du snying 'dun par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gnon
30a7(rgyud): nur gyur pa la lta zhing 'khod do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor da ya mtshan cha snyam du rtse gcig tu gyur par rig nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
30a8(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus pa/ gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas/ rnam par 'dren
30b1(rgyud): rnams mi gsung las/ bde gshegs sras la rdo rje yis// dbang bskur du ni nges par gda'/ gsang sngags spyod pa ye shes che// theg pa chen po go'ang nga mchog der ni thams cad mkhyen nyid dang / 
30b2(rgyud): don kun grub pa'i spyod pa thog gsang sngags spyod pa 'byung ba yi// theg pa chen po thams cad mkhyen// sngon gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyis// nags tshal mchog 'dir rtag tu bshod // sa lani
30b3(rgyud): rgyal mtshan nyams dga' che// spyod pa yang dag bstan pa'i gnas// sngon gyi spyod las byung gyur pas// gsang sngags shes las 'byung bar bshad// gang dag 'das pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas
30b4(rgyud): de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang / mgon po glang dag lta byung / rnam par 'dren par bzhugs pa rnams/ de dag tham das cad 'dir gshegs shing / gsang sngags spyod las
30b5(rgyud): byung ba yi// theg pa chen po dbang bskur 'di// bdar gshes sa sras la rab tu stsol// sangs rgyas drang srong chen po da// kun gyi dbang ni bdug lag so// 'jig rten phan par
30b6(rgyud): 'tshal bas na// rdzogs sangs rgyas la gsol ba 'tshal// bston pa kun tu srung ba dang // dem chos rtag gnas bgyi slad du// bdag nyid che ba'i spyi gtsug tu// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur/ 
30b7(rgyud): stsol/ gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi// theg chen rtogs par khong du chud// sngon gyi smon lam nges 'byung ba// sangs rgyas sras po grags chen lags// sangs rgyas 'dra 'am ci zhig te// 
30b8(rgyud): bdar gshegs sras po chags med pa// byang chub mthar thug dbang po legs// gsang sngags mgon pos rnam kun du// thog ma'i spyod ldan nges pa 'di// sangs rgyas 'dra'am ci zhig te// bde
31a1(rgyud): gshegs sras po chags med pa/ byang chub mthar thug dbang po lags// gsang sngags mgon pos rnam kun du/ 'khor 'di byin gyis brlabs lags na// gsang sngags rgyal
31a2(rgyud): po bka' stsal nas// ji srid mi gsung gyur cing bzhugs// thams cad ngo mtshar 'dzin 'gyur te// bde bar rtog la brtson par gnas// dpa' bo che rnams the tsom dang // de bzhin yid gnyis bsal du
31a3(rgyud): gsol// da ni dus la bab lags na// phyi bshol ma mdzad bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas bcom
31a4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ngar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gsungs pa// 'dren pa rnams kyis gang sangs rgyas// chos nyid 'di ni gcig
31a5(rgyud): tu mchog rtag tu mnyam gzhag rnams kyis ni// rab tu bsgri mas te de rtog bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya/ thub pa la sogs pas shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan
31a6(rgyud): bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po kun tu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa gru bzhi lham pa/ sgo bzhi btod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyi ras bskor ba/ sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / stegs bus
31a7(rgyud): rgyan pa steng du rin po che'i bla re bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu sbyangs pa/ rin po che sna lnga'i srad bu 'brel bar byin gyis brlabs te dbus su rdo rje pad+ma'i khri dang / phyogs cha brgyad du rdo rje chen po'i phreng
31a8(rgyud): pas bskor ba dang / rdo rje phyi ras kun tu bskor ba dang / phyi rgyab tu ni rdo rje'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i srad bu bres pa dang / rdo rje'i bcing ba'i bcings pa dang / rdo rje'i phur bu dag btab pa dang / thams cad rdo rje
31b1(rgyud): rang bzhin can du byin gyis brlabs nas steng gi gtsug tor nas thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ngo // 'od zer de dag phyung nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi/ 
31b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyi gtsug tu zhug so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer nga dag zhugs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'
31b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dge ning mgunas rab tu dga' ste thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i snying po smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bau shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a ti ha ta ba lam
31b4(rgyud): hA badz+ra A dz+nyA ka ra Na/ na mestu te swAhA/ de nas thogs pa med dpa'i stobs rdo rje'i snying po smras ma thag tu de bzhin pa/ shegs pa de dag gi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / stobs pa
31b5(rgyud): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lame dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dus pa dang / stong pa nyid chen po'i mtha' las byas pa sbyin pa dang / 
31b6(rgyud): dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par bskyed pa'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lag
31b7(rgyud): tu byi no// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kun tu bzang po'i lag tu rdo rje byin ma thag tu/ de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
31b8(rgyud): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha
32a1(rgyud): ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
32a2(rgyud): 'di ni lag na rdo rje'o lag na rdo rje zhes brjod do// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ bam po gsum pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dam tshig 'di byin gyi
32a3(rgyud): brlabs nas yang gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba mu khaM b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA guh+ya badz+ra d+ha ra swAhA/ de nas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag/ 
32a4(rgyud): tu jig tan gyi khams rapa 'byams thams cad dang / s+yAd sargyas kyi 'a khor gling kyil 'khor thams cad du gas da ba'i bdag pa'o// gsang ba'i bdag po zhes sgra gciganas
32a5(rgyud): gcig tu 'ur ces grags nas 'di lta ste/ snying po 'di'i ma thu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na
32a6(rgyud): rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dag mngon sum du zhug so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bstan pa kun tu bsrung ba dang / 'gre/ 
32a7(rgyud): ba yongasu skyob pa'i snying po rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra d+ha ra bir bir bi ki ri gi sa// rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i
32a8(rgyud): snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje chen pa rgya che ba las byung ba'i lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing
32b1(rgyud): thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs
32b2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad dang / sems dang po bskyed pa rnams dang / lus dang po pa rnams dang / sems can rnams kyi rgyab dang / mdun dang / ma nyal ba'am/ gnyid kyi log pa 'am/ chos ston pa 'am/ byang chub
32b3(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/ sems can gyi don byed pa 'am/ sprul pa rab tu byed pa'i bar du thams cad kyi drung na gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i cho ga shes pa lag na rje
32b4(rgyud): rje cong pan can du kun tu snang ngo // yang de bzhin gshegs ba de dag gis phyogs rdo rje bcing ba zhes bya ba rdo rje'i snying po mchog gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+baHthA ga teg+hA sar+b+ba mu la
32b5(rgyud): b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA rig badz+ra Ta Ta Ta Ta Ta swA hA/ phyogs rdo rje bcing ba'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sems cadan ma rungs pa thams cad rdo rje'i bcings paso// bcings par
32b6(rgyud): snang ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa'i rdo rje 'am phur bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu kha b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba thA wa dza ShA dza dza s+yAhA/ sa rnon gyi rdo rje'i snying
32b7(rgyud): po 'di gsungs ma thag tu kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po lag na rdo rje 'di'i rdo rje'i sa rton to zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa
32b8(rgyud): 'og gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ya Ta ya Ta swA hA/ sa'i 'og gi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab
33a1(rgyud): 'byam thams cad dang / sa'i 'og gi phrag thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sa 'og gi rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur/ 
33a2(rgyud): ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi 'gro ba gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tsin+ta sar+b+ba
33a3(rgyud): bI r+ya tu rag rim pa barma la b+hA bi dza ya swA hA/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang gi gnas
33a4(rgyud): thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa 'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin
33a5(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis gnod sbyin tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsungs pa// ne maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra yak+Sha ni gr-i ha da ta swA hA/ gnod sbyin gyi rdo
33a6(rgyud): rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gnod
33a7(rgyud): sbyin gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis klu'i rdo rje bsgrags pa'i tog rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ 
33a8(rgyud): b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ha ra ha ra nA ga badz+ra swA hA/ de nas klu'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub
33b1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni klu'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs pa/ na ma/ 
33b2(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ma tha ma tha badz+ri gan+d+har+tha hri da yai swA hA/ rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas de'i mo la 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad
33b3(rgyud): dang / dri za'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa'i chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni dri za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs
33b4(rgyud): pa de dag gris rdo rje chen po na mkho'i lding gi dbang po'i snying po gsung so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ta b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra bi ta ta d+ha ra ka ra tra ha swA hA/ de nas rdo rje chen po nam kha
33b5(rgyud): lding dbang po'i snying po da gsungs ma theg tu 'jigakhams rang 'bum thams cad dang / rnam pa gi gnas thams cad du kye mi byang chub sems dpa' dun
33b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po lagan rdo rje chen po 'dini nam 'a lding gi dbang zin rdo rjenas sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'u ces byug ste/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gos rdo rje chen po ma 'am ci'i rnying
33b7(rgyud): gsungs gan maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sar+b+ba mu khe g+he sarmA thA badz+ra tI ra nganA bi dza~M yad 'a ba sna// de nas mi 'am ci'i snying po mchog 'gasu su ma jug tu 'jig rten gyi kham su rab 'byam thams dang / 
33b8(rgyud): dang mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni mi 'am ci'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so// yang ngode bzhin gsheg
34a1(rgyud): pa de dag gis rdo rje sngo 'phye chen po'i snying po gsus gnamaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sanA mu khe b+h+yaHsarbA thA mahor ba badz+rarda la ya suhA// de nas rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying po 'di gsung
34a2(rgyud): ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lto 'phye chen po'i rdo rje'o zhes
34a3(rgyud): gci nAg gi tu 'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po 'ang gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra rAk+Sha sa kru ra da ha pa tsa Tu Tu TuM swA hA/ 
34a4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'ji ngag rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / srin po'i ga nas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i
34a5(rgyud): chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni srin po'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de/ ngag gis rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs
34a6(rgyud): pa na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra hr-i te he ha swA hA/ de nas rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i
34a7(rgyud): gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
34a8(rgyud): gis rdo rje chen po 'byung po'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ha la hu la badz+ra ma hA b+hU te shwa ra swA hA/ rdo rje chen po 'byung po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu de nas 'jig
34b1(rgyud): rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / 'byung po'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'byung po'i rdo rje chen po zhes sgra gcig nas gcig
34b2(rgyud): tu'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po'i sha za'i snying po gsungs pa// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ma hA badz+ra pri sha tsi shwa ra bI shwa hr-i da ya gaM/ mi tsi/ 
34b3(rgyud): mi tsi/ ma Ta ma kra badz+ra swA hA/ rdo rje chen po sha za'i snying po 'di dag gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / sha zi'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sam
34b4(rgyud): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sha za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig denas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshe/ gas pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po shra za mo'i snying po gsungs pa/ 
34b5(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+re dU ting shwa tsi ki ri mo ri me le swA hA/ rdo rje chen po sha za mo'i snying bo 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
34b6(rgyud): thams cad dang / sha zo mo'i gnas thams cad du kyem byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lag na rdo rje 'di ni sha za mo'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin
34b7(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje srin mo'i snying po gsungs pa/ namaHsar+b+ba twa thA ga te g+has nA mu khe s+ya sar+b+ba thA badz+ra / ra l-i ra shA sa hA ri mi ri swAhA/ rdo rje srin mo'i snying po 'di gsungs ma ngag tu / 
34b8(rgyud): mi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / srin mo'i gnas thams cad du tsam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'din rdo rje'i srin mo'i snying po'i zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu
35a1(rgyud): 'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po gnon po'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA osta ra ka badz+ra hi k+ShehA// gno/ 
35a2(rgyud): ngo'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / gnon po'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gnon po'i
35a3(rgyud): rdo rje nis sgra gcig nas gcig tu'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis grib gnon rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje snying po gsungs pa/ nas sar+b+ba pA na rgya su rgya nagasags brda
35a4(rgyud): bi dA hi ni swA hA// grib gnon rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam/ thams cad dang / grib gnon gyi gnas thams cad du kye ma byung / 
35a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni grib gnon gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grwa gso// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis brjed byed kyi gdon
35a6(rgyud): 'gog pa rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA gra gra s+pha ra Na badz+ra swA hA/ brjed byed kyi gdon 'gog pa rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam
35a7(rgyud): thams cad dang / brjed byed kyi gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni brjed byed kyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur cas grag so// de bzhin
35a8(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis yang gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ga/ namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga teSh+Tha sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya sar+b+ba thA bi ra badz+ras r+b+ba gra he ni kr-in+ta na dza Ti la la bo da ra ra Ta raTaH swA hA/ gdon/ 
35b1(rgyud): thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di dag gsungs ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang // gdon thams cad kyi gnas rnams su kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sem/ 
35b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'o nas sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur tsas grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying
35b3(rgyud): po gsungs pa// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu kha b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra badz+ra sa saM swA hA/ lha la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / lha la
35b4(rgyud): sogs pa thams cad kyi gnas su kye ma byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lha la sog/ sa pa'i snying po rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces
35b5(rgyud): grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis nad kyi gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba tra thA ga te b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA b+he 'dzu badz+ra a
35b6(rgyud): mr-i tra prA ba swA hA/ rdzi sman chen po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di dag gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'dzin rtsi sman gyi
35b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i zhes skra gcig nas gcig tu'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis nad gdon gsal ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs gnamaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba pA tra tre trang
35b8(rgyud): badz+ras hA/ nad gsal ba'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'dini ni rab tu ni bar bying/ 
36a1(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rga ba'i gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te
36a2(rgyud): b+h+yasar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+bA thAs mr-i tong b+ha ba badz+ra la la la la sahA/ rga ba 'gog pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thang du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems
36a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rga ba 'gog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i snying po 'di gsungs
36a4(rgyud): ga na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga teb+h+ya/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ka di badz+radza ya ha ha swA hA// 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i snyi/ nga po 'di gsungs ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams
36a5(rgyud): rab 'byam thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'don 'chi ba las kyang rgya la ba'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so// 
36a6(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rgud pa'i gdon bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA pa ra ma badz+re sar+b+ba shri yaM a b+hu da yan dang ma hA kA ru Ni
36a7(rgyud): ka d+ha ka d+ha ka swA hA/ rgud pa thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di
36a8(rgyud): ni rgud pa thams cad 'gog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po stobs thogs pa meng pa'i rdo rje gsungs pa/ 
36b1(rgyud): namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te g+hasar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM badz+ra nakra badz+ri dz+nyA swA hA/ de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i gas sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rang 'byam thams ca
36b2(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
36b3(rgyud): chen po dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa'i gnas thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur ba zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces
36b4(rgyud): grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen pokhor los bsgyur ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thAg te b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba thA dz+r-IM shrI hUM swA hA/ de nas de bzhin
36b5(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis yang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po la sogs pa rdo rje chen po'i snying po rnams byang chub sems/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la byin no// byin nas kyi
36b6(rgyud): 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin stug po'i dra ba chen pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po dang / thams
36b7(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas chos gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor
36b8(rgyud): du bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du bsgyur nas mi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas kyang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin
37a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lag tu rdo rje dbang bskur bas khyod dbang bskur to// ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag
37a2(rgyud): khrig brgya stong du ma las byas pa'i rdo rje khyod la byin no// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rjes khyod byin gyis brlab so// rdo rje'i snying po thams cad khyod la bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
37a3(rgyud): cad kyis khyod la bstan pa thams cad kyi don bya ba dang / srung bar gnang ngo // khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam chen po yong su rdzog so// rigs kyi bud rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nges par ston cig rigs kyi bu
37a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po shod cig/ dri skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// chos kyi rjes 'di skad ces
37a5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag ma chog tu ngo mtshar thob pa dang / bdag rnam par rgyal ba'i chos dam pa thob pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
37a6(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de'i tshe rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par
37a7(rgyud): bsgrags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas lag na rdo rje rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i snying po ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas
37a8(rgyud): de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang zhing thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu
37b1(rgyud): g.yos/ kun tu rab tu gsos so// che mche ma/ rab tu che mche ma/ kun tu rab tu chem mo// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg go shar phyogs mtho na nub
37b2(rgyud): phyogs dma'o// nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'o// lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'o// byang phyogs mthe na lho phyogs dma'o// dbus mtho ni mtha' dma'o// mtha' mtho na dbus dma'o// snang ba
37b3(rgyud): chen po yang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar mun pa mun nag rmag tu gyur pa na 'khod pa de dag kyang 'od des snang bar byas nas sems can gang dag der skyes pa de dag phan tshun lta
37b4(rgyud): zhing gcig gis gcig mthong nas sems can gzhan dgag cig 'dir skyes pa lta/ sems can gzhan dag gcig 'dir skyes pa lta'o snyam mo// de dag gis bltas pa dang / byang chub
37b5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje'i yi ge'i/ snying po'i gzungs kyi chos ston to// de dag gis chos de/ thos nas dad pa rnyed de shi 'phos nas lha'i nang du skyes te shi
37b6(rgyud): sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dar lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba chen pos dbang bskur che na po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje
37b7(rgyud): la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir dong ngo // tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang skad cig de dang / yud tsam dade dang / thang cig de la chad par gyur to// de'i tshe dud 'gro'i
37b8(rgyud): skye gnas kyi ming yang mi grag par gyur to// yi ngogs kyi gnas thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi ra bas kun tu bskor ba dang / lha'i zas dang / skom dang / yo byad yongasu rdzogs pa dang / lha'i
38a1(rgyud): lus dang ldan par gyur to// shring sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags stug po 'di thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos snang bar byaso// lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba rdzu 'phrul che ba
38a2(rgyud): mthu che ba 'di gnyis lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhung nger ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang / sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'od ma gtogs par 'od gzhan thams cad
38a3(rgyud): mog mog por gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes ting nge 'dzin 'di la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu de'i tshe spu'i bu ga thams cad nas khro bo'i rgyal po dag byung nas hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po
38a4(rgyud): ni bsgrags/ lag na rdo rje ni thogs/ gdong gi dpral ba'i khro gnye Ta ni gnyer/ stong gsum gyi stong chen de'i 'jig rten gyi kham sra ni dbyangs gcig gis go bar byed cing / kye ma rungs pa'i srin
38a5(rgyud): po dang / pa'i mtshun dang / sha za ba dang / ma mo dang / gdon dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / grub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin/ bcas dang / gnon po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs
38a6(rgyud): pa gdon gyi tshogs thams cad/ sar sna yongasu btang byos la/ dul ba'i sems kyis mnyam gzhag ste/ sangs rgyas chos dang ngage 'dun la// mkhas pa dag ni skyabasu dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal
38a7(rgyud): ldan da// rdo rje rab tu 'bar 'dzin pa// nags tshal dam pa nyams dga' bar// yid 'ong khang pa brtsegs na bzhugs// dang la mgon po de las ni// dam tshig yongasu brtsal byos la// nga rgyal nga yi mad
38a8(rgyud): byos terjes rnams kun tu rgyu bar byos// gzhan du khyed cag de ring nyid// rdo rje 'bar ba rab 'khrugs pa// 'bar ba 'jigs chen 'di dag gis// mgo ni shin tu 'gems par 'gyur// de ltar khro bo'i rgyal
38b1(rgyud): bo dag 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// brtsal med tshig gis yo byas nas/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi gan des shig/ ces tshig tu brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de'i tshe 'drung ngo'i tshogs thams cad/ 
38b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i bstan pa tshol zhing // sangs rgyas la skyabasu dong ngo // chos la skyabasu dong ngo // dge 'dun la skyabasu dong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag
38b3(rgyud): na rdo rje la yang phyag 'tsha'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe rang gi snying po smras pa/ na moHsar+b+ba ta thA gau ta b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba thA tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na badz+ra
38b4(rgyud): pA Ni hUM phaT/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snyi dang po smras ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'a byam thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
38b5(rgyud): thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto/ 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi gnas
38b6(rgyud): rnams kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lag na rdo rje drag po'o// lag na rdo rje drag po'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so// de thos nas byang chub sem
38b7(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyi tshul chen po la smon lam shin tu btab par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje drag po'i snying po 'di smras nas de bzhin gshegs
38b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis gnang bas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas te dkyil 'khor chen po smra so// de la slob dpon ni gsang sngags de kho na'i don la mtha
39a1(rgyud): pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ spya rtsal rnams la mkhas pa/ snying rje ba'i rang bzhin can/ bzod pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bsam pa nges padu/ 
39a2(rgyud): shes pa/ gser ba/ sro shi ba ma yin pa/ mdangs cha ba/ zab mo'i chos la mos pa/ bzlas brjod la brtson pa/ rtag tu bsam gtan byed pa/ lag na rdo rje la dga' ba/ ming thos sngags pa brtag
39a3(rgyud): par ni/ mchil ma 'byung zhing spu zing byed// rmi yang lag na rdo rje la// yid kyi the tsom med pa dang // dus shas de bzhin tshod shes shing / byas bzo de bzhin bden pa smra// slob dpon de lta bus ring bsreg
39a4(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs te gong du smos pa na'i snying po de dag re re zhing yang 'bum 'bum bzlas brjod
39a5(rgyud): bya'o// de'i 'og tu lag na rdo rje drag po'i snying pos yungs kar/ dang / dngar gsum bsres pa dag lan khrir sbyin bsra ga bya'o// de'i 'og tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dkyil 'kho
39a6(rgyud): chen po'i dbus su 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bzlas brjod bya'o// drag po'i snying po chen pos slob ma dag par bya ba dang / bsrung ba'i cho ga byi'o// de'i 'og tu sa
39a7(rgyud): brtag par bya ste/ rdo dang / bsreg ma dang / gyo mo med pa/ skye ba po grog sbur la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sa ni thams cad du yang shis pa'o// der bza' gtum po la ma bab pa/ chos grang
39a8(rgyud): ngan pa ma yin pa mi mthun par 'jug pa dang phrad pa spangs pa/ nyi ma dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' bzang por mngon pa las brtsams na shis par 'gyu ro// dmar dang
39b1(rgyud): ser dang dkar dang gnag/ 'dren ma pa ni lnga pa yin// gang yang rungs der ni// mkhas pas khru gang tsam brkos te// sngags pa yi ni brkos pa de// sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya// lhag na rnam
39b2(rgyud): pa kun tu mchog khang chang ni 'bring du brjod// gang bar ma gyur sad sprang // mkhas pas der ni brtsam mi bya// dkar po dag ni ni bar bstan// dmar po dbang gi don du 'dod// ser po rgyas par
39b3(rgyud): shes par bya// nag po drag shul spyod par shes// der ni mchod yon gtor ma dang / mar me spos dang bdug pa dag/ bsgrims te byin nas bsrung bya ste// mnyam par gzhag nas sa la brjod// 
39b4(rgyud): yi nub mo sa der ni/ ku sha bting ba'i steng du nyal// gal te ngas ni rung gyur na// der ni bsgrims te bri bar bye// sngon gyi sangs rgyas mi mchog gis// de ni dgegs med yin
39b5(rgyud): zhes brjod// gzhan du na ni der mi bri/ dgrags dang bcas/ bas phung bar 'gyur// de nis sngags pa langs ni/ sa ni// de yi nyin mo mkhas pa yis// sa ni shin tu yod
39b6(rgyud): sbyangs phyir// sbyin bsreg bya ba 'ang bya ste// sbrang rtsi dang ni 'o ma dang // mar bsres sbyin bsreg mchog tu 'gyur// zhi ba'i sems kyis sbyin blugs ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsreg bya/ nganas
39b7(rgyud): sngags pas sa brkos la// sa de nyid kyis slar dgang ngo // yang na dkyil 'khor las kyi tshe// sngags pas spos kyi sa dgang ngo // legs par brdung zhing mnyam 'jam bya// phyogs cha dag dang
39b8(rgyud): sgo yi rnams// kun kyang rnam pa thams cad du/ rin chen sna lngas rab mdzes bya// bye brag tu ni sa dbus su// rin chen sna lnga bzhag par bya// de nas yon tan ldan pa yi// slob ma dag ni gdams/ 
40a1(rgyud): te gzung // bzlas brjod sbyin bsreg rnam kun gyis// bsgrims te de dag bsrung bar bya// mchog sbyin rdo rje blo ldan gyi// gsang sngags 'di ni zlos pa na// skyon dang yon tan rnam dpyad pas/ 
40a2(rgyud): de dag thog mar brtag par bya// yon tan 'di dag ldan pa ni// shin tu brtags nas gzung bar bya// rig dang gzon phun sum tshogs// gsal zhing dul la brtson pa dang // shes rab ldan brtan byas gzo
40a3(rgyud): dang / dkon mchog gsum la gzhol ba dang / gzugs mdzes yan lag yongs rdzogs dang // gang dag theg chen dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun la yang // gang dag rtag tu gus gnas dang / 
40a4(rgyud): phal gus dang ma la gus// bla ma mchod la rab brtson dang // / gang dag pha rol don spyod la// snying nas rtag tu 'jug pa dang // / gang dag dran zhing nges pa dang // g.yo sgyu med cing chos brtson
40a5(rgyud): dang // lus dang ngag dang yid dag pa// de dag nye bar rtag gzung bya// gang dag snying nas 'jig rten 'di// 'jig rten pha rol yid ches dang // bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang // dmang rig
40a6(rgyud): gang dag chos brtson zhing // sngags kyi theg pa rtogs 'dod pa// de dag bsgrims te gzung bar bya// nyan thos theg pa pa rnams min// zhar ba lag zha za ma dang // rgur po 'on pa mi thung dang // gang dag sna
40a7(rgyud): lelab gyur pa dang // de bzhin mi g.yon gnod bag can// 'jungs dang byas pa mi gzo dang // mkhas bsnyems sems dang g.yo can dang // sngags kyi theg pa skying chen gyi// theg pa la ni ma mos pa// de dag
40a8(rgyud): nam yang gzung mi bya// de dag stan 'dir skal ba med// bstan bcos mi shes mi bzung ste// tho bu tho bu 'dzin pa dang // de bzhin bla ma mi gus pa// smad pa de dag ring du spang // gang dag yan lag
40b1(rgyud): mtshang dang / rkang zha dag dang theng po dang // yan lag lhag par gyur pa rnams// mkhas pas bsgrims te yongasu spang // ji skad smos pa'i slob ma rnams// de tshe cho ga bzhin brtags te// gcig pu yod/ 
40b2(rgyud): na'ang de gzung ngo // yang na slob ma bzhi zhig gzung // de nas smyung ba byad bcug la// spos dang me tog rnams kyis mchod// dkyil 'khor nang gi sa la ni// ku sha gding ba gting ba la// nges pas slob
40b3(rgyud): ma lhan cig tu// der ni rab tu nyal bar bya// slob dpon yud ci ma yud tsam zhing // de tshe slob ma rnams la ni// thag chen zab mo rgya chen gyi// chos kyang rab tu bshad par bya// gsang sngags brjod las
40b4(rgyud): byung ba yi// yon tan kun tu brjod na phan// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' rnams kyis// rdzu 'phrul la sogs yongasu brjo/ dang // pha rol rgyu la snying rje ba// de dag yud tsam yud tsam brjod/ 
40b5(rgyud): nam gyi bzhi cha lus pa'i tshe// gal tA rmi lam bzang rmin// da kon mchog gsum la gzhol rnams kyis// nam nangs pa dang legs rab tu// sangs rgyas spyan sngar 'dug nas ni// khyed
40b6(rgyud): kyis de dag brjod par gyis// pad+ma'i steng du 'dug na mchog/ bzung dang mthong ba'ang de bzhin te// rgya mtsho mthong bar rmis pa dang // rgyal dang 'thungs pa'ang de bzhin no// sangs rgyas mthong na snying dga'
40b7(rgyud): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang // 'jig rten rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos dag dang gang mkhas pa// de dag mthong na snying dga'o// me yi phung po grags pa dang // ba glang khyu mchog gra/ 
40b8(rgyud): chan drags// rta ni dkar por gang gyur pa// de dag mthong dang zhon pa dang // ba lang khyu yang shis pa yin// bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang // rgyal po dge bar grags pa dang // sdug pa'i gnyen dang grub pa dang / 
41a1(rgyud): / nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // de dag mthong na shis par 'gyur/ rmi lam smra zhing gtam zer dang / rang gi mgo bo gcod pa dang / sha chen za bar byed pa dang // khrag gis khrus kyang byed par
41a2(rgyud): de bzhin mi gtsang nub pa dang // zho dang 'bras can za ba dang // chang yang 'thung bar byed pa dang // skra 'dreg pa ni mchog yin no// so yang ltung bar gyur pa dang // ri dang shing ni n+ya gro dang / de la 'dzags
41a3(rgyud): pab shis par 'gyur// lagaso bu zhe 'am blo ldan zhes// sgra ni de skad thos pa dang // yid du 'ong ba'i bud med dang // nyin mo nyal po byed pa dang // tshangs pa drag po'i nyi ma dang // khyab 'jug dang ni zla ba dang
41a4(rgyud): lus ngan po dang ner sbyin dang / brgya byin dang ni chu lha dang // de/ ngag mthong ngam smras pa dang // 'phel gtam byed na nges pa dar 'grub// gzhan yang de lta'i rmi lam dag/ dngos grub 'dod
41a5(rgyud): pa rnams kyis gzung // rmi lam de las bzlog pa dag/ 'ji rdzogs pa med kyis gzung mi bya// sa la rgyug dang 'tshong ba dang // gar byed pa dang glu len dang // dgod dang bong bu rnga mo la// 
41a6(rgyud): zhon pa shin tu ngan pa yin// 'bru mar gyis ni lus brkus dang // gcer bu dag dang smra ba dang // zhar ba theng po rkur po dang // mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa dang // pag rnams dang ni khyi rnams dang // bung bu
41a7(rgyud): rnams kyang de bzhin te// ma ha rnga mo tsa spyang dag/ rmi lam mthong na rtag tu smad// rtsa gsum rtsa gsum gdengs thogs dang // mig dmar shin tu 'jigs pa dang // gcer bu dag dang sna la ba dang // bsdig
41a8(rgyud): mi byed pa'i 'jigs byed dang / mdog mnag mi bzang chen po dang / gos sngon gzugs byang mi sdug pa/ su yi rmi lam rmis pa ni// de la dngos grub yong mi 'gyur/ zung shig rgyab shig choms
41b1(rgyud): shig ce 'am// zo shig ces pa'i mi bzang sgra// drag po'i 'jigs byed khro thos dang // phud dang ma rnyed thos pa dang // bya rgod bzhad dang bya gar dang // 'ug pa bya rog byi la dang // byi ba sdig pa sre mo sbrul// gang
41b2(rgyud): yang gzhan dag skye bo gdug// de dag rmi lam mthong gyur tam// reg par gyur na'ang mi dge'o// de nas phyi de nyin par slob dpon gyis rdo rje'i snying pos pa'i rnam lnga la sngags kyis btab te/ slob ma
41b3(rgyud): bos la rdo rje dag po'i snying pos bsang gtor byas te/ shing a shwad tha'i lo ma skyongs pa 'am/ snyim pa'i nang du snod du bya ba sbyin zhing khyed de rid zas kyi tshad shes par gyis shig ces bsgo bar
41b4(rgyud): bya'o// nyi ma nub na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'jigs med kyi sreg/ sa blugs dang / yang sreg shing nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsra/ ga bya'o// de nas a shwang tha'i shing ngam// yang na u dum
41b5(rgyud): par las// ser brgyad tsam gyi so shing bya// thog ma gcig ni me tog brgyan// rdo rje drag po'i sngags btab la// de de ga la ni bca' phyir sbyin// shar gyi phyogasu mdun bstan
41b6(rgyud): nam// yang na byang phyogs bstan te bzhag/ gsang sngags mgon po dran byas la// gar bltas de bzhin shes par bya// de nas phyi nyin slob ma rnams// smyung ba byed du bcug nas su// 
41b7(rgyud): rje mi 'pham me zhes bya/ srid pa gsum po rmis byed pa// rtag dran bya phyir de dag la/ dri ma med pa'i gzungs byin bya// snying du sdug pa'i dam tshig brjod// nyams pa la yang lhag par brjod// sdig
41b8(rgyud): parab tun par byed/ mchog tu bkra shis byed por 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' gro ldan pa/ thams cad kyis ni ma yin te/ sdig pa thams cad kyang byed pa/ de ni kun tu dag dran bya/ slob dpan
42a1(rgyud): gyis ni thams cad du// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag sems kyis// sna lnga'i tshon las byas pa yi// thig skud rab tu bzang blangs la// bsgrims te sa 'di thams cad la// thig
42a2(rgyud): ni legs par gdab par bya// dkyil 'khor dkyil du 'dug nas su// sngags pas de bzhin gshegs rnams la// de bzhin rdo rje 'chang ba dang // 'khor los bsgyur ba dran byas la// bdag nyid dar
42a3(rgyud): bsgoms byas nas su// de'i sngags yid kyis dran byas la// de nas shar phyogs kha bstan te// shar phyogs nyid du thig gdab po// de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis// nub phyogs kha bltas 'dug
42a4(rgyud): nas su// nub phyogs nyid du thig gdab po// de nas bsgyur/ te mkhas pa yis// byang phyogasu ni kha bltas la// bya/ dang phyogs ni thig gdab po// de nas kyang ni bsgyur byas la// lho
42a5(rgyud): phyogasu ni kha bltas te// rnam par dbye ba shes pa yin// lho phyogs nyid du thig gdab bo// de ltar nang logs dkyil 'khor ni// cha brgyad yod par rab tu bya// de nas de lta'i tshul gyis
42a6(rgyud): ni phyogs bzhir yongasu bskor byas la// kun tu gru bzhi lham par ni// rab tu bsgrims te thig gdab pa// dbus kyi gnas nas byung nas su// ma yi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la// sngags pas sngags
42a7(rgyud): kyi cho ga bzhin/ shar phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab po// de nas cho ga shes pa yis// gus par dbang ldan phyogs song la// nub phyogasu ni kha bltas te// byang phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab po// dbang ldan
42a8(rgyud): phyogs nas song nas su/ rlung gi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la// der ni lho phyogs kha bltas te/ nub phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab po// gnas de nas ni de byung la/ bden bral phyog su dong nas su// me yi
42b1(rgyud): phyogs kyi bar du ni// thig skud legs par gdab par bya// kun tu grub zhi ldam par ni/ de ltar gnas de byas nas su// de nas phyi rol de bzhin du// cho ga bzhin du cha brgyad bya/ tshad ni bcu drug khru mI/ 
42b2(rgyud): te/ slob dpon nyid kyi khru yin no// de nas byung la blo ldan gyis// cha gzhan dag ni bya bar bya/ phyi rol sa dang bcas par ni// khru grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// der yang snga ma bzhin du ni// cha brgyad nyi du cang bar phye/ 
42b3(rgyud): brgyad pa nas ni bzung nas su/ sngags pa yis ni thams cas 'khor sa'i thig ni gdab par bya// gnas gsum dag tunges par yang // cha brgyad tsam yang 'tsham pa yi// thog ma'i sgo ni gdong
42b4(rgyud): bya/ dkyil 'khor rim pa bar ma la// snga ma nyis 'gyur sgor shes bya/ rim pa gsum par sum 'gyur dang // sgo grang dadag kyang mkhas pas bya// rta babs dag gis tshad rnams ni/ 
42b5(rgyud): dbus kyi cha dang mnyam par bya// lha yi gtso bo rnams la yang / sgo gang dag ni bya bar bya/ rim pa gsum du rnam dbye bas// de ltar dkyil 'khor lags phye la// sngags mgon gan
42b6(rgyud): la 'dug nas su// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// tshon rtsi 'dir ni bye brag tu// rin chen sna lnga yin par 'dod// sa lu btags pa'i phye yang rung // ji ltar 'byor pas byar yang rung // gos dkar
42b7(rgyud): bgos shing gtsang byas la// dul zhing ze'u ka bcings nas su// bsgrims te byang shar phyogs mtshams nas// tshon rtsi dag ni dgye bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis sam// yang na lcags kyu'i phyag
42b8(rgyud): rgyas sam// gnod kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis sam// rig byed 'don pa'i lag paso// thog mar dkar po bgyi bar bya// de yi 'og tu dmar po dgye// de yi 'og tu ser po ste// de yi 'og tu ljang ku ra gyi// dzad
43a1(rgyud): dag ni nang rol du// sngags pas tshon rtsi nag po dgye// chu brgyad dag tu gang bstan pa// dbus kyi cha yi cha rnams ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ste// de dag rdo rje bcing chub
43a2(rgyud): / 'dod// gdan ni pad+mar bstan pa ste// mchog tu dkar zhing mdzes pa yin// de yi steng du rdo rje bzhag/ de bzhin rdo rje gtsug tor te// me lha 'bar ba'i snying po bya// mdor na sa bon ldan par bya// de la shar
43a3(rgyud): phyogasu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog bzhag par bya'o// lho phyogasu de bzhin gshegs pa me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po'o// nub phyogasu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med do// 
43a4(rgyud): byang phyogasu de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'o// byang shar dgyi phyogs mtshamasu de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug to// ra can no// shar lho'i phyogs mtshamasu de bzhin gshegs
43a5(rgyud): pa rnam par gzig so// lho nub kyi phyogasu de bzhin gshegs pa/ thams cad skyob bo// nub byang gi mtshamasu de bzhin pa/ shegs pa 'khor ba 'jig go// mdor na dbus kyi pad+ma ni// mngab
43a6(rgyud): ma brgyad par brjod pa ste/ mngab ma dkar po shar phyogasu// nub phyogasu ni dmar po nyid// byang phyogasu ni ser po ste// lho phyogasu ni nag po nyid// mdab ma lhag ma rnams kun tu// rgyal ba rnams kyis
43a7(rgyud): 'dren mar gsungs// de yi snying po'i dbus su ni// bum pa zla 'od 'dra ba bri/ de yi stang du rlung chen ste// 'bar zhing tog dang ldan par bri// zla gam 'dra zhing drag po ste// 'di ni dbyar sprin mdog 'dra la/ 
43a8(rgyud): rlung gi steng du ma bris te// dbyibs ni gru gsum gnas pa yin// rtags ni 'bras bu zur gsum pa// 'jig pa'i dus kyi me dang mtshungs// nga yi dbus su pad+ma bri// 'od ni dus mtha'i ma dang 'dra// 
43b1(rgyud): de yi snying po'i dbus su ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba bri bar bya/ de la bcom ldan 'das de ni gzugs sam phyag rgya'am yi ge ci rig su gnag par bya'o// phyag brgya bzhag na rdo rjes/ bsgrims nas
43b2(rgyud): sa bon ldan par bya// de yi phyi rol cha rnams ni// brgyad po dag tu snga ma bzhin// sngags pas cho ga ji bzhin du// lha rnams rnam par dgod par bya// de lo shar phyogasu ni kha lo'i dkyil 'khor
43b3(rgyud): du me'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs pa pad+ma sbyin pa'i rdo rje dang bcas pa rdo rje ud ba la'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o// shar lho'i phyogs mtsham su ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du kun tu
43b4(rgyud): bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bca/ sa pa bri'o// lho phyogasu ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor
43b5(rgyud): du lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas shing rdo rje 'chang thams cad dang / lhan cig tu rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o// lho nub kyi mtshamasu ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du byung
43b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o// nub phyogasu ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du/ byang chub se
43b7(rgyud): dpa' na mkha'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod pa bri'o// nub byang gi mtsham su ni pad+ma rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems byams pa 'khor dang bcas pa
43b8(rgyud): ril pa spyi rings kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// byang phyogasu ni pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag
44a1(rgyud): rgya dang dgod par bri'o// byang shar gyi mtshamasu ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya dang bcas/ 
44a2(rgyud): pa dgod par bya'o// phyogs bzhi ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'khor dang bcas par rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po nang du chud par bri'o// de la nyan thos kyi bu'i phyag rgya ni dbyug tho yin no// 'phags pa
44a3(rgyud): skyes po'i phyag rgya ni btson no// mig mi bzang gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o// lus ngan gyi phyag rgya ni bzhag pa'o// phyi rol khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni gru bzhi lham pa sgo bzhi btod pa// sgo khang dang / rta
44a4(rgyud): babs dang / mu ran shin tu rnam par phye ba khor yug chen pos/ yongasu bskor ba'o// de'i nang rol du ni 'jig rten pa'i dalha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o// de la shar phyogasu ni lha'i
44a5(rgyud): dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i byang phyogasu ni tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas ba pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// tshangs pa'i byang phyogasu
44a6(rgyud): ni dbyangs can 'khor dang bcas pa pi wang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dang nye bar sa'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i byang phyogasu ni dpal chen mo 'khor dang / 
44a7(rgyud): bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'am yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// dbang ldan gyi phyog su ni 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor dang bcas pa mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang
44a8(rgyud): bcas pa bri'i// brgya byin gyi lho phyogasu ni nyi ma 'khor dang bcas pa shing rta'i phyag rgya dang bcas po bri'o// me'i phyog su ni drang srong ma'i lce 'khor dang bcas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang / 
44b1(rgyud): bcas pa bri'o// lho phyogasu ni bshin rje 'khor dang bcas gshin rje'i betson gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i shar phyog su ni 'chi bdag gi dril bu bri'o// mtshan mo nag mo'i ni rtog go// nag por
44b2(rgyud): ni zhags pa'o// drag po'i chung ma'i ni mdung rtse gsum pa'o// tshangs pa'i chung ma'i pad+ma'o// khyab 'jug gi chung ma ni 'khor lo'o// gzhon nu ma'i mdung thung ngo // pag gi chung ma'i ni tho ba'o// tsA muN+Dini
44b3(rgyud): ni mi thod do// dbang po'i chung ma'i ni rdo rje'o// lus ngan gyi chung ma'i ni dbyug tho'o// gshin rje'i nub phyogasu ni yi dgas rnams 'khor dang bcas pa kha'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// sha za rnams ni ng+ga
44b4(rgyud): ba rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// gnon po rnams lnga/ dgas kyi rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// grib ga/ non rnams ni gdugs rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// 
44b5(rgyud): brjed byed rnams ni lag pa brang la bcar ba'i phyag rgya dang / bcas pa bri'o// mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni lag pa ba kan pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// srin mo rnams ni mche ba
44b6(rgyud): rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya'am lce rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// sha za mo rnams ni rdo rje bab col gyi lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// bden bral gyi phyogasu ni bden bral 'khor dang
44b7(rgyud): bcas pa ral gri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// nub phyogs kyi sgo'i lho phyogasu ni chu lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcwa
44b8(rgyud): pabazhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de nas sgo dang nye bar dbang phyug chen po mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dang nye bar dka' thub bzlog pa rtse gsum
45a1(rgyud): gdengs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// sgo'i byang phyogs kyi ngos su tshogs kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i byang phyog su thag
45a2(rgyud): bzangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dbyug to rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// rlung gi phyog su rlung lnga 'khor dang bcas pa ba dan gyi phyag rgya dang bcas
45a3(rgyud): pa bri'o// byang phyogasu rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dbyug to rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dag gi shar phyogasu khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas
45a4(rgyud): pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i 'og tu nam/ kha' lding 'khor dang bcas pa mdab ma'i phyag rgya dang bca/ sa pa bri'o// nga'i shar phyogasu ni sna tshogs phreng ba can la
45a5(rgyud): sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po rnams dang / ljon pa la sogs ba mi 'am ci'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste/ de la dri za dag gi phyag rgya
45a6(rgyud): rnams ni rnga phrang bu dang pag rnam so// mi 'am ci'i phyag rgya dag ni sku'i pi wang dang / pi wang la sogs pa bdud ba sbreng ba rnam so// de nas lto 'phye chen po rnams dang 'bab chu chen po rnams rang gi phyag
45a7(rgyud): rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de nas skye dgu'i bdag po rig byed 'don pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dag gi shar phyogasu zla ba 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma dkar po dang bum pa'i phyag rgya dang
45a8(rgyud): bcas pa bri'o// nub sgor ni ki li ki la rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri ste drag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// byang sgor ni sgo srung gnyis bri bar bya ste/ de la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu ni dbyug
45b1(rgyud): to'i phyag rgya bri'o// klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya bri'o// shar sgor ni khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis bri bar bya ste/ de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa/ 
45b2(rgyud): bri 'o/ ba con sngon po can ni be con gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// lho sgor ni thub par dka' tho ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// mngon phyogs na rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dri'o// 'og log su ni rgya
45b3(rgyud): mtsho dang / rgya mtsho'i 'gram na sring mo bzhi rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// de la dum bu ru'i phyag rgya ni dbyug tho bo// rgyal ma'i phyag rgya ni mdung rtse gsum pa'o// rnam par rgyal ma'i phyag
45b4(rgyud): rgya ni pad+ma'o// mi nga ma ma'i phyag rgya ni 'khor lo// gzhan gyi sa mi thub mo'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o// srin mo bzhi'i lho phyogs ni smin drug bu 'khor dang bcas pa mdung thung gi phyag rgyad
45b5(rgyud): bcas pa bri'o// byang phyogasu ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rnams ral gri dang ras la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcu sa pa bri'o// 'khor thams cad kyi gnas ni thig ler bri'o// 
45b6(rgyud): de dang de ltar lhag ma brjod pa thams cad ni thig ler byas te// thams cad kyang rdo rje drag pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi las ci bya ba de thams cad ni rdo rje drag po'i snying pos
45b7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs te bya'o// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las dkyil 'khor rnams dgod pa'i cho ga'o// cho ga shes pas de lta bur// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mchog bris te/ byin gyis brlabs pa byas
45b8(rgyud): nas su/ rab tu bsgrims te mchod pa bya// de nas bum pa zhabs mi gnas/ kha yi cha gshel kha can// mgrin pa ring bzhing lto che ba/ nyi shu rtsa lnga blang bar bya// sa bon rin chen sman gyis bkang // spos
46a1(rgyud): kyi chus kyang rab tu bkang // kha rgyan ya la gas khebs byas shing // de bzhin 'bras bus kha bkang la// mgul chings kyis kyang bcing byas pa/ kha dog ci rigs rnam par dgod
46a2(rgyud): sgo bzhi po ni thams cad du// bum pa snga ma ji bzhin du// brgyad nyid du ni gsungs pa ste// dgu pa ni bsang gtor ba// rdo rje drag pos rnam kun tu// bsgrims te de ni sngags kyis gdab// bcu pa dbus
46a3(rgyud): su shes par bya// de ni 'khor los bsgyur la dbul// rta babs rnams ni mdzes pa ste// rin chen rnam pa bzhi las byas// yang na yid 'ong shing las bye// tsan ngan yang na gzhan yang rung // dum bu ma yin/ 
46a4(rgyud): ma grugs pa/ gas pa med cing 'dzer ba med/ bu run dang sha ngam dang // sa la ba'i kang ka ta yang rung / rin chen dril bu rab sbyangs shing // dar dang ras la sogs pas rgyan// khru ni brgyad
46a5(rgyud): dam bdun nam drug me tog phreng dang ldan par 'dod// stang / du rin chen bla re bre/ mu tig rgyan phreng rnam par sbyang // dar/ dang ras kyang sbyang bar bya// dkyil 'khor bas ni che ba bya/ kha
46a6(rgyud): dog sna tshogs pa ngan rnams// phyogs bzhi dag tu spang bar bya// srang bu la ni brgyu bar bya// dril bu sgra 'byung ldan par bya// kha dog sna tshogs gdugs kyi rnams// ci rigs par ni bre bar bya// rin chen
46a7(rgyud): bzhi las byas pa 'am// de med zangs las byas po'ang rung // mchod pa'i g.yog ni snod bzhi zhig/ blo dang ldan pas bzhag par bya// sna tshogs sposu gsungs pa ni// gur gum dang ni tsan dan dang // 
46a8(rgyud): s+thi ka la sogs ci yang rung // srog chags yan lag kun mi rung / sna tshogs gdug pa dbul bya ste/ a ga ru dang sgron shing dang // ga bur shi ri ba sa gtso bog dang ni ru tadang // sa la'i shing gi thang chu
46b1(rgyud): 'am// yang na thang shing thang chung dbul// rdo rje 'byung ba'i rig pa'am// rdo rje drag pos bzlas brjod bya// u ba la dang pad+ma mchog tsam pa ka dang klu shing dang // ge sa ra dang ma li ka mya ngan tshang dang skya snar/ 
46b2(rgyud): dang / ta ka ra dang pu na gdong ka'i me tog mdzes pa yin// kar bi ra ku mu dang // sna ma d+hu nu skA ri yau/ me tog ci rigs dbul bar bya// de bzhin lha bshos sna tshogs te// 'o thug shing dang 'bras chan
46b3(rgyud): dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi rab tu bzang // bag chos dang ni la thu dang // sbrang rtsi bzhag pa'i cung pang dang / a shi brti pa na ka/ spyan gzigs kha 'drar grags pa dang // shi ra ba d+ha ka mo dang // gar b+hod ka ra
46b4(rgyud): ka dang ni/ be reg dang ni tra ya tse/ sha ku la dang pa ra pa ta/ 'bru yi la thug 'bring bu dang // shun di ba la gi dag dang // g+ha da ri ka dang swa sti ka/ mon sran gre'u gyi nu te'u dang // rtsa ba dang ni
46b5(rgyud): drungs pa dang // 'bras bu sna tshogs dbul bar bya// sran tshe/ nga kha dog ldan pa dang / sge'u gshar nges par dbul bar bya// sran tshed ril bu che chung dang // pa 'ga' na dang sa b+ha d+hi/ 
46b6(rgyud): bu ram bsres pa'i khu sman dang // rab tu bsgrims te byas pa dang // bu ram sna tshogs bcos pa dang // kun tu rnam pa thams cad dbul// rnam pa sna tshogs zho dag dang // zho srungs bu ram btab
46b7(rgyud): nges dbul// 'o ma lags par btsags pa dang // de bzhin btung ba rnams kyang dbul// kha ra'i dbu ba kha ra dang // mar dang bu ram 'bru mar dang // sbrang rtsi dang ni lan tshwa dang // dge bar grags pa dbul
46b8(rgyud): bar bya// btung ba bsgos pa byas pa dang // tam po la dang mal cha dang // snod spyad bzang zhing mdzes pa dang // rnam pa sna tshogs rtsi sman rnams// rab tu bsgrims te cho ga bzhin// byang chub sems
47a1(rgyud): / dpa'i skyob la dbul// de nas so so re re la'ang / na bza' ras zung re re dbul// me long mig sman yid 'ong dang / dung dang de bzhin gi ru wang rnams// byang chub tshogs ni bka
47a2(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ mgon po kun la dbul bar bya// skyob pa rnams la thams cad du// de ltar legs par mchod byas nas// de nas sngags pas sbyin bsreg bya// snying po cho ga bzhin du bya/ sregs blugs
47a3(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig ni// cho ga bzhin du sbyin bsreg bya// thams cad 'grub byed yid 'ong ba/ mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi'o// yi ge glog pa bzhi dag kyang // phyogs bzhi dag tu bzhag par bya// de la shar phyogs
47a4(rgyud): bzhag pa ni// 'phags pa shes rab pha rol phyin// byang po dag su ni mdo bzhag pa// gser 'od dam par dam pas bzhed// nub phyogasu ni bzhag bya ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
47a5(rgyud): gsang ba yin// sdong po bkod pa tshul chen ni// lho phyogs lo/ gsu shes par bya// dkyil 'khor lha rnams ji lta bar// / de dag la yang gus par mchod// dam pa'i chos ni klag pa ni// 
47a6(rgyud): srung ba rnams kyi dam pa yin// de nas lha rnams thams cad kyang // de yi tshe na dgyes par 'gyur// gang dag 'jig rten mi srun pa// de dag phyogs phyogs 'gro bar 'gyur// de lta bas na rnam kun tu// 
47a7(rgyud): de tshe dam chos bklag par bya// slob ma thams cad bos nas su// de dag la ni skyabs gsum sbyin// sdig pa mi bya brjod par bya// sdom pa dag kyang 'dzin du bzhug/ mkhas pas cho ga 'di bzhin du/ 
47a8(rgyud): byang chub sems kyang bskyed du gzhug/ rdo rje drag po'i sngags chu yi// de nas kun la gsang gtor bya// dam tshig yongasu brjod byas la// mkhas pas nang du zhugs nas su// gos rnams yongasu
47b1(rgyud): brjes byas te/ sngags kyis yongasu gdab par bya// de tshe snying rje ldan pa yis// slob ma de dag gdong bkab la// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya sngags pas 'ching bcug ste/ lag
47b2(rgyud): tu me tog sbyin byas la// de tshe snying khar yi ge bsam// skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni// me tog de dag 'thor du gzhug/ blo dang ldan pas slob ma yi/ rna g.yas rdo rje dril bu bzhag/ rdo rje rnga zhes bya ba
47b3(rgyud): yi/ lha mo chen po g.yon par ro// me tog rnams ni gar bab pa/ lha da do yi yin par 'dod// de ltar slob ma bcug byas nas// da tshe dam tshig bstan par bya// mkhas pas zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// 'di
47b4(rgyud): ltar sbyin bsreg rab tu bya// de nas 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smra so// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang
47b5(rgyud): de bzhin drag shul spyong // sbyin sreg las ni mdor bsdus pa// sems dpa' chen pos brjod par mdzod// cho ga tha mas cad rgyas pa dang // de bzhin tha dad las kyang gsungs// 
47b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'i gnas gang du// me yi thab kyi khung bu bgyi// yam sreg shing cis ji lta bur/ las ni ci zhig rtsam par bgyi// khyab bdag thang khung bka' stsol la// bdag gi the tsom
47b7(rgyud): bsal du gsol// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smra so// sems dpa' chen
47b8(rgyud): po legaso legs// khyod kyi dri ba gang byas pa// de dag thams cad brjod par bya// g.yang ba med pa'i yid kyis nyon// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus su ni// sbyin bsreg ma thab khung bu bya// 
48a1(rgyud): de tshad gtan pa dbab pa ni// khru gang tsam du brjod pa ste// mtho gang tsam zhig brkos nas su// dbus su rdo rje bzhag par bya// kha khyer yang ni der byas te// mkhas pas mdzes pa/ 
48a2(rgyud): gzugs bya// rdza ba rtse mor dkris pa yi/ ku sha dag ni der dgram mo// de ltar kun tu lags par yang // sngags pas shin tu dkram par bya// ha cang mi nye mi ring bar// sbyin bsreg ma yi thab bya ste/ 
48a3(rgyud): tshul bzhin du ni byas nas su// der ni sbyin bsregs brtsams par bya/ ku sha sbams steng bdag 'dug ste// de bzhin gshegs rnams dran byas nas// de nas ma ni 'bor byas la// de la bsang gtor
48a4(rgyud): bya ba brtsam// de yi 'og tu me dar ni// me tog gcig gcig pa zhag par bya// de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya// rang gi phyag rgya ngas 'gug par 'gyur// de la ma yi phyag rgya ni// lag pa g.yas/ 
48a5(rgyud): ba drang brkyang ste// mthe bo mthe cung ngung du gzugs// sngagasa'adi dag gi 'gug par bya'o// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba thA ag+na ye hA bya ba ha na ya swA hA/ blo dang
48a6(rgyud): ldan pas rang sngags kyis// de nas dgang blugs sbyin bsreg bya// de la dgang blugs phul nas ni// slob ma g.yon du bzhig par bya// de dag re re'i phyir yang ni// dgang blugs nyi shu lnga lnga sreg/ rnam pa
48a7(rgyud): sna tshogs las kyi rnams// 'di lta bu dag rab bya ste// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang drag shul spyod pa'o// zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg 'o mar bcas// mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi'o// rgyas la zho dang 'bras can dang / 
48a8(rgyud): gang dag gzhan las gsungs pa'o// drag shul spyod pa tsher mar gsungs// dbang byar snga ma ji bzhin du// las 'dod 'jigs pa med rnams kyis// ci rigs par ni sbyin bsreg bya// ji ltar rigs
48b1(rgyud): pa so so las// de dag las ni g.yon 'dug go// yang na yid la gang 'dod pa// de ni ci bder sbyin par gyis// de yi tshe na slob dpon la// slob ma rnams kyis yon dbul lo// ma byin na ni dam tshig nyams// 
48b2(rgyud): dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro// dper na nyi ma zla ba gnyis// 'jig rten mig tu mkhas pas 'dod// de bzhin skye ba 'di la yang // slob dpon de ni mig 'drar 'dod// dper na ma yi khams de ni// 
48b3(rgyud): bud shing thams cad sreg par byed// de bzhin slob dpon shes par bya// mi shes bud shing sreg par byed// dper na chu yi khams de ni// 'jig rten gdung ba thams cad gcod// de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang / 
48b4(rgyud): gdung ba kun gcod shes par bya// dper na rlung gi khams de da ni// 'jig rten thams cad rtog tu sgrub// de bzhin slob da dpon slob ma la// dge ba rnam par sgrub par byed// dper na lus
48b5(rgyud): can thams cad la// sa ni rten du grags pa yin// de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang // chos kyi rten du 'dod pa yin// dper na bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad// chos kun rtogs par thugs
48b6(rgyud): chung// de bzhin slob dpon shes par bya// dper na dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // gsang ba thams cad 'thun par 'dzin// de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang // 'dir ni sngags kyis gsang ba 'dzin// dkon mchog
48b7(rgyud): gsum gyi bsngags pa rnams// de ni rtag tu brjod par byed// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// bsngags pa chen po'ang brjod par byed// dper na sangs rgyas mig 'dra ste// yang dag lam ni
48b8(rgyud): ston mdzad pa// de bzhin sngags pa 'jigs med kyang // thag chen gnas 'di ston pa yin// bdag ltar sngags pa de bzhin te// slob dpon ji bzhin rgyal de bzhin// slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung // skyon
49a1(rgyud): rnams nams kyang gzung mi bya// yon tan 'dzin na grub par gyur// nyes pa rnams ni dngos grub nyams// slob dpon la ni smad byas nas// 'jig rten dag na tshe thung zhing / de bzhin ngan
49a2(rgyud): song 'gro bar 'gyur// nya ba la sogs rigasu skye// 'di ni nyes kun 'byung gnas te// mkhas pas bla ma skur mi gang ba// chos 'dod rnams kyis slob dpon la// rtag par rgyun tu mnyes par bya// ga
49a3(rgyud): na rgyal ba'i sras gnas pa/ sa de mchod rten 'dra ba yin// der ni rgyal sras thams cad dang // bdag kyang snying las chung ngu yin// sbyin sreg las ni dam pa 'di// dpa' bo khyed la brjod pa ni// sems
49a4(rgyud): can rnams la phan bzhed pa// mgon po rnams kyis sngon cha/ du bshad// sbyin sreg bya ba'i las rnams la// gang gis 'di ltar rnam shes pa// de ni sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin/ dngos
49a5(rgyud): grub myur du thob par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las ma'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par bya ba'o// / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ bam po bzhi ga/ da na
49a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// sangs rgyas snga mas bsngags pa yi// dbang bskur dkyil 'khor brjod par bya// khru
49a7(rgyud): gsum tshad gcig bzhag nas su// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi tshad ni khru bzhi ste// dkyil 'khor logasu mngon phyogs bya// der yang sngags pas cha snyams shing // kun tu gru bzhi lham par
49a8(rgyud): bya// sngags pas sngags kyi tshul gnas te// ma yi phyogasu 'dug byas la// de tshe byang du mngon phyogs te// cho ga bzhin du thig skud bre// snga ma'i gnas ni spangs nas su// dbang ldan phyogasu 'dug byas
49b1(rgyud): te/ rlung phyogs spyod yul bar du ni// byang phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo// rlung gi phyogasu 'dug nas ni// lho phyogs ngos su mngon bltas te/ bden bral phyogs kyi bar du ni/ nub phyogs ngos kyi thig gang ba
49b2(rgyud): bo// de bzhin rlung gi phyogs spangs te/ bden bral phyogasu 'dug byas nas// de nas shar phyogs mngon bltas te// sngags pas gsang sngags rjes dran zhing // me yi phyogs kyi bar du ni// lho phyog
49b3(rgyud): ngos kyi thig gdab bo// cho ga de bzhin thams cad kyang // grub bzhi lham par rab tu bya// mkhas pas thog ma nyid du ni// nang rim cha brgyad byas nas su// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// mkhas
49b4(rgyud): pas rim pa gnyis su bya// dbus kyi pad+ma mdor brjod na// ma dab brgyad ze bar bcas pa ste// mdab ma'i bar bar tha/ mas cad du// rdo rje dag ni bri bar bya// de dag la yang snying po bri/ 
49b5(rgyud): rang gi snying pos bskul nas ni// phyogs skyong brgyad po dang ga kyang // ji bzhin gnas su rnam par dgod// de la nang re la grwa rnams su// 'jig rten skyong ba rnam par dgod// bgegs
49b6(rgyud): kun zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// sgor ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor ba zhag// dkyil 'khor lha la ji lta bar// der yang mchod pa rab tu bya// ras dang bla re dril bu dang // gdugs dang me tog rnams kyang dbul// mu tig bre
49b7(rgyud): sogs me tog phreng // ci nus ci 'byor dbul bar bya// de la dbus su ni phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan bri'o// rin po che sna bzhi'i bum pa rin po che dang // sman thams
49b8(rgyud): cad kyis bkang ba rin po che me tog dang / me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang / 'od dpag med dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byams pa dang / sa'i
50a1(rgyud): snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa dag gis spyi bor dbang bsku ro// sngags pa pad+ma dam pa der// rab tu bzhag nas bdag nyid kyis/ me tog spos kyis mchod byas la// mar me
50a2(rgyud): mchod yon dbul bar bya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / sil snyan sgra rnams phyung ba dang // rol mo'i sgra sil snyan mang gis// yang dag mngon du dga' byas la// skyob pa kun gyis mngon
50a3(rgyud): sum du// bsgrims te de ni dbang bsku ro// ji ltar gling bzhi'i dbang phyug po// 'khor los bsgyur rgyal dbang bskur ba// de bzhin sngags pas ngo mtshar dang // bkra shis kun gyis dbang bskuro// me tog
50a4(rgyud): rnams dang bdug pa dang // spros mchog rnams kyis yang / mchod la// lag pa g.yas su rdo rje dang // g.yon du'a'akhor lo bzhag nas su// slob ma de la 'di skad du// rdo rje slob
50a5(rgyud): dpon khyod gyur to// te nas rdo rje ldan pa khyod// rdo rje chos ni ra pa brjod pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyis khyod lag tu// ting 'a dzin 'byung ba'i rdo rje byin// de nas 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ 
50a6(rgyud): lag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// sdang ba rnams ni tshar bcad dang // bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa// de dag gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// 'dren pa rnams kyi rdo rje byin// ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal// bdag
50a7(rgyud): por bya phyir dbang bsgyur ba// de bzhin chos rgyal dbang bskur phyir// rdo rje blo ldan dbang bskur brjod// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis// de la bsrung bar bya ba ni// slob ma rdo rje chos brjod la// lag
50a8(rgyud): pas bslang ba byas nas su// dkyil 'khor chen po dar khrid la// dam tshig dag ni rnam bsgregs te// byang chub sems ni btang mi bya// khyod kyis byams dang snying rje dang // lag na 'khor lo gzhar mi
50b1(rgyud): gtang // blo dang ldan pas thabs rnams dang / rdo rje bzhag pa khyod kyis ni// nam yang yongasu btang mi bya// blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang // sangs rgyas dam tshig 'di yin te// ji ltar rang gis
50b2(rgyud): lus bsrungs pa// de ltar khyod kyis 'di gsungs shig / de byas sangs rgyas byas gzo ba// sangs rgyas sras zhes brjod pa yin// gzhan du na ni dam tshig nyams// rdo rje can du khyod mi 'gyur// rdo rje
50b3(rgyud): 'chang ba thams cad kyi// rigs ni byang chub sems yin te// rtags ni snying rje yin zhes brjod// thabs ni dbang du bstan pa ste// rdo rje bzhag pa go cha bgos// rdo rje mtshon cha thogs pa yin// khyod la lnga
50b4(rgyud): rnams phyag kyang 'tshal// khyod la srung ba kun byed/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / rnam pa kun tu srung ba mdzad// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i las dbang bskur ba'i
50b5(rgyud): rim par phye ba rdzogaso// // de nas 'jam rab dpal ldan pa// ya mtshan gyis ni mig rgyas pas// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad smras// dpa' bo gzi brjid chen
50b6(rgyud): po legs// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor gang bshad pa// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa mchog gang gis dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// gsang chen bcas pa yang gsungs shig/ lha rnams thams cad
50b7(rgyud): so so dang // byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi// phyag rgya dang ni sngags bcas pa'i// sbyor ba rnams kyis rab sbyar dang // bsam gtan brtan bca' man ngag dang // rig pa'i chos ni gang yin
50b8(rgyud): dang du brtul zhugs dang ni spyod dang rtags// yul dang dus kyi rnam kun dang // zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin drag shul spyod pa dang // 'byung po dag ni dgug pa dang // nor ba'ang rab tu dgug pa dang / 
51a1(rgyud): / gsang sngags spyi yi mtshan nyid dang / bye brag rnams kyang bshad pa mdzod// 'jig rten 'di ni 'dor ba su// gzhan du 'gro ba su zhig gsungs// 'di dang gzhan 'bras 'jig rten na/ 
51a2(rgyud): rnyed dka' rgyal ba rnams gsungs dang // las ni gzhan gyis byas 'gyur la// 'bras bu gzhan spyod 'gyur ba dang // dkyil 'khor 'di dang sngags rnams kyi// 'bras bu bdag la bshad par mdzod// sangs
51a3(rgyud): rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dga'// mi yi lus kyang rnyed par dka'// gsang sngags 'byung ba rnyed par dka'// dang ba phun sum tshogs pa dka'// sangs rgyas kun gyis di ring khyod// phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// bstan
51a4(rgyud): pa 'di yi bya ba la// gsang chen 'dzin par dgongs pa ste// dkyil de 'khor 'di yi bar dag gi/ cho ga rgyas par bshad par mdzo dang // de skad ces smras pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
51a5(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal lagaso lag so// khyod kyis gang dris pa'i tshig de legs par smras pa ste/ de'i phyir 'jam
51a6(rgyud): dngal rab tu nyon cig/ 'jam dpal de la dkyil 'khor gyi gsang chen ni lha gang yin pa de kho bo yin no// kho bo gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor yin no// lha'i gnas gang yin pa de kho bo'i gnaso// kho
51a7(rgyud): po'i gnas gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ni gsang sngags te// dkyil 'khor med par gsang sngags med ngo do// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dkyil 'khor ni// gzugs
51a8(rgyud): yod pa dang gzugs med pa'o// de la gzugs yod pa ni ri mor bri ba'o// gzugs mang pa ni bri ba ma yin pa'o// gzhan yang bri bar bya ba ni bri ru rung ba'o// mi bri ba ni brir mi rung ba'o// gzhon nu
51b1(rgyud): dril bri ba ma yin pa ni las thams cad bya'o// bri ba ni bya ba dang las kyis rgyu tsam du bang de de ni pha rol dang pa skyeng pa yin la// gcig gis ni lha'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs par bya ba ste/ 
51b2(rgyud): don gnyis sgrub pa dang / bya ba dang / rnal 'byor tha dad pa ma yin pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// slob dpon las dang / bya ba dang / dus dang / byed pa dang / nus pa
51b3(rgyud): dang / 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan du bya ba dang / man ngag dang / rnal 'byor thams cad dang ldan pa'i ngag la dbang thob pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// gzhon nu de la man ngag gang zhe na/ 'di/
