147b1(rgyud): khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA te he re Te swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid lus lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gris lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du drung pa ni mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying rnam par gzhom pa'i
147b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba mu kha b+h+ya// sar+b+ba thA he raM gi ni he he swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las snyim pa'i tshul du byas la/ mdzub mo gnyis dang mtha
147b3(rgyud): bong gnyis gdung gi tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje dung gi phyag rgya ste/ klu thad kyi snying rnam par gzhom pa'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA dza gi ri put+ta re re sA
147b4(rgyud): de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la gung mo gnyis bsnol ba da ni gnod sbyin thang tshar gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o// sdugadas la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH// sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba
147b5(rgyud): thA dzi gi ri ni hUM de ka swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug la gung mo gnyis snga ma bzhin pa/ zhag pa ni dri za tshar gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ 
147b6(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA he ri ge b+h+yaHswA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis 'khyud pa'i tshul du byas pa ni lha ma yin nges par gzhom pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags
147b7(rgyud): laT sarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba thA hUM hUM phaT phaT/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis 'khyud la sbrang ste/ sor mo lhag ma brkyang ba ni na mkha' lding thams cad 'ching
147b8(rgyud): bar byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA ha ri bing+ga li mu khi swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la lag pa g.yon pa bkan ta g.yas/ 
148a1(rgyud): pa khas phub la srin lag gis lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du reg par byas pa ni mi 'am ci tshar bcad pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe
148a2(rgyud): b+h+yaH/ sarba thA dza ya dza ya ni swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mos lag pa de nyid kyi mthil du reg par byas pa ni lto 'phye chen po tshar bcad pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tAH/ 
148a3(rgyud): sarba mu kha b+h+yaHsarba thA ga ra li ni hU~M ka ri ni swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la lag pa gnyis bsnol ba ni sdang ba thams cad dgag pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga teH/ 
148a4(rgyud): sarba mu kha b+h+yaHsarba thA he tsan di hi re bi ke swA hA/ lag pa de gnyis sor mo rnams gcig gis gcig 'khyud la lag pa gnyis snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni srin po thad snying tshim
148a5(rgyud): par bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA gte rgyas rba gu khe b+h+yas thA kaM ka ri Ni dz+nyA ka ri Ni ke swA hA/ phyagargya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis yid tsam bkug pa 'di ni
148a6(rgyud): srin mo thams cad kyi snying rmongs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ka ra na dzi taM/ bi kha la mu ke swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las
148a7(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis phye ste mthe bong snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni sha za 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'o// rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis rtag tu gsungaso// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu
148a8(rgyud): khe b+h+yaHsarba thA mi tsi mi tsi swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis bya la mdzub mo snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni sha za mo thams cad kyi snying rmongs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ nam/ 
148b1(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+ya sarba thA pi shA tsi ni swAhA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis kyang phye ste gung mo snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni 'byung po thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i phyag rgya'o// 
148b2(rgyud): sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA gung gung swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mtha'u chung gnyis kyang phye ba la srin lag gnyis snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni 'byung po thams
148b3(rgyud): cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA gu mi gu mi hI li ge swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong g.yon pa brkyang la lhag ma snga ma bzhin
148b4(rgyud): bzhag pa ni grib gnon thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag ngargya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA ts+tsha ga li swA hA/ de bzhin du mthe bong g.yon/ 
148b5(rgyud): pa yang brkyang la lag pa g.yas pa snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni grib gnon thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'i phyag rgya 'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba te thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu kha b+h+yaH
148b6(rgyud): sarba thA dzo la ni dza ti ka swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bsnol ba'i tshul du bkug la mthe bong gnyis kyi stang du bzhag pa ni brjed byed thams cad gzhi pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags
148b7(rgyud): la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu kha b+h+yaHsarba thA lam+bo d+ha ra NI b+hI b+hi shi ni swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las sor mo thams cad phye ste// smra ba ni brjed byed ma thams cad skrag par byed
148b8(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khi b+h+yeHsarba thA be rat+na u la ku mu gi tsi pu ri re swA hA/ de bzhin du sor mo thams cad bkug ste/ nang du bcug la
149a1(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis sbrang ste de ltar byas pa ni byad rnams kyi snying skam pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe b+h+ya// sarba thA khi khi ri srid ya
149a2(rgyud): ya bi dA ra Ni swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis bkug ste bcug la// mdzub mo gnyis sbyang ba 'di ni byad thams cad kyi snying kun tu sbyar ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba
149a3(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu kha b+h+ya// sarba thA pi sa ri Ni swA hA/ de nas lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ 
149a4(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes las mngon par byung ba rnams kyi don du de ba bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi snying las byung ba'i phyag rgya gsang rab rab 'byam bstan pa'i sgo smras pa/ thog mar sangs rgyas
149a5(rgyud): thams cad la phyag byas te/ byang chub kyi sems mngon du byas la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i mi ga gis sems can gyi khams khyab par byas te/ spros
149a6(rgyud): kyi lag pa bskus la/ kha shar phyogs sam byang phyogasu bltas te phyag rgya legs par bcing bar bya'o// lag pa gnyis snyom par sbyar la bstod de bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po
149a7(rgyud): tshe tog gi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA tri rat+na nir dza ta hUM hUM swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis bkug ste bcar ba ni de bzhin gshegs
149a8(rgyud): ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba te thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA dz+nyA na saM b+ha ba swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis rdo
149b1(rgyud): rje'i tshul du bkug te gung mo'i ngos kyi thad kar bzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA a mi tod b+ha be dz+nyA/ 
149b2(rgyud): na pa ri Ni swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo bkug pa de nyid kyis rtse mo la gung mo rag par byas pa ni mi 'khrugs pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu
149b3(rgyud): kha b+h+yaHsarba thA bi ga da dzA dz+nyA na saM b+ha ba swA hA/ lag pa gnyis ka khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mthe bong gnyis 'khyud pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi phyag rgya'o// 
149b4(rgyud): sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu kha b+h+yaH sarba thA ka na bi tsu ti ta dz+nyA no da ya swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid da las gung mo gnyis gzhibs te sgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das/ 
149b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can gyi phyag rgya'o// snga/ gas la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA dz+nyA na shi khi sa b+ha ba sAhA/ de bzhin du khu tshur ba
149b6(rgyud): la/ srin lag gnyis gzhibs te sgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das thams cad skyob kyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu kha b+h+yaH/ sarba thA bi shud drA ga ta dz+nyA na bi de
149b7(rgyud): swA hA/ snga ma bzhin du de ltar khu tshur bcangs la mthe chung gnyis gzhibs te sgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das log par dang sel gyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH/ sarba mu
149b8(rgyud): khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA dzi ma swA hA/ de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i dbu'i phyag rgya'o// 
150a1(rgyud): sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe b+h+ya// sarba thA kha tra mi swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis phyung ste/ gzhibs pa ni bcom ldan 'das la
150a2(rgyud): los bsgyur ba chen po'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA dz+ra ma// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phyung ste tshig dang po bkug/ 
150a3(rgyud): pa de nyid la sbyar ba ni spyan gyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA dri/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis yid tsam bkug la mdzub mo gnyis
150a4(rgyud): la phyogs par byas te// lhag ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni btso dam ldan 'das kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o// sngags da la/ na maHsarba ta thA te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA a/ snga ma
150a5(rgyud): bzhin lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis phyir bskyed de brkyang la tshigs dang po dgug cing mthe bong gnyi sa phyir bskyed da/ brkyang ba ni bcom ldan 'das dpal
150a6(rgyud): be'u'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA shrI// phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis bskyed de brkyang la mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug pa ni bcom
150a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi lta ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khi b+h+yaH/ sarba thA hri/ snga ma bzhin du de ltar lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mthe'u chung gnyis byung ste
150a8(rgyud): bskyed pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA hri/ 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i
150b1(rgyud): phyag rgya ste dgos pa'i don thams cad sgrub pa'o// gang zhig nang gi dag pa yis// phyag rgya 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// sngags pa de ni sdig bral bar// 'gyur te 'di la the tshom med// rdo rje 'chang
150b2(rgyud): rnams thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha kun dang // blo dang ldan pa de la srung // de lta bas na rnam kun du// bdag nyid che la gus par bya// 
150b3(rgyud): rig sngags rtag tu bzlas byas na// de la dngos grub mi dka' 'o// rgyal ba rnams kyi gsungs pa'i sngags// tshe 'di la ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten sngags rnams gang yin pa// de dag nga yi/ 
150b4(rgyud): dbang gyur te// bsgo ba ci zhig bgyi zhes ces// de yi g.yas g.yon 'khor bar 'gyur// lha min lha yi sman rnams kyang // de yi dbang du gyur cing 'khod// sngags pa sngags
150b5(rgyud): kyi tshul gnas nas// gang tshe lus ni 'dor 'gyur ba// dbang / bsgyur gyi ni gnas mchog tu// de tshe de ni skye bar 'gyur// gang na dang ldan bcom ldan 'das// rnam par snang mdzad tshe bcu
150b6(rgyud): par/ rgyal ba'i sras po 'dod pa bzhin// skye ba dag ni 'dzin par 'gyur// ji srid byang chub gyur gyi bar// de yi spyod pa nyams mi 'gyur// rdo rje 'chang rnams thams cad kyis// thams cad du ni
150b7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la srin lag gnyis nang du bcug ste// mdzub mo gnyis tshigs dang po bkug la/ gung mo gzhibs te nas gang gis ma reg tsam bzhag cing
150b8(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis de'i drung du bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA tsaN+Da ma hA ro ShaHhUM/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub
151a1(rgyud): mo g.yas pas gung mo sbreng ba la 'khyung pa 'di ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i mgro'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA maM/ mdzub mo g.yon
151a2(rgyud): pas gung mo sgreng ba la 'khyud pa mdzub mo g.yas pa phye ste snga ma bzhin tshigs dang po bkug ste bzhag pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
151a3(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA dzi/ de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo sgreng ba la 'khyud pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i go cha'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba
151a4(rgyud): thA A/ de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis phya la glog 'gyu ba'i tha dbasre brkyang ba ni rdo rje ma lce 'bar ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH// sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba/ 
151a5(rgyud): thA kAM/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug ste/ mthe bo'i drung du bzhag pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i dpral ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba
151a6(rgyud): bu b+ha pa ba ti gi du yonapan mapo su du bdags su ma 'i sa u shAn na du la su bya / gas dad pa la na gsugs su khye ma na rta mamathas na du mig du su lta ga su gnyi nang du bcug pa
151a7(rgyud): ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i la le'u'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA bi s+phul badz+ra tsaN+Da swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung byung ste sdo ma bzhin bzhag
151a8(rgyud): papa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i rkang pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe b+h+ya// sarba thA bi tsi tra ga ti swA hA/ de ltar phyag rgya rab 'byam 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
151b1(rgyud): thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam pa sna tshog su gnas pa// 'jig rten gyi khams du mar sems can gyi khams du ma rnam par sbyong bar byed pa// dus gsum la ni stobs thogs pa/ 
151b2(rgyud): med pa/ chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
151b3(rgyud): dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba gcod par byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtogs pa thob par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung thug
151b4(rgyud): kyi bkod pa bstan pa'i rnam par gnas pa bsam pa ji lta ba babazhin du yongasu rdzogs par byed pa// rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyi ral 'khor bkod pa sgrub par byed pa// byang chub sems dpa'i
151b5(rgyud): spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'/ rnams dang // lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa/ 'i 'jig rten gyi mig tu gyur pa sha stag go// lag na rdo rje dang
151b6(rgyud): bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bstan pa dang // cho 'phrul rnam par sprul pa'i gnas las phyag rgya rab 'byam ji snyed cig rnyed
151b7(rgyud): pa'o// / bam po bcu pa// de nas lag na rdo rjes bdud thams cad pham par byed pa bkod pa rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// byang chub
151b8(rgyud): sems dpa' lag na rdo rje snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste lag na rdo rje'i mgo bo la byugs nas leg
152a1(rgyud): so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can kun phan byed pa// dpa' bo chen po legaso legs// gsang sngags spyod pa las byung ba'o// rdo rje stang stabs ched kyi phyir// sdang ba'i san
152a2(rgyud): 'jigs byed pa// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// rdo rje stang stabs cho ga'i rim// sem can chen po khyod kyis ston// rdo rje 'byung ba'i rkang thabs ni// sngags rgyal rnams kyi spyi/ 
152a3(rgyud): yin te// 'dug pa dang ni 'gro ba dang // ldang dang rnam par gtor ba dang // dgug pa dang ni brkyang ba dang // rkang pa sa bcing bskum pa dang // spo ba dang ni bzhag pa dang // khur tshur bcangs/ 
152a4(rgyud): pas bzung ba dang // gzir dang rdo rje'i gzhum pa dang // rdo darje'i phyag rgyas phur gdab dang // sang ge lta bur 'phyod da pa dang // hUM zhes bya bas bsdigs pa dang // stan las langs
152a5(rgyud): nas mchu mnan dang // khro gnyer dpral bar blta ba dang / smin ma bskyod par bya ba dang // de bzhin mig gnyis dgrang ba dang // rkang thabs rnam par 'byed pa dang // lag
152a6(rgyud): gnyis sbyar bar bya ba dang // de bzhin lag pa bskyod pa dang // rkang pa gnyis kyis 'phyong ba dang // lus ni snyoms dang bcas par yang // bye bra du ni ston pa dang // bcad dang gtub dang bgad
152a7(rgyud): pa dang // gza' dang rnam par bgrad pa dang // kun tu sgra dang rnam sgra dang // drag tu byed dang bcas pa dang // sdang ba thams cad tshar bcad dang // rangs par bya dang rmongs bya dang // gyen
152a8(rgyud): du mchod dang nges bsnun dang // mdzes pa'i stabs dang gtsub bsnun dang // sgrub phyir dang po sngar spyad dang // de bzhin lha la bsnyen bya dang // sngags pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang // dngos grub
152b1(rgyud): ci 'dra yin pa dang // sems can khams la rnam kun du// srung dang sba ba bya ba dang // dbang po 'di dag thams cad dang // gzhan yang yid la ci 'dod dang // sdang sems ldan pa de dag la
152b2(rgyud): de bzhin phyir ni dgug pa dang // 'di dag thams cad rgya cher ni// sems can 'phang bar 'dod par smros// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rkang stabs kyi stabs kyis rnam par rgyal bar
152b3(rgyud): bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di lta bu gsungaso// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH// sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA hUM hU~M hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ tsaN+Da badz+ra/ pra dz+wa li ta mUr+Ni swA hA// de nas lag na rdo rjes/ 
152b4(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di thos nas dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la rnam par bltas nas smras pa// kye grogs po dag nyon cig/ san
152b5(rgyud): gang la la sangs rgyas dang // chos dang / dge 'dun la skya/ bsu 'dong ba rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'/ gang dag gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod cing gsang sngags kyi/ 
152b6(rgyud): tshul la brtson pa de dag la ci nas kyang ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang phyin cad srung ba gyis shig/ sti stang du gyis shig/ rim gror gyis shig/ mchod pa gyis
152b7(rgyud): shig/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu smras pa// chos kyi rjes bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshalo zhes brjod nas cang mi smra bar 'khod do// de nas lag na rdo rjes
152b8(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la smras pa// rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la srung ba sgrub par brtso
153a1(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyong pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam tshig las 'gal bar byed na rig pa'i rgyal po drag pos 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba
153a2(rgyud): kun tu mched cing rab tu 'bar bas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gem so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smraso// 
153a3(rgyud): zhi ba'i blo gros stang stabs kyi mtshan nyid sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsungs pa bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshalo// 
153a4(rgyud): sngags pas shar phyogs kha bltas te// 'grang la tha/ dal mo mtshogs mar bzhag/ gsang sngags lta bu dar 'jom mchog gis// rdo rje stangs tshul gar byed cing // 
153a5(rgyud): mtshogs nas thal mo phab nas su// snying khar bzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni// phyogs rnams kun tu bskor ba ra bya// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nasu// lag pa g.yas
153a6(rgyud): pa btag byas la// g.yon pa rkang pa'i rgyab du bzhag/ rkang pa g.yas pa btag nas su// g.yas pa bskum par lags par sbyar// g.yon pa mtshogs mar bstod nas su// sdang ba
153a7(rgyud): kun la bsdigs par bya// rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang bya zhing // gnyi ga rdo rje khu tshur bcangs// khro bcas hUM zhes bya bas bgyid// rdo rje bsnun pas bsnun par bya// rdo rje gar gyis bsgyur
153a8(rgyud): nas su// rkang pa g.yon pa bkug byas la// de ltar phyogs bzhi rnamasu yang // rdo rje'i mnan 'gros mnan par bya// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// rkang pa'i gnasu bzhag par bya// rting
153b1(rgyud): spang gnas la gnas nas su// mig ni thur du blta bar bya// rdo rje'i phur bus btab pa ni// sa 'og rnams bdun g.yo bar 'gyur// 'brug sgra ngal 'dra'i hUM ldan zhing // 'bar bar rdo rje 'chang 'dra/ 
153b2(rgyud): bar// rdo rje gyen du bdeg par bya// rgyab du thal mo sbyar bar bya// de nas rdo rje gar bya zhing // lte ba'i gan su bzhag par bya// 'di 'dra'i gnas la gnas nas su// tsham ngam lags par
153b3(rgyud): bslab par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // khro bo phyag brnyan bran mo yi// mtshon cha'i phyag brnyan ji snyed pa// rdo rje becon dbyig to dang // mdung thung mnga' chen 'khor lo
153b4(rgyud): dang / ka na ya dang gtun shing thogs// po nya po smos gang yi ngan dang // bgegs la sogs pa rnam par bzlog/ phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan gang gsungs pa// bgegs rnams
153b5(rgyud): bzhig par bya ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan rnam/ sa kyis// spyi yi cho ga rgyas par ni// bslabs pa'i snga gas pas lhar bcas dang // lha min gsang ba kun tu gzhon/ 
153b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la ni bgegs bya'i phyir// tshangs pa'i sdong bur thug pa nas// so stangs gnas pa'i lha yi bar// gcig tu 'dus nas lcags gyur kyang // stang stabs cho ga shes pa yi// 
153b7(rgyud): sngags pas hUM zhes byas pa yi// thams cad rnam par 'thor 'gyur te// shing bal mdab ma rlung gtor bzhin// rdo rje 'bar ba med gyur nas// bskal pa'i me 'drar langs nas su// 
153b8(rgyud): rdo rje rkang pa ldan par ni// rdo rje phyag rgyas kun tu gzhom// rdo rjes gnon dang ldan par ni// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcom nas su// sngags pas sa gsum phung byed na// bgegs dang log
154a1(rgyud): / 'dren smos ci dgos// bdag nyid chen po'i rdo rje'i rgya// stang stabs 'di ni spyi yin te// bsgrubs min don yang grub byed na// cho ga ni ba las 'byung ci dgos// rdo rje 'byung ba'i/ 
154a2(rgyud): dam pa ni// thog mar bcings pa byas nas su// de nas rdo rje mchog rigs las// 'byung ba gzhan yang bcing bar bya// 'di las gsang sngags rnams dang ni// stang stabs rnam pa thad
154a3(rgyud): 'byung // de lta bas na rnam pa kun tu// sngags pas bsgrims te bslab par bya// dam tshig chen po rdo rje 'byung ba'i rtsa ba'i stang stab so// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug na su// seng ge bzhin du pha rol
154a4(rgyud): mnan// rdo rje phyag rgyas kun tu gzhom// rdo rje rkang pa brkyang bar bya// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing // rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcom nas su// sa rnams kun kyang g.yo 'gyur na/ 
154a5(rgyud): gsang dang klu rnams smos ci dgos// seng ge'i tshul du mcho sa nas ni// bgegs dang seng ge'i gzugs 'dra dang // glang chen shing rta spre'u dang // gzhan yang gang dag rkang bzhi
154a6(rgyud): pa// de nas rnam par 'bros pa'am// 'chi bar gyur te the tshom med// tshangs pas byas pa'i dgegs rnams kyang // skad cig de la myur du 'joms// seng ge ltar pha rol gnon pa'i
154a7(rgyud): stangs stabaso// rdo rje 'byung bar yang 'dug ste// rkang pa bsnol ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ka ni// rkang pa'i gnasu bzhag par bya// hUM brjod mgul pa gsal
154a8(rgyud): ba'i sgras// rdo rje gar gyis gar bya zhing // rkang pa g.yon pa btig nas ni// de yi rtse mo sar btsugs la// rkang pa g.yon pa bteg nas ni// lag pa rdo rje gsor bcas par// lag/ 
154b1(rgyud): g.yon snying khar bzhag nas nas ni// sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// rdo rje 'bar ba'i mer sbyar nas// rdo rje nyi ma'i dmigs ldan par// rdo rje mgul pa gsal ba'i sgras// 
154b2(rgyud): phyogs kun yongasu rgyas par bya// bgegs kyi gnas su dmigs nas ni// myur du rdo rje'i goms stabs kyis// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas nas te// rdo rje phyag rgyas kun tu gzhom// de/ 
154b3(rgyud): bzhin phyogs dang mtshams rnams kyang // kun tu yang dag gzhom par bya// bdud snga mi bzang chen po dag/ phyogs rnams kun nas 'byung ba kun// g.yas kyang gom pa'i stabs
154b4(rgyud): sbyar te// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kun tu gzhom// sa gsum thams cad g.yo 'gyur na// bgegs dang log 'dran smos ci dgos// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bltas nas ni// bgegs dang log
154b5(rgyud): 'dun thams cad dang // mi bzang gzugs can srin po rna/ mas// phyogs rnams kun tu 'bros par 'gyur// rdo rje g.yas brkyang bya ba'o// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// / 
154b6(rgyud): mtshogs mar rdo rje thar sbyar te// rdo rjer bcas pa'i lag bsko ro zhing // sprin ltar yongasu khyab par bya// rdo rje gar gyi sa gar bya zhing // mchu ni so yis mnan par bya// khu chu
154b7(rgyud): g.yon pa bdag par bya// g.yas pa snying khar bzhag par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa btag nas su// g.yas rol du ni bcug par bya// 'brug sgra dal ltar hUM brjod pa// g.yon pa brgya
154b8(rgyud): ba'i rkang gnas te// rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya// g.yas pa sa la gzugs par bya// rdo rje rkang pas sa 'og tu// bsnun na thams cad g.yo bar byed// sa yi 'og na gnas pa'i klu/ 
155a1(rgyud): gsang dang lha min srin por bcas// thams cad g.yos pa 'di ci zhes// ya mtshan 'dzin pa'i sems gyur nas// ya mtshan 'dzin pa'i snying gis su// 'di dag thams
155a2(rgyud): cad cir 'gyur kye// bskal pa zad par ma gyur grang // de skad phan tshun 'dri bar byed// gnas de nas ni yang bskyod nas// rdo rje 'bar ba'i mig ldan par// rdo rje phyag rgyas hUM brjod te// 
155a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i rkang pas bsnun par bya// klu dang gsang ba thams cad dang // gzhan yang gang dag sar gnas pa// gang na sngags 'chang 'dug pa yis// gnas der thams cad lhag nas su// 
155a4(rgyud): lung ni yongasu nod byed cing // rdo rje 'bar bas rab nyen pa sa// jo bo cig tshel gcig pa// bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsal// bcud kyi len dang dngul chu 'am// 'on
155a5(rgyud): te mig bsku'i sman rdzas sam// gnod sbyin po mos 'a bang su 'am// 'on te rgyal srid bzhed gyur tam// 'o// na te dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam// 'on te yul sa gzhan ba
155a6(rgyud): na/ rdo rje 'bor bas gzir gyur pas// bzhad pa thams cad brkang par bgyi// sngags pas 'ga' zhig blangs nas su// de dag la ni bsam par bya// rdo rje gar ni lags bya zhing // 
155a7(rgyud): phyag rgya de ni bsdu bar bya// cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis su// rdo rje gnasu bzhag par bya// gzhan du na ni gsang ba dang // srin po kun la gnod 'gyur te// glags lta glan ka tshol byed
155a8(rgyud): pa/ gzir ba de dge gnod par byed// blagasu 'gyur ba rtogs nas su// sngags pa la ni gnod pa byed// de lta bas na rnam kun tu// blo dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos// rdo rje'i gnas ni
155b1(rgyud): rig byas la// stang stabs bya ba sbyar bar bya// g.yon brkyang rkang pa'i stang stabaso// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// dpral bar thal mo sbyar bar bya// rdo rje gar ni byas nas su// thal
155b2(rgyud): mo snying kar bzhag par bya// tshangs pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// pad+ma'i thal mo rgyas par bya// gnyi ga khu tshur bcangs nas su// g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya// g.yon pa/ 
155b3(rgyud): snying khar bzhag nas su// hUM dang bcas pas khro bsgyings shing // so ni mchu yang mnan byas la// rdo rje nyi ma'i mig ldan zhing // bzhin ni khro gnyer mi 'chang bas// gar byed pa yi tshul
155b4(rgyud): gyis ni// rkang pa g.yas pas bsnun par bya// g.yon dpas kyang ni de bzhin bsnun// rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya da yis// lag pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya// gyen du bltas nas
155b5(rgyud): drag tu ni// rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun par bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgya sa bsnun nas yang // tshangs par bcas dang brgya byin bcas// gnas dang bcas pa thams cad 'gul// phan
155b6(rgyud): tshun gcig la gcig lta zhing // grogs dag bskal pa 'khrugs gyur tam// 'on te sems can che 'byung ngam// 'on te sangs rgyas byung gyur tam// ci zhes thad phan tshun smras// myos/ 
155b7(rgyud): ches gyur nas phan tshun dang // phyogs bcu dag tu lta bar byed// rdo rje 'bar bas gzir bas na// gnas de nas ni dong na su/ rdo rje ldan pa ci bzhad pa// gsungs zhes lung ni mnod// 
155b8(rgyud): par byed// bdag cag nongs pa ma mchis shing // bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid ma lags// rdo rje 'bar bas gzir gyur na// bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol// rdo rje can gyis rdo rje/ 
156a1(rgyud): laHmig mi 'dzum par rtag tu lta// lha pha la gzhan rnams de dag kyang // rdo rje 'bar bas brgyal gyur nas// rdo rje dam pa ldan pa la// thugs la ci dgongs bslang mdzod dang / 
156a2(rgyud): gal te rgyal srid bzhed gyur tam// de bzhin ming dang lha bzhed dam// lha yi bu mo brnyes pa dang // lha yi bde ba yid 'thun bzhed// thugs la gang bzhed de rnams kun// de dag 'bul bar
156a3(rgyud): bgyid par 'gyur// de nas lha mang rdzu 'phrul che// de dag yid ni rab dga' nas// rdo rje 'bar bas gzir ba dag/ sgrub pa po la myur du 'bul// de nas byams pa'i sems kyis ni// sngags
156a4(rgyud): bas bltas nas btang bar bya// gzhan du na ni gzir de dag/ glags rnyed gnod pa byed par 'gyur// rdo rje 'byung bar/ yang 'dug ste// rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya// mtshogs mar thal
156a5(rgyud): mo sbyar nas su// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya// rkang baspo ba'i tshul gyis su// g.yas pa btag cing de bzhin g.yon// rdo rje'i khu tshur tshul gyis ni// g.yas pa gyen du
156a6(rgyud): bsgreng bar bya// g.yon pa snying khar bzhag nas su// smin ma dgug cing bskul bskyed de// mig gis bgegs la bltas byas la// hUM dang bcas pas rab bskul na// gal te tshangs pa nyid
156a7(rgyud): gyur tam// gal te khyab 'jug nyid gyur tam// drag po brgya byin nyid gyur yang // bltas pas myur du 'jigs par 'gyur// ci ste khyab 'jug drag po rnams// bdag gi dbang du 'gyur 'dod pas/ 
156a8(rgyud): kun tu spyod pa'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje nyi ma'i mig can gyis// rkang stabs sbyar ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun par bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na// sa rnams thams cad
156b1(rgyud): rab tu g.yo// de nas brgya byin lha rnams dang // lha min srin po gsang ba dang // stan las nyams par bdag nyid kyis// ma shes shig ni brgyal bar 'gyur// de nas khyab 'jug drag po rnams// 
156b2(rgyud): yid ni blong zhes gyur nas su// rdo rje rnal 'byor cha ldan pa// ga la ba der thal sbyar to// bdag cag nongs pa ma mchis par// sngags kyis bdag cag shin tu gzir// gzir ba'i lha rnams
156b3(rgyud): de dag kun// stan las sems ni nyams par gyur// ji ltar ci bgyi bka' stsol ces// lus la gus par blta zhing 'khor// kun la byams pa byas nas su// snying la bsam pa gcig
156b4(rgyud): bslangs na// nga yi mod la de dag rnams// dga' zhing da mgu nas sbyin par byed// sngags pa mnyam par gan/ dag nas su// de nas phyag rgya'i rgyal po btang // rkang pa spo ba
156b5(rgyud): tshul gyi su// rdo rje gnasu bzhag par bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje'i gnas ni rkang gnas brjod// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nasu// dbang po chen po'i gan su ban
156b6(rgyud): mtshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas la// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya// rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs byas la// gar byed pa yi lag pa yis// bgegs
156b7(rgyud): kyi gzug rnams bsdigs par bya// de bzhin g.yas dang g.yon gyis kyang // gnas nas song ba'i bar du bya// de lta bgegs chen rab sdang ba// bsdigs kyang 'gro bar mi byed na// 
156b8(rgyud): rdo rje gom pa myur bor la// gyen du lag pa kun tu bskyod// lag gnyis sa la brdabs nas su// 'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM brjod la// gsang sngags blo ldan rkang bskum te// rnam pa
157a1(rgyud): kun tu lus bskor ro// de nas ldang ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje'i lag pa g.yas brkyang la// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dgug pa
157a2(rgyud): byang g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul du ni// lag gnyis gcig tu sbyar byas la// 'brug sku ngal 'dra'i hUM rnams dang // phaT rnams kyis ni rab bskul te// rdo rje gzer ba'i phyag rgya yis// 
157a3(rgyud): bgegs rnams thad gzir bar bya// bde gshegs go 'phang ma gtogs par// rdo rje can dang 'khor lo can// sangs rgyas sras po gang zhig gis// de yis lus la mi sems
157a4(rgyud): naHlha dang dri za gsang ba dang // gzhan yang gang dag ku rnams kun// shing bal 'dab ma rlung gtor bzhin // hUM brjod 'jigs 'gyur smos ci dgos// lha min srin po/ 
157a5(rgyud): ma rungs dang // yi dgas grul bum mngag zhug dang // bdud dang bdud kyi pho nya rnams// 'di ltar 'gyur ba ci zhig smos// byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag cing
157a6(rgyud): snying rje la yang mnyam bzhag nas// byang chub sems dran sngags pa yis// phyag rgya bsdu ba brtsam par bya// nyes pa cung zad tsam gyis phyir// bgegs rnams la ni gnod mi bya// 
157a7(rgyud): shin tu sdang bar rig nas ni// gal te bgegs la gnod bya na// shin tu sdang ba drag rnams la// 'jam de nyid ni mi bya'o// gal te 'jam des nyid byas na// de yi mod la gnod par byed
157a8(rgyud): thog mar 'jam por sbyar bar bya// lan gnyis tshe ni dbye bar brtson// gsum tshe mchod yon thogs nas su// me tog snyim par gnas byas la// de nas bgegs la mchod par bya/ 
157b1(rgyud): 'byung po kun phan gtor byin nas// 'di skad kyi ni tshig brjod ste// bdag gis de ring khyod mchod kyis// song shig bgegs chen 'gro bar gyis// phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/ khyod kyi stobs
157b2(rgyud): dang rtsal mthong ste// khyod ni gegs kyang byed par nus// khyod ni lha yi sprul pa ste// khyod ni gegs byed mi nus min// sngon cad mchod pa ma mthong la// de ring bdag gis mchod byas
157b3(rgyud): te// mchod kyis de ni mchod khyer la// bgegs kyi dbang po song zhes brjed// gal te 'dug kyang bgegs min na// de yi spyod pa bzang po yin// sngags pas mchod byas 'on kyang ni// 
157b4(rgyud): ci ste bgegs ni yang byed na// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang gyur pas// mi mchog rnams la mkhyen pa gso ngal// bgegs la chad pas bcad slad du// sbyor ba bgyis/ 
157b5(rgyud): kyis nongs ma mchis// sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgya/ sa sras// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni// bka/ 'a dang bdag 'gal mi bgying brjod// lha dang lha min gsad
157b6(rgyud): rnams dang // phyogs bcu kun gyi dri za dang // gza' dang mi 'am ci gang dag/ mgon po mgon po che rnams la// bgegs kyis gtses pa bsgrag par bya// gal te cung zhig bskyab ce na// 
157b7(rgyud): myur du yongasu skyobs shig ces// bsgrags pa gang dag mnyan byas nas// gegs byed zhi bar gyur na ni// de nas phyogs rnams thams cad kyi// lha rnams la ni mchod pa bya// gal
157b8(rgyud): ting ltar mi 'dug na// me tog thal mo mchod yon gyis// sangs rgyas la sogs rab bskul la// de la chad pas bcad par bya// drag po shin tu sdang sems pa// bka' lung las
158a1(rgyud): ni 'gal byed cing // srog kyang shin tu 'phrog byed la// sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi g.yel bar// de la phan pa shes nas su// bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// sems
158a2(rgyud): dmyal rnamasu skye ba yi// sdug bsngal mang por 'dis 'gyur te// ji ltar sman pas sems can gyi// nang rnams med par byed pa bzhin// gzir bas bdag la nyes pa mang // mtha
158a3(rgyud): ba rnam par sbyangs pa yi// de ltar sems ni mnyam bzhag cing // snying rje'i yid dang ldan pa yis// byang chub sems ni brtan byas la// de la chad pas bcang brtsam// ji ltar sman
158a4(rgyud): ba mkhas pa yis// nyes de yal bar mi 'dor bzhin// thabs dang shes rab mkhas pa yang // mi 'byed mkhas bos na'ang nyes dang bcas// ji ltar sman pa mi mkha
158a5(rgyud): pa/ thabs dang shes rab bral ba yis// nang pa yal lnga/ ngor byed cing // gso ba'i cho ga mi byed pa// de nga zhin shes dang bral ba yis// gal te gso bar brtson na ma
158a6(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab bral ba la// sangs rgyas rnams ni bsngags mi mdzad// nad pa nang pa rnams la ni// sman pas ji ltar sman byin pa// tshwa dang kha dang bskab yang // 'jig rten
158a7(rgyud): smod pa mi byed pa// de bzhin 'dul ba'i bye brag gis// ci rigs pa ni gso bar bya// sdang ba'i sems can rnams la ni// byas te sangs rgyas rnams mi slong // 'das pa'i dus na
158a8(rgyud): sngon byung ba// shin tu rmad 'byung rgyal ba 'byung // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i chos ni 'di lta ste// shin tu sdang sems drag po yi// sems can thams
158b1(rgyud): cad de che byung // shin tu drag po mthong nas ni// 'jam po nyid du ma spyod te// shes rab thabs kyi snying stobs can// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje'i snying stobs khros
158b2(rgyud): gyur pa// sems can rnams la phan byed pa// de nas pha rol gnon pa yis// sems can khams ni du ma mnan// sdig mang nan gyis stobs kyis su// thams cad dbang du dgod
158b3(rgyud): bya/ pha rol gnon pa'i rim tshul gyis// ji ltar byang chub 'dod byas nas// sems can khams ni du ma dag/ thams cad dbang du dgod pa byas// rdo rje slob dpon chen po yis// 
158b4(rgyud): log 'dren dgegs rnams de ltar dgod// byang chub sem das dran pa sgrim byas nas// skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyuro// de phyir sngags pa cha khros la// bskal pa'i me yin
158b5(rgyud): lta bus// rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis// bgog rnams tha/ mas cad bcad par bya// rkang ba'i tshul ni de nyi kyi sa// rdo rje'i gar gyis gar byas la// rkang pa g.yon pa
158b6(rgyud): zhes 'dor// rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas brtan te// rkyang pa'i gnas kyi ral gri // shugs nas phyung nas gdab par bya// rno ba med pa'i tshul gyis su// shugs kyis lag pa sar
158b7(rgyud): bsdams la// rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su// ral gri 'phyar ba 'dra bar bzung // ral gri tshul du gzhug pa ni// mdzub mo gung mo gzhibs par bya// de nas lag pa g.yon pa yis// 
158b8(rgyud): ral gri shub su bya ba ni// mthe'u chung dang ni srin lag dang // mthe bos ral gri shungasu bya// de nas rkang pa g.yas pa yis// sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris te// so yis mchu mnan
159a1(rgyud): khros byas la// bdag ni rdo rje'i gnyis 'bar bas// rkang pas mgo ni mnan byas nas// lag pas ral gri phyung nasu// rdo rje 'gro ba'i gom stabs kyis// gar gyi tshul du kun
159a2(rgyud): bskyod te// rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thang bcang bar bya// rdo rje ldan des gang bcom pa// de ni srog la mi semaso// de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi 'gyur the tshom
159a3(rgyud): mang brgya byin mtshungs pa'i bgegs zhig na'ang // de yang mod la brlag par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje slob dpon che// snying rje snying brtse'i sems ldan pas// ji ltar de yang skye 'gyur ba// 
159a4(rgyud): de ltar de la snying brtse bya// rdo rje ral gri'i stang stab so// de de nas rdo rje slob dpon ches// rdo rje gtub par bya ba bas/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis// gnod par sems pa thams
159a5(rgyud): cad gtub// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nasu// rdo rje mthu rtsal brtsam byas la// rkang pa bteg cing bzhag tshul gyis// rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya// 'khor los bsgyur bar bya rim gyi/ 
159a6(rgyud): pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar byas la// rkang pa rnam par bzhag byas nas// sa la 'khor lo 'phang bar bya// rting sbrang gnasu 'dug byas la// 'brug sgra ngal 'dra'i hUM brjod te// thal mo brdab pa'i tshul
159a7(rgyud): gyi su// sa la 'khor los bsnun par bya// bzlog sta lan bur byas nas su// lag pa sbyar ba'i tshul gyis ni// 'khor lo lta bur byas nas su// gyen du 'phangs la bzhig par bya// bkug ste
159a8(rgyud): rkang pas mgo mnan nas// bgegs rnams la ni bsnun par bya// 'on te rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// yang na shi 'gyur the tshom med// de ltar rim pa'i tshul 'di yis// bgegs rnams la ni gnod pa bya// sdig
159b1(rgyud): pa'i gnod pa med par ni// bskul kyang bde bar mi 'dong ngo // gal te rdo rje sems dpa' che// snying rje'i sems dang ldan gyur pas// bgegs la zhi bar bya 'dod na// cho ga 'di yi tshul du bya// ba lang gi ni lci ba
159b2(rgyud): las/ de 'dra ba yi gzugs byas la// sngags pas zhi ba'i sems kyis su// sngags pas 'o mas bkrus nas ni// mod la snga ma kho bzhin du 'gyur// de ltar kun tu bgegs rnams ni// kun la cho ga 'di
159b3(rgyud): bzhin bya// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis na// gsang sngags rnams la sbyar bya ste// bcad dang gnod pa byas pa dang // bkag pa dang ni bcing ba'ang rung // gal te sgrub par 'dod pa ni// de nas snga 'kho zhin du 'gyur// 
159b4(rgyud): 'on kyang gsang sngags rnams la ni// bye brag du ni spos kyis bya// / da ni ser mo'i 'o ma dang // yang na mar gyi sbyin bsreg bya// ya dran brgya dang rtsa brgyad kyi// sbyin sreg gis ni kun zhi 'gyur// zhi ba'i
159b5(rgyud): sems kyis zhi ba ste// dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa'o// drag shul spyod lam gang yin pa// de ni khros pas brtsam par bya// de ltar las ni ci rigs pas// gsang sngags rnams
159b6(rgyud): la sngags pas bya// rnam pa gzhan du mi bya ste// las kyis 'bras bu med par 'gyur// rdo rje 'khor lo'i stang stabaso// rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas su// mtshogs mar thal mo/ 
159b7(rgyud): sbyar byas te// rdo rje'i gar ni rab tu byas// rting sbrad rnams kyi tshul gyis// smin bsgyur rkang pas reg par bya// lag pa gnyis kas sa la reg/ de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnamasu yang // yid kyis bskor ba'i
159b8(rgyud): tshul gyi su// rkang pa 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// lag gnyis rkang pa'i gnas bzhag la// rdo rje'i bgad pa rab byed cing // lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng bar bya// rdo rje'i mdzub mos rab tu bsdigs// hUM brjod
160a1(rgyud): bsgyings dang bcas byas la// rdo rje nyi ma'i mig ldan pas// rdo rje'i mdzub mos bsdigs nas ni// bdud kyi dbang phyug bdag nyid kyang // bltas pa de ni mong la 'bros// bya rog bong rdo 'phen
160a2(rgyud): mthong bzhin// rdo rje bgang pa'o// de nas rdo rje sngags pa che// rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas su// mi mthun rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa bsnol te khu tshur bcang // mthe bong gyen du bsgreng byas la// gung
160a3(rgyud): mo gshibs te bsgreng bar bya// mdzub mo de gnyis zla la sgreng // rdo rje kha zhes brjod pa yin// rkang pa g.yas pa brdeg par bya// g.yon pa gzugs shing de bzhin bya// rdo rje ma lce ma ltar 'bar// dgod pa'i kha
160a4(rgyud): ltar mngon sum bya// 'brug sgra ngal 'dra'i hUM brjod de// kha yi thang dkar bzhag par bya// phyogs rnams dag ni thams cad kyi// rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu 'thungs na// mig sngar snang bar gyur pa yi// sdad
160a5(rgyud): bkun lta smos ci dgos// de ltar byas na phyogs bzhi po// kun/ nas byung ba thams cad skams// tshub ma kun tu lce 'ang/ pa dang // sprin rnams kun nas 'du ba dang // rdo rje'i kha ni glal
160a6(rgyud): ba dang / gtor bas rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur// 'jig rten du ni ltas 'byung ba// kun nas gnas grub gang yin pa// sngags pa rdo rje ma lho yi// me ltar bsgyur na de kun zhi// rdo rje kha yi phyag rgya yis// ngag
160a7(rgyud): rnams thams cad bca' bar bya// rdo rje kha glal ba'i gar stab so// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor che// rdo rje ye shes bsgyur nas su// bgegs la gso ba byas na ni// nyes pa yod pa ma yino// rgyal ba'i ye
160a8(rgyud): shes las byung ste// rdo rje slob dpon gso byad pas// bdag 'drar sngags pa de 'dre ste// sngags pa ci 'drar rgyal de bzhin// sems can kun la snying rje dang // byang chub sems ni bsnun byas te// 
160b1(rgyud): kyis dam pa thob gyur nas// rnam par gso ba thams cad bya// gzhan du na ni phyogs rnams na// bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bsngags mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dang bral ba ni// lha yi mchod 'os ma
160b2(rgyud): yi no thabs dang shes rab bral gyur pas// rgyal ba'i sras po nyan thos dang // gang yang rang sangs rgyas dag ni// bka' 'grub gnas la gnas pa ste// bdag don phan pa'i sems ldan pa/ 
160b3(rgyud): de dag la ni bya ba med // thabs dang ye shes las byung ba// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can// byang chub sems kyi shing rta dang // byams dang snying rje'i kha bsgyur dang // sa dang pha rol
160b4(rgyud): byin pa dang // bsdu ba bzhi yi rdo rje dang // thams cad mkhye/ na pa nyid pa dang // byang chub phyogs kyi rtsa lag la// ba/ rten nas sangs rgyas sras po rnams// sems can don dga'i
160b5(rgyud): brtsa bas brtse// de ltar slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // thabs dang de/ shes mkhas pa yis// sdang ba rnams ni thams cad kyi/ sems ni rab tu gso bar bya// rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // 
160b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas ni// rkang pa 'thun pa'i gnas bzhag ste// rdo rje thal mo bzhum byas la// rdo rje'i gar ni byas nas su// lag pa g.yas pa gyen du sgreng // g.yon pa bkos skor brtan nasu
160b7(rgyud): gung mo dang ni mdzub mo gzhi ba// mthe chung mthe bo phrad par bya// g.yas pa lha yi ba dan gsum// g.yas brkyang rkang par gnas nas su// rdo rje bgad pa'i tshul gyis ni// kye ma bdag nyid rdo rje
160b8(rgyud): canasabadag nyid du ni bdag gnaso// hUM brjod snyams dang khros pa yis// rdo rje yid kyis btang bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rjes bsdigs// rdo rje bgad pas bsdigs pas na// lha dang lha min
161a1(rgyud): gsang bar bcas// dkyil 'khor tshe'am sgrub pa'i tshe// gags byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mar bcing // gtsug nas byung ba nyid kyang ni// gegs byang / 
161a2(rgyud): phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum zhes// bgegs rnams phan tshun smra byed cing // srung ba'i phyir ni de dag kun// lhan cig dkyil 'khor drung du 'dong // rdo rje stangs kyis bskul ba
161a3(rgyud): na rdo rje sleb dpon skal ba che// bsod nams tshegs ni bsags pa la// gzhan rnams thams cad phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje gar ni rab byas la// pad+mo'i thal mo/ 
161a4(rgyud): sbyar nas su// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya// g.ya ngas pa brkyang ba'i tshul byas te// bskal pa'i me yi'o/ du 'dra bas// thal mo brdabs pa'i tshul gyis su// khros
161a5(rgyud): te lag pa phur bar bya// lag gnyis rdo rje'i tshul gyisu// ma the'u chung mthe bong sprang byas la// g.yon pas kos sko/ ra brten nas su// g.yas pa gyen du sbyang byas la// A hUM
161a6(rgyud): hUM hUM brjod de bskal pa yis// sngags pas kun tu sgra yang brjod// rdo rje'i sgra ni phyung bas na// sdang ba thams cad phung bar 'gyur// brgya byin tshangs dang zla ba sogs// rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gza'
161a7(rgyud): gzhan yang // thos pa tsam gyis sa g.yos te// kun tu sgra yis sems kyang nyams// de tsha thal mo sbyar te 'dud// rdo rje sgra tshan gang na bar// thams cad lhan cig lhags nas su// rdo rje
161a8(rgyud): sgra yis gzir gyur te// stan las sems ni nyams pas na// mnga' bdag sug las ci 'tshal ba// bdag cag myur du bka' stsol ces// sngags pa la ni lung yang nod// sngags pas
161b1(rgyud): bsams te gar byas na// lha rnams myur du grol bar 'gyur// de nas byams pa'i sems bskyed la// rtul zhugs can gyis phyag rgya dgrol// rdo rje kun tu sgra'o// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// 
161b2(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas byas te// mi mthun rkang stabs byas nas su// bsnol ta khu tshur bcangs byas la// mthe bong gnyis ni gshibs te sbrang // gung mo gnyis
161b3(rgyud): ni gshibs byas la// mdzub mo dbu ma'i tshig bkug ste// gung mo gnyis la gzhag par bya// rdo rje kha ni byas pas na// sdang ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// kha yi thad kar bzhag nas ni/ 
161b4(rgyud): rdo rje kha yang 'byung bar 'gyur// bdag ni rdo rje chen po can/ rdo rje'i ye shes stobs dang ldan// hri ha hUM hUM hUM phaT phaTadaphaT// rdo rje'i gem stabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje gnon pa
161b5(rgyud): gom pa yis// bzhag dang bdag pas 'gro byed cing // phyo gas rnams bzhi por brjod par bya// rdo rje sgra phyung bsku la bas na// bgegs chen rnams dang bgegs rnams dang
161b6(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams dang // de yi mdun du 'gro bar byed// rdo rje sgra yis bdag cag tshig/ rdo rje sgra yis bskul bas na// bdag cag rang gi gnas nas g.yos// rdo rje dbang
161b7(rgyud): pos bka' myur stsol// gal te dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam// rgyal srid dngul chu mig bsku dang // kun nas gter rnams gzigs bzhed dam// bka' stsol cig ces de skad smra// dga'
161b8(rgyud): par byin nas sgrub pa la// phyag 'tshal mchod pa byas nas dong // rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje'i slob dpon mthu chen gyis// rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la// rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya bcing
162a1(rgyud): rkang pa dbus mo bcugs nasu// lag pa gnyis ni khu tshur bcangs// gung mo gnyis ni sgreng nas su// mdzub mo gnyis ni ngos la gzhar// g.yas btang gom stabs bya
162a2(rgyud): nas su myur du rdo rje gom stabs kyis// 'khrul 'khor kun la bsnun byas la// sgo rnams thad dbye bar bya// lha min gnod sbyin rgyal po dang // srin po rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyang // thams cad rang
162a3(rgyud): gi gnas nas g.yos// bskal pa zad dam ji snyam sems// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na// sems ni blong zhes gyur nas su// ye shes rdo rje cha ldan pa// ga la ba der nye bar 'dong // rdo rje 'bar
162a4(rgyud): bas bdag cag tshig/ sngags pas dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam/ da 'on te dngul chu bcud len bzhed// rdo rje dbang pos bka' myur stsol// smras nas kun gyis de mod la// yid la 'dod pa/ 
162a5(rgyud): sbyin par byed// gal te lha dang lha ma yin// gsang ba bkol ba/ ra 'dod na yang // 'dod pas de dag lhags nas su// 'dod pa bzhin du las byed// lung dang 'gal bar byed pa dag/ 
162a6(rgyud): ci ste dam bcas mi 'ong na// slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba po// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas yongs ldan pa// sos ni mchu mnan khros pa dang // me 'bar lta bur 'jigs rung bas// myur du rdo rje'i gom stabs kyi/ 
162a7(rgyud): sa rnams kun la bsnun par bya// g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas nas su// ci ste dam bcas mi 'ong na// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun par bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na// ha ha zhes ni de dag smra// 
162a8(rgyud): stan las lus kyang rab tu nyams// lus ni ma yi rab tu 'bar// rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po pa// ga la ba der nye bar 'dong // bskal pa chen pos yongasu skyobs// bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol
162b1(rgyud): lha dang gsang ba lha min rnams// 'phral du bsgo ba'i lung bzhin byed// bsgo ba'i lung ni bsgrubs na su// rang rang gi ni gnas su 'dong // de lta na ni lha dbang song // de lta ma yin mi bta // 
162b2(rgyud): de nas bsgo lung bzhin byas nas// de dag myur du gnasu 'dong // slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos// de nas phyag rgya btang bya ste// rdo rje'i gar gyi tshul gyis ni// rked pa'i gnasu bzhag par bya// 
162b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la// rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// sdang ba thams cad bcing bar bya// dus bzhin rab tu bskul byas la// gal te bsgo lung 'gal
162b4(rgyud): byed na// rdo rje'i lcags kyus dgug bya zhing // rdo rje'i zhags pa das bcing bar bya// rdo rje rnam pa'i sgra'o// rdo rje thal mod tsum nas su// mthun pa'i stabasu gnas bya ste// lag pa
162b5(rgyud): rgyab tu bsnun byas la// rdo rje gyen du 'phang bar bya// de nas rngo rje la bltas la// 'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM brjod de/ rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su// g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pas
162b6(rgyud): lag pa g.yin pa'i mdzub mo dang // mthe bo rtse sbeng bzhag par bya// lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yis// rtse bkug lcags kyus brtan por bya// rdo rje rgyas pa'i mig ldan pa// so yi mchu mnan/ 
162b7(rgyud): khros pa yis// gang la bgegs ni yod pa der// rdo rje thabs kyis myur song la// rkang pa g.yas brkyang stabs byas te// rdo rje'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dgug
162b8(rgyud): bya zhing // rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya// gal te 'khor lo can dang ni// dbang bcas drag po tshangs bcas pa// gal te rdo rje 'chang srung yang // sngags pas bzhin nas drang te dgug/ bkug
163a1(rgyud): nas rdo rjes bcings pa yis// rdo rje'i gzeb tu bzhag par bya// ji srid 'dod pa rdzogs 'gyur ba// de srid bar du bzhag par bya// bsgo ba'i lung ni mi nyan te// gal te/ 
163a2(rgyud): 'dod pa ma rdzogs na// bdag gi 'byor pa 'dod pa yis// de la chad pas bcad par bya// de yi gzugs ni byas nas su// rdo rje'i rkang pas gzir byas nas// ha ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing // lha'i
163a3(rgyud): dbang po yang 'ong 'gyur// de la bsgo ba'i lung yang 'bog/ rdo rje gar gyis de nas yang // thal mo shin tu sbyar byas la// dbang chen stabs kyis 'dug nas su// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas
163a4(rgyud): par bya rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su// g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spro// lag pa gnyis ni sbyar nas su/ phan tshun bsnol te khu tshur bcangs// gung mo gnyis ni
163a5(rgyud): bshibs nas su// mdzub mo de la gzugs par bya// nga yi rdo rje phyag rgyad// bgeg rnams kun gyi dam tshigayin// snga ma bzhin du stabs tshul gyi// phyag rgyas bgeg
163a6(rgyud): rnams bkug nas su// khro bo yi ni rdo rje 'dis// de la dam tshig sbyin par bya// rdo rje stabs kyis phyag rgya bcing // hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la// bdag nyid rdo rje bsgyur nas su// bgegs rnam
163a7(rgyud): thams cad bkug par bya// lan ni smra bar mi byed na// de ni btang bar mi bya'o// gal te cung zad mi smra na// de la chad pas bcang bya ste// shing gi dug dang star bu dang // yungs kar dag ni
163a8(rgyud): sreg pa las// de yi gzugs ni byas nas su// me yi nang du bor byas na// gal te tshangs pas bsrungs na yang // bgegs de de yi mong la 'gro// sngags pas ngal bsgo bar bya// de nas de la
163b1(rgyud): rgyas par bya// byams pa'i sems ni bskyed nasu// phyag rgya btang bar brtsams byas nas// gzir drang bcing dang bkug pa rnams// thar nas bde bar gnas par 'gyur// de nas slob dpon rdo rje
163b2(rgyud): 'chang ye shes chel rab gzhog cing // sems can don la snying rje bas// rdo rje nyid du yang bsgyur te// 'thun pa'i nang stabs byas nas su// rdo rje gar ni rab byas la// rdo rje thal mo legs su
163b3(rgyud): te/ phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya// gom pa sngo ba'i tshul gyis// g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pasgo// lag pa gar byeng tshul gyis ni// de nas thal mo yang sbyararo// gom pa bskyod pa'i tshul
163b4(rgyud): gyis ni// mkhas pas phyogs bzhi rnams bskor// rdo rje rangs byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bas dpar bya// myur du rdo rje gom pa yis// phyogs rnams rdo rje
163b5(rgyud): par bya rtse mo brgyad pa'i lhun po che// rdo rje mtshan can bsam par bya// 'og tu lag pa rdo rje can// steng du g.yas pa'ang rdo rje can// rdo rje rangs byed rab byed cing // phyogs
163b6(rgyud): rnams kun tu bskor byas no// gang dag sdang ba'i sems ldan pa// bgegs rnams thams cad rengs par 'gyur// rdo rje rengs byed byas pas na// bgegs byed phyir ni 'tsho mi byed// de yi spyi
163b7(rgyud): bor rdo rje ni// legs par bkug nas bsam byas na// tshangs pa'i gnas la thugs pa nas// sa 'og bdun la thug pa'i bar// rdo rje rangs pas rangs 'gyur te// rmongs shing sems kyang med par
163b8(rgyud): 'gyur// sngags pa mkhas pas 'dod par du// de srid du ni rengs par byed// rdo rje tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la// mtshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas te// phyogs rnams
164a1(rgyud): kun tu rgyas byas na// kun nas 'byung ba'i chu rnams kyang // sngags pas skam par byed par nus// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// rdo rje'i thal mo banum byas la/ 
164a2(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa gyen du ni// zhags pa bcas par brkyang bar bya// de bzhin rkang pa g.yon pa ni// g.yon dang lhan cig bdag par bya// de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnamasu yang // gom pa 'dor ba'i
164a3(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// mngon du bskal pa'i me lta bu// so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis// 'og log su ni mig bltas te// rdo rje'i gom pas myur song la// rkang pa g.yon pa bskum byas te// lhun
164a4(rgyud): po'i rtse mor bzhag par bya// 'og ma shugs nas 'byin pa/ 'i lag/ g.yas pa steng nas de bzhin te// mchong ba'i da rkang stabs sbyar ba yis// khwa yi tshul du 'dug par bya// rgod
164a5(rgyud): ma rta yi kha tshul gyis// rgya mtsho'i chu rnams btung bar bya// rdo rje ldan pa bshad pa yis// bsam gtan sngags pa ldan gyur nas// chu ni ha ha ha zhes su// sgra 'byin nas ni 'du
164a6(rgyud): 'gyur na/ 'bab chu dang ni chu klung dang // sprin las bya ba smos ci dgos// bskyod na gal te 'o ma yi// chu las byung ba'ang skam par 'gyur// rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje'i thal mo mtsha/ 
164a7(rgyud): mar sbyar// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas byas te// sprin bzhin yongasu rgyas par bya// dbang chen gom stabs byas nas su// rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis ni// rkang pa g.yon pa gyen btag ste// de
164a8(rgyud): nas so la bzhag par bya// rkang pa g.yas pa btag nas su// g.yas phyogasu ni bskor bar bya// lag gnyis khur tshul gyis nasu// rdo rje ldan pa g.yas pa sgreng // g.yon pa mkhur bar
164b1(rgyud): brten nasu// 'khor lo bzhin du yongasu bskor// de bzhin g.yas pa gzhag nas su// rkang pa g.yon pas yongasu bskor// g.yas pa mkhur bar brten nas// rdo rje ldan pa g.yon pa sgreng // 
164b2(rgyud): rje gom pas myur song la// g.yas pa brkyang ba'i gom stabs kyis// ti sa'i rtse mor rkang bzhag ste// rkang stabs sbyar ba'i tshul gyis ni// lus ni 'dud pa byas nasu// rangs byed rtsa bar skye
164b3(rgyud): ldan pas// so yis mchu mnan khros gyur cing // bdag nyid me drang 'dra 'gyur ba// stobs chen sgra yang tshe ldan pa// gtum po chen po pha rol gnon// rdo rje'i tshul gyis steng bskor la// nges
164b4(rgyud): ba mnan pa blangs par bya// sngags pa sngags la 'jigs med pa// ngas ni gang du khros par 'dor// rdo rje ngas man na tshul gyis ni// rkang pa g.yon pa btsugs nas su// rdo rje mnan
164b5(rgyud): bas bsnun byas nas// dbang po chen po'ang phye mar rlog/ rdo/ rje mnan pas mnan pas na// sa rnams thams cad rab tu g.yos// lhun po man dar ti sa dang // khor yug ri rnam
164b6(rgyud): g.yo 'gyur na// lha mi sgo lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje ldan pas bshad na'o// bsnun pas rnam pa brgyar 'gyur te// phub ma par gang rlung gtor bzhin// slab dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos// sa sbyang
164b7(rgyud): brtsams par bya ba ni// rdo rje thal mo sbyar na su// snying khar bzhag ste rgyas par bya// rkang pa rting pa sprad nas su// lag pa gar byed sbyong ba dang // rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su// g.yas
164b8(rgyud): dang g.yon pa bzhag par bya// rkang pa bskyod pa byas nas su// de nas rting pa yang sprad de// gar gyi tshul ni de nyid kyis// phyogs bzhir yongasu bskor bar bya// khros pas dbus kyi gnasu ni// rdo rje/ 
165a1(rgyud): gom pas myur song la// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// gung mos srin laga' khyud byas la// gnyi ga khu tshur bcang byas te// ting ba spang pa'i rkang stabs kyis// sa la bzhag dang btag
165a2(rgyud): byas te// g.ya su yongasu brkyang byas la// bar bur thams cad gsal bar bya// ma lce zhes ni brjod byas la// nang na gang dag ci yod pa// sngags pas thams cad bsal bar bya// hUM dang bcas shing
165a3(rgyud): phaT bcas pa'i// gsang sngags mkhas par brjod par bya// 'og dang sa yi steng na ni// bar bur thams cad zhi 'gyur te// kun tu bgegs ni med gyur nas// sngags pas mnyam gzhag las rnams
165a4(rgyud): byadade nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje bzhags pas legs bslabs pas// rdo rje gar ni rab byas la// tshangs pa'i da rkang stabs byas nas su// pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar byas te// snying ka'i
165a5(rgyud): thad kar bskor bar bya// gar byed tshul gyis lag pa gnyis// rje rdza khu tshur bcang bar bya// g.yon pa g.yon du brkyang ba ra bya// g.yas pa g.yasu brkyang bar bya// 'thun pa'i rkang thabs
165a6(rgyud): byas nas su// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod la// sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// rdo rje gom pas myur song la// g.yas brkyang gom stabs tshul gyis ni// rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su// de nyid
165a7(rgyud): kyis ni yang bskor ro// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la// de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnamasu bya// rdo rje khu tshur bskyod pas na// bgegs rnams thams cad nga bar 'gyur// rdo rje blo dang ldan pa yis// sa bsdus/ 
165a8(rgyud): 'dor bar 'dod na ni// gom pa bzhag pa'i grogs kyi su// myur du g.yas pa brkyang byas la// gcig ni ri rab rtsa la bzhag/ gcig shos ti sa'i rtse mor bzhag/ de ltar rkang stabs bzhag pa ni// 
165b1(rgyud): kun tu 'dor bar rab byed cing // sa 'og na ni lag pa g.yon// g.yas pa sa yi steng na ste// ha ha zhes ni sgra 'byin cing // 'jig rten khamasu 'phen byed pa// bgegs rnams gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 
165b2(rgyud): log 'dran sdang ba drag po rnams// mi yi 'jig rten 'di nas ni// gzhan du 'phen pa smos ci dgos// ci ste 'jig rten khams rnams kyang // kun nas tshig par byed 'dod na'ang // rkang stabs tshul ni de// 
165b3(rgyud): nyid kyis// phyogs bzhi dag tu 'jug par bya// rdo rje'i gom pas myur song la// g.yas pa brkyang ba'i stabs tshul gyis// nyi ma bcu gnyis lta bur ni// lce yi phreng ldan bzod dka' ba// rkang pa
165b4(rgyud): g.yon pa brtan byas la// rdo rje 'dzin da lag pa sbrang // lus ni btud par byas nas su// rkang pa g.yas pa bteg bya su la// sngags pa 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// rlung rnams kun
165b5(rgyud): kyang sdud byed cing // nam mkha' ma 'drar bsgyur nas su// sreg pa'i bskal pa lta bur 'jug/ lag na 'dzin pa/ 'i rdo rje ni// kun tu ri rab 'drar bsams la// hUM zhes bya ba'i
165b6(rgyud): sgras gnon cing // rdo rje 'og tu 'phang byas ni// ri dang nagasu bcos pa yi// sa rnams thams cad 'khrug par 'gyur// de nas thal ba nyid 'gyur te// mer ni shing bal bcug pa bzhin// slob
165b7(rgyud): dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos// de nas bsdub brtsam byas te// rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid de// bye brag tu ni lag pa sgreng // rdo rje gom pas myur song la// chongs pas bskor ba byas nas su// phyag rgya
165b8(rgyud): yi ni stang stabs bya// rgyab nas rkang stabs tshul gyis ni// dbus kyi gnasu phyin par bya// de bzhin phyogs bcu rnamasu yang // rdo rje bsnun pas brdab par bya// rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid
166a1(rgyud): dang / sngags pa blo ldan lag tshul gyis// sa rnams thams cad blang byas la// de nyid du ni bzhag par bya// kun nas bsdu bar rab byed cing // mkhas pas gsang sngags
166a2(rgyud): brjod byas la// rdo rje can gyis bshad pa bzhin// sa rnams kun tu bzhag par bya// rim pa'i tshul ni 'di nyid kyis// mkhas pas thams cad kun tu bzhag/ de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // 
166a3(rgyud): rdo rje bzhag pa lags bslabs pas// sdang ba lha dang lha min dang // mi rnams bzhag bya gdul bar bya// bsam dbang bzhin du 'byung ba yis// rdo rje'i ye shes legs bslabs pas// 'dul
166a4(rgyud): ba'i tshogs ni tha dad pa// thams cad rnam par gdul bar bya// / gdung bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten na// gdung ba nyid kyi das grub par 'gyur// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// dpa
166a5(rgyud): bo'i lnga po kun tu bya// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ g.yas brkyang stabs kyis mnan par bya// rkang stabs bzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'ben la lta zhing lag pa gtad
166a6(rgyud): srin lag mthe'u chung sprang byas la// lag gnyis lu gu rgyud du bya// g.yon pa'i gung mo mtshungs par gzhar// g.yas pa yi ni mdzub mo de// brkyang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni// gzhu dang mda'
166a7(rgyud): zhes brjod pa yin// gung mo yi ni rgyab logasu// mdzub mo mnga' yi tshul du bzhag/ g.yas brkyang rkang stabs tshul gyis ni// hUM bcas brjod de phog par bsnun// gal ta sa yi 'og gan
166a8(rgyud): sam tshangs pa rab tu gnas gyur tam// drag pos bsrungs par gyur kyang rung // rdo rje 'phang bar byas nas su// rdo rje mnga' yis phog gyur na// de ni gson par mi bsam mo// 'phang ba'i stang
166b1(rgyud): stabaso// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // thabs shes pa la mkhas gyur cing // 'phang ba'i tshul du legs bslabs pa// sdang ba'i sems can gdul bar bya// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje
166b2(rgyud): zhags pa lags bslabs pas// srid pa gsum la khyab lus kyis// bgegs rnams thams cad gdul bar bya// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nasu// rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni// lag pa
166b3(rgyud): g.yas dang g.yon pa gnyis// thal mo khong stong sbyar bar bya// de yi phyag rgya bcings nasu// phyogs rnams kun la bskor byas na// srid pa gsum yang 'gugs 'gyur na// log 'dran bgegs
166b4(rgyud): rnams smos ci dgos// dgug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nas sgo ba dpon rdo rje 'chang // 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nasu// pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar byas las// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas
166b5(rgyud): par byas// rkang stabs bzhag pa'i tshul gyi su// gnas ni myur du gzung byas la// rdo rje khu tshur snying khar bzhag/ khros pas hUM gi sgra brjod de// rgya mtsho bzhi po'i gnas rnam
166b6(rgyud): la rdo rje'i lag pas bsnun par bya// klu skrag thal mo sbyar ba dag/ rgya mtsho nas ni 'thon par 'gyur// gang dag sa yi 'og gnas pa// lha min gsang ba srin po rnams// bsgo ba'i lung
166b7(rgyud): la brtson yid kyis// ci tshol cig ces 'khor bar byed// rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag gzir// gnod sbyin mo 'am srin mo 'am// lha min mo 'am klu mo 'am// bcud kyis lan nam dngul
166b8(rgyud): chu'am// rin chen rnams sam nor bu rgyan// dpal dang phun sum 'dod ldan nam// thugs la ci dong ci bzhed pa// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ sngags pas gang yang
167a1(rgyud): rung blangs te// gsang ba pa kun btang bar bya// bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal byed pa// ci ste bsgo yang mi 'ong na// rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid kyis// g.yon brkyang stabs kyis mnan
167a2(rgyud): par bya// lhun po la ni rkang bzhag ste// lag pas dbyug pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgra sgrogs cing ni thams cad nas// sa 'og thams cad mnan par bya// ha ha zhes ni sgra 'don cing // bsgo ba'i
167a3(rgyud): lung ni 'gal byed pa// thams cad kyis ni gzung nas su// shin tu myur bar 'bul bar byed// sngags pas de gcig tshar bcang ngo // lhag ma thams cad btang bar bya// bsgo ba'i lung la de
167a4(rgyud): bzhag la// mkhas pas legs par bslabs par bya// gas dang ba srin po thams cad la// byams pa'i sems ni ya dang bskyed// de dag dam tshig byin nas ni// de rnams kun tu btang
167a5(rgyud): par bya// / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbangadabang bskur ba las// bam po bcu gcig pa// de na sa slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // snying brtse snying rje'i sems ldan pas
167a6(rgyud): mi dang mi min la sogs pa// shin tu gnod byed lha rnams la// lha min gsang bar bcas pa rnams// gzhan yang sdang ba'i gdon la sogs// nad sbrul dug la sogs rnams kyis// sems can
167a7(rgyud): rnams la gnod byed cing // dam tshig la ni mi gnas te// rgyags pa'i yid dang ldan pa dag/ nad dang mu ge la sogs pas// sems can rnams la gnod byed de// pha rol la gnod mngon dga'
167a8(rgyud): pa de dag snying rje med pa dang // bstan pa las ni 'gal byed cing // shin tu rgyags pa'i shas che ba// mthong nas de dag tshar bcad phyir// sngags pa mkhas pas sbyar bar bya// bdag la sdig pa
167b1(rgyud): 'gyur snyam du// bdag nyid las ni mi sems shing // bdag nyid la min zhugs gyur la// gzhan dang gzhan yang phung byed pa// gzhan la gnod byed de dag la// sngags pas bzod par mi bya ste// 
167b2(rgyud): bsgrag par bya zhing bcing bar bya// btub par bya zhing bsad par bya// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje zhags pa lags bslabs pas// na mkha' go skabs med byas te// rdo rje'i dbyibs su
167b3(rgyud): bsgyur nas su// gus pas sgrim bcas 'jo tshul dang // bzhin 'dzum rgyags dang ldan pa yis// rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la// lag pa bskyod pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyogs rnams kun tu gar bya zhing / 
167b4(rgyud): dngos dang 'thun par bzung byas la// bsgo ba la ni sems pa zhag cing // rdo rje'i rang bzhin lus sra bas// mi mthu na rkang stabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje 'chang bas lag sbrang ste// 
167b5(rgyud): rdo rje mig gis kun bltas la// srid pa gsum po thams ca/ dmanan// dpa' bo gnas su gnas nas su// rkang/ pa gdeg pa'i tshul gyis ni// hUM brjod 'jigs pa 'jigs rung
167b6(rgyud): ba mig gnyis nyi ma zla ba ste// kha ni rgod ma rta yi kha// lte ba dga' bo nye dga' bo// lto ba rgya mtshor bsam par bya// lhun po de yi mgo bo bya// de bzhin lag pa 'khor yug ri// sa ni rkang
167b7(rgyud): pa gnyis yin te// nor rgyas bu sbrul gsang bsrel yin// rlung ni de yi rna ba gnyis// de yis sgra rnams me yin te// lce ni 'jigs pa chen po'i grog/ ha ha ha zhes sgra chen ldan// 'brug
167b8(rgyud): sgra hUM zhes sgra phyung la// phyogs rnams kun tu yongasu bskor// rab tu bskul bas de nas ni// rdo rje'i sgra yis brgyal gyur nas// klu dang dri za srin po dang // lha dang lha min sogs kun
168a1(rgyud): / 'dong khru brjod pa ni 'jigs 'gyur zhing // 'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med// rdo rje sgra yis tshig gyur cing // blong bar gyur te dman par lnga// rdo rje rnal 'byor che ldan pa// gal/ 
168a2(rgyud): bder nye bar 'dong ngo // rdo rje chen po bstsol la// slan chad de ltar ma mdzad cig/ de nas dam tshig bzhag byas la// lha rnams thams cad btang bar bya// rdo rje 'jigs pa gtum pa che// 'jigs pa
168a3(rgyud): chen po 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs bya rnams la 'jigs bskyed pa// chen pos mchod 'os rmad byung bas// mi dang mi ma yin rnams la// 'jigs chen lhas byung che 'byung dang // lha dang klu dang sha \u0f7f
168a4(rgyud): dang // gza' dang ma mo brtse meng rnams// nang dang mu ga la so dgas dang // yul 'khrugs pa dang mchi byed dang // bdud rnams dang ni log 'dren rnams// srul po srin po la sogs
168a5(rgyud): pa/ bdag yul gzhan yul las byung ba'i// gnod pa gzha na yang du ma rnams// de dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyar bar bya// rkang pa rgyas par bya tshul
168a6(rgyud): gyis/ hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod na// rdo rje 'jigs pa rab bskul bas// thang myur du 'jigs par 'gyur// 'di ni don yod thogs pa med // rdo rje 'jigs pa mi bzad pa// sngags pas kun tu
168a7(rgyud): sbyor byas nas// srid pa gsum yang dbang 'gyur na// mi yi 'jig rten mngag gzhug pa// byed par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// tshig gis cung zad bskul bas na// gang dag shin tu dregs ldan
168a8(rgyud): par srin po lha min gsang ba dang // de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas// dbang phyung kun dang yon tan 'thob// lha rnams kun gyi rgyal por 'gyur// mkhas
168b1(rgyud): pas dbang la 'god par byed// klu yi gnas su klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin rgyal dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur// lha min gnas su lha min dang // mkha' lding gnas su mkha'
168b2(rgyud): lding dang // mi ci rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur// lha dang lha min mir bcas pa// bsgo ba'i lung bzhin gus sems kyis// rdo rje 'jigs sgra che ldan pa// de yi dbang du thams cad 'gyur// rdo rje 'jig su
168b3(rgyud): rung ba'i sgra chen po'i phyag rgya'o// kun la rdo rje rnam 'phrul pa// de yi 'og tu brjod par bya// dpal ldan mchod pa byed pa pos// phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs rnams kyi// sangs rgyas rnam pa kun
168b4(rgyud): tu mchod // srid par bdag nyid rnams kyi// bsam yas mcho dang min gang yang meng // 'dzum dang bcas shing mig rgyas dpas// g.yas pa dang ni g.yon tshul gyis// rdo rje'i thal mo
168b5(rgyud): bcu ma byas la// phyogs bcu rnam pa kun tu gdung // dpral bar thal mo sbyar byas la// phyogs rnams kun tu yod/ sa bskor zhing // dus gsum rnam par bzhugs pa yi// sangs
168b6(rgyud): rgyas kun la phyag bya'o// bde gshegs kun la phyag bya mchod// sems can gdul ba'i mchod pa ni// bsam pa ji bzhin 'dug pa ste// bsam pa tha dad sems can khams// bsam pa sna tshogs
168b7(rgyud): rnam par 'phel// bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par rtogs// bsam pa chags byed de dang nges// sngags pas rnam pa thams cad du// sems can khams mang gdul bar bya// de nas slob dpon
168b8(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang // kun la shes pa cher 'byung ba'i// stegs dang dpa' dang snying rje dang // bgag dang khros dang 'jigs byed dang // 'jigs rung rmad byung zhi ba rnams// bsam pa chags pa rnam
169a1(rgyud): dgur dgongs// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chung // kun la ye shes 'byung byed ba// rkang pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni// gom pa mdzes dang ldan pa yis// lag pa g.yas
169a2(rgyud): dang g.yon pa ni// gar byed pa yi tshul gyis su// mdzub mo mthe bong che spang la// g.yon phyog su ni blta bar bya// g.yas dang g.yon pa sbyar tshul gyi// 'dzum byas rgyas pa gus drim/ 
169a3(rgyud): ning / lagan rdo rjes gsor ldan pas// rjesu chags pas gar bya'o// lha rnams kun dang gsang ba dang // lha ma yin dang mi rnams dang // 'dod khams dbang phyug bdag po dang // sa gsum
169a4(rgyud): gnas rnams chags byed cing // mig zur bgrang dang lta ba yings// de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// sa gsum thams cad 'gugs byed na// sa stengs mi rnams smos
169a5(rgyud): dgos// lha yi rgyal po sogs bkug nas// sdom btsun gyis dbang 'jog ste// thams cad bsgo ba ban na byed cing // mngag gzhug par ni rab tu dgod// 
169a6(rgyud): ldan kun shes pas// rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya// rdo rje'i klu yis bskul bas na// rngusu chags shing chags chen 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpar smos pa yis// glu dang gar ni rab tu bya// bas/ 
169a7(rgyud): pa chags pas brgyal 'gyur bas/ sems can khams ni rjes chags bya// rdo rje'i glu ni 'byung ba ste// sa gsum dag na 'bar ba'i sku// mnga' rjes chags mdzad 'dul ldan pas// nyi ma
169a8(rgyud): stong phrag bcu pas rna ba'i 'od zer stong dang ldan pa po// rnam mang cha byad gzugs kyis sems can 'gro ba rje su chags mdzad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa mdzes pa'i stobs
169b1(rgyud): ldan gar mdzang gsol// shal ba la sogs klu yis// rdo rje gar ni rab byas pas// sa gsum thams cad 'gug byed na// sa stengs mi rnams smos ci dgos// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'o// de nas
169b2(rgyud): dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje nyid du yang bskur zhing // rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// thams cad la ni gar mkhan bya// gim stabs thams cad mdzes ldan par// g.yas pas dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o// 
169b3(rgyud): g.yon pas btang ba'i phyag rgya bya// mig zur bgrang dang lta ba yis// lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa yis// 'khyud par byed pa'i sbyor ldan pas// tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams ni// rnam pa kun
169b4(rgyud): tu dbang 'gyur te// mngag gzhug pa ni rab byed cing // rdo rje can gyi lung la brtson// rdo rje chags pas chags byas pa su// shin tu chags pas dregs myos pa'i// lha dang mi dngags
169b5(rgyud): ba bas// sgrub dka' rnams kyang sngags pas sgrub// rdo rje'i lus la yongs chags pas// 'dod chags thams cad yongasu dor// rdo rje'i glu snyan ldan pa yis// sems can kham
169b6(rgyud): rnams chags par bya// rjesu chags pas chags pa'i phyir// lha rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje'i glu yis snyan pa'i sgra rnams thams cad dang // bzod nas rang bzhin dag pas rdo rje sam
169b7(rgyud): dpa' bskul// sgyu ma'i dngos po rnam mang dang // snyan pa'i sgra ni de nyid dang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad kyis// dbang bsgyur de nas sangs rgyas snang // 'jig rten thams cad yongs su
169b8(rgyud): 'dren pa bdud rnams thams cad yong su 'dul// shes pa thams cad yongasu sbyong // sems can thams cad yongs smin byed// glu 'di rab tu lan byed cing // rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas na// lhang
170a1(rgyud): gang dag gnod sbyin dang // lha min klur bcas thams cad 'grub// rdo rje'i glu ni 'dren pa'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje sems dpar yang bskur te// dpa' chen
170a2(rgyud): bsam pas kun chags pas// dpa' bo'i lnga po brten par bya// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// g.yas pa brkyang ba pha rol mnan// g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis ni// sing ge bzhin du
170a3(rgyud): bsgying bar bya// tshangs pa'i gnas la yang gnas te// rdo rje sa gol sbyor ba dang // rdo rje bsnun stabs tshul gyis ni// tshangs pa la sogs bsdu bar bya// rdo rje'i glu ni lan byed cing // sa gsum 'bar
170a4(rgyud): ba'i sku ldan pa// nyi ma bye ba 'bar mtshungs pa// nam mkha' ma datshungs shing mnyam med pa// chos dang rgyal mchog rnams kyi gtso// sangs rgyas sku mchog de la 'dud// so yis
170a5(rgyud): mchu ni rab mnan cing // kun nas mig can khro gnyer bzhin// rkang par rdo rje brtan nasu// phyogs bcu kun tu blta bar bya// g.yas pa rdo rje'i tshul gyis ni// phyogs rnams kun
170a6(rgyud): tu rab bsgrags pa// lta 'jigs 'od zer 'bar ldan zhing // sregs pa'i bskal pa gzhan lta bu// grub 'gyur rdo rje ma 'bar ba// 'jigs pa che ltar bzod dka' bas// bgegs rnams la ni
170a7(rgyud): sbyor bar bya// 'jig rten gsum po thal bar rlog/ nyes pa chen po ma yin la// phyag rgya 'di ni sbyar mi bya// thun mong ma yin dgos pa ni// tha ma'i tshen sbyar bar bya// rdo rje 'chang bas bsrungs/ 
170a8(rgyud): gyur kyang // hUM brjod pas na thal bar rlog/ 'jig pa'i me ltar bzod dka' bas// rdo rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje'i ye shes legs bslabs pas// snying ka
170b1(rgyud): khu tshur gnyis// bzhag nas 'di snyam pasam byas te// sems dmyal yi dgas dud 'gro dang // gang gzhan sdug bsngal sdug bsngal rnams// lag pas drang ba'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba kun gyis bsdu/ 
170b2(rgyud): par bya' gza' btung la sogs char pa dang // gos dang rin chen rgyan gyi char// de dag rnams la kun tu dbab// ci bder yang dag bstabs pas na// snying rjes spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhin// kun tu yod/ 
170b3(rgyud): su rgyas par bya// sems can kun gyis bla med bde// thob par shog shig bsam par bya// snying rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas// rdo rje'i phyag rgya
170b4(rgyud): bcing bya zhing // mtshogs mar thal mo sbyar bar bya// btags dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis// de nas myur du smad par bya// rdo rje ba gang chen phyag rgya 'di// rdo rje 'chang nyid bzhin du bgod// bgang
170b5(rgyud): pa chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de nas lag g.yas btegs byas te// g+hayon pa rkang pa'i phyogasu bzhag/ g.yon brkyang rkang sta bas byas nasu// de nas thal mo yang sbyar te// 'jigs rung sgra ni
170b6(rgyud): drag byed cing // thal mo sbyar ba btud par bya// 'jig su rung ba chen po'i sgra'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas brkyang rkang pa'i stabs byas te// lag pa gnyis ni rgyab rol du// khu tshur gnyis ni bcang bar bya// pag
170b7(rgyud): kun dbab par bya ba'i phyir// mgul pa nges par smad bya zhing // sgra chen rab tu brjod byas na// phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dbab par 'gyur// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas
170b8(rgyud): nasu/ mtshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas la// lag pa gnyis ka lto bar bzhag/ g.yas brkyang rkang stabs sbyor ba yis// sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// ha ha zhes pas rab brgyan pa// phyag
171a1(rgyud): rma 'dzin rgya che ste// ri rnams phye mar rlog byed na// sdang ba'i sems can ci spros te// sngags pa'i 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa
171a2(rgyud): gyen du sgreng byas la// gdu bu'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// de bzhin so yis mchu mnan cing // g.yon pa brkyang ba legs sbyar bas// bgegs rnams kun la bsnun par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni sgra chen
171a3(rgyud): te/ bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa yin// phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar bas// thams cad bzlog par gyur pa yin// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nasu// lag gnyis drang la gcar ba la// 
171a4(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa sgreng byas te// rkang pa g.yon brkyang lag ngas sbyor byas// tho ba yi ni phyag rgya yis// rdo rje 'cha dang nyid yin na'ang bsnun// rdo rje tho bas bsnun pas na// de yi
171a5(rgyud): mod la phye mar 'gyur// tho ba'i stang stabaso// g.yas dang ga/ yon pa'i sbyor ba yang // lag pa mtshan khung gzhu ga par bya// nyi ma 'bar 'dra'i lta 'bar bas// hUM brjod bsnyams
171a6(rgyud): par thur du blta// lag pa rdo rje nyid bsgyur te// 'jig su rung ba'i sgra phyung la// rgya mtsho man dar bcas pa yis// sa rnams thams cad g.yo bar bya// so yis mchu ni mnan bya zhing // rdo rje rkang pa
171a7(rgyud): bsnun par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar byas// de dag thams cad da bar 'gyur/ g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs tshul gyis// g.yon pa brang la bzhar ba
171a8(rgyud): bya// g.yas pa gyen du sbrang byas la// mdzub mo myur du sprang byas shing // rdo rje'i sgra ni 'byung byas na// gal te sangs rgyas nyid gyur kyang // bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya// rdo rje can gyis
171b1(rgyud): bshad na'o// sdang ba'i sems can smos ci dgos// phyag rgya 'dis ni bskyod pas na// de dag thams cad nga bar 'gyur// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// g.yas pa gyen du sgreng byas la// lag pa
171b2(rgyud): thal mo brkyang bar bya// g.yon pa brang du ba nar bar bya// lag pas myur du bsnun stabs kyis// hUM dang bcas pas sa ya bsnun// na mkha' ma 'bar 'dra ba yi// ral gri'i phyag rgya bcings byas
171b3(rgyud): la/ bgegs rnams thams cad btub par bya// rdo rje can gyis bshad na'o// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa 'og tu btang nas ni// rkang pa'i bar nas gzung byas la// de ni gyen du
171b4(rgyud): bdeg par bya// rdo rje hUM brjod sgra dang ni// khros shing khro gnyer ba cas pa yis// rkang pa de yis yang bsnun la// de na das bgegs ni bsam par bya// rdo rje'i rkang pas bsnun byas na/ 
171b5(rgyud): ri rab rnams kyang phye mir rlog/ rdo rje rkang pa'i stangs sta so// g.ya/ sa brkyang rkang stabs sbyor ba yi// lag gnyis 'a khor lo'i tshul du brkyang // so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis// 
171b6(rgyud): kun tu 'khor lo 'phang bar bya// phyogs rnams kun na gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas zhing rnams gzhig par 'gyur// zhig par gyur pa'i zhing rnams nas// rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyang 'byon// 
171b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul cha// gang gzhan dbang ni thob gyur rnams// blong zhes gyur nas blo ldan pa// lag na rdo rje'i gan du 'ong // srog zad na ni mi rung gis// bu gcig nged kyis ci
171b8(rgyud): zhig bya// khyod ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// nged kyis myur du sgrub bo zhes// rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pas// lung ni yongasu nod par mdzad// bskal pa'i ma ltar gyur pa yis// g.yas brkyad
172a1(rgyud): / rkang stabs byas nas su// 'bar ba'i phyag rgya lags sbyar bas// sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar bya// sa gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas// sngags pa rnams la rtag 'tsheb
172a2(rgyud): gegs byed ma rungs chen po pa// srin po sdang ba rnams skrag go/ phyag rgya 'di 'dra mthong gyur nas// de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// de tsha nges par bsnun
172a3(rgyud): blangs la// sngags pas gyen du 'phang bar bya// de tshe so yis mchu mnan la// myur du gom pa gcig bor te// nges par bsnun pas bsnun pa'i tshe// srin po sdang ba gags byed pa// de dag tham
172a4(rgyud): cad phye mar 'gyur// rdo rje ngas bsnun phyag rgya yis// de dag thams cad bzlog par 'gyur// dbang chen gnas la ga denas nas su// lag pa gnyis ni sbreng byas la// lhun po'i
172a5(rgyud): rgyal po blangs nas su// lag pa gnyi su de bzhag nas/ sngags pa la ni gegs byed pa// sdang ba'i sems can rnams la bsnun// bsnun pas rnam par phung 'gyur zhing
172a6(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur te the tsom meng // rnal 'byor gzhol ba'i sngags pa la// gang tshe bgegs shig gegs byed pa// de tshe sngags pa stobs chen gyi// phyag rgya 'ang la sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di/ 
172a7(rgyud): la sbyar ba na// mthong nas de dag bar 'gyur// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje'i ye shes legs bslabs pas// rgyal ba kun la phyag byas nas// cod pan stabs kyis thabs
172a8(rgyud): bshad do// sngags pas shar phyogs kha bltas la// lag pa g.yas pa mtshogs mar bzhag/ g.yon pa rkang pa'i phyogasu bzhag/ hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la// 'brug sgra ngal 'dra'i phyag rgya
