197b7(rgyud): cag klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btabo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos klu'i rgyal po chen po rnams la cung zad spyan gyis gzigs na
197b8(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ klu'i rgyal po dag leg so// zhu ba'i dus la bab bo// ngas sems can rnams kyi don du rab tu phye ste bshad kyis nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das lagaso zhes gsol te/ klu rnams
198a1(rgyud): wA nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u bshad de/ hUM/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rdo rje 'dzin chen ston pa des// nyid kyi 'khor la/ 
198a2(rgyud): rab gzigs te// 'od zer kun tu rab bkye nas// gdon rnams brlag byed thabs gsungs pa// dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga la// rab tu dben pa'i sa
198a3(rgyud): phyogasu// phyag na rdo rje rab khros pa// gzhon tshul 'gying ba rab bsas la// rin chen snod dam kham por du// gser la sogs pa'i rin chen bdun// dug par bsgrubs te rab bcu
198a4(rgyud): gnas// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te// dkon ma chog gsum gyi bka' bden pas// 'byung po ngal dgator byin te// gang gnas rten sar rab spras la// 'byung / 
198a5(rgyud): po klu gdug zhi bar 'gyur// gang tshe zhi bus ma phan na// da tshe gdug pa'i mtshon cha rnams// rang gi khang pararab tu 'bar// sdug bsngal mi bzang drag po ste// de tshe sngon
198a6(rgyud): gyi sems dran pas// zhi bar 'gyur bar the tsom med// de nas 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i cho ga rab tu gsungs pa/ rtag tu byang chub sems thob cing // dam tshig sdom pa kun
198a7(rgyud): ldan pa// khrus kyi las rnams kun bya ste// rnam par dag pa'i sa gzhi la// dkyil 'khor ji ltar mdzes par bya// hUM yig las byung lcags kyu yis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
198a8(rgyud): dpa' rnams// skad cig mdun bsams mchod sogs bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ho// stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom// namakha'i khamasu a dang ni// zla ba dang
198b1(rgyud): yi ge hUM// 'od zer kun tu 'bar bar sgom// 'gro drug nyon mongs kun sbyangs te// rnam 'gro sa la nges bkod nas// 'od bsdus hU~M gi rnam par bsam// de nyid rdo rje rtse lnga can// 'od zer phreng
198b2(rgyud): ba 'phro bar bsam/ nga yi 'od kyis sems can rnams// rdo rje'i ngo bo thim par bya// de las khro bo chen po'i sku// sku mdog sngon po cher 'bar ba// g.yon brkyang na tshong bcu drug 'chang // 
198b3(rgyud): mtha' yas la sogs brgyad kyis rgyan// sku mdog nag po'i gzugs can de// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje bsnams// na bza' sngon po'i zer 'jol can// spyan gsum dmar mdze
198b4(rgyud): gyen du 'jil// ral pa gyen rjes rdo rje yi// dbu rgyan can du/ bsam par bya'o// de nas ye shes khro bo che// spyan drangs dzaHhUM baM hos gzhug/ mgo dang lkog ma snying kha ru// 
198b5(rgyud): oM AHhUM gi rnam pa yi// yi ge bcu gsum sngags kyis rgyan// 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje bsam// mi bskyod rdo rjes dbang bskur te/ kun 'joms rnam par dag par bsam// 
198b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di'i rtsa ba'i sngags las thams cad pa gsungs/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+hA ra badz+ra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT/ rab tu brjod par bya'o// sngags kyi phreng ba de dag kyang // zhi la ra
198b7(rgyud): dkar dbang la dmar// rgyal ser po drag la gnas// rtog pa kun tu spangs te bzlas// sgro dang bsdu ba'i bye brag gis// ji ltar mos pa'i bsam gtan bya// mi mos rnal 'byor rab tu spang // 
198b8(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje khro rgyal gyis// dge kun rten pa'i yid 'di la// gang brtson pa de phan yon no// kun tu dga' sogs dag/ mi snang la sogs rab tu 'grub// kun rten rab tu sbyang dge can// 
199a1(rgyud): rten can sbyor ba rab tu dben// dngos grub mchog tu rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las zhi ba'i las sgrub pa dang lha'i le'u ste dang po'o// 
199a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// bar chad zhi byad gtor ma yi// cho ga mchog
199a3(rgyud): ni bshad du gsol// sems can don du brtson ldan bgyi// zhes gsol to// nga nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ leg so rdo rje 'chang ba gtso// bar chong zhi ba'i cho ga dang // dngos
199a4(rgyud): grub thabs kyi cho ga ni// gtor ma kun gyis gter 'gyur ba shad// rab tu mdzes pa'i snod mchog tu// bza' dang ba ca' ba la sogs pa'i// phun sum tshogs pa rab tu bya// stong
199a5(rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro bas// bruM las mdzes pa'i snod du spring de// kham las kha zas na mkha'i khams// mnyam par bsams te sngags 'di brjod// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba
199a6(rgyud): d+har+m+ma NaM Ad+ya nut+pan+na tAta oM aHhUM phaT swA hA// zhes brjod do// bdud rtsir bsam te rab tu spel// spel ba gnyis kyis rnam par sbyangs// na mkha'i hri las pad+ma brgyad// dpag tu meng ba bas
199a7(rgyud): bya ste// gtso bo mgon po rnam thos bu// gnod sbyin bye tshogs kyis bskor cing // klu brgyad kyis mchod spyan drang bya// gnod sbyin rgyal po de dag la// rmugs 'dzin gang ba bzang po dang / no
199a8(rgyud): bzangs ku be ra dang ni// yang dag 'brog gnas lnga rtsen dang // tsi bi kuN+Da li rnams ni// 'khor gyi tshul gyis gtse la bskor// phyogs dang mtsham su bsam par bya// bye ba'i 'khor tshig
199b1(rgyud): thun mong yin// klu brgyad gnod sbyin phyi na'o// de nas lcags kyus spyan drangs la// ma bral gtso dang lcags kyu'o// bzhon pa seng ge rta yi tshegs// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// rin
199b2(rgyud): chen 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan dang // nor bu rin chen ral gri dang // gri mdung khang brtsegs ral gri phub// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phyar bar sgom// spyan 'dren chen rnga sogs dang // dung chen 'bras/ 
199b3(rgyud): spos dag ni dbul// oM be shra ba Na sa pa ri bA ra sa mA dza dzaHhUM baM ho oM bai swA hA/ oM be shra ba Na A kaR+Sha ya hUM dzaHzhes spyan drang ba'i sngag so// oM a mri ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ces
199b4(rgyud): ba ni bgegs bskang pa'i sngag so// de nas tog la sogades pas// mchod pa dag ni na mkhra' ru// rab tu mtsho da de sme bar bya// oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni/ adz+nyA pa ya ti/ 
199b5(rgyud): i maM ba liM gr-ih+Na tu/ sa ma ya rak+Sha nA ma ma sid+d+him+me prats+tsha tu ma ma sarba sa twa swA hA/ oM be shra maN+Da ya sahA/ oM dzam+b+ha lA ya swAhA/ oM pUN+Da b+ha drA ya swAhA/ oM ma NiH
199b6(rgyud): dra ya swA hA/ oM kuM ba rA ya swAhA/ oM si pra dza nA yai swAhA/ oM gu h+ya d+ha nA ya swA hA/ oM pAny+tsa kI ya swA hA/ oM tsi bi kuN+Da le ya swAhA// gtor mi dbul ba'i sngag so// de nas mtsho dang 'gron rnam
199b7(rgyud): btang 'od zer lcags kyu dkrol nas su// dkrol po'i dus na gshegs dang mnyam// mnyam langs spyod ba'i cho ga bya'o// rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las gtor ma'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// 
199b8(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sgrub par 'dong ba'i don du 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku'i
200a1(rgyud): spu nas 'od zer spros te rnam thos sras 'khor bcas kyi thugs bskul nas 'khor der 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rin po che'i phye mas gtor na
200a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos skyong ba'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi ba lags te/ bdag gis chos dang ldan pa rnams kyi chos srung zhing yun ring du gnas
200a3(rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid kyis gsang ba bshad na bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar ci gnang zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po leg so// rang
200a4(rgyud): gi gsang ba legs par shod cig/ ngas rje su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlab par bya'o// rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyis kyang byin gyis rlob par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kyis lags pa
200a5(rgyud): smros shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas rnam thos kyi bugau stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la byag/ 'tshal nas rang gi rig pa 'di smra so// oM be shra ba N+DA
200a6(rgyud): hUM hUM ba tsa pa tsa chen+da tshin+da swA hA/ zhes brjod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sngags 'di'i sgrub pa ni 'di lags te/ gang zhig bdag sgrub
200a7(rgyud): par 'dod pa des dus gsum du mchod pa rgya chen po bshams te/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa mchod la sems rtse gcig dang ldan pas gnas dben par 'dug ste/ bcom ldani/ 
200a8(rgyud): 'das phyag na rdo rje sgom pa pos bdag gi sngags de khri phrag gcig bzlas/ de nas las rnams sgrub par bya'o// de ltar bdag sgrub pa dang bdag gi las sgrub pa po nges bdag 'khor ba
200b1(rgyud): bcas pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa rgya chen por mchod par bya'o// de la bdag dang bdag gi 'khor rnams la mchod pa dang gtor ma rgya chen po dbul ba'i sngags ni 'di rnams yin te// 
200b2(rgyud): oM shra ba NA ya swA hA/ oM dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ oM pU Na b+ha dra ya swA hA/ oM ma Ni b+ha dra ya swA hA/ oM ku be rA ya swA hA/ oM saM pra dza nA ya swAhA/ oM gu h+ya dA nA ya swA hA/ oM pAny+tsi kA ya swA hA/ oM bi
200b3(rgyud): tsi kuN+Da la ya swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags da ni bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags gnyis shes par bya'o// de nas bdag gi las sgrub pa ni bdag gi
200b4(rgyud): bshad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes gsol nas/ 'di'i las bshad pa ni// gang zag gang gis sgrub 'dod pas// bsang dang sbyin
200b5(rgyud): sreg mnan pa gsum// rim pa ji bzhin shes par bya// bsgrub bya bstan la sdang ba rnams// spra tshil la sog/ sa gzugs byas la// dgug dang gzhug sogs dbang
200b6(rgyud): du bya// yig 'bru bco brgyad sngags kyis ni/ dus gsum brdeg par rab byas nas// 'phral du yid ches 'joms pa ste// bsgrub bya gsod par the tshom meng // gal te sbyin sreg
200b7(rgyud): byed pa na// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod las// 'dir ni drag pos bsgral bar bya// ner sbar tshal rab bsreg bya// thab khung rab dang 'bring tha ma// rab kyis mtho gsum 'bring
200b8(rgyud): gis // tha mas mtho gang tshad du bya// bud shing tshe ra ma can shing gis// kun tu drag po rab tu sgrub// bag zan yungs kar mar sreg cing // sdang ba'i lus ngag yid gsum rnams// 
201a1(rgyud): rdzas la bstims te sbyin bsreg bya// 'khor bcas gnod sbyin mar bsams te// sreg pa'i rdzas kyis mchod pa 'am// las me gnod byin rdzas kyis brag// gang ltar
201a2(rgyud): byas kyang 'grub par 'gyur// de tshe bstong pa 'dis kyang ni// rtse gcig sems kyis bstod par bya// hUM kun 'dul mi bzang gnod sbyin sogs// gdug pa dpal tsha rab tu 'jigs// 
201a3(rgyud): khro bo rngam pa cher sgrogs pa// 'khor bcas rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod// oM bai shra ba Na puSh+pa hU~M swA hA// oM bai shra ba Na d+hU pa hU~M swA hA// oM be shra ba Na dI pe hUM swA hA// oM be shra ba Na
201a4(rgyud): gan+d+ha hUM swA hA// oM baM shra pa Na ne bi d+ya hUM swA hA// gtso bog nod sbyin 'khor kyang mchod// de nas rim pas mcho dad pa ni/ gsang sngags kun tu sprul te bzlas// sgro dang bsdu
201a5(rgyud): bkun tu bya// spel byed kun gyi thun mong yin// oM bai ba Na che ge mo mA ra ya phaT swA hA// gtso bo ji ltar 'a rakyang ngo // rang gi rig pas mchod par bya// rig pa kun
201a6(rgyud): tu rten byas nas// rdul phran bzhin du brlag par bsam// phrin las bcol la gtor ma btang // mchod dang gtor ma'i rim pa ni// go rims bzhin du dbul bar bya// zhi ba'i las kyi
201a7(rgyud): rim pa ni// thab khung mtho gang tshad nyid la// sreg rdzas la sogs rab tu dbul// lus ngag yid gsum sdigs bcom nas// ye shes me yi ngo bor bya// smod dang thab ni dor bar bya// 
201a8(rgyud): der ni gdon rnams kun sreg cing // bgegs chen zhi ba'i las kyang bya// rgyas dang dbang du bya ba la// las dang bye brag rim pa rnams// sngar bshad pa yi las bzhin du// thab dbyib/ 
201b1(rgyud): byiblag shes par bya// ser dang dmar ba'i bung shing sogs// rim brdas ldan dbul ba ni// oM be shra baN+DA ya dA na puSh+Ti ku ru swAt+ma// oM be shrab tu ba shi ku ru swA t+ma// oM be shrab d+hA m+b+ha
201b2(rgyud): shAn+tiM ku ra sU hA// gtso bos ji bzhin 'khor bcas ni// rigs pa'i rdza rje mchid par bya// sreg pa'i rdzas ni bag zan dang // yungs kar mngar sogs rim pas mcho // phrin las rnam po ni
201b3(rgyud): kun 'grub ste// brtse bar brtson pas nye bar 'grub// 'bring dang tha mas 'bring dang ni// tha ma nyid du shes par gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rnam thos kyi bu 'khor dang bcas pa
201b4(rgyud): rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis bshang ba'i las 'di rnams rgyu dab pa po nges dus rgyun tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang / 
201b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin rnams la dkar gsum gyis mchod par bya// chang kun tu spang bar bgyi'o// sha rnams ni 'ongs pa'o// dang / shis pa drang bar bya'o// de ltar rtse gcig gis bdag
201b6(rgyud): cag sgrub pa de rnams kyi phrin las ji lta ba bzhin du bdag cag gis ma bsgrubs na/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'khus par gyur cing / bdag cag gis chos ma bsgyangs par
201b7(rgyud): byas po yino// de la bdag gis bro tshig ni 'di yin// oM be shwa ar+tha kha~M thaM zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam thos kyi bu chen po leg so// shin tu ra
201b8(rgyud): tu leg so// ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag gis don du rang gi gsang ba smras pa ni don chen po dang ldan no// ngas kyang de rnams kyi don nges par 'grub par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di bshad kyis nyon
202a1(rgyud): cig bcom ldan 'das la leg so// zhes rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rnams ltar nyan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra pA Ni ni lAm+ba
202a2(rgyud): d+har badz+ra s+pho Ta hUM phaT swA hA/ rig pa 'di ni las thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i sngag so// rnam thos kyi bu chen pos ji ltar khas blangs pa ltar gsang ba dang ldan par byed pa'o// de bzhin gyi ni
202a3(rgyud): nas gnod sbyin mi snang bar gyur to// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las rnam thos sras kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom
202a4(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du gdug btsan la bsnun pa'i 'khor lo bshad du gsol zhes gsol
202a5(rgyud): ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar thugs kyis gnang nas rang gi thugs ka nas 'od zer kun tu khyab par spros te/ sems can thams cad la
202a6(rgyud): byams pas khyab par mdzad nas lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje ngas bgegs la bsnun pa'i 'khor lo bshad kyis khyod rtse gcig tu nyon cig/ de ltar 'tshal lo zhes ltar/ 
202a7(rgyud): nyan no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig 'khrul 'khor byed 'dod pas// nyams dga' dben pa'i gnas dag tu// phyag na rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bya// snod bcung rdo rje gtum
202a8(rgyud): bor sgom// rlung las ri rab mthar thug pa// rdul rnyed grangs kyi sku ru bsam// dbus na phyag rdor rnal 'byor sgom// ri bong 'dzin pa zhabs kyis brdabs// stong gsum chad kyi zla ba
202b1(rgyud): la/ bgegs chen kun tu 'angar bar sgom// sku la nyi ma stong ldan pa'i// gzi brjid bzod dka'i 'od zer gyis// bgegs rnams ma lus 'tshig par sgom// ljags las bzlas pa'i snga
202b2(rgyud): phreng gis// stong gsum gang bar rab tu sgom// rgyan tu byas pa'i klu brgyad kyis// kha blangs chen po btang ba las// lha klu thams cad skrag par 'gyur// thugs las khro spros de dag gis/ 
202b3(rgyud): bskal pa'i rlung ltar 'thor bar 'gyur// phyag gis rdo rje rab bsnun pas// rgyogs gzar bzhin du bsnun par 'gyur// hUM hUM 'brug ltar rab tu sgrogs// skad kyis kun tu bkug par bas
202b4(rgyud): de ltar byas gyur thams cad 'grub// las kyis mnar ba 'jig par 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje mi shes par// gang zhigagazhan du skal dman par// 'di la gang 'grub thams
202b5(rgyud): cad 'grub// mchog dang thun mong bye brag go// rdo rje sa'o// ga gi rgyud las bsnan pa'i 'khor lo ste le'u bzhi pa/ 'o// / de nas gzhan
202b6(rgyud): yang 'khrul 'khor gyi// cho ga rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// gro ga'am shing shun dag la ni// ri mig nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i// 'khor lo dag ni rab bris te// zla ba yar gyi ngo la brtsam// 
202b7(rgyud): gcig sems kyis rab tu bri// dbus su drag po'i yi ge dgod// gnyis par nor 'dzin yi ge ste// gsum par badz+ra zhes pa dang // gzhi pa chu yig dang po dgod // lnga par na ni rab tu dgos
202b8(rgyud): mtshams bzhir bsgrub bya'i gsong snying bri// de ni nang gi re mig go// phyi yi re mig bcu gnyis la// oM spangs yi ge bcu gnyis la// de yi gsang sngags 'di yin te/ nI lAM ba rad+ha
203a1(rgyud): ra badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT zhes bya'o// rab tu rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo ste// bsgrub bya'i snying khar dril de gzhug/ dang po mtha' nas dril bar bya// de nas sbyin bsreg cho ga bya/ 
203a2(rgyud): gal te mnan pa byed 'dod pas// sngar bzhin 'khrul 'khor rdzogs byas nas// mtha' ru mnan pa'i cho ga bya// khe bar sar pa kha sbyar du// bcug nas rdo rje rgya gram bri// rdo rje spyan gyis
203a3(rgyud): rab sbyar nas// gtsug lag khang sogs mnan par bya// gal ta ra mig mi 'dod na// rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo la// hUM yig dbus su rab dgod de// lhag ma bcu gnyis rtsibs
203a4(rgyud): la dgang // bri ba rdzogs na snying khar gzhug/ dgug dang gzhug sogs byas la sreg/ mi 'dod mnan pa'i tshe dgu bya// mar gyi dus la shis pa yin// 'khrul 'khor ji ltar
203a5(rgyud): bris pa ltar// gang 'dod las la the tsom mang // dperan mi lces rtswa bsregs 'dra// gang yin gnas par// mi 'gyuraro// bri ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi cho ga ste rdo rje sa 'og
203a6(rgyud): gi rgyud las le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas yang lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thams cad zab mo'i spyod yul lag/ 
203a7(rgyud): pas sbyin sreg la sog pas grol bar cang 'gyu lags sam// bdag gi the tsom bsal du gsol zhes zhuso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje snying rje che// dang pa'i
203a8(rgyud): shugs kyis rab nyams te// dkyil 'khor rdzas kyis sbyor ldan zhing // sbyin sreg las dang de nyid shes// sdom par dam tshig rgyud ldan na// mtshan mas grol bar 'gyur ba ste// 
203b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg rdzas la sogs// meng na dngos grub mi 'grub pas// sbyin sreg las ni 'bad bas brtsam// phrin las bzhi yi sbyin sreg las// drag po'i rib bya ba ni// khru bzhi pa
203b2(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor la// dbus su zur gsum khru ra tshad// zab su khru phyed brko bor bya// phyi rol rim pa gsum ldan pa// dbus su rdo rje'i mtshan ma bri// rim pa gsum la rdo rje yi// rtsegasu
203b3(rgyud): phreng gis bskor ba bri// mtshamasu lcags kyu bri bar bya// tsher mo can gyis shing bu ni// khru gang tshad kyis rab tu shis// dug dang khrag dang ska tshe sogs// rdzas ni rim par shes par
203b4(rgyud): bya bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// ye shes khro/ po spyan drangs te// 'jig rten gsum 'dul gzugasu bsam// mchod pa'i rim pa rab tu dbul// de la
203b5(rgyud): sbyin sreg gi sngags gsungs pa 'di yin te/ oM nI lA ba ra d+ha ra/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la a nA la ha na sarba duSh+TAnra sarba b+hasmi ku ru nA lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni che ge mo mA ra ya
203b6(rgyud): hU~M phaT ces pas rdzas rnams sreg go/ dug dang khrag dang lan tshwa las// gzugs byas rab tu bsgrubs te sreg/ oM nI lAM ba ri dA ra badz+ra pA Ni yak+Sha khA da ya ban d+ha ya ban d+ha/ 
203b7(rgyud): ya mo ha ya mo ha ya sha dz+nyA A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ gzugs la brab pa'i sngagaso// oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni sha traM grih+Na A kaR+Shi hU dza dza/ 'gro ba dgug pa'i sngagaso// de ltar sbyin sreg/ 
203b8(rgyud): rab byas nas// chu bo bskems dang klu shing bcang // glang chen g.yas chung me chen 'bar// nang dang yams sogs byung ba'i tshe// zhi ba mchog gi las bsgrubs te// thab khrong rdum
204a1(rgyud): khor ba kA ba// rim pa gsum ldan khru gang chang // rab su khru phyed brkos byas nas// zhi ba'i las kyi chog bya// de ltar byas na mtshan ma yi// dngos grub
204a2(rgyud): par the tsom med// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// gus pas rlung don rab tu 'azung // 'gro ba'i don la rab brtson gyis// kye ma rgyud chen mchog tu gsang // byin rlabs sngon du cher 'thung ba// ston/ 
204a3(rgyud): ba rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs// rab tu 'bad pas sgrub par gyis// dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las sbyin sreg gi rim pa ste le'u drug pa'o// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang / 
204a4(rgyud): dpal chen gdan la rab bzhengs nas// lag na rdo rje la gzigs nas// las kyi cho ga bshad par bya// dug la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la// gang 'dod pa yi gzugs
204a5(rgyud): byas te// snying khar 'khrul 'khor rab tu gzhug/ bdag nyi nga las kyi lhar gsal bar// ga'u nang du rab bcug ste// tshon gyi tha gu sna lnga bkri// snying kha'i lcags kyu rab
204a6(rgyud): bkug nas// yi ge bcu gsum 'khrul 'khor bzlas// 'gul g.yo yi ni rtags byung nas// chu chen gzhung la btang bar bya// gal te rtags de ma byung na// da du ra yi khu ba dang // khrag dang dug
204a7(rgyud): bsres rab byugs te// tshar ma can gyi shing mas sreg/ oM nI lAM ba ra dA ra badz+ra pA Na stam+b+ha ya mo ha ya b+han+d+ha ya da ha nA ya hUM hUM phaT/ dus gsum dag tu bdugs byas na// skad ngan sna tshog/ 
204a8(rgyud): 'don par byed// de nas sngags 'dis chu la ngor// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT// tshen gyis dril nas rab tu bor// bsam pas pa tsha'i rgya mtshor bsgyur// de nas mi ldog bya ba'i phyir/ 
204b1(rgyud): snrus n+dan tu rnam par gyu// mo nI la m+bar d+hang badz+ran A s+thA m+b+ha sa nan pa skyes rgyun du gas par bya'o// de na sa las dengs par grub // derje sa 'ogs rgyu las brgyud
204b2(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas sems can rnams kyi don du sngags kyi le'u 'di gsung so// oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra
204b3(rgyud): pA Ni hUM hUM phaT/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags las thams cad sgrub pa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs gsang ba'o// 'dis ni ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad
204b4(rgyud): 'grub ste/ phyag rgya thams cad 'ching ba sgrub pa la ni rdo rje da khu tshur gyiso// dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rab tu gdengs pas so// sems can thams cad rjes
204b5(rgyud): chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje bzhad paso// thams cad lkug sa par bya ba la ni rdo rje hUM sgras so// nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje ku mu ngas bya'o// klu thams cad
204b6(rgyud): 'dul ba la ni rma bya'i mjug sgros bya'o// dgra thams cad bsad pa la ni 'khrul 'khor gyis so// nor sgrub par 'dod na dzam+b+ha la'i chu sbyin gyis bya'o// bgegs 'phang bar 'dod na ting
204b7(rgyud): nge 'dzin gyis bya'o// thams cad 'gugs pa la ni rdo rje lcags kyus bya'o// rims srung ba la ni rtsa ku sha'i 'brum bus bya'o// klu sgrub par 'dod na mtshar bu'i lcug ma dang bdud rtsi'i chus
204b8(rgyud): bya'o// pha rol gyi dpung 'joms par 'dod na gu gul gyis bya'o// las rnams la sngags 'bum gyis bya'o// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las sngags kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// 
205a1(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bzlas pa yi// nges pa 'dir ni bshad par bya// gang zhig dngos grub 'dod pas// dam tshig sbom dang rab ldan pas// bdag nyid las kyi lhar bsgom/ 
205a2(rgyud): te/ ye shes khro bo spyan drangs te// dzaHhUM baM ho/ dgug sogs bya// rang nyid zla bar sngags kyi phreng // dngul sbom lta bur rab bsams te// myur dal gsal dang mi gsal spangs// yid / 
205a3(rgyud): kyi bsgrims pa'i bzlas pa bya// mchod pa rnam pa lngas kyang mchod// rab tu bsgrims pa'i bzlas pa 'dis// gang 'dod dngos grub nges par 'grub// oM AHhUM sku gsung thugs byin gyis
205a4(rgyud): brlab pa'i sngag so// oM badz+ra pA Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA// dbang ba skur ba'i sngagaso// oM badz+ra pA Ni tiSh+Tha hUM// thugs bar+Nadan pa'i sngag so// sku dang thugs kyi gsang ba dang // gsung gi
205a5(rgyud): gsang ba ma lus pas// myur du byang chub la reg 'gyur// gang tshe sgrub la brtson ldan pa// tshe gcig 'bras bu myur thob 'gyur// gnyis med rang bzhin rdo rje can// mkha'
205a6(rgyud): dbyangs rdo rje kun tu khyab// brjod med rtog bral de nyid don// lhun grub dang la rab tu bzhag/ hUM dang AHyi rnam pa can// ji ltar chu yi zla ba bzhin// ma yangs sems kyis rgyun tu sgom// a
205a7(rgyud): ma ho mgon po bcom ldan 'das// mchog las mchog tu rnam par rgyal// e ma ho sprul pa'i rnam pa sku// sgra la rab tu dmigs pa med// dge chen kun gyi spyod yul yin// rang gsal
205a8(rgyud): nyid la rnam par dag/ mchog gi byang chub tshul du gnas// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las nges pa dang rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang // 'gro
205b1(rgyud): mgon la rab gzigs te// srung ba'i cho ga rab tu gsungs// lag na rdo rjerab tu nyon/ 'gro ba gdug pas zin gyur pa// bas ma ngag la dung 'gro'i gzugs// legs bdag tu rabu byas/ 
205b2(rgyud): te/ khong pa rdul la sogs pas dgang // gang nas 'dod pa'i sa phyogs sam// rang lus ngag la legs sbas nas// srung ba dam par 'gyur ba'o// bde gshegs sku gdung ring bsrel
205b3(rgyud): can/ rab tu gnas pa lags byas te// gang snod sar ni rab sbas na// bden stobs brjod pas zhi bar 'gyur// bya la sogs pa'i byol song tshogs// yid 'ong mdzes pa'i dud 'gro la// 
205b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bye tshogs kyis// gsungs pa'i ga/ zungs sngags dag gis ni// skud pa sngon po dag dang / ni// ngar la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te// bden pa bdar la
205b5(rgyud): rab tu bsngos// gtor ma btang na zhi bar 'gyur// kham bor la sogs snod gtsang mar// sman dang ngar sog sa rab bcug ste// me tog bdug sogs mchod byas te// 
205b6(rgyud): sa la sbas na gnod pa rnams// zhi ba dag tu 'gyur ba yin// skud pa dkar po sum sgril la// mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// sgrub dang bsgrub pa'i mchod pa bya// rgyal la rab tu mgul du
205b7(rgyud): btags// bar chod bzlog par 'gyur bar nges// yungs kar mar dang mu zi rnams// cha snyoms lus la rab byugs na// gdug pas zin la thar par 'gyur// ba gun da'i me tog dang
205b8(rgyud): 'da' hu na nga'i 'bras bu la// smin drug dus su rab bsgrubs na// gdug pa'i phyogasu mi gnas so// stag dang dreng dang 'ja' thar gyi// spus ni gdug pa las grol 'gyur// 'bab chu rtsa
206a1(rgyud): mtsho la sogs pa// lus srung bya ba mthar phyin par// byas na mchog tu srung bar 'gyur// rdo rje 'chang ba khyod kyis zung // mthar phyin zla ba sprin gza' las// grol
206a2(rgyud): blta bur 'gyur ba yin// dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / lag na rdo rjes legs smras pa/ bsdu bsngags kyi cho ga ni
206a3(rgyud): ji ltar lagaso rdo rje 'chang // khyed la rab tu nyan par 'tshal// nyon cig rdo rje 'chang ba khyod// sngags ba tu khyod la bshad par bya// gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar// pad+ma mdab
206a4(rgyud): ma brgyad pa bri// 'dod don thams cad rab 'grub pa// der ni gsang sngags bdu bar bya// dbus su yi ge'i bdag po da bzhag/ bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la// yi ge i ni rab tu sbyar// 
206a5(rgyud): mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la// lnga pa yi ni mtha' dang sbru ra// de nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa bzhag/ de nas mthar gnas gnyis pa bzhag/ de nas bzhi pa'i bzhi pa bzhag/ nga na
206a6(rgyud): mthar gnas gnyis pa bzhag/ de nas lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la// ra dang bcas pa bzhag par bya// de nas lnga pa'i dang po bzhag/ de nas gsum pa'i tha ma la
206a7(rgyud): / i ni rab tu sbyar te bzhag/ bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la// yi ge A ni rab tu sbyar// stong pas mnan pas nyis 'gyur dang // lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa la// gsum pa yi ni dang por sbyar// yi ge
206a8(rgyud): bcu gsum rig pa'i sngags// brtse bas brtson par rab bzlas na// gang 'dod dngos grub nges par 'gyur// kye ma ho rdo rje can gyis gsungs// sngags kyi rgyal po bla med lam// phyag na
206b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i dngos grub thob// dpal rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las sngags btu ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang // spyan mig 'od zer sprul mdzad nas// slob
206b2(rgyud): ma rab tu smin bya'i phyir// dbang bskur cho ga rab tu bshad// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// gsang dang ldan pa dbang thob cing // dul dang drang dang shes nyan che// g.yo chung dang bzang byang sem
206b3(rgyud): thob/ tudakyil 'khor cho ga rab mkhas pa// slob ma dam pa dbang bskur phyir// yid 'ong gtsug lag khang sogasu// brtul zhugs sngon du legs spyad nas// de nas sa yi cho ga bya// brtag dang / 
206b4(rgyud): sbyang zhing bslang bas// mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa dang // rmi la dam mtshan ma'i sgo nas brtag/ zhi ba'i cho gas sbyin sra dag ni// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi cho ga bya// 'byung po rnams la
206b5(rgyud): mchod cing bsgo// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab gnas te// hUM las rdo rje chen po sgom// 'bru las gzhal yas khangachen sgom// spyan gnyis nyi zla'i 'od zer gyis// bgegs
206b6(rgyud): rnams ma lus tshar gcong ngo // rdo rje chen po gar 'gros kyis// sa gzhi lan gsum bskor bar bya// ba yi rnam lngas lags byugs te// chom bu gcig gis lha dgod bya// mchod dang
206b7(rgyud): bstod dang snyan gsan dbab// bum pa lhag par gnas par bya// slob ma cho gas rab smin bya// thig dang tshon gyi cho ga ni// las kyi cho ga bzhin du bya// gdong g.yogs ngar ni sngon po yi/ 
206b8(rgyud): slob ma dag ni gzhug par bya// sdom ldan dbang bskur lngas bskur ro// bum pa dang po rdo rje dang // dril bu dbu rgyan ming gi dbang // las kyi cho ga ji bzhin no// tshes bcu bzhi dang bcu
207a1(rgyud): gsum la// slob ma las la bzung bar bya// byin rlabs rim pas 'pho ba dang // 'bral du yid ches bskyed par bya// rin chen snying po dri mang drung // rlung rnams ku
207a2(rgyud): ca ba ni// 'dir dbang bskur ba dam pa yin// smin pa'i las la rten pa yi// dbang bskur mchog gi rgyud gsungs pas// rab gnas dge ba sdom pa ldan// dam pa yon gyis mnyes par
207a3(rgyud): bya/ grol ba mthar byin rab tu gnas// slob mi smin pa'i cho ga'o// rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las slob mi la dbang bskur ba'i le'u sa bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nus byang chub sa/ 
207a4(rgyud): dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso la to// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du bdag gi thugs kyi gsang ba bshad du gsol// zhes gso
207a5(rgyud): pa btab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ la gan rdo rje mi bzang khyod// gzhan don bag brtson lagaso leg so// gang zhig dus kyi snyigs ma la// gdul
207a6(rgyud): dka'i sems can 'dul 'dod pas// dang po byang chub sems bskyed la// tshogs gnyis kun rdzogs mthar phyin pas// rin chen snod du pad+ma'i gter// dbus su gsang ba'i bdag/ 
207a7(rgyud): po can/ 'dab ma brgyad la klu chen brgyang // sbrul mgos rgyan pa dgrod par byas khrus dang gtsang sbra dang ldan pas// las kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// dang po spyan drang rab mchog
207a8(rgyud): bdag dang lha gnyis 'phro 'dur bzlas// klu brgyang zhi bar 'gyur sems kyis// hUM dang hUMg thag pa las// bsgrub bya 'od kyi phung por bya// skad cig mas ni hUM du bslang
207b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra kro d+ha a hI tsan+d+ra phaT/ khri bzlas gdon las nges grol 'gyur// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis ni// thugs kyi 'phro 'dugasang ba yin// bsgrub bya'i lus ni tshon gyis dkri// hUM chen
207b2(rgyud): phreng ba'i 'phro 'dus bcang // rdzas chen rnams la rab brtags na// nges par gdon las grol bar 'gyur// gal te nges kyang ma grub na// sngags kyi phreng ba bzlog te bzlas// rdo rje 'phreng
207b3(rgyud): bas rab bcang na// the tsom med par 'grub par 'gyur// 'og gi bgegs bzlog cho ga mchog/ yid bzhin nor ltar 'byung ba yin// thegs pa gsum la nges rgyal ba'i// rgyud chen
207b4(rgyud): gsang ba mthar thug pa// skyob pa thugs kyi rnam pa yin// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'// sprul ma thag tu// lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs kyi
207b5(rgyud): 'khor rnams dang / lha'i tshogs thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo // dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las gas
207b6(rgyud): ba gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / kha che'i paN+Di te tse lu dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// rdzogs so// // rgya gar
207b7(rgyud): skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra pa Ni nI lAm+ba ra dA ra badz+ra pA tA la nA ma tan+ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje sa 'og ces bya ba'i rgyud// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha
207b8(rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sa 'og rim pa bdun klu'i rgyal po'i gnas na rin po che'i khri la bzhugs te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang
208a1(rgyud): rigs ldan la sogs te klu rnams dang / byang chub semapa' lagra na rdo rje la sogs pa rnams dang thabs gcig ste/ de nus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa nas
208a2(rgyud): 'od zer brgya stong du ma bkye bas 'jig rten du 'gyur ba dang / ltas byung bas 'jig rten pa rnams 'jigs shing skrag nas brgyal bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes
208a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ 'od zer 'ad 'gyur ba dang / ltas byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa
208a4(rgyud): las grub pas 'bras bu yang tshad med kyis// byang chub sam/ sa dpa' brgyal ba las bslang du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas 'od zer
208a5(rgyud): brgya stong du ma bkye ste/ 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis brgyal ba las bslang so// de nas 'jig rten pa rnams kyis chud du brjod pa/ a ma thabs chen thugs rje yis// 'jig
208a6(rgyud): rten thams cad brgya la gyur na// thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis// brgyal ba thams cad slongs par gyur// de nas 'jig rten pa rnams sa 'og rim pa bdun gyi klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'dus
208a7(rgyud): par gyur nas gsol ba btab pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las can// ston pa bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// 'jig rten rnams la phan gdags phyir// rdul bral chos rnams bshad du gsel
208a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa badz+ra pA Ni hUM zhes gsungs pas snod dang ldan par byas so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams 'khrug so// shin tu ying 'khrugs nas kha g.yab
208b1(rgyud): cing brang brdungs te/ kye ma gyi hung bdag klu'i gnas dang / ston pa ni 'jig rten pas phrogs pas 'jig rten pa rnams brlag par bya'o zhes zer nas/ klu'i kha'i rdzas pas 'jig rten pa rnams
208b2(rgyud): la mdze'i nang btang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nang sal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thugs kha'i dpal be'u las nang sel ba'i 'od / zhal nas kyang
208b3(rgyud): daya zhes bya ba'i sngags dang bcas te byung bas me long la has btab pa bzhin du song ngo // de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis klu bran rnams bskul nas la la rtsa nas zhug so// la la dang
208b4(rgyud): po'i sgro nas zhug so// la la rus pa nas zhugs pa la brko ma ldan 'das kyis dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba'i rji 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa la dbugs kyis bsru / 
208b5(rgyud): dbang po la zhugs pa dang / rus pa la zhugs pa sreg pa'i 'khor los bcom mo// de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams ra 'khrugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la snang ba re rare
208b6(rgyud): chang nas lus la sri bas byang chub kyi sems dang ldan te rgyan du song ngo // de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis bstod pa/ 'jig rten 'di na klu'i rgyal po mthu che yang // bcom ldan pa spu'i char/ 
208b7(rgyud): mi pong // des na bcom ldan 'gro ba skyob// klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi rtag tu bstod// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las glang bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje
208b8(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang la/ yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ sar sna'i dbang gis dbul gyur pa// nor rnams ji ltar sgrub par bgyi// mdun gyi phyag na rdo rje yi// ye shes sems
209a1(rgyud): dpa'i phyag g.yas pas// dzam b+ha lha ni bsgom par bya// bdag nyid sngags kyi rgyal po zlos// snying khar 'od zer dag gis ni// ye shes sems dpa' bskul bar bya// ye shes
209a2(rgyud): sems dpas dzam+b+ha lha'i// sngags ni zlos pa nyid du sgom// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kha nas// 'od byung dzam+b+ha lha bsku'o// nor gyi rgya mtsho gang bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag
209a3(rgyud): na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba btab pa/ nyes pa shin tu phra mo la// grags dang rnyed pa'i don du ni// 'jig rten gnod byed sgrub byed pa// thog ser bzlog pa bshad du gsol// thog mar mchod
209a4(rgyud): sngon po cig rab gnas gzung dang 'thun par bya// de yi'o// dag tu 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad lte bar bcas pad+mo// rtsibs la lha srin snying po bri// kAd+ha/ tsAd+ya/ tshAng+ga/ shAd+tha/ 
209a5(rgyud): d+ham+bo d+ha/ d+hod+ha/ swAd+ha// dbus su sngags mkhan bri bar bya/ de nas thong ba'i nang du gzhug/ thong ba mchod rten 'og/ tu mnan// snying po'i 'od kyis sngags mkhan de// lha sran
209a6(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa dgug/ de la thun gyis brab par bya// 'byung po 'khrugs pa'i dus su ni// ston pa'i nga rgyal ldan pa la// mthe bong dang ni mtha chung la// hUM las phyag na rdo rje bskyed// mtha
209a7(rgyud): chung phyag na rdo rje yi// thugs nas phyag na rdo rje ni// zhags pa lcags kyu thogs pa spro// snying gi lcags kyus dgug pa deng // mgrin pa zhags pas bcing bar bya// mthe bong phyag na rdo rje yi// rdo
209a8(rgyud): las ni rdo rje spro// bgags rnams la ni bsnun par bya// ba spu'i gshis na rdo rje 'phro// na mkha' thams cad rdo rjer grub// yungs kar rdo rjer bskyeng la byab// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
209b1(rgyud): byaphyagra na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas cheng du brjod pa/ e ma ho stan pa rdo rje 'dzin// sems can rnams la phan don du// tshar bcang rjes bzung gsungs pa mthar// dbu
209b2(rgyud): dang yi dgas gnas las thar// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las nor sgrub pa dang gnod pa bzlog pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin/ 
209b3(rgyud): la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ klu dang gnod sbyin sa bdag gi/ mdze dang rmu chu ji ltar bzlog/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// mdo
209b4(rgyud): sngas ni las kyis rnam par smin pa mi bzlog la sngags kyi/ sa bzlog par khyad par du 'phags// de la klu zhes bya da pa nyon mongs pa gti mug shas che ba yis chags pa dang zhe
209b5(rgyud): sdang yang che ste// gti mug gi dbang gis gnyid che ba dang / zhe sdang gi dbang gis skye ba bdun du mi gtong ba dang // chags pa'i dbang gis chags pa la gnas pa'i lus la/ 
209b6(rgyud): zhugs nas mi gtong ba'o// klu gdol pa can gyis mthong ba tsam gyis nang skye // rigs gsum ni reg pa tsam gyis nang skye // klu bran rnams ni steng sgo gsum nas zhugs nas lus
209b7(rgyud): kyi bcud za bar bya// byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ de rnams ji ltar 'dul bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das klu 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
209b8(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di gsung so// nA ga bi dA ra NA dzaH/ nA ga uta sA da na ya dzaH/ sbyor ba gsum la legs gnas pas// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis 'gugs par 'gyur/ 
210a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi dbugs las sngags 'di rnams byung ngo // tad+ya thA/ \u0f7f
210a2(rgyud): bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha/ mA ti kra ma the/ ha ra ha ra nA gA nA na/ pra ha ra haM pra ha ra nA gA nA/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga mar+m+ma Ni ShI r+yA nU nA ga shwa rI ra Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya ni/ 
210a3(rgyud): 'jigs shing skrag te rgyal ba 'gyur// snying khar yi ge hUM bsgoms pas// klu rnams thams cad bsregs gyur pas// bde bi can gyi gnasu skye// byang chub sems dpa' phyag na/ 
210a4(rgyud): rdo rjes gsol pa/ de la 'jug pa'i gnasu mchis// ba dam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rtsa bzhi dag nas zhugs gyur nas// rtsa rnams na zhing tsha ba dang // steng sgo
210a5(rgyud): mi bang rdul yang 'byung // mugs dang gnyid kyi bdag nyid na// sha mdog sbu ba lta bu ste// rmi lam du ni chu 'od/ 'byung // nga nas chags pa spang par bya// dbang po gsum du
210a6(rgyud): zhugs gyur na// dbang po sbrid cing lus kyang 'dar// sha ni skam zhing rus pa na ra// de la chags pa mi spya // sa yi dbang po kun nas 'jug/ ba spu'i khung bu dmar zhing 'gyur// phol dang shA
210a7(rgyud): bkra 'byung ba dang / rmi lam du ni byol song 'byung // rgyal po dang ni rtsa bzhir 'jug/ tho rangs mi dga' mngon shes smra// gnyid chung ba spu'i gshis kyang dkar// gu gul nag po bstan par
210a8(rgyud): bya/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// nad de 'tsho ba dang mi 'tsho ba'i rno ba ji ltar lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa/ bsnyen pa mtshan ma thob pa yis// bdud rtsi lnga pa
210b1(rgyud): glaci dang // 'bras bu gsum dang rma bya'i sha/ ril bu byas la rgal tshig gzhag/ de'i bar du rma bya'i sgo// mngangs dang ldan na 'tsho bar nges// nag por gyur na mi 'tsho'o// byang chub sems
210b2(rgyud): dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la tshar bcad pa'i thabs du mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags dang 'khrul 'khor sman dang srog/ thabs
210b3(rgyud): ni rnam pa bzhi yin te// byang chub rdo rje can gyis gsungs// dbang bskur dam tshig ldan pa dang // bsnyen pa brtan par gyur pa yis// dang por sngags kyis bzlog par bya// snying kha'i sngags
210b4(rgyud): kyis rgyal po yis// rlung dang 'grogs te 'byung bar 'gyur// / nad kyi snying po hUM bsams te// rgyu rkyen tshogs pa/ sa bsreg par bya// de nas phyir bzlog mnan par bya// sbyin
210b5(rgyud): sreg rnam pa gsum du bshad// dang po zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ste// zlum po khru gang kha dog dkar// kha khyer sor bzhir rdo rjes mtshan// gru gsum sor bcu kha dog gnag/ kha khyer
210b6(rgyud): sor gsum rdo rje mtshan// zla dbyibs zla ba dmar 'dra ba// khru do kha khyer de 'drar shes// zhi ba'o ma can shing gi/ gtum pa 'bigs par byed de'o// dbang yang zhi ba dag dang mtshungs rgyun
210b7(rgyud): bzhag me dang rigs ngan khyim// ram las thab dang me lha bskyang // zhi rgyas dbang la bdud rtsi lnga// gtum pa dmur dang khrag dag dang / dug dang gu gul nag po dang / gzugs brnyan
210b8(rgyud): ngag gis mchod par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa mchog gi sras// me lha'i rgyal po Tik+kis dbang bskur zhing // shes rab mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad sreg// 'jigs
211a1(rgyud): byed me lha nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud// gzi brjid chen po me yi lha// 'dod pa thams cad rab stsol zhing // bdag gzhan phan sogs la zhugs pa// tshangs sras
211a2(rgyud): mchog la phyag 'tshal 'dud// me yi thugs khar drag po ni// cho ga bzhin du bskyed par bya// sbyin sreg de dag 'brel pa yis// nor rnams thams cad ster bar byed// de nas byang chub sems
211a3(rgyud): dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la zhus pa// drag po'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas lha srin thams cad 'dul ba'i sngags 'di gsung so// 
211a4(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ hUM phaT/ nA ga bi d+ha ra NA ya hUM phaT/ na ga uta sa da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI la ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya hUM phaT/ kri tAn+ta ya hUM phaT/ kri tAn+ta rU pA ya hUM
211a5(rgyud): phaT/ ro Sha Na ya hUM phaT/ tra sa nA ya hUM phaT/ kuM b+hU NA u/ te sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ pra ta bi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya hU/ phaT/ yak+Sha a pa smA ra bi nI sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ 
211a6(rgyud): d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha yi/ sarba big+h+na bi nA sha kA rA ya hUM phaT/ sarba sha truM saM brti bi nA she ka rA ya phaT/ no lAm+ba ra dA ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ oM badz+ra a nA la ma hA/ 
211a7(rgyud): b+hU tA dz+wA la b+hasmiM ku ru swA hA/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ puSh+TiM ku oM// sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis ni// lha srin thams cad brgyal bar gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ched
211a8(rgyud): du brjod pa/ e ma dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// drag po 'dul bar dbang bskur nas// sngags rgyal gsungs pas skrag 'gyur ba// ngo mtshar 'di ni shin tu lha zhes pa'o// de nas
211b1(rgyud): rang rang gi srog snying ston pa la phul nas bran gyi tshul du gnaso// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las bcos dka' ba'i nang bzlog pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems
211b2(rgyud): dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod pa dang / phyag byas nas gsol ba btab pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje 'chang
211b3(rgyud): rgyal pos// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing // dbang bskur ba yang ma thob na// bsgrubs kyang ci yang mi 'gru'o// de bas da ni bshad bya ba// gru
211b4(rgyud): bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhir bgyi// thig bzhi dag dang ldan/ gyur pas// cha chen bzhi ru bteb byas nas// shar/ gyi cha chen dang por ni// bzhir bogs dang po lta ba dang // 
211b5(rgyud): gnyis pa pad+ma ral gri gnyis// gsum pa lnga yi snam bu'o// de nas tshon ni dgye bar bya// lta ba dkyil 'khor 'od nga bcas// pad+ma sngon po ral gri sngon// lha gnam gnag la
211b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i sgo// bzhi ni dkar po bri bar bya// sgo yi phyi rol kha dog gnag/ me ri 'bar ba bri bar bya// de la rdo rje phreng bas bskor// mnga' dang phur bu bcu drug la// tshon skung sngon po bri bar bya/ 
211b7(rgyud): dbus su bcom ldan 'das ma la// klu chen phyed gzugs sbrul mgo can// rdzogs par byas nas rnal 'byor ni// cho ga bzhin du gnyis ka yi// rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin du bskyed/ 
211b8(rgyud): dang po bla ma'i spyan sder ni// phyag 'tshal la sogs bdun rnams dag/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' la/ me tog gtor zhing bsting ba bya// phyag tshal bskor ba bdun rnam ga khyis
212a1(rgyud): nas ye shes dbab par bya// gnas gsum yi ge gsum bsams la// sngags 'di yang ni brjod par bya// A be sha ya staM b+ha ya rA rA tsA lA ya/ tsa la ya hUM A
212a2(rgyud): oM dzaH/ de nas dkyil 'khor bstan byas la// rig pa'i dbang ni cho ga bzhin// de nas sngags kyi rjes gnang sbyin// rnal 'byor snying kha'i sa bon las// sngags kyi 'od kyi ye shes bskul// 
212a3(rgyud): shes ljags las 'od byung las// skrong gyur lce la thim par bsam// sgrub pa'i rdzas kra shis brjod// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas
212a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa la mcho du cing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa// snying po kun ral phan gdags dang // sangs rgyas bstan la gzhug don
212a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin bsgrub par bya ba ni// rdo rje chen pos bshad du ga/ sol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sems can kun la/ phan don du// gnod sbyin bsgrub par bya ba ni// gsung ni/ 
212a6(rgyud): 'di skad bka' stsal to// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // theg pa che la smod pa dang // de sgrub pa la snying nas bsnyas// sgrub pa 'di ni brtsam par bya// de la ri rab kyi 'og nas las kyi gnod
212a7(rgyud): sbyin gyi lus blangs la gdong bzhi lag pa bzhi yod pa/ gdong dang po bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags zlos pa// gnyis pa rang gi srog snying zla ba// gsum pa na ma lce'i dbugs 'byung
212a8(rgyud): bzhi pa ni sha dang khrag za ba yod de sgrub pa'i thabs bshad kyis legs par nyon la yid la zung shig/ rdo rje 'dzin gyis// sngags kyi rgyal po 'bum bzlas la// 'byung ba bzhi yi dkyi
212b1(rgyud): 'khor bri// de yi steng du khrag chen gyis// pad+ma 'angab ma bcu drug pa// btson dong tshul du bri bar bya// ngar sngon de yi nang du brjing // dbus su mi yi sha dang khrag dang po khyi ste gnyis pa da/ 
212b2(rgyud): gsum par rna can zangs gtsug phung // lnga par skad can drug par ra// bdun par skye gnyis brgyad par glang // g.yas kyi phyogs nas bskor ba'o// ma ha dang lug dang spre'u// 
212b3(rgyud): gyi phyogs nas bskor ba'o// de ni dbul ba'i dam tshig/ khrag dang drug dang ske tshe yis// nam gyi phyed kyi dus dag tu// dur khrod ras la 'di ltar b+hi// nalnga brgyad phyag snying yang
212b4(rgyud): na bcu// zhal ba ni dang po ni bste/ gnyis pa dmar po chu srin no// gsum ni khro nag yod dang khro// bani de pa yi dgras mgo yino// sgra ni gyen brdzes zhal dang
212b5(rgyud): mtshungs// sprul pa bya rgod khra dang spyang // de yi mgo can bri bar bya// dgug gzhug dbang ni bskrad par bya'o// 'di ni bsten pa'i dam tshig/ bsnyen pa'i dam tshig
212b6(rgyud): gnyis dag gi/ gsum rgyal dag las shes par bya// oM yak+Sha ha sa ha sa/ da ra da ra hU~M/ khra dang sbrang gi khyi la sogs// rmi lam du 'am dngosu 'byung // de nas mchod pa'i dam
212b7(rgyud): rdzas kun// bsgrub bya'i rdzas dang bsras byas la// gzugs brnyan byas la thod par gzhug/ mar ngo gnod sbyin gzugs kyi mchod// oM yak+Sha mA ra ya mA ra ya/ a pra ti ha ba la
212b8(rgyud): pra rA kra mA ya phaT/ sarba sha truM sam brta bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ ni lA ma ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti/ mA ra ya tsit+ti la phaT/ des kyang grub par ma gyur na/ gzugs
213a1(rgyud): brtan rdul la sbyin pasreg bya/ las skyes gzugs brnyan gong bur gzhug/ des kyang grub par ma gyur na// oM yak+Sha ma ra ya ma ra ya/ nA sha yAn+yA shA ya/ tsit+ta la rdung / 
213a2(rgyud): rbang / phyag gi rdo rjes bsnan par bya// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// nI lAM ba sa nA ya phaT/ stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ngo mtshar nas ched
213a3(rgyud): du brjod pa/ zung du 'brel bar gnas gyur pa/ yaM las rlung ste paM las pad// 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di// bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las gnod sbyin sgrub pa'i
213a4(rgyud): le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas byang chub se mas dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'chang la gsol ba btab pa/ snying nas slob dpon smod pa la// klu gzhug pa ni/ 
213a5(rgyud): ji ltar lags// rdo rje can gyis bshad du gsol// klu'i la ga na nad bcu gcig yod de// mdze dang / mdza' to/ 8/ ka ta ma dang / ka sha dang / 'bras dang / phol dang / shu ba
213a6(rgyud): dang / skam pa dang / g.yan pa dang / rmu chu dang / gag pa'o// klu'i gnas ni sa 'og gi rim pa bduno// klu bran ni 'dzam+bu'i gling na yang yod do// 'khor ni rnam pa bzhi dag gis// gtsang ma'i grwa/ 
213a7(rgyud): dag gyon nas ni// dkar gsum dag kyang gza' bar bya// sngags rgyal nyis 'bum bzlas byas la// dkyil 'khor can ngan gur gum byug/ pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bya ste// bdag nyid lag na
213a8(rgyud): rdo rje la// klu chen brgyad kyis bskor ba bri// de la sogs pa bshad zin to// dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub phyogs// klu yi gzugs gcig tsam bya ste/ rin chen lnga 'am gla rtsi 'am// mchod bri/ 
213b1(rgyud): rdzas ni 'o ma sogs// dang po 'das pa'i mchod pa bya// spyan drang mchod dang bstod pa ni// cho ga bzhin du bya ba'o// klu yi snying khang du bsgoms la// 'od zer rnam pa gsum dag gis// klu chen gan
213b2(rgyud): nas dgug par bya// gzugs brnyan de la bstim byas la// mchod pa dag gis mchod par bya// gzugs brnyan g.yo ba 'byung ba na// sdang ba'i lus la gzhug bya ste// dbang po brgyad
213b3(rgyud): nas gzhug bya ste// brgyad cha tha ma'i dus dag tu// 'og ma gla rtsi kha ra yis// lam ni drang por dang byas la// gong bu dgu pa'i sbyor ba yis// de la klu chen gzhug par bya// sgrub pa po yis
213b4(rgyud): gu gul sten// gzugs la phur bus gdab par bya// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// lha yi rnam pa nyid dag la// spogs pa dag gi tshig bzhin// tad+ya thA/ hUM pa~M kra nA ga bi dA
213b5(rgyud): ra NA ya hUM/ nA ga bi dA ra NA/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ sarba sha truM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti she tr-i tsi mA ra ya phaT/ 
213b6(rgyud): oM nA ga g+haM g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ hU hU hU badz+ra ki la ya/ badz+ra dr-iSh+To adz+nyA pa ya kA ya bAka tsi ta badz+ra kI la ya phaT/ na ga ba~M dA ra ya phaT/ nA ga uta sA nga
213b7(rgyud): nA ya phaT/ nI laM ba sa nA ya phaT/ sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can rnams 'dar zhing brgyal gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das brgyal ba sel
213b8(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ a ba sha gsungs pas thams cad kyang dbugs 'byung zhing brgyal ba sangs nas 'dar zhing thal mo sbyar nas cheng du brjod pa// sa
214a1(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'i// sngags dang cing 'dzin nus pa yis// sangs rgyas kyis kyang gnal mi nus// rdo rjes 'on
214a2(rgyud): gi rgyud las klu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas gtam rgyud bshad par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos lha gnas rnam pa brgyad du rgyud thams cad
214a3(rgyud): bsdus nas ri rab kyi byang phyogasu 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud gsung so// de nas zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa'i sngags gsungs pas lha dang lha ma yin gyi rna bar song // rig sngags
214a4(rgyud): 'ching de rnams ngo mtshar nas bstod pa byaso// de nas gling dge snying por 'khor gyi snying po gnod sbyin gyi cha 'dzi na pa/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje byon nas mer gyi
214a5(rgyud): snying po dang 'dra ba dam pa'i chos rgyud thams cad bsdu so// gnyid kyi las gnyis kyi bdag nyid can rgyud sde ste/ nga phrag brgyad cu yang gsung so// de nas 'jig rten du gnod sbyin
214a6(rgyud): rnams kyis/ mchod de sgron ma za ba rdo rjes mgo lus phral ta nyams par byaso// de nas klu 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sa 'og rim pa bdun du
214a7(rgyud): byon nas rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud gsungaso// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las gtam rgyud kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud rdzogs// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI ba ka ra/ 
214a8(rgyud): dang sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ga~M dge slong bya'i gdong pa can gyis bskur ba'o// / rgya gar skang du/ badz+ra b+hU ma tri rA dzA kal+li nA ma/ bod skad du// rdo rjes gsum du rtsu ba zhis
214b1(rgyud): pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshalo// de nas gsang ba'i dbang phyug po// shAka thub kyis ni rigs khro bo// phyis kyi rtog pa las rgyal byed// rtog pa'i bla ma 'di
214b2(rgyud): mchog bshad/ lha dang sngags dang sbyor ba yis// rtog pas rtog pa 'joms pa'i lam// rtog pa med pa'i rig pa yis// khro bo'i dbang phyug zhi ba brnyes// dang po phyag 'tshal de 'og tu// 
214b3(rgyud): bzhi pa yin lnga pa la// dbyings yig gsum pas mdzes par byas// drug pa'i gsum pa blangs byas la// 'og tu dbyangs kyis gnyis pas brgyan// de la zla phyed dang thag le// lnga pa'i bzhi
214b4(rgyud): pa nyid dang ni// drug pa'i gnyis pa nyid dang yang // bzhi pa/ de'i bzhi pa yang de bzhin// yang ni me yi sa bon dang // / lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa yi// 
214b5(rgyud): 'og tu ma yi sa bon no// lnga pa'i dang po nyid dang yang // gsum pa'i snga pa lnga pa la// dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan pa dang // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang // lag
214b6(rgyud): na rdo rje'i snying po'o// lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa la// gsum pa'i dang po mthar gzhag pa/ 'di rnams rig sngags dbang byed pa// gang+gA klung bcu'i bye snyed kyi// sangs rgyas khro bo byang chub sems
214b7(rgyud): 'byung por bcas pa 'gugs mdzad do// rig sngags rnams ni lha nyid de// stong dang snying rje 'dres pa yi// lha 'di snying kha'i sbyor ba ru// legs par bzhag pa bsam par bya// lugasu
214b8(rgyud): byung dang bzlog pa yi// sngags 'di bzlas dang bri bar bya// oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT/ rig sngags 'bum phrag bzlas pa dang // yi ge re la 'bum phrag dang // de las lhag pa'i
215a1(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa po yi bsam pa ni// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dgug dang // bskrad dang dbye rengs bsad pa dang // las ni gang gang 'dod pa nges// snying khar sbyor ba
215a2(rgyud): rim bzhin sgrub// lus rtsa snying rjer ldan pa yis// rang lus lha dang bla ma la// phyag sogs bya ba sngon 'gro bas// reg pa'i khro bo bsgom par bya// dang po stong nyid rnam bsams la// 
215a3(rgyud): lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru// rang gi snying khar dbyangs yig ni// dang po las byung zla ba la// hUM yig sngon po rnam par sgom// rang gi 'dus 'dra'i 'od 'phros nas// sems can dri ma
215a4(rgyud): / rnam bsal te// skur gyur snying po bsdu bar bya// hUM yang rdo / rje sngon por gyur// sngon bzhin spro dang bsdu byas la// sku mdog sngon po cher 'bar ba// rab tu dregs pas khros
215a5(rgyud): pa'o// ri bong 'dzin pa'i steng du ni// bde bar g.yon brgya gar gyis bzhugs// brgyad gnyis lon po'i nyams tshul can// drag cing khros pa'i ro dang ldan// brang 'gro brgyad
215a6(rgyud): bos sku la brgyan// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// rang gi rdo rje bsnams pa ni/ bsnun pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa dang // g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo can// na bza' sngon po
215a7(rgyud): sham thabs 'dzin// spyan mig dmar zhing mche ba gtsigs// dbu skra nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba// steng du bcings dbus cod pan ldan// zhal nas ha ha'i gang rgyangs ldan// khro bo'i bdag
215a8(rgyud): po 'jigs par byed// log 'dren la sogs 'joms mdzad pa// de 'drar bdag nyid rab bsgoms la// de nas bdag nyid snyoms 'jug pa// de yi snying khar nyi ma la// rang gi chos
215b1(rgyud): kyi yi ge las// khros pas yang yang spos mdzad cing // de dang lhan cig bsgo bar bya// sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yis// de bzhin du yang dbang blang zhing // rdo rje rgyu mdzad ting 'dzin pan/ 
215b2(rgyud): gdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byed cing // 'od zer 'byung ba sna tshogs kyis// rims dang gdon dang dug sogs bza'// rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa dang po'o// // de nas/ 
215b3(rgyud): spyan sogs skye mched la// hU~M byung khro bo bsgom par bya// sku sogs gsum la rdo rje gsum// sgom pa 'di ni dbang byed pa'o// dang po zhi bas zhi bar bya// klu la sogs pa'i gzugs
215b4(rgyud): byas la// rang snying 'od kyis bkug la bstim// mchod sbyin bya ba snying rjes sbyin// 'jog po dang ni rigs ldan dang // mtha' yas nor rgyas pad+ma dang // pad chen dung skyong
215b5(rgyud): stobs kyi rgyu// dug rnams snying rje'i sbyor bas sbyangs// nag po dkar po sngon po dang // rang gi gnasu sbyar bar bya// yang na zhi ba'i thab khung du// klu yi sdig
215b6(rgyud): ba zhi bar bya// shin tu gnag pa'i rigs nga la// mngar gsum chu yis gso bar bya// gang zhig sdig can zhi mi 'dul// gnyis kyi sbyor bas rgyun gcod bya// khrag dang dug
215b7(rgyud): sogs rdzas dag la// rig pa bzlog pas bsgrubs nas ni// shin tu khros pa'i khro bo yis// dgug dang gzhug dang myos bsang dang // cho gas gdug pa dbang byas la// sreg pa la
215b8(rgyud): sogs las bya'o// brgyad dang bcu bzhi'i dus kyi tshe// skya rengs shar dang dmar rengs cha// nyin mtshan zad pa'i dus kyi tshe// skra sgrol bcud 'dzag gcer bu ni// byol song gnas su
216a1(rgyud): khrag sdu'o/ lus dbus me 'bar bsgrub byed// khro bo'i spu yi bug las// spros pa'i khro bo khros pa dang // mngag gzhug rnams kyis drangs byas nas// rtog pas
216a2(rgyud): rtog pa bza' bar bya// sngar ni rdo rjes 'og las// gdug pa 'dir ni bza' bar bya// mang du smras pas ci zhig dgos// ma bcos pa yi sems can la// snying rje'i yid can rdo rje sems
216a3(rgyud): til sogs rdzas dang sngags sbyor gyis// sdig pa zhi byed sbyin bsreg bya// rig pa'i blo can kun bzang gis// zhol bsreg bya rgyas pa'o// mi rtag gyur pa'i gdul bya la// 'dod chags yid can bde
216a4(rgyud): chan gyis// bdag nyid dgos pa brtan bya'i phyir// ut+pa la dmar sogs kyi sgrub pa'o// 'dir ni ma rungs sdig pa bye/ dang // gtsor ni sbyangs phyir khro sems kyis// mngon spyod las
216a5(rgyud): ni rgyud kun las// bshad pa thams cad 'dir bya'o// rig snga gas snying rje'i shugs kyis 'gro// las ngan rgyun gcod bcos ma yin// las ngan dag pa'i rang bzhin du// khros pa/ 
216a6(rgyud): dmigs par mi 'gyur te// sbyor ba rnams ni bcos mar 'gyur// byang chub bcos med 'bang spangs pa'o// rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas khams gsum rnam
216a7(rgyud): rgyal po// sngar ni sprul pa bcu drug pos// rtog pa bcu phrag dang bzhi yang // gnyis kyis rig ma 'joms byed 'dir// sprul pa brgyad du bsdus pa dang // bdag nyid gcig pu sgom pa'ang
216a8(rgyud): gsungs// na mkha'i khamasu 'byung ba zhi bsam// ri rab lhun po hI yig las// pad+ma 'ang ba grangs lte ba la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o// hUM las byung ba'i khro bo ni// zhal gcig phyag
216b1(rgyud): bzhin bza' sngo/ rdo rje dril bu mnga' gzhu 'gengs// sbrul dang mi sdug mgos rgyan cing // stag lpags smad dkris 'jigs sel ba// khro bo rnam rgyal bsgom par bya// thugs tha'i hUM
216b2(rgyud): gi sbyor ba yis// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs mtsham su// 'jig rten gsum snang rdo rje dang / 'jig rten gsum 'dul rin chen dang // 'jig rten gsum 'ching pad+ma dang // 'jig rten
216b3(rgyud): gsum 'jigs las nyid dag/ g.yas rnams rang ming mtshan ma la// g.yen rnams gdug pa bsdigs pa'o// bdud rtsi 'khyil dang dbyug sngon dang // mi g.yo ba dang rta mgrin khro// rdo rje dang / 
216b4(rgyud): ni dbyug pa dang // ral gri pad+ma g.yas rnam so// g.yon pa gdug pa bsdigs pa'o// brgyad kyi dbus na khro bo dang / dag/ 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khrul pa sbyong // dbyug pa nag so
216b5(rgyud): po nya bzhi// sku mdog mtshan mis rgyan pa khros// lcags kyu la sogs sgor gnas pa// khro bo'i 'khor lo 'jigs sa la sgom// gtso bcas rig pa'i khro bo kun// sgyu ma'i phreng bas
216b6(rgyud): do shal byas// gos sngon can la stag lpags dkris// gdug pa sel ba'i lam du sgom// de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gtso// kho bo'i mtshan nyid sngags bcas bshang // dkon mchog gsu
216b7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can// sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba// mche ba gtsigs pa dang mtsham pa/ mig ma mngag
216b8(rgyud): gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me lha lter 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can// lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus rgyan pa/ klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar
217a1(rgyud): bas rnacha byas pa// sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba zag/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma dang dbral ba bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu
217a2(rgyud): mnan pa/ gshin rje'i cha byad can/ lce glog ltar 'gyur ba/ gsus po che sbrul za ba/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska ragasu bcings pa/ 
217a3(rgyud): a la la zhes sgrogs par byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i zabasu dpag tshang brgya khri bzhi stong yod pa rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma phrag la khur ba// klu thams cad brlag par byed pa/ gang
217a4(rgyud): rgyangs chen po dgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa/ gshin rjede'i gzugs can khams gsum pa 'jigs par/ byed pa/ klu thams cad brlag par byed pa la phyag 'tshalo// 
217a5(rgyud): de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ste da kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// / tad+ya thA/ b+ha b+ho pa nA ga a dI pa ta ye/ i dan nI lAM ba ra d+har
217a6(rgyud): sha rI ra/ badz+ra pA Ni hri da ya ya sa mA ti kra ma thA mA ku lau ta sA da naM/ baM bi Sh+ya ti/ ta d+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+he/ bi bud+d+ha bi bu d+hA / ma hI prAp+ta ta ra ha ra nA ga nA ne/ ts+tshi nA ts+tshin+da/ nA ga hri da yA ni/ b+hin+da
217a7(rgyud): b+hin+da nA ga nga ma ni/ b+hi Shir+yan+na nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho Ta/ nA ga na ya ni hUM hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga bi dA ra Na ya hUM phaT/ nA go ta sA dA nA ya hUM phaT/ nI laM ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti he ta/ 
217a8(rgyud): ba le pa ra kra ma ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tan+ta ya hUM phaT/ kri tAn+ta rU pa ya phaT/ ro Sha nA ya hUM phaT/ tra sa nA ya hUM phaT/ kuM b+hUN+De/ u ta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ pra ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM pa
217b1(rgyud): yak+Sha a pasma ra bi nA shA ka rA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ha sa d+ha ra dA ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+nAn bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ sarba sha trA saM brta bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ oM/ 
217b2(rgyud): nI laM ba ra d+ha ri/ badz+ri pA Ni rA dz+nyA pA ya ta swA hA// / de'i cho ga la gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la chu la sngags kyis btab tA gto ren btang bar 'gyuraro// klu bzlog par 'dod na smag
217b3(rgyud): shed kyi lcug ma 'am/ bal po se'u lcug mes bya'o// yi dgas dang brjed byed rnams la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// rims nang med par bya ba dang // yi ge 'chus pa la ni skud pa sngon po
217b4(rgyud): bya'o// nor 'dod na zhag gcig bskyang bar gnas te pog gis bdug na rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don tham/ ngas cad ston par 'gyur la gser gyi dong tshe bdun stong ster
217b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya/ 'o// sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad srung ba la ni mar snying po
217b6(rgyud): 'am thal ba 'am yungs kar gyis bya'o// nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po la srung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyu ro// byis pa gdon
217b7(rgyud): gyis nyen pa la ni tshen sna lnga'i skud pa mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyu ro// chom rkun bzlog par 'dod nasas bya'o// dug la ni rtsa ku shas bya ba par bya'o// bdag srung / 
217b8(rgyud): pa la ni yid kyis sam chus bya'o// gzhan srung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsum mam bdun nam bcu bzhi 'am nyi shu
218a1(rgyud): ca gcig gam brgyan brgyad brjod par bya'o// de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyuraro// rdo rjes 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa gsum pa'o// rtog pa 'di dag dbang byed pa
218a2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje khros pa las// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bran g.yog rnams ni bskul bar bya// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ 'di ni bka' tsam nges bsgrags cing // 
218a3(rgyud): baM yig sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod/ snying kha'i 'od kyis dbang bya zhing // gu gul dung bas brong byas la// sar sna chen po sing+ga la zhon pa dang / rmugs 'dzin dang / gang bzang dang / nor bu bzang
218a4(rgyud): dang ku be ra dang / yang dag shes dang / 'brog gnas dang // lngas rtsen dang / pi tsi kuN+Da li rnams la mkho ba sbyi na par bya'o// 'di rnams rta la chibs pa la// 'od dang
218a5(rgyud): ldan zhing me long can/ ras dkar gtsang mas gsal byas la// gsal snang kun ni bri bar bya// yang na kun kyang sbrul nag chi bas// 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha
218a6(rgyud): phyag na bsnams// bskul ba dag par dbang byas na// mngon spyod las kun byed par 'gyur// drag po dgu dang nyi shu brgyad// sa gsum khyab pa spros nas ni// sngags grub stobs
218a7(rgyud): kyis bdag bran byed// dus tshod dus la mchod pa byed// de nas dbul bas 'jigs pa la// rmugs 'dzin sgrub pa yid 'ong bshad // kun kyang gter rnams mnan pa la// rin chen
218a8(rgyud): 'bar bas khyim 'gengs pa// sbyor gang rdo rje chus 'grub 'gyur// pad+ma zla dang gter chen la// dzaM las byung ba'i gnod sbyin dgu// bkug la rang rang gsang sngags kyis// chu dang ba
218b1(rgyud): pa'i mchod sbyin dbul// 'di ni sngags kyi rkang pa rnamaso// oM be shra ba NA ya sUhA/ oM dzam+b+ha lA ya swAhA/ oM pAr+yA b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM ku be rA ya swA hA/ oM swa pra dz+nyA nA ya/ 
218b2(rgyud): swAsAhA/ oM gu h+ya d+ha nA ya swA hA/ oM pAny+tsi kA ya swA hA// oM bi tsi kuN+Da lA ya swA hA// de nas yang dag spyod pa'i mchog/ lha yi brtul zhugs dge ba bshad// kun tu ras gtsang gos sngon
218b3(rgyud): byin gyis brlab bya zhing // bram ze'i rigs lhar dri can zas dang 'gro mgyogs sha las ring du 'dug/ bsrung bar gnas shing chus bkrus dkar gsum gtsang ma'i zas bzhing // ngag
218b4(rgyud): gi rlung bsdams dang dang snying rjes yid brlan brtson para'ajug/ bsam gtan khang pa mngag ni sngo bsgyur dpa yi lci ba dri zhim chu yis byugs// dkar dang sngo ba'i
218b5(rgyud): me tog bkram la sku gdung bla ma mdun bzhag la// cho gas btsun pa'i sgrub pa pos ni gos dkar ba gos la ku shi'i stan la 'dug/ snying rjes khros pa'i rig sdug/ 
218b6(rgyud): dam pa mdzad par bzlas pa bya// ru rak+Sha yi bgrang phreng brgya phyed byin gyis brlabs la lag pa g.yas pas gzung // ril bu re dang lha re sngags ra bcas nas snying khar bzung // rnal 'byor
218b7(rgyud): 'di rnams spyad cing 'gro la 'jungs pa'i sems ldan pas// bdag dang gzhan la phan phyir rtog pa bshad pa yin// rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa bzhi pa'o// // dbyar kha skyes
218b8(rgyud): pa'i rtsa dang nags tshal byung ma mched ltar// rlung gis grogs byas bsregs nas thal ba'i lhag ma'ang ma lus bzhin// bskal pa dpag med skyes pa'i rtog pa'i dri mi'i rma rnams
219a1(rgyud): la srung ba dang dang brtson 'grus sngags bzlas sems dam me yis sreg/ nyi ma'i snying po 'jam gling dbus su rigs bzung ste// skyes dang bud med dbang po skyon me
219a2(rgyud): tshul khrims can// skye ba snga ma'i lam shugs dag dang bla ma'i lung thob pa// dad dang snying rje'i sems can gtong ba'i can blo ngas// rig pa'i khro bo sgom dang de rjes de ni bzlas 'bad na/ 
219a3(rgyud): bstod dang mchod mnyes bran g.yog lha min gsang ba brnyes med cing // chu yi mchod sbyin 'khor lo gtor ma la brtson zhing // sbyin sreg rnams kyis lha dang bran g.yog mnyes byas na// 
219a4(rgyud): ring por mi thogs sgrub po ngas rtag phyag rgya 'byin par 'a/ gyur// 'dir ni mang du smras mi dgos// sngar ni rdo rjes de 'og tu// bshad pa'i mtshan ma ster bar 'gyur// zangs
219a5(rgyud): lcags bla ma'i gnang bya'o// lus sogs rig pa'i dbang gyur nas// me dang rlung sogs 'byung ba dang // nang dang ga na dang byang rnams dang // bdud kyis klags ni rnyed mi
219a6(rgyud): 'gyur// me lce phreng ba'i rtog pa las// bshad pa'i 'chi ba'i sbyor byung na// ser sna 'di ni pha rol 'phang // smon lam lam sna la brten nas// 'di 'og byang chub sems dpa' ni// 2
219a7(rgyud): basmin pa'i bla mar 'gyur// yang na srid pa bar ma dor// sngags kyi rnam shes gzi bskyed nas// 'gro phan rig pa 'dzin gyur nas// de yi 'og tu sems pa'o// tha ma'ang lam la brten ma
219a8(rgyud): ni/ rang 'dod dam pa'i lus rnyed nas// snga ma lam sal de 'og tu// dngos grub la ni rnam par gnas// lha dang sngags sogs rtogs pa des// rtog pa dman pa mnan yin// nam mkha' lta
219b1(rgyud): bur rtog med la// 'jig rten ngor ni rtog pas sprul// gdul bya sdang sogs sems 'khrugs la// nga ni snying rje sdang bar mdzad// khro sogs gsal du med gyur na// khro bor da ni ci phyir 'gyur/ 
219b2(rgyud): dang po rnal 'byor 'tshe ba bcom// de phyir rig sdigs sbyor ba rnams// rgyud kun tu ni gsungs pa yin// 'tshe ba bcom nas dag pa ni// sasas dag pa ni bde ba yin// gdug pa'i sbyor ba
219b3(rgyud): phrogs pas na// bde bar byang chub lam brten la// rdo rje sku nyid 'gyur meng la// bdag gi rig pa'i ye shes de// lus can de yi 'bras bu'o// ji ltar shel ni 'dzam bu ka'i// me tog gi/ 
219b4(rgyud): ni gzhan du snang // de bzhin rtog meng rig pa yang // khro bo nga'i dbang phyug 'dir snang nas// ji ltar 'dul gyur sprul pa yis// rgyun mi 'chad par khro bor snang // snying rje mod
219b5(rgyud): na 'bras bu nyams// 'gro la phan btags gnod bsal/ na// rang sems dag par 'bras bu 'grub// rgyu dang 'dra sa bu'i sgrib pa rnams// byang chub sems kyis ring du spyad
219b6(rgyud): 'dir ni 'khor ba 'jig par nges// brtan dang g.yo ba'i sgrib pa rnams// blo mnyam dus na gnyen po dang // mi mthun na mkha' ltar yangs pa// lhun gyis 'grub 'bras phye ma yin// ji
219b7(rgyud): srid rtog pa'i dri ma yod// de srid 'bad nga rig pa sgom// sems sbyong snga ma rig pa yis// rgyud nyid du ni 'dod pa yin// gang la sems ni dri med pa// rtog pa'i dri mas nag por byas// de
219b8(rgyud): le spang ba'i blo med pa// rtog pa'i blo can 'khor ba yi// de phyir shAkya'i rigs can rnams// sa 'og tu rgyu ba'i klu'i rtog pa la sogs pa tshar bcad pa'i phyir// sbyor ba rnams la gus
220a1(rgyud): par bya'o// rdo rjes gsum du rgyu ba las rtog pa lnga pa rdzog so// / dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag khri srong lnga btsan gyi bkar khrims// dpal da
220a2(rgyud): ming lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mur badz+ra dang / ra bying lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ye nI lAm+ba d+hA ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA NI kawAn ma
220a3(rgyud): ra Ni bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// gnod sbyin gyi sdeng zin chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon mo/ 
220a4(rgyud): can sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis rje su gnang dag/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa/ mig me 'dag gi daphung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i
220a5(rgyud): nga ro tsam lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus rgyan pa/ klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang nye da/ 'bo 'bar bas rnacha byas pa/ sbrul 'bar ba rin po che
220a6(rgyud): cod pan thogs pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za ba/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma dang dpral ba bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/ gshin rje'i cha byad can/ lce glog ltar 'gyu ba/ gsus
220a7(rgyud): po che sbrul za ba/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska ragasu bcings pa/ a la la zhes sgrogs par byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i zab su dpag tshad brgyad
220a8(rgyud): khri yod pas rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur ba/ klu thams cad brlag par byed pa/ gang rgyangs chen po dgod pas kun tu 'khrugs par byed pa/ gshin rje'i
220b1(rgyud): gzugs can/ khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa/ klu rnams 'chi bar byed pa la phyag 'tshalo// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs
220b2(rgyud): pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho ba nA ga a d+hi pa ta yA/ I ngan nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra shwa rI raM/ badz+ra pA Ni hI da ya/ yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha mA ku lota sA da naM/ b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ 
220b3(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bu d+hA/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ mA ti krA ma tha ha ra ha ra nA gA nA na/ ts+tshi n+da tsin+da nA ga hr-i da yA naM/ b+hin+da bin+da nA ga marma Ni/ bi shIr+ya nU nA gA sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ nA ga na ya nA ni
220b4(rgyud): hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga bi dA raM NA ya hUM phaT/ nA go ta sA/ dade nI ye hUM phaT/ nI le ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta/ da ba la pa ra kr-i mA ya hUM phaT/ kri tAn+ta ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn+te rA
220b5(rgyud): pA ya hUM phaT/ ro She NA ya hUM phaT/ tA sa nA ya hUM phaT/ ku b+hUN+Na/ uta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ pra ta pi shA tsa ba na/ sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ yak+ShA a pa smai ra bi nA sha ka rA yaM
220b6(rgyud): hUM phaT/ ha sa hA sa/ d+hi ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+nAn bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ sarba sha truM saM brta bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni radz+nyA/ 
220b7(rgyud): pA ya ti swA hA/ de'i cho ga la gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la chu la sngags kyis btab ste/ gtor na btang bar 'gyu ro// klu bzlog par 'dod na smag shad kyi lcug ma 'am/ bal po'i se'u
220b8(rgyud): lcug mas bya'o// yi dgas dang brjed rnams la srung bas bya'o// rims nang med par bya ba dang / gzhogs phyeng na ba dang / yi ge mchus pa la ni skung ba sngon pas bya'o// nor 'dod na zhag
221a1(rgyud): gcig bsnyung bar 'dug ste/ srog phor gyis bdugs na rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston la gser gyi ngong che bdun stong sbyin par bye'o// rgyas
221a2(rgyud): btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o// sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad srung ba la ni mar snying pa 'am/ thal ba'am/ yungs kar gyis
221a3(rgyud): bya'o// nad kyi 'jig pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po la srung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyu ro// byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa
221a4(rgyud): la srung ba'i mdud pa byas te/ mgul du btags na srung da ba'i mchog tu 'gyu ro// chom rkun bzlog par 'dod na sa das bya'o// dug la ni rtsa ku shas byab par bya'o// bdag
221a5(rgyud): srung ba la ni yid kyis sam chus bya'o// gzhan srung la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsum mam/ bdun nam/ 
221a6(rgyud): bzhi 'am/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o// de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me tog sngon pos mchod de sngags stong bzlas
221a7(rgyud): brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyu ro// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI bo ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang
221a8(rgyud): bo kyi lo tsA ba brtson 'grus seng ges dpal na len tra'i sgo 'gram du bsgyur// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra pA Ni nI la ba ra d+ha ra tri lo ka bi na ya nA ma tan+te/ bod skad du
221b1(rgyud): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
221b2(rgyud): ldan 'das ri rab kyi byang phyogs na lcang lo can gyi pho brang na bzhugs te/ brjod kyis mi lang ba'i lha dang mi dang lha mi yin la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa dang / byang chub sems
221b3(rgyud): dpa' lag nu rdo rje la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma 'jigs shig/ ma skrag shig/ ma dang shig/ ces gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum 'du
221b4(rgyud): pab zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thugs ka'i dpal gyi sa bo'u la 'od zer kha dog gsum las grub pa/ 'od zer kha dog gsum po'i 'od zer bye ba
221b5(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'jig rten gsum du bkye ste/ thams cad bkug nas slar yang 'od kyis snang ba byas nas/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da pa tsa duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM paT
221b6(rgyud): nA ga bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ tir+ya bi dA ra Na ya phaT/ pre ta bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ na li bi dA raNA ya phaT/ na ra ga Na bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ de bi ba da ra NA ya phaT ces gsungs pas 'jig rten gsu/ 
221b7(rgyud): po thams cad kyi lus gas nas sems shel sgong lta bur gnas par gyur to// sams yi ge gsum lta bur gnas te/ oM ni zhal gsum phyag drug ste/ AHni zhal gcig phyag
221b8(rgyud): gnyis te/ hUM ni rgyan dang bral gyur pa/ rigs ni gsum du gyur pa yin zhes gsungaso// de nas rig gsum du gyur pas ched du brjod pa 'di chad du brjed do// e ma'o shin tu rnyed dka'
222a1(rgyud): pa zhe sdang chen po bdag nyid can// phyag na rdo rje rnyed dka' ba// bdag cag gis ni thob par 'gyur/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos 'khor gyi gtso bo
222a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa thugs bskul ba'i sngags 'di gsungaso// badz+ra pA Ni hri da ya nga // de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan dz+wa la bstod pa/ tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho ban nA ga a d+hi pa ta
222a3(rgyud): ya/ i dan nI lAM ba ra d+hA ra sha rI ra/ badz+ra pA Ni hri da ya/ yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha/ ma ku la uta sA da naM b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ bstod pa 'dis bstod pas 'gyur ba bcu gnyis dang / ltas bco brgyad byung
222a4(rgyud): bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'byung ba'i lha dang mi da la sogs pa thams cad skrag nas dkon mchogagasum la skyabasu mchi'o// zhes brjod do// 'jig rten gyi
222a5(rgyud): khams gzhan na gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis rang rang gi gdul bya rnams ma 'jigs shig/ mi mdze da kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa' phyag
222a6(rgyud): na rdo rje bzhugs pas 'jig rten mkhyen pa la bstod pa'i ltas yin gyis zhes gsung so// rang rang gi 'khor dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis rang rang gi 'jig rten mkhyen pa la gsol pa/ 
222a7(rgyud): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bar 'tshal na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas rang rang gi 'khor rnams rang rang gi ston pa'i 'od la 'jus nas ri rab kyi steng na
222a8(rgyud): lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi nang du rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa byon no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod de bstod pa byas nas/ byang chub
222b1(rgyud): sems dpa' bstod pa yi// ngo mtshar ltas kyis 'dir mchis pas// 'jig rten du 'byung dka' ba yi// tshar bcad rjes bzung bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rngo
222b2(rgyud): rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbang bskur ba mdzad// a b+hi Shany+tsa zhes gsungs pas snod dang ldan par byaso// 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las gling
222b3(rgyud): gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod de// lan gsum du bskor
222b4(rgyud): ba byas nas yang dang yang du phyag byas gsol ba btab pa// / sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// srung ba rnam das kyi mchog gyur pa// phyag na rdo rje srung ba'i rgyud// zhe sdang
222b5(rgyud): gtso bos bshad du gsol// nga nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// zhe sdang kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso// 'bar ba drag po spyan ya ngas pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// zla ba'i dkyil
222b6(rgyud): 'khor la gnas pa'i// dbus su phyag na rdo rje bri// de mtha' mtshan ma nyi shu bzhi// rang dbus sarba duSh+Ta dang // sde tshan dang po bco brgyad dgod// dbus mtshan lta ba ming bris la// 
222b7(rgyud): de rnams phyag na rdo rje'i dbus// dbus ma'i phyag na rdo rje la// bstod pa'i sngags kyis bskor bar bya// rdo rje nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// klu 'dul sngags kyis bskor bar bya// de nas bcom
222b8(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas klu 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sangs rgyas gang+ga klung gis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to// tad+ya
223a1(rgyud): bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ mA ti kra ma thA/ ha ra ha ra nA gA NAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA ga hri da yA ni/ bin+da bin+da nA marmA Ni/ bi shIr+ya tu nA ga sha rI ra Ni/ bi s+pho/ 
223a2(rgyud): Ta ya/ sngags des klu rnams skrag ste/ rang rang gi gnasu 'bros par chas pa las nA ga ya nA ni zhes gsungs pas lus mi g.yo bar gyur to// de nas dkon mchog gsum la
223a3(rgyud): skyabasu mchi ste rang rang gi gnasu dong ngo // phyi yi phyag na rdo rje la/ lha srin sngags kyis bskor bar bya// gnyis la rigs kyis nag pos rgyan// rgyan dang cha lugs tshang ba la// dbus
223a4(rgyud): nas rim pa bzhin du bri// oM dang hUM mtha' pA Ni'i sngags/ 8 / phreng ba bsnams pa bri bar bya// oM gyis rdo rje lta bar mtshan// hUM gis shes rab lce la mtshan// byi yi
223a5(rgyud): lcags ri dag la ni// thabs dang shes rab dag dang bri// ba sgrub bya rdo rje lta bar bca'// gur gum gyis ni bri bar bya// yar ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung ste/ bris nas
223a6(rgyud): de nub nas bzung ba// bcu bzhi bar du bsnyen par bya// bco lnga'i nub mo sgrub pa ste// dkyil 'khor cha lugs ldan pa la// lha rnams stang du dbus btsugs la// cho ga bzhin du bskyed
223a7(rgyud): par bya// 'khor lo dag la gsang byas la// 'khor lo stong pa nyid du sgom// stong pa nyid las hUM byung ste// de zhu ba las rdo rje ni// badz+ra pA Ni sa lte bar mtshan// de las 'phro dang 'dus
223a8(rgyud): pa las// phyag na rdo rje'i skur bskyed la// de snying zla ba rdo rjes mtshan// rdo rje lte bar hUM mtshan las// 'od zer spros te gos sngon bsdu// de la mchod pa sna tshogs mchod// bstod dang
223b1(rgyud): bdun po byas nas kyang // 'od zer dag gis bkug byas la// rang nyid rdo rje hUM la thim// de la mchod bstod sna tshogs bya// rdo rje dag las ye shes dam pa yis// me byung bas ni rdo rje na
