223b2(rgyud): gyur nas// 'khor lo'i rnam par gyur par bsam// sku ni sku yi rnam pa ste// mtshan ma mtshan ma'i rnam par ro// sa de bsdus pa kir ti dang // bsregs pa'i nang du 'khor lo gzhug/ 
223b3(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bstod pa// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// ston pa khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin// gdul dka' thams cad 'dul ba yi// srung ba
223b4(rgyud): 'khor lo ngo mtshar che// 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyudu las sa 'og 'dul ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyag ma
223b5(rgyud): rdo rje rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la ma tshong pa thams cad kyis mchod nas phyag 'tsha la te gsol ba btab pa// de nas sngags snying kun 'du
223b6(rgyud): pa/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ston pa dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// rig sngags gcod byed bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rig sngags gcong // gsung ni 'di skad bka'
223b7(rgyud): stsal to// dang po bsnyen pa bya ba ste// mchod rten sngon po brtsigs pa dang // bris la sogs bri ba ste// lce yi sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir// yi ge brgya pas bshags pa bya// de nas
223b8(rgyud): tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sgom// stong pa nyid las 'di gsum mtha'// yongasu gyur pas rdo rje ste/ de la badz+ra pA Nis mtshan// lte dbus sngags la lha spro bsdu// byas pas phyag
224a1(rgyud): na rdo rjer gyur// lha yi sku mdog rgyan la sogs// rtsa ba'i rgyud las shes par bya// bdag nyid thugs ka'i dpal be'u las// 'od zer 'phros pas bcom ldan bsdu// 'o/ 
224a2(rgyud): zer gnyis pa'i rtse mo las// mchod pa rnam pa bcu spos te// bcom ldan tshogs la mchod pa bya// de nas yang dag bstod byas la// 'od zer gsum pas snying khar gzhug/ snying kha'i
224a3(rgyud): mtshan ma zla dkyil thim// badz+ra nyi shu gcig dbus gnas// de la sngags rgyal bskor bar bya// sngags ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// ming dang don dang sbal ba dang // bzlas pa dag dang rnam
224a4(rgyud): pa bzhi// bzlas pa rnam pa bcu drug tu// rgyud 'di las ni rab tu grags/ rdo rje yi ni bzlas pa dang // rin chen pad+ma'i bzlas pa dang / las kyi bzlas pa bzhi po dag/ las bzhi po/ 
224a5(rgyud): yi ni rang bzhin// rang bzhin rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang // drag po'i las dang zo chun rgyud // mgal ma'i 'khor lo'i bzlas pa dang // mda' dang sbrul gyi bzlas pa dang // 
224a6(rgyud): 'gog pa yi ni bzlas pa dang // sku bsrung bka' nyan bzlas pa'o// khyab 'jug mdud dang tshangs pa'i gzhu// mar mo lta bu'i bzlas pa'o// bzlas pa'i mtshan ma'i rang bzhin te
224a7(rgyud): rtag tu lha rnams bum pa yis// dbang bskur byed pa byung ba 'am// yang ni la brgyad lon par 'byung // yang na me tog sngon po ste// ma byung na'ang dus bsnyen bya// de nas sgrub pa
224a8(rgyud): brtsam par bya// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// zhi rgyas bsdus dang drag po ste// 'dir ni drag po'i gtso bo'o// dkyil 'khor nyam su blang ba'o// bla ma lnga ru shes par bya
224b1(rgyud): bdag nyid rgyan dang ldan pa la// shar gyi phyogasu blta byas te// cho ga gsum gyis dbyung ba'o// dpal be'u zhu ba rdo rjer gyur// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi lte ba la/ bcom ldan cho ga bzhi
224b2(rgyud): du bskyed// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la// dpal be'u zhu bas ye sheso// mtha' ma skar ma lta bu yi// rang bzhin dpal be'u hUM dang ni// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs dkyil
224b3(rgyud): las/ sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya// de yi dbusu bsgrub bya bzhag/ hUM las bskyed pa'i phur bu ni// de yi lce las brtan par bya// gu gul nag po'i spos kyis ni// de yi sna nas
224b4(rgyud): bdug par bya// sngags rgyal nA ga bor nas ni// mA ra dzi da hI gzhug par bya// de ni rigs ngan thod par gzhu dag/ mchod rten 'og tu mnan par bya// nga stang dgu gsum
224b5(rgyud): mgo bo ni// oM AHhUM/ dar dkar cig gis pur byas la// rim pa dang por gzhug par bya// de steng rim pa lnga pa la// sha chen la sogs lnga po dag/ hUM traM hrIHA a/ 
224b6(rgyud): ra rog kha ru gzhug par bya// rim pa bzhi pa dag la ni// 'khor lo gzhug par bya ba ste// ya las rlung dang raM las me// de ltar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// nga steng nyi ma zla ba ste// 'khor lo
224b7(rgyud): dbus kyi lte ba la// dgra bo'i mgo bo thur bstan bri// de yi snying khar ming bri'o// 'khor lo yi ni rtsibs brkyang ste// rtsibs la sngags kyis bskor bar bya// ming las bsgrub bya hUM lA/ 
224b8(rgyud): ston// 'og gi las ni gnyis kyang bri// khra dang sbyang ki la sogs pa'i// thod par gzugs brnyan bcug nas ni// yungs kar dag gis brab byas la// rang gi 'og tu mnan par bya// 
225a1(rgyud): gul nag po'i spros ngag gis// de yi sna nas bdug par bya// seng ljang phur bu sor bzhi pa// gdab pa'i sngags kyi lce la gang ba// rdo rje rgya gram dag gis ni// de yi
225a2(rgyud): bug pa dgag par bya// nya dang 'byung ba'i nyi ma la// phur bu bskul zhing yungs kar brdeg/ de nas rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ched du brjod pa 'di chang du brjod do// e ma'o ston
225a3(rgyud): pa khyad par 'phags// e ma'o thabs kyang khyad par 'phags// e ma'o 'khor kyang khyad par 'phags// khyad par 'phags pa ngo mtshar che// 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud la
225a4(rgyud): sa bla 'dul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas byon pa'i dbacom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa mchod cing phyag
225a5(rgyud): 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa// bsad pa las kyi 'khoralo 'di// sa stangs 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 
225a6(rgyud): gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // theg pa chen po spong ba ni// bsdu ba'i dngos por bsdu bar bya// de yang dbang du ma gyur na// khams gsum sems
225a7(rgyud): can thams cad ni// sangs rgyas sku ni bsams nas su// de yi bsang sgom nye pa bsgrag/ zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje 'dzin// snying kha nas ni spos byas la// de yis srung dang 'jig
225a8(rgyud): rten lha/ zhags pa dag gis drangs nas ni// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Ti pa sha dzaH/ mtshon cha dag gis bcang la sogs// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Te ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT// klu yi bzlas pa
225b1(rgyud): 'bum byas te// nya dang 'byung po'i nyi ma la// bdag nyid rgyan dang ldan byas la// rdzas dang sngags kyis bsrung bar bya// bzhi mdo lha khang dus nam phyed// sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas byas
225b2(rgyud): te/ de nas 'khor lo bri bar bya// steng 'khor 'og 'khor dug shing gos// dga' dang lags pa'i sems kyis bri// ras ma nyams la gur gum mchog/ dbus phyag na rdo rje la// dpral
225b3(rgyud): bsnying kha lkog ma ru// yi ge gsum bkang sku gsum ste// rgyan dang cha lugs tshang bar bri// khor yug thams cad duSh+Ta bri// zhabs dang spyi bo g.yas dang g.yon// zla banyi ma dbus
225b4(rgyud): ni/ rgyal po bzhi yi mtshan ma bri// mtshams bzhir rdo rje ga ngan la hUM// khor yug la ni shes rab thabs// hUM las dam tshigs sems dpa' la// ye shes spyan
225b5(rgyud): drang mchod de zhu// 'og 'khor sbal nag yan lag lnga// snying dang drug tu ming rus gzhug/ phyogs bzhir rtsib la mtshams bzhir thong // rtsibs dang thod kar ming
225b6(rgyud): rus te// khor yug gnyis la bstod pas bskor// sbal khar hI las 'od byung bas// sa bdag klu chen bkug ste mchod// mchod pa'i rdzas ni 'o ma sogs// de nas bsgral bya dgus
225b7(rgyud): bya ste// sku gsung thugs la lags gnas pa// ming dang rus la bstim ste bzhag/ thod pa las srin hUM las bskyed// de la sbyor ba lags par bya// klu la dam gdab mchod pa bya// phur bA
225b8(rgyud): phyogs mtshams bcad par bya// 'og mas phyogasu drangs na 'grub// de nas gsol ba 'debs pa rnams// ngo mtshar nas ched du brjod pa// rmad byung chen po chos rnams la// rnam pa
226a1(rgyud): mi rtog ngo bo nyid// chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa la// kun rdzob tu yang bshad pa mtshar// de nas thog mar gyur pa'i 'khor rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
226a2(rgyud): nas byon pa'i ston pa 'khor dang bcas pa la tho mtshams nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gnod byed thams cad bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
226a3(rgyud): badz+ra pA Ni hri da ya// gsungs pas gzhan nas byon pa'i ston pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i thugs bskul nas// tad+ya thA/ hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ nA sang sA da nA ya phaT/ nI laM ba sa
226a4(rgyud): nA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta ya da phaT/ kr-i tan+ta pU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ trA sa da nA ya phaT/ kuSh+maN+Tha uta sA da nA ya phaT/ pra te bi shAH/ 
226a5(rgyud): bai nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pas mA ra bi nA sha ka rA yaM ts+tsha/ phaT/ ha sa haM saM/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nAM sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+na bi nA shaM ka rA ya hUM phaT/ sarba
226a6(rgyud): shatrU~M swa g+ha bi nA sha ka ra ya hUM phaT/ nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA ba ya ti swAhA/ gsungs pa tsam gyis dang po'i 'khor rnams skrag par gyur te ched du brdzi dpe/ e ma'o ston pa byin
226a7(rgyud): rlabs che// a ma sngags kyi nus pa che// e mche ba'i nyon mongs che// 'khor rnams mnyam pa nyid du gnas// 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud las sa steng 'dul ba'i le'u bzhi pa'o// 
226a8(rgyud): de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gsum dang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas byon pa'i 'jig rten gsum po rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te rang ba
226b1(rgyud): gi gnasu dong ngo // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la rgyud 'di 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsungs pa 'di chongs shig/ lhogs shig ces gsungaso/ 
226b2(rgyud): yongasu gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI pang ka ra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos
226b3(rgyud): bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sap+ta ta thA ga ta pUrba pra Ni d+ha na bi sha Sha bstA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon la
226b4(rgyud): gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po// sangs rgya das dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
226b5(rgyud): 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing yangs pa can du na te/ yangs pa can na rol mo'i sgra gcan gyi shing ljon ni
226b6(rgyud): dru na/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sum khri drug stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
226b7(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
226b8(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa don yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blta na sdug
227a1(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mun pa mun nag thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
227a2(rgyud): pa legs par rnam par sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dang / 
227a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po chen po'i rtse 'dzin rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs pa/ byang chub
227a4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri drug stong dang tha dbas cig tu bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gno rad sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding
227a5(rgyud): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rgyal po dang / blon po nga / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag thu mas cad kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ 
227a6(rgyud): thog mar dge ba/ bar du dag pa/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po'i chos ston cing / chos kyi gtam gyis sems can rnams tshim par mdzad/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzes
227a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod par mdzad // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rgyal bu 'jam dpal stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
227a8(rgyud): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha
227b1(rgyud): dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / na mkha' ljin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / khyim bdag dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa
227b2(rgyud): mang po dag chos nyan pa'i slad du 'dus shing mchis lags na de'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba dgongs te/ thos na ci nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag
227b3(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang zhing yongasu byas par 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can gyis mi rdzi
227b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i gnas rnams bshad
227b5(rgyud): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni ma gzigs pa'am/ ma gsan pa'am/ rnam pa/ ra mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
227b6(rgyud): brgyad stong gang+gA'i rtsag bye ma'i rdul phra rabs kyi rdul snyeng dag kyang dper na deng ngam sang gi ltar dgongs pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dang po byang chub kyi thugs yid la mdzad
227b7(rgyud): pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan par spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das
227b8(rgyud): srang ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na sems can thams cad rje su gzung ba'i slad dung bzhin gshegs pa rnam
228a1(rgyud): kyi thabs mkhas pa mang po dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par nus pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ka la byin
228a2(rgyud): sgra skad dang dbyangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lag so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal lagaso leg so// 'jam dpal khyod snying rje dang ldan pa ste/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis snying
228a3(rgyud): rje dpag tu med pa bskyed nas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa nadang sna tshogs kyis lus yongasu gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal
228a4(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis gtses pa'i lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs pa ni ya dang lag so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis
228a5(rgyud): brlabs kyis khyod kyi spobs pa 'di skye so// 'jam dpal 'i phyir lags par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom
228a6(rgyud): ldan 'das la de bzhi no// zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal shar phyogs logasu sangs
228a7(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
228a8(rgyud): rgyas mtshan lags par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zham ring ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang ldan pa bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa la
228b1(rgyud): chos kyang ston pa yod do// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan lags par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i
228b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni shin tu yongasu dag pa/ thag grur dpag tshad brgya stong du ma yod pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur/ ngan song dang sdug bsngal gyi sgra med pa/ bud med kyi dngos
228b3(rgyud): po med pa/ tsher ma dang / g.yang sa med pa/ ri dang rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med pa/ 'jam pa/ sa'i ngos reg na bde ba/ lha'i dri bsrung dang ldan pa/ lha'i rin po che'i shing ljon pa dang / me tog
228b4(rgyud): dang 'bras bus mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i sang+ga'i khris legs par rgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sa/ 'dzam chu bo'i gsar dang / nor
228b5(rgyud): bu dang mu tig gis brgyan pa'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa 'o// 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad ni brdzus
228b6(rgyud): teskyes pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma las byung ba shA sta go/ de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam thob shig/ 'jam dpal de bzhin
228b7(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po de thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyang
228b8(rgyud): pabaspyod pa na nges smon lam chen po brgyad rgyun ma chad par bta'o// brgyad gang zhe na de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni bdag gang gi tshe ma 'ongs po'i dus na bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
229a1(rgyud): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang la la dgun pa'i nang sna tshogs kyis lus yongasu gzir te/ rims dang / gshed byed dang / byang nga
229a2(rgyud): ro langs dang / 'jigs pa rnams kyis gtses pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing / bdag gi ming lan bdun brjod pas/ de dag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig
229a3(rgyud): byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du rims dang / sdig pa can gyi gdon rnams med par gyur cig/ rab tu zhi bar gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs
229a4(rgyud): pa'i dus na bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma dngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang de dag long ba dang / 'on pa dang / smyos pa dang / sha bkra can dang / 
229a5(rgyud): nad tshabs chen pos btab par gyur pa de dag bdag gi mthus bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing bdag gi ming lan bdun brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du
229a6(rgyud): dbang po thams cad yongasu tshang bar gyur cig/ sdug bsngal dang / nad thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla
229a7(rgyud): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi bsgribs pa/ mtshams med pa lnga
229a8(rgyud): byed pa/ bya ba ma yin pa spyod pa mang ba/ dam pa'i chos spong ba sdig pa mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs byed pa/ ngan song gsum dang / sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba de dag sems can dmyal ba
229b1(rgyud): chen por skyes nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas de dag mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa/ 
229b2(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang shing zad par gyur cig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du su yang sems can dmyal ba/ 
229b3(rgyud): dang / ngan 'gror 'gro bar ma gyur tsog/ lha yul ba'i lha'i bde ba dang / mi'i bde ba nyam su myong bar gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus
229b4(rgyud): na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang su dag dbul por gyur te/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / nor
229b5(rgyud): dang 'bru dang / mal cha dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan dang / yo byad mi bdog pa de dag bdag gis mthus// bdun gi ming yid la gnas shing / bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod
229b6(rgyud): pas// de dag byang chub kyi mtha' thug gi bar du/ dbyig dang / gos dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mal cha dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan dang yo byad 'phel bar gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i
229b7(rgyud): smon lam chen po lnga pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag bcing
229b8(rgyud): ba dang / brdeg pa dang / go rang gzhug pa dang / mtshon cha'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lus yongasu gzir ba de dag bdag gi mthus / bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing / bdag gi mig
230a1(rgyud): yid kyis brjod pas// de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bcing ba dang / brdeg pa thams cad las yongasu thar par gyur cig/ lus kyi gdung ba thams cad rgyun chad
230a2(rgyud): par gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po drug pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sen
230a3(rgyud): gang dag med par gyur pa lus la gdung ba'i ma 'bar ba dang / seng+ga dang / rtag dang / do ma dang / drad dang / sbrul gdug pa'i nang du chud dang / srog la bab cing 'jigs skrag cing mgon mang de/ smra
230a4(rgyud): sngags sna tshogs 'don pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi/ ming la gnas shing / bdag gi ming len bdun yid dkyis brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du lus
230a5(rgyud): le gdung ba'i ma thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ sang ga dang / stag dang / do ma dang / dred dang / sbrul gdug pa de dag byams pa la gnas par gyur cig/ 'jigs pa med pa dang / zhi
230a6(rgyud): ba'i gnas la gnas par gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po bdun pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par/ 
230a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag phan tshun 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed par gyur te/ 'khrugs shing 'jigs skrag nas spungs pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi
230a8(rgyud): ming yid la gnas shing / bdag gi ming lan bdun yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi
230b1(rgyud): bapar gyur cig/ phan tshun byams pa la gnas par gyur cig ces bta bo// de'i smon lam chen po brgyad pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
230b2(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag chu'i nang du son te/ grur zhugs pa/ gling med par phyin pa/ srog 'dod pa/ chu klung dang / rgya mtsho'i nang du son te/ smre sngags sna tshogs
230b3(rgyud): 'don pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing / bdag gri ming yid kyis lan bdun brjod pas// de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du chu klung chen po de las dbugs 'byin
230b4(rgyud): pa sbyin par gyur cig/ 'jigs pa med par rgal bar gyur/ cig ces btab ste/ 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal
230b5(rgyud): gyi rgyal po des smon lam chen po brgyad pa de dag bta'o// 'ja ma dpal de lta bas na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa mtshan lags par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po
230b6(rgyud): de'i thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste// smon lam dang / ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyi gnas dang / sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshag
230b7(rgyud): pa mchod pa dang / rim gro mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang // zham ring ba byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gsheg
230b8(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rnams ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lo brgyar
231a1(rgyud): yang brjod par mi nu'o// la ma pal de lta bus nang pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ thon po'am/ khyim bang ga yon tan don du gnyer ba rnams kyi na
231a2(rgyud): sdang dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya ste/ rab tu gus par de bzhin gagogs pa de la mchod pa byas na de'i sdig pa thams
231a3(rgyud): cad dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ ra ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// 'jam
231a4(rgyud): dpal shar phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma rnyed 'das rapan 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa na de bzhin
231a5(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan ba mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba btu
231a6(rgyud): te/ 'tshe zhing gnas la chos kyang ston cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig ston pa yod// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
231a7(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po brgyad bta'o// brgyad gang zhe na/ de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs
231a8(rgyud): pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag zhing las kyi las kyi mtha' dang / tshong la dga' ste g.yeng ba
231b1(rgyud): sna tshogs mang bas dge ba'i chos rnams las yong su nyams pa dang / byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa las yong su nyams te/ de dag 'khor ba'i sdug sngal rnams las yongasu mthar
231b2(rgyud): par ma gyur cing / so sor 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug
231b3(rgyud): pa rnams myong ba de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing / bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas// de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
231b4(rgyud): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bsams ma thag tu bgo ba da/ dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / long spyod dang / yongs/ su spyad pa dang / nor dang 'bru dang / dbyig dang gsar rnams
231b5(rgyud): 'byung bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyis par 'phel rtsa bar gyur cig/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ ngan seng gsum dang sems can dmyal
231b6(rgyud): pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yong su thar par gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
231b7(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal nas skye ba 'am/ drod gshar las skyes pa 'am/ brdzus te sku
231b8(rgyud): ba'i sems can gang dag grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pas lus yongasu gdungs shing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyam thag pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming rnal ma du
232a1(rgyud): du grag cing / de dag gis bdag gi ming dran pa dang brjod pas sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa de yongasu byang bar gyur cig/ skye ba de yang tha mar gyur cig/ bla na med pa yang dag par
232a2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skye ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yong su thar par gyur cig/ lha yul ba'i lha'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i
232a3(rgyud): smon lam chen po gsum pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa den stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
232a4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/ bud med gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis lus yongasu gang zhing bud ma da kyi skye gnas la smod pa dang / gang dag bca' ba'i dus na
232a5(rgyud): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming rna lam du grag cing de dag gis bdag gi ming du na pa dang brjod pas/ tshor ba thams cad dang / sdug bsngal
232a6(rgyud): thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ skye ba de yang tha mar gyur cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du skyes pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni gang
232a7(rgyud): gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag 'chi ba dang / dgra dang dgon pa'i gnod
232a8(rgyud): pas gtses pa dang / phan tshun pha ma dang / sring mo dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du'i mya ngan myong zhing / sdug bsngal dang / mya ngan gyi zug rngus lus la zug pa de dag/ bdag gi mthus
232b1(rgyud): bdag gi ming rna lam du grags cing / de dag gi rna lam du bdag gi ming grag pa dang / kha ton du bton pas byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du 'chi ba dang / ngag dang dgon pa'i gnod pa thams
232b2(rgyud): cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po lnga pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag pa
232b3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag mtshan mo mun pa mun nag na rnam par rgyu ba/ las kyi mtha' rnam pa sna tshogs la zhug pa/ sdig pa
232b4(rgyud): can gyi gdon sna tshogs kyis gces pa/ 'jigs pas desmre sngags sna tshogs 'don padri dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing / bdag gi ming yid kyi
232b5(rgyud): brjod pas/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du mun pa mun nig thams cad med par gyur cig/ sdig pa can gyig/ don thams cad byams pa la gnas par gyur cig/ mcho
232b6(rgyud): pa dang rim gro bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par brtson par gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po drag pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
232b7(rgyud): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag dman pa la mos shing shes rab chung la dran pa rmongs te dge ba'i chos rnams dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan
232b8(rgyud): lag dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rjesu dran pa las yongasu nyams pa de dag/ bdag gi mthus bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing
233a1(rgyud): bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas// de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du// ting 'dzin dang / dran pa dang / stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / gzungs kyi sgro rnams mngon
233a2(rgyud): du gyur cig/ shes rab chen po rje su rgyu bar gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po bdun pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
233a3(rgyud): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag dman pa la mos shing nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'dod pa bskyed/ de la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag
233a4(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur pa/ de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming yid la gnas/ shing / bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag bla na med
233a5(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig/ nyan tho dang / 
233a6(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po brgyad pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs
233a7(rgyud): pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag bskal pa chen po zad pa'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu 'bar shing / rab
233a8(rgyud): tu 'bar bar 'khrug par gyur te/ ngu zhing mya ngan byed la sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyi rgyus sdug bsngal myong zhing / skyabs mang mgon med pa'i sems can de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi/ 
233b1(rgyud): ming 'di la gnas shing / bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag sdug bsngal dang / mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ bsil ba'i dngos po thob par gyur cig/ de nas shi 'phos
233b2(rgyud): nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du pad+ma'i snying po'i sang+ga'i khri la brdzus te skye bar gyur cig ces btab te/ 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
233b3(rgyud): na smon lam chen po brgyad po de dag btab po// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas
233b4(rgyud): pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni mnyam pa/ thag gru che ga/ yangs pa/ lag mthil da ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ lha'i spos kyi ljon pa rnams kyis
233b5(rgyud): rab tu brgyan pa/ spos gtsang zhing skyon med pa dang / lha'i spros me tog gis rab tu brgyan pa/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra skadadang / klu'i nga ro 'byung ba/ lha'i rin po che'i dril bu g.yaraka
233b6(rgyud): drabs lags par rgyan pa/ lha'i rin po che'i seng ge'i khris mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i rin po che'i rdzing gis rab tu rgyan pa/ sa gzhi 'jam zhing snyi ba/ ri dang rdo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ma
233b7(rgyud): med pa/ bud med kyi dngos po med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sar gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma'i snying po'i
233b8(rgyud): seng ge'i khril brdzus te byung ba/ lha'i rin po che'i rgyan dang / gos kyis lus legs par rgyan pa/ sha sta'o// sangs rgyas kyi ning ngan pasams ma thag pa tsam gyis gos dang / bas dang / skom pa
234a1(rgyud): dang / mal cha dang / spos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i long spyod thams cad dang / sems can gyi tshogs chas thams cad dang / lha'i
234a2(rgyud): rin po che'i long spyod thams cad 'byung ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal de lta bas na dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ 
234a3(rgyud): rgyal po 'am/ rgyal bu dag gi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu rgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan nyin gsum mtshan
234a4(rgyud): lan gsum du yid la bya/ rab tu gus pas gzung bar bya/ dad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa nga'i sku gzu dgras kyang byeng du gzhugs/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spon
234a5(rgyud): dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / mar ma rna mas kyis mchod par bya/ yan lag brgyad pa 'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas la nyin bdun gtsang mar
234a6(rgyud): byas te/ sa phyogs gtsang mar gnas par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam gdab cing sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje ba'i semasu byas na de la de bzhin
234a7(rgyud): gshegs pa de dgongs par 'gyu ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems dpar 'gyu ro// sdig pa thams cad dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongasu
234a8(rgyud): byang bar 'gyu ro// byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyu ro// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug bsrabs par 'gyu ro// yun ring du 'tsho zhing nang meng par 'gyuro// 
234b1(rgyud): gang bsams pa'i bsam pa de dag thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyu ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyeng ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyu ro// 'di nas shi 'bos nas sdig pa thams
234b2(rgyud): cad zad par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la brdzus te skye bar 'gyu ro// skyes ma thag tu ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon du 'gyu ro// 'jam dpa
234b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'dzin pa 'di ni de ltar yon tan mang po dang ldan pa yino// 'jam dpal shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas
234b4(rgyud): kyi zhing gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi/ khams spos kyis yongasu gang ba rin po che brtseg das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
234b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'
234b6(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun bskor ba yod do// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de sngon byang chub
234b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bzhi bta bo// bzhi gang zhe na de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni gang gi tshe/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
234b8(rgyud): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag srog gcod pa/ srog gcod pa'i mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa/ srog chags rnam pa sna
235a1(rgyud): tshogs kyi srog gcod pa de dag srog gcod pa byas pas che thung zing nang mang ba dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / me dang / nang sna tshogs kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba
235a2(rgyud): de dag gi bdag gi ming thos nas 'dzin pa dang / mchod pas las kyi sgrib pa de yongasu byang ste/ tshe ring bar gyur cig/ nad med par gyur cig/ su yang dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus
235a3(rgyud): byed par ma gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
235a4(rgyud): pa de na sems can gang dag sdig pa mi dge ba sna tshogs bya/ sa twa gzhan gyi rdzas phrogs pas dbul po'i khyim du skyes te/ sgren mo dang / smras pa dang / skom pas lus
235a5(rgyud): yongasu gdungs shing sdug bsngal myong ba de dag gis bdag gi ming thos nas gzung bas bla na med pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
235a6(rgyud): rgyas kyi bar du sdig pa thams cad byang bar gyur cig/ dbang phyug phun sum tshogs shing ma tshang ba med par thob par gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni
235a7(rgyud): gagi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag gcig la gcig kun tu gnod sems
235a8(rgyud): dang ldan zhing phan tshun srog gcod pa byed pa dang / 'thab pa de dag gis bdag gi ming thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
235b1(rgyud): bar du phan tshun pa ma ltar byams pa la gnas par gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
235b2(rgyud): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis bsgribs te/ tshul khrims 'chal par gyur nas/ de dag sdig pa
235b3(rgyud): kun tu spyod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa dral bas ngan song gsum du ltung ba dang / sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag bdag gi mthus bdag gi ming thos nas bla na med
235b4(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pasangs rgyas kyi bar du las kyi sgrib pa thams cadayongasu byang bar gyur cig/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams
235b5(rgyud): dang bral bar gyur cig/ tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin cing lus dang ngag dang yid sdom pa la gnas par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi
235b6(rgyud): 'bral bar cig ces bta'i// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang dri meng rin chen snang brtul zhugs
235b7(rgyud): grub pa de/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bzhi po de dag bta'o// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
235b8(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang dri mang rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sa gzhi la rin po che'i spos sna tshogs gnas pa/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri dang ldan
236a1(rgyud): pa mnyam pa yangs pa/ thag gru che ga/ can dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i nor bu dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng dang / rin po che dbyangs pa/ 
236a2(rgyud): lha'i nor bu rin po che'i rdzing spos chus yongasu gang bas mdzes par byas pa/ dar gyi lda ldi bres shing dpyangs pa rin po che'i skud pas mig mangs ri su bris pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral
236a3(rgyud): ba sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba med pa/ bud med kyi dngos po med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag pa rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra dang / sril snyan dang / glu dbyangs ma blangs par sgra 'byung ba/ 
236a4(rgyud): sil snyan de dag las dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sgra dang // theg pa chen po'i gtam gyi sgra 'byung ba/ sgra de thos rabs sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la
236a5(rgyud): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi thabs mkhas pa nga/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa du ma phun
236a6(rgyud): sum tshogs pa ni de lta bu'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gas bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa de/ bla na meng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
236a7(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs te/ sems can 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gis bsgribs pa rnam
236a8(rgyud): gzigs shing / nang sna tshogs kyis lus gzing gi 'chi ba dang / dgra dang dgon pa'i gnod par gyur pa/ tshe bskal par thub pa'i sems can dmyal bar gnol pa'i sems can rnams/ 
236b1(rgyud): gzigs nas sems can de dag gi don dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu zad par bya ba'i phyir gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsum
236b2(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ sid+d+he sid+d+he/ su sid+d+hi/ mo tsa ni/ mok+Sha ni/ muk+te/ bi muk+te/ oM ma la/ bi ma la/ mA ga l+ya/ hi ra N+ya gan+d+he/ rat+na gar+b+ha/ sarbAr+tha sA d+ha ni/ ba ra mAR+YA sA d+ha ni/ ma na sa ma hA ma na se/ 
236b3(rgyud): ad b+hU ta aM t+yad b+hU te/ bA ti b+ha ye/ su wAR+She/ brah+ma g+ho Sha/ brah+ma d+h+yA Shi ta/ sarba an+de dzu a pa rA dzi te/ sarba tA pra ti ha ti/ tsa tuHShaSh+Ta bud+d+ha ko Ti b+hA Shi te na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn swA hA/ 
236b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags 'di gsungs pa/ ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa thams/ cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
236b5(rgyud): thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de la lagaso zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis sems ca na thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sdig pa thams
236b6(rgyud): cad bsal ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / re ba thams cad yongasu bskang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi tshig 'di lta bu 'di dag bka' stsal pa lagaso leg so// bcom
236b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal bu'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma yon tan don du gnyer ba gang su/ 
236b8(rgyud): yang rung ste/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / dad par byed pa dang / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sems can thams cad la/ 
237a1(rgyud): snying rje'i sems yid la byed pa dang / me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang mar me rnams kyis mchod pa dang / gtsang mar byas te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
237a2(rgyud): brgyad dang ldan par byas na de'i mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa sdig pa thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyur/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur te/ 
237a3(rgyud): pad+ma'i snying po'i sang ga'i khri la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// 'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa'i gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 'chi
237a4(rgyud): ba'i dus kyi tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs par 'gyur/ ra ba dang bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal shar phyogs log su
237a5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'ang sa pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
237a6(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa yod do// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
237a7(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan mang mchog dpal de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ thag gru cha ba/ yangs pa/ mya ngan dang / ngan song dang / 
237a8(rgyud): sdug bsngal gyi sgra med pa/ bud med kyi dngos po med pa/ sa gzhi 'jam zhing / shin tu snyi ba/ lha'i spos kyis gdugs pa/ lha'i nor bu rin po che'i shing ljon pas mdzes par

237b3(rgyud): bad pa can ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan mang mchog dpal de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi

237b5(rgyud): mchog dpal de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spro ngan smon lam chen po bzhi bta'o// bzhi grang zhe na de 'i smon lam chen po dang po ni gang gi tshe/ bdag ma 'ongs
237b6(rgyud): pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ni/ sems can gang dag mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang // 
237b7(rgyud): 'khrug pa mang ba/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba dar/ sems can gang dag gis bdag gi ming thos la/ thos nas kyang yid la byed pa de dag gi mthus mya ngan dang / sdug
237b8(rgyud): bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ su yang sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar ma gyur cig/ tshe ring por gyur cig ces

238a2(rgyud): rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag sdig pa mi dge pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas te sems can dmyal ba bstir med pa chen po mun pa mun nag can du skyes pa de dag la bdag gi mthus

238a6(rgyud): pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ngan sems can gang dag sngon sdig pa mi dag pa byas te gzhan gyi rdzas phrogs pas

238a8(rgyud): gzir cing mdog ngan pa de dag gis/ bdag ming thos nas brjod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ bgo ba dang / bza'

238b8(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyur/ mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yong su thar par 'gyur/ rtag tu nang med pa dang ldan

239a6(rgyud): klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal mtshan na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i

239b1(rgyud): ra ba dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / dra ba dang / ba ga ma ni shel las grub pa/ sa bzhi lha'i rin po che'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa/ gser gyi skud pas mig mangs ris su
239b2(rgyud): bris pa/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad la yang dril bu g.yar ka'i dra ba bres shing dpyangs pa/ lha'i dar gyi lda ldi dang / lha'i me tog dang / spos kyis mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che

239b7(rgyud): de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bzhi btabo// bzhi gang zhe na/ de'i smon lam chen po ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/

242a1(rgyud): cig sems can gang yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar ma gyur cig ces smon lam btab po// de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'os
242a2(rgyud): pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can gang ji snyed cig gzhan gyis dbang
242a3(rgyud): du song ste/ chad pas bcad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / go rar gzhug pa dang / bsad par 'os pa de dag gis bdag gi ming thos nas bdag gi 'od kyis/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar
242a4(rgyud): du bcing ba dang / brdeg pa de dag rgyun chad par gyur cig ce/ das btab po// de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de'i tshe/ smon lam chen po bzhi pa btab pa ni/ gang gi tshe
242a5(rgyud): bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gang
242a6(rgyud): su dag tshe thung bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge pa sna tshogs byas te/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag gi ming rna lam du grag par gyur cig/ de dag gis bdag gi mi
242a7(rgyud): thos nas bang 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig/ sdig pa'i las thams cad yongasu byang
242a8(rgyud): bar gyur cig ces btab te/ 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par
242b1(rgyud): rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bzhi po de dag btab po// 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che rgya mtshor lags
242b2(rgyud): par gnas pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa na ci 'dra ba yod pa de 'dra'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rig
242b3(rgyud): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po de dag gi mtshan thos la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / nang par langs nas yid la byed pa dang / dad par
242b4(rgyud): byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phre dang ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan da dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis mchod pa dang / glegs bam la
242b5(rgyud): bris te 'chang ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / sems btud de gzhan las nyan pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la
242b6(rgyud): 'tshogs chas dang / yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa byed pa de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs
242b7(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// // bam po gnyis pa// 'jam dpal shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung bcu'i
242b8(rgyud): bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+yar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhab su
243a1(rgyud): ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
243a2(rgyud): 'das sman gyi bla bai DU r+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhug so// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi
243a3(rgyud): bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bcu gnyis po 'di dag btab bo// bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni/ 
243a4(rgyud): gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na meng ba yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par/ sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/ bdag
243a5(rgyud): gi lus kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs meng dpag tu med cing dpag gis mi lang ba dag lham ma lhan ne lhar nger gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
243a6(rgyud): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus lags par brgyan par gyur te/ bdag ci 'dra ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra
243a7(rgyud): par gyur cig ces btab po/ de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa na lus nor bu rin
243a8(rgyud): bo che bai DUr+ya ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar phyi nang shin tu yongasu dag pa dang / dri ma med pa 'od gsal ba dang / kho lag yangs shing tsha ba dang / dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang / lags
243b1(rgyud): bar gnas pa dang / nyi ma dang zla ba bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rnams kyis legs par rgyan par gyur cig/ de na sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu skyes pa dag dang / gang dag
243b2(rgyud): yang mi'i 'jig rten 'di na mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na phyogs tha dad par 'gro ba de dag/ bdag gi 'od kyi phyogs rnams dga' dgur 'gro bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i las rnams
243b3(rgyud): kyang byed par gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ong ba'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
243b4(rgyud): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub tho/ ba pa na/ bdag gi shes rab dang / thabs dpag tu med pas sems can gyi khams dpag gis mi lang ba
243b5(rgyud): ngag long spyod mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur te/ su yang ci sa kyang brel ba med par gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ong
243b6(rgyud): pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gang dag lam ngan par zhugs
243b7(rgyud): pa de dag byang chub kyi lam la dgod par bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs pa deng dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la gzud par bya'o zhes
243b8(rgyud): gtab po// nga'i smon lam chen po lnga pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sems
244a1(rgyud): can gang dag bdag gi gnan tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sems can gzhan dpag tu med cing dpag gis mi lang ba de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi/ 
244a2(rgyud): ming thos nas bdag gi mthus sdom pa gsum gyis bsdams pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa med par gyur cig/ su yang tshul khrims log par zhugs te/ ngan 'gror 'gro bar
244a3(rgyud): gyur cig ces gta'o// de'i smon lam chen po drug pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa

244a8(rgyud): gzir ba/ skyabs med pa/ mgon med pa/ 'tshog chas dang / sman mi bdog pa/ dpung gnyen med pa/ dbul ba/ sdug bsngal ba gang dag gi rna lam du bdag gis ming grags

244b3(rgyud): la bud med kyi skyon brgya dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa/ bud med kyi dngos po la smod pa/ bud med kyi skye gnas las yongasu thar par 'dod pa de dag bud med kyi dngos po

244b7(rgyud): gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan par bya'o zhes btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bcu pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na medang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

245a1(rgyud): pa dang / go rarang gzhug pa dang / bsad par 'os pa rgyu du mas kun tu gces pa/ nga rgyal dang bral ba/ lus dang ngag dang / sems sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa de dag

245b6(rgyud): sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can ci 'dra ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+yar snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang de dang 'dra'o/

245b8(rgyud): ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya/ gnyis pa'i ming ni zla ba ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya ste/ de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po
246a1(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o// 'jam dpal de lta bas na ngang pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam thob shig/ yang

246a8(rgyud): rgyal po de mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni ga shin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas kyang rung / dud 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas kyang rung ste/ der de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur/

246b7(rgyud): 'gyu ro// mi blun po de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs pa ste/ bdag kyang lam ngan par zhugs la/ sems can gzhan gang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag kyang g.yang sa chen por lhung bar byed pa'o//

248a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag la gang gis kyang bar chad bya bar mi nus te/ de dag phan tshun byams pa'i

248a8(rgyud): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de zad par mi 'gyur zhing ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang mi'i 'jig rten 'dir gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
248b1(rgyud): rgyal por 'gyur te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par 'gyu ro// gzhan du na yang rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i
248b2(rgyud): khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag dang / khyim bdag shing sa la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang pa mang po 'byor
248b3(rgyud): po'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpa' ba dang / rtul phod pa dang / chen po che
248b4(rgyud): chen po'i stobs kyis shugs dang ldan par 'gyu ro// bung / med gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan tho/ sa shing bzung ba de'i bud med kyi dngos po de tha ma yin par
248b5(rgyud): shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// com ldan 'das slang ma'i dus na gang dag mdo 'di 'chang ba
248b6(rgyud): dang / klog pa dang / 'chad pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'dri stsol ba dang / glegs bam la bris te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / 
248b7(rgyud): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rnams kyis bkur sti bgyid pa'i ngad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de
248b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan rnam pa tshog su bsgrags par bgyi'o// tha na rmi lam du'ang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rna lam du nye bar skrag par bgyi'o// tshon sna lnga
249a1(rgyud): pa'i gos rnams kyis bkris te phyogs gtsang mar bzhag na gang na mdo sde 'di gnas pa de dang ngar rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig
249a2(rgyud): brgya stong gzhan yang mchi bar 'gyur ro// gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i
249a3(rgyud): mdo 'di 'dzin pa de dag dus ma lags par 'gum par mi 'gyur/ sus kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi nus te/ phrogs na yang slar 'phrogs par 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
249a4(rgyud): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de de/ de bzhi no// 'jam dpal ngang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigades kyi bu mo gang dag nga bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod
249a5(rgyud): pa byeng pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku gzug sa byas te nyin zhag bdun du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar bya// 
249a6(rgyud): kha zas gtsang ma za zhing lus legs par bkrus te gos bzang po dri ma med pa bgo zhing phyogs gtsang mar me tog sna tshogs sil ma bkram pa/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdug pa/ 
249a7(rgyud): ras dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyan pa'i sa phyogasu dri ma med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / gnod sems mang ba'i sems dang / 
249a8(rgyud): byams pa'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / mnyam pa'i semasu bya/ rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs blang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de/ 
249b1(rgyud): la bskor ba byas ste/ de'i sngon gyi smon lam yang yid la bya zhing mdo sde 'di yang ston na/ gang bsams pa dang / gang smon pa'i bsams pade thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur
249b2(rgyud): te/ gal te tshe ring bar smon na ni tshe ring por 'gyu ro// gal te long spyod dang ldan par smon na ni long spyod 'byor par 'gyu ro// gal te dbang phyug dang ldan par smon na ni tshogs chung ngus rnyed
249b3(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// gal te bu 'dod na ni bu rnyed par 'gyuraro// gang dag sdig pa can gyi rmi lam rmis sdom/ gang du bya khwa dang ltas ngan mthong ngam/ gnas gung du bak+Sha mi shis pa bcu
249b4(rgyud): dag gnas par gyur pa la/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkur sti byed na
249b5(rgyud): rmi lam ngan pa dang ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i/ dngos po thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyuraro// gang dag mes 'jigs pa dang / chus 'jigs pa dang / mtshon
249b6(rgyud): gyis 'jigs pa dang / dug gis 'jigs pa dang / g.yang sas 'jigs pa dang / glang po che gtum pos 'jigs pa dang / seng ges 'jigs pa dang / stag gis 'jigs pa dang / 
249b7(rgyud): dom dang / dreng dang / sbrul gdug pas 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa dang / rkang lag brgya pas 'jigs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas na 'jigs pa thams cad
249b8(rgyud): las yong su thar par 'gyuraro// gang dag pha rol gyi dmig tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang / rkun pos 'jigs pa dang / chom pos 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
250a1(rgyud): de la mchod par bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dang pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gsum la skyab su 'dzin cing / lhags
250a2(rgyud): mi 'dzin pa/ gang dag yang bslab pa'i bzhi lnga po dag 'dzin pa dang / gang bslab pa'i gzhi bcu po 'dzin pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa bslab pa'i gzhi bzhi brgya po
250a3(rgyud): 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / khyim gyi gnas nas byung ba'i dge sbyong gang dag bslab pa'i bzhi nyis brgya lnga bcu po dag 'dzin pa dang / dge slong ma gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga brgya po 'dzin pa
250a4(rgyud): dang gang dag ji ltar yongasu bzung ba'i bslab pa'i sngo/ ma pa de dag gi nang nas/ bslab pa'i gzhi yang ru / nga ba zhig las nyams par gyur te/ ngan 'gro dang ngan song
250a5(rgyud): gis 'jigs skrag pa gang dgra bcom ldan 'das de ba zhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la mchi da pa sna tshogs byed na de la ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal
250a6(rgyud): med par shes par bya'o// bud med gang la la bu btsa' ba'i dus na sdug bsngal ma rungs pa drag po mi bzad pa myong ba des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bi
250a7(rgyud): DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po nga la mchod na de myur du yongasu thar par 'gyuraro// bu yeng yan lag yongasu tshangs bca' zhing gzugs bzang ba dang / mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / nga
250a8(rgyud): ba rno ba dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / nang med cing gnod pa nyung bar 'gyu ro// nga la mi ma yin pas mngangs 'phrog par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun
250b1(rgyud): dga' bo la bstsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang gi phyir nga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i yon tan brjod par khyod dang ngam/ yid ches sam/ yang
250b2(rgyud): na khyod sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab mo 'di la yid gnyis sam/ som nyi 'am/ the tsom za ba med dam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gso
250b3(rgyud): to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos rnams la/ yid gnyis sam/ som nyi 'am/ the tshom 'tshal ba ma mchi so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
250b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sku dang / gsung dang / da thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa yongasu ma dag pa mi mnga' ba da'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu
250b5(rgyud): 'phrul cha zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba'ang gnyis ni ngogs la ltung yang ganga'/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni gnasanas 'pho yang ganga'i/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' ni
250b6(rgyud): gzhan du mi 'gyur lags// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar legs kyis kyang sems can dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba dag mchis te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
250b7(rgyud): spyod yul 'di thos nas de dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'di dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar shin tu yon tan dang / phan yon du 'gyur snyam
250b8(rgyud): nas de dag mi dad cing yid mi ches te/ spong ba yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi sman pa dang / mi bde ba dang / rnam par ltung bar 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
251a1(rgyud): kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan su'i rna lam du grag par gyur pa de ngan 'gro ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni gnas mang dgo skabs ma yin
251a2(rgyud): kun dga' bo sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni yid ches par dka'o// kun dga' bo khyod dad cing yid rgyas pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin par blta'o// byang
251a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams ma btogs par 'di nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yino// kun dga' bo mir
251a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba rnyed pa ni rnyed par dka'o// dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus pa yang rnyed par dka'o// de babazhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa yang rnyed par shin
251a5(rgyud): tu dka'o// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe gus pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni tshang med do// thabs la
251a6(rgyud): mkhas pa yang tshad do// smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa yang tshang mang ngo do// nga de bzhin gshegs pa nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag
251a7(rgyud): par rgya cher yang dag par bshad par 'dod kyang bskal pa zad par 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par
251a8(rgyud): par rgyas pa'i mtha' rtog par ni mi 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskyab grol zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
251b1(rgyud): gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
251b2(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das slang ma'i tshe slang ma'i dus na sems can bro nang sna tshogs kyis lus yongasu gzir te/ yun ring po'i bro nad kyis lus kyi sha bas bcing bkres pa dang skom
251b3(rgyud): pas gre ba dang mchu ni bskams/ 'gum pa la ni mngon du phyogs/ 'dza' gshes dang nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams du ba rnams kyis ni bskor/ phyogs rnams ni mun par mthong
251b4(rgyud): gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis ni drangs te/ de'i lus 'di na da nyal yang rnam par shes pa chos kyi rgyal po ga shin rje'i mdun du khrid cing / mi de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i
251b5(rgyud): lha slad bzhin 'brang ba gang lags pa des ni ngas dge ba 'a/ ma mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa de dag thams cad legs par yi gar bris nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjel
251b6(rgyud): phul ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes de la dris shing brtags nas dge ba'am mi dge ba ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du bsgo ba la gang dag nang pa de'i don du bcom ldan 'das de
251b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la skyabasu 'chi zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor bas mchod pa bgyi na de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing rmi lam rmis pa bzhin
251b8(rgyud): du bdag nyid kyi 'tshal ba'i gnas der mchis te/ yang na ni gdugs bdun/ yang na ni gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig/ yang na ni gdugs sum cu rtsa lnga/ yang na ni gdugs bzhi bcu
252a1(rgyud): rtsa dgu la de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing dran pa rnyed la/ de dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyuraro// srog gi
252a2(rgyud): slad du yang sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do// de lta lags pas dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
252a3(rgyud): dga' bas byang chub sems dpa' bskyab grol la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la ji ltar mchod
252a4(rgyud): par bya// byang chub sems dpa' bskyob grol gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag nang chen po las yongasu thar bar 'dod pa de dag gis/ nang pa de'i
252a5(rgyud): don du nyin bdun mtshan bdun du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong gi sdom pa blang bar bya'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun la zas dang skom rnams dang / yo byad thab
252a6(rgyud): kyis ci nus su mchod pa dang / rim gro bya'o// nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan yid
252a7(rgyud): la bya'o// mdo 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu gdon par bya'o// zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me bud par bya'o// sku gzugs bdun bya'o// sku gzugs ra re'i spyan sngar yang mar ma
252a8(rgyud): bdun bdun bzhago// mar me re ri'i tshad kyang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du bya ste/ ci nas kyang zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me mi zad par bya'o// tshon sna lnga pa'i ba ngan bzhi bcu
252b1(rgyud): dgu las lhag par bya'o// btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la nad kyi gnod pa 'am/ rang gi dmag tshogs sam/ pha rol gyi
252b2(rgyud): dmag tshogs kyi gnod pa 'am/ rgyu skar gyi gnod pa'am/ gza' zla ba'i gnod pa 'o ma/ gza' nyi ma'i gnod pa'am/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char gyi gnod pa'am/ than pa'i
252b3(rgyud): gnod pa yang rung ste/ gnod pa dang / nang 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa zhig nye bar gnas par gyur na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba des sems can thams cad la byam
252b4(rgyud): pa'i semasu bya/ btson du bzung ba rnams btang ba dar bya zhing / gong du smos pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'ang das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi
252b5(rgyud): rgyal po de lta bur mchod pa byas na rgyal po rgyal rig sa spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla/ 
252b6(rgyud): bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po nga'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par gyis yul bde ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur/ rlung dang char dus su ldang zhing lo thog 'grub par 'gyur/ yul den
252b7(rgyud): gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang nad med pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang por 'gyu ro// yul der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma ruH/ 
252b8(rgyud): pas sems can rnams la gtse bar mi 'gyu ro// ltas ngan pa thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyuraro// rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs
253a1(rgyud): dang / nang med pa dang / dbang phyug rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ byang chub sems dpa' bskyab grol la 'di/ 
253a2(rgyud): skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na tshe yongasu zad nas yang mngon par smra/ byang chub sems dpa' bskyab grol gyi smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu/ 
253a3(rgyud): yod par khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la ma thos sam/ de'i phyir sngags dang sman gyi sbyor ba rnams bstan to// sems can nad kyis gtab pa la de nang tshabs mi ches kyang sman
253a4(rgyud): dang rim gro byeng pa dang mi ldan nam/ yang na sman pa smra da na ma yin pa byed pa yang yod de 'di ni dus ma yin/  par 'chi ba dang po'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni// gang
253a5(rgyud): rgyal po'i 'chad pas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o// dus ma/ yin par 'tsho ba gsum pa ni/ gang dag ha cang bag mang bar gnas pa de dag la mi ma yin pa dag gis
253a6(rgyud): mdangs 'phrog pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzhi pa ni/ gang dag mes tshig te 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba lnga pa ni gang dag chus 'chi'o// dus ma par 'chi ba
253a7(rgyud): drug pa ni gang dag seng ga dang / stag dang / wa dang / sbrul dang / gcan zan khro bo'i nang du chud nga 'chi ba'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba bdun pa ni gang dag ri kha nas g.yang du lhung
253a8(rgyud): ba'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad pa ni/ gang dag dug dang byang dang ro langs kyi sbyor bas gsod pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu pa ni gang dag zas dang skom ma rnyed nas 'i
253b1(rgyud): pa dang skom pas nyen te 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o// mdor na 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba chen por bstan pa ste/ gzhan yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni grangs
253b2(rgyud): med dpag tu med do// de nas 'khor der gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis 'dus par gyur te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan
253b3(rgyud): 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
253b4(rgyud): po dbang 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ba tung 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam
253b5(rgyud): 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba'in dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po de dag go// 
253b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi snga dpon chen po re re la yang g.yog gnod sbyin bdun 'bum bdun 'bum yod pa ste/ de dag gis tshig gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
253b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos te/ bdag cag la yang ngan 'gror
253b8(rgyud): mchi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// des na bdag cag lhan cig tu 'thun par ji srid 'tshe'i bar du/ sangs rgyas la skyabasu mchi'o// chos la skyabasu mchi'o// dge 'dun
254a1(rgyud): la skyabasu mchi'o// sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o// bye brag du ni grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal/ 
254a2(rgyud): lam/ dgon pa'i gnas gang na mdo sde 'di spyod pa dang / gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan 'chang ba dang / mchod pa dang
254a3(rgyud): rim gro bgyid pa'i sems can de dag la bdag gis srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyab par bgyi/ gnod pa thams cad la so yongasu thar bar bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs
254a4(rgyud): par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sgyu dan gyi sde dpon chen po de dag la lag so zhes bya ba byin te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dag/ gang gi phyir khyod
254a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla be D+hA/ r+ya 'od kyi rgyal po nga la byas pa gzo zhing rje su dran la// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa log/ 
254a6(rgyud): lag so// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu shes rab chung ngu kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na rnam par bzhugs pa'i de
254a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan thos pa dang // gzung ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyad par 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
254a8(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pas lha'i bu blo gros chung ngu de dag gi sems kyi yongasu rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bskul ba zhes bya ba'i
254b1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ting 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu gso
254b2(rgyud): so// lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / me tog gi sprin gyi char yang bab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs
254b3(rgyud): pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing byang chub sems sapa' thams cad kyis ni bskor/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / 
254b4(rgyud): na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang // / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim pa/ ngag rnams kyis ni yongasu bskor te chos ston cing / btso
254b5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang thab sa gcig tu kun tu snang ngo // de nas lha'i bu de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du
254b6(rgyud): gyur nas la gso zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la gso lagaso zhes gsol nas 'khor de thams cad kyis rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
254b7(rgyud): bsod nams las nges par byung ba'i me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spud pa dang / rgyan rnams dang / lha'i rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis nga bzhin
254b8(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag la mngon par mchod de lan gsum bskor ba byas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
255a1(rgyud): rgyas kyi yul dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par dang / thabs la mkhas pa ni ngo mtshar du bgyi ba lags te/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul
255a2(rgyud): gyi ting 'dzin 'di lta bu thob par gyur cig ces sems can de dag thams cad kyis smon lam de skad btab po// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te thal
255a3(rgyud): mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ting nge
255a4(rgyud): 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// yang bcom ldan 'das ji ltar/ slad
255a5(rgyud): ma'i tshe slang ma'i dus na sems can bsod nams chung / ba/ bro nang sna tshogs kyis yongasu gzir ba/ gnod/ samasu gyur pa/ gza' dang rgyu skar gyi gnod pa 'byung ba/ 
255a6(rgyud): 'chi ba dang / ngagra dang / dgon pas gnod par gyur pa thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad las bskyab pa dang / mgon bgyid pa dang / sems can de dag gis bcangs sam/ bklags
255a7(rgyud): sam/ yi ger 'di'am/ yi ger 'drir stsol ta ma/ 'don na de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs
255a8(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / log par ltung bar mi mchi ba dang / dus ma lags pas 'gum par mi 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi
255b1(rgyud): tshig de lta bu bshad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lagaso zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal lagaso lag so// 'jal
255b2(rgyud): dpal sems can thams cad kyi don dang snying rje ba'i phyir khyod kyi spobs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis skyes so// yang legs par rab tu nyon la yid la
255b3(rgyud): zung shig dang bshad do// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos san
255b4(rgyud): thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems kyis gzungs de gzu rang ngam bklags sam/ mchod na bsam pa tha ma sa cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
255b5(rgyud): pas dgongs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar/ 'gyur/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpa'
255b6(rgyud): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bgyi ba'i gzungs de gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
255b7(rgyud): gsung dbyangs gcig gis gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ g+hu ma g+hu me/ i ma/ ni mi hi/ ma ti ma ti/ sap+ta tA thA ga tA sa ma d+h+ya d+hiSh+Thi ta a ta ma te pA la/ pA ba
255b8(rgyud): sho d+ha ni/ sarba pA pa nA sha ya/ ma ma bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ho tA ma/ u me/ ku me/ bung+ga/ k+She tra pa re sho d+ha ni/ d+ha me/ nir d+ha me/ ma ru ma ru/ ma ru shi kha ra/ sarba kA la/ mri tu ni bA ra Ni/ bud+d+ha
256a1(rgyud): su bud+d+he/ bud+hA d+hiSh+Thi te na rak+Shan+tu ma?/ sarba de bA/ sa ma a sa ma/ sa ma nA ha ra nU ma sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA/ shA mra sha ma/ pra sha ma nu me sarba i t+yu pa dra ba
256a2(rgyud): byA d+ha ya/ pU ra Ne pA ra Na/ pu ra yaM ma/ sarbe A shA yaM ba DUr+ya pra ti b+hA sa sarba pA paM kA ya ka ri swA hAM// gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa'i tshe snang ba chen po byung sA/ sa chen po g.yos/ 
256a3(rgyud): nas rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa dag snang ngo // 'khor ji ltar lhags pa des kyang lha'i spos dang bdug pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod nas lagaso zhes bya ba
256a4(rgyud): gsol te/ lan bdun pa skor ba byas so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces pa dka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
256a5(rgyud): zhig gzungs 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod ngam/ gtsang mar byas te/ phyogs gtsang mar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan par byas la
256a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying rje bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po de dag gi sku gzugs byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la me tog dang / bdug pa dang // 
256a7(rgyud): mar me dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed cing nyi ma bdun du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la gnas te/ 
256a8(rgyud): gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag/ lan stong rtsa brgyad du bton na de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgongs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sems dpar 'gyur/ rdo rje
256b1(rgyud): 'dzin thams cad kyang yang dag par srung bar 'gyur/ lnga thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang yongasu spong bar 'gyur/ mtshams
256b2(rgyud): meng pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongasu byang bar 'gyur/ nang thams cad kyis mi gtab par 'gyur/ ring du 'tshe bar 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i
256b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad las yong su thar par 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang / ngag dang / dgon pa'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 
256b4(rgyud): dgra thams cad kyi dbang du mi 'gro bar 'gyur/ ci bas dmas pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa/ dar 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo
256b5(rgyud): rje dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po zhi dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
256b6(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa yang thos/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
256b7(rgyud): gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mngon du mthong ste/ mchod pa bgyis so// yang bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan dang / gzung
256b8(rgyud): kyi tshig 'di dag spyod pa der bdag cag g.yog dang bcas te mchi bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa dang / 
257a1(rgyud): yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba der/ bdag cag 'thun par lhan cig tu mchis la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/
