257a2(rgyud): rgyal po'i blon po mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa dang / 'dri ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis rab tu srung bar bgyi'o// grong dang grong khyer dang / phyogs kyang yongasu
257a3(rgyud): bskyang bar bgyi'o// 'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa'i gnod pa dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sems can thams cad la
257a4(rgyud): byas pa gzo ba lags te/ dus ma yin par 'gum pa tha/ mas cad bzlog par bgyi'o// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar
257a5(rgyud): bgyi'o// ji ltar bsam pa dang / sems dang yid bde ba da / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang nor dang / 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyi'o// dus thams cad du srung
257a6(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rang gi bro bor ba dang / dam bcas pa 'di dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo nges rjesu dran par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ a g+hu ma g+hu ta ra g+hu/ ma ma
257a7(rgyud): g+hu g+hu ra/ ha hu he/ mra mr-i mra mra/ dzu dzu re/ dzu re swA hA/ gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams dang / gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri
257a8(rgyud): ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / rab tu gus par mchod pa bgyid pa ni ngan song gsum du mi mchi bar rig par bgyi ste/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar
257b1(rgyud): mi ldog par 'gyur/ ji ltar 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ ting 'dzin dang / gzung
257b2(rgyud): kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub dpa' lag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa
257b3(rgyud): de dag gi don du bdag gis gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams rab tu stsal bar bgyi yis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol// de nas sangs rgyas
257b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gsung gcig gis byang chub sa/ dmas dpa' lag na rdo rje la lag so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje lagaso leg so// lag na rdo rje khyod la dgongs
257b5(rgyud): zin gyis mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la phan par 'a/ dod pa dang / re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya/ ba'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smos
257b6(rgyud): shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes gzungs gsang sngags kyi bzhi 'di dag smraso// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po de dag la phyag 'tshal
257b7(rgyud): lo// rdo rje 'dzin thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM badz+re badz+ra ma hA madz+re/ badz+ra pA sha d+hA ra NI/ sa ma sa ma sa man+ta/ a pa ti ha ta badz+ra/ sha ma sha ma pra sha man+ta/ sarba byA drA ya/ 
257b8(rgyud): ku ru ku ru sarba karmA Ni/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra b+ha ga bAn badz+ra pa Ni/ sarbA sha ma me pa ri pU ra ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan
258a1(rgyud): dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa de'i re ba thams cad bdag gis bskang bar bgyi/ don thams cad kyang
258a2(rgyud): sgrub par bgyi'o// gal te des bdag mthong bar 'tshal na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dir stsal bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi sku gzugs bdun kyang bgyi/ 
258a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin yang sku gdung dang bcas par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yang ji skad gong du smos pa bzhin du/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan dang / 
258a4(rgyud): rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / phag rdob pa rnams kyi da sa mchod de bskor bar bgyi/ gzungs kyi gsang / sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang gdon par bgyi/ sems
258a5(rgyud): can thams cad la yang phan pa'i sems dang / byam sa pa'i semasu bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yanaleg brgyad pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas te/ lan
258a6(rgyud): gsum khrus bgyi zhing gos lan gsum rje bar bgyi/ tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ zla ba phyi ma bco lnga nya'i bar du/ nyin gzhin rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na
258a7(rgyud): de dag la bdag gis rmi lam du mthong bar stsal bar bgyi/ 'bel ba'i bka' mchid kyang bgyi/ re ba thams cad kyang yongasu bskang bar bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems
258a8(rgyud): dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la lag so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag la/ 
258b1(rgyud): par smras pa lagaso lag so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje nged kyis sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / re ba thams cad
258b2(rgyud): yongasu bskang ba'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag byin gyis brlab so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
258b3(rgyud): ba rnams la bos te bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag khyed la chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di rjesu gtad kyis/ khyod kyi ci nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs chen po de bzhin gshegs
258b4(rgyud): pa dang mtshungs pa/ sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa / ra ba thams cad yongasu skong ba 'di phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma nga'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la sems can bsod nams chung
258b5(rgyud): du dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la bskur ba 'a/ dbas pa rnams kyi lag tu myur tu nub par mi 'gyur/ ra bar srungs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba
258b6(rgyud): stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig le gzar nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btung nas bcom
258b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
258b8(rgyud): kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes
259a1(rgyud): bya bar yang zung shig/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong zhing re bathang
259a2(rgyud): yongasu skong ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis kyis dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
259a3(rgyud): nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lnga
259a4(rgyud): ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ ba com ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pa dar bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun
259a5(rgyud): gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba thegapa chen po'i mdo brgyad brgya pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na
259a6(rgyud): shI li dang / shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba na de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// 
259a7(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+ha ga ba ta b+he Sha dz+ye gu ru bai DUr+ya pra b+hA ba pU rba pra Ni d+hA na bi she Sha bistA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla baM
259a8(rgyud): DUr+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa
259b1(rgyud): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing yangs pa can na byon te/ yangs pa can na rol mo'i sgra gcan gyi shing ljon pa'i drung na dge slong brgya stong gi dge 'dun chen po
259b2(rgyud): dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sum khri drug stong dang yang thabs gcig tu rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams dang / lha dang / lnga
259b3(rgyud): ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi rgyal
259b4(rgyud): bu 'jam dpal stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gtso dag tu bgos nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logasu
259b5(rgyud): thal mo sbyar ba btung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadaces gsol to// gang thos pas sems ca/ na rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa yongasu byang bar 'gyur ba
259b6(rgyud): dang / slang ma'i tshe slad ma'i dusu dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na sems can de dag rje su gzung ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam
259b7(rgyud): gyi khyad par rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal lags
259b8(rgyud): leg so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis snying rje dpag tu med pa bskyed nas sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa rnams dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / 
260a1(rgyud): bde ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs pa ni leg so// 'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur
260a2(rgyud): gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal shar phyogs/ 
260a3(rgyud): logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
260a4(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab sun pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skye bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / 
260a5(rgyud): mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba bzhug so// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman
260a6(rgyud): gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de sngon byang chub sems dpe'i spyad pa spyod pa ni smon lam chen po bcu gnyis po 'ang dag btab bo// bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni gang
260a7(rgyud): gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas de'i tshe bdag gi lus kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
260a8(rgyud): ming dpag tu med cing dbag gos mi yang bdag ldam me lhan lteng skor tshig/ sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / nga'i byang b.rang ngo // 
260b1(rgyud): brgyad cus lags par rgyan par gyur te/ bdag ci 'dra ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de 'dra bar gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni/ glang
260b2(rgyud): gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na lus nor bu rin po che ba
260b3(rgyud): DUr+ya ji 'dra bar de 'dra bar phyi nang shin tu yongasu dag pa dang / dri ma med la 'od gsal ba dang / kho lag yangs shing che ba dang / dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang / legs par
260b4(rgyud): gnas pa dang / nyi ma dang zla ba bas lhag par 'od zer gyi dra ba rnams kyis legs par rgyan par gyur cig/ de nas sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu
260b5(rgyud): skyes pa dag dang / gang dag yang mi'i 'jig rten 'di na mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na phyogs tha dad par 'gro ba de dag/ bdag gi 'od kyis phyogs dga' 'gur
260b6(rgyud): 'gro bar gyur cig/ las rnams kyang byed par gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
260b7(rgyud): paba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na bdag gi shes rab dang thabs dpag tu med pas sems can gyi khams dpag gis mi lang
260b8(rgyud): bdag longs spyod mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur te/ su yang cis kyang brel ba med par gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus
261a1(rgyud): na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa ni sems can gang dag lam ngan par zhugs pa de dag byung
261a2(rgyud): chub kyi lam la dgod par bya'o// nyan thos kyi lam du zhugs po dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la gzung bar bya'o zhes btab bo// de'i smon
261a3(rgyud): lam chen po lnga pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na sem
261a4(rgyud): gang dag bdag gi gnan tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa dang / de de bzhin du sems can gzhan dpag tu med cing dpag gis mi lang ba de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi/ 
261a5(rgyud): ming thos nas bdag gi mthus sdom pa gsum gyis bsnga/ mas pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa med par rgyu ra cig/ su yang tshul khrims log par zhugs te/ ngan
261a6(rgyud): 'gror 'gro bar ma gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po drug pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
261a7(rgyud): par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa nus sam can gang su dag lus ngan pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / mdog mi sdug pa dang / bems po dang yan lag sbyin ca
261a8(rgyud): dang / chur bo dang / sha bkra can dang / zhar ba dang / long ba dang / 'on pa dang / smyon pa dang / gzhan yang gang dag lus la nad kyis btab pa de dag gi bdag gi ming thos nas thams
261b1(rgyud): cad dbang po tshang zhing yan lag yong su rdzogs par gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po bdun pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
261b2(rgyud): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gang su dag nang sna tshogs kyis yongasu gzir ba/ skyabs med pa/ mgon meng pa/ 
261b3(rgyud): chas dang / sman mi bdog pa/ dpung gnyen med pa/ dbul ba/ sdug bsngal ba gang dag gi rna lam du bdag gi ming grag pa de dag nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ byang chub kyi
261b4(rgyud): mthar thug gi bar du nang med cing gnod pa med par gyuradag/ ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po brgyad pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus bla na med pa yang / 
261b5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sang sa rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/ bud ming gang la la bud med kyi skyon brgya dag gis kun nas/ 
261b6(rgyud): nyon mongs par gyur po/ bud med kyi dngos po la smod pa/ bud med kyi skye gnas las yong su thar bar 'dod pa dag bud med kyi ngos po las ldog par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi maH
261b7(rgyud): thug gi bar du skyes pa'i dbang po 'byung bar gyur cig ces bta'o// de'i smon lam chen po dgu pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
261b8(rgyud): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sems can thams cad bdud kyi zhags pa rnams las yongasu thar bar bya'o// lta ba tha dad pa
262a1(rgyud): mi mthun pa zang gzing bas mi mthun par gyur pa dag yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par bya'o// mthar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa bstan par bya'o zhes btab bo// 
262a2(rgyud): de'i smon lam chen po bcu pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa
262a3(rgyud): na/ sems can su dag rgyal po'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang / gang dag bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / gau rar gzhug pa dang / bsad par 'os pa/ rgyu du mas gtses pa/ nga rgyal dang / 
262a4(rgyud): bral ba lus dang ngag dang sems sdug bsngal gyis nyin/ pa de dag/ bdag gi bsod nams kyi mthus/ ga nod pa thams cad las yongasu thar par gyur cig/ ces
262a5(rgyud): btab po// de'i smon lam chen po bcu gcig pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
262a6(rgyud): rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can gang dag bkres pa dang / skom pa'i me rab tu 'bar ba/ kha zas tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa/ sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag
262a7(rgyud): bdag gis kha dog dang / dri dang / ror ldan pa'i kha zas kyis lus tshim par byas/ phyis chos kyi ros shin tu bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes btab po// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i smom
262a8(rgyud): lam chen po bcu gnyis pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ sems can
262b1(rgyud): su dag sman mo// bgo ba med pa/ dbul ba/ sdug bsngal ba/ grang ba dang / tshab dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dag gis nyin mtshan du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba dag la
262b2(rgyud): bdag gis gos yongasu spyad par 'os pa tshon sna tshogs yongasu kha bsgyur ba dag sbyin par bya'o// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rin po che'i rgyan sde tshogs dang / spud pa dang / phreng ba dang / 
262b3(rgyud): spos dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par gyur cig ces btab bo// 'jam
262b4(rgyud): dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra pa dam pa yang bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi zla pe n+dur+ya'i 'od de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyang ba spyod pa na
262b5(rgyud): smon lam chen po bcu gnyis po de dag btab par gyur to// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa sman zla bin+d+ha/ ro'i 'od de'i sprin la ma gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
262b6(rgyud): zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa de ni bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par yang zad par byar mi nus so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni shin tu yong su dag pa ste/ rdo dang / gsag
262b7(rgyud): ma dang / sgo mo med pa/ 'dod pa'i skyon med pa/ ngan song dang sdug bsngal gyi sgra med pa/ bud med kyi dngos po med pa/ sa dang rtsig pa dang / rab dang / rta babs dang / skar khung gi dra ba dang / 
262b8(rgyud): bgam ni bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin cano// bu shu ni rin po che sna bdun gyi ring bzhin can te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+yar snang ba'i
263a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang de dang 'dra'o// 'jig rten gyi khams den byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa de dag gi nang na byang chub sems
263a2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtso bo gnyis yod de/ gcig gi ming ni nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya/ gnyis pa'i ming ni zla ba ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya ste/ de dag ni bco
263a3(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o// 'jam dpal da lta bas na dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas
263a4(rgyud): kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam thob cig/ yang bcom lnga na 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sems can so so'i skye bo
263a5(rgyud): gang dag dge ba dang mi dge ba mi shes pa dag yod de/ de de/ ga ni chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/ sbyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi shes pa'o// de dag
263a6(rgyud): ni byis pa/ glen pa/ dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba/ nor sog cing srung ba la mngon par brtson gyi/ sbyin pa yang dag par 'gyed pa la de dag gi sems mi 'gro ba ste/ sbyin pa'i dus nye bar
263a7(rgyud): gnas pa na/ rang gi lus kyi shwa las bshad pa bzhin du yid mi dga' bar 'gyu ro// sems can de dag ni bdag nyid kyang du ma yongasu mi spyod na/ pha ma dang / chung ma dang / bu dang bu
263a8(rgyud): me la mi ster ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gzhan spong ba rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sems can de lta
263b1(rgyud): bu de dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas yi dwags kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// yang na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye bar 'gyu ro// de la gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das pa
263b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas kyang rung / dud 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas kyang rung ste/ der de bzhin
263b3(rgyud): gshegs pa de'i mtshan mngon du gyur zhing / dran ma thag pa tsam gyis de nas shi 'phos nas yang mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i 'jig
263b4(rgyud): pas skrag nas yang 'dod pa'i yon tan dag don du mi ga nyer ba dang / sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / de sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / bdog pa thams cad
263b5(rgyud): yongasu gtong bar 'gyur te/ rims kyis rang gi mgod nga / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / sha dang / khrag kyang slong ba rnams la rab tu sbyin par 'gyur na/ 
263b6(rgyud): nor gyi phung po gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos 'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i gnas 'jig pa dag yod de/ de dag tshul
263b7(rgyud): khrims log par zhugs shing / lta ba log par zhugs nas gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa de dag ni tshul khrims srung gi/ mang du thos pa yongasu mi tshol te/ de bzhin
263b8(rgyud): gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams kyi don zab mo mi shes/ gang dag mang du thos pa dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur te/ nga rgyal gyis non pas gzhan dag la phrag
264a1(rgyud): dog byed cing dam pa'i chos la dbang za bar 'gyur/ spong bar 'gyuraro// mi blun po de lta bu de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs pa ste bdag kyang lam ngan par zhugs la/ san
264a2(rgyud): gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag kyang g.yangs chen por ltung bar byed pa'o// sems can de lta bu de dag ni sems can dmyal ba mi bzad par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang dag
264a3(rgyud): sngon mir gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba na gnas kyang der sangs rgyas kyi mthus
264a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur te/ de da dag de nas shi 'phos nas yang mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang / brtson 'grus
264a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa can du 'gyur ro// ngag khyim spangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsti na pa la rab tu byung nas/ mthar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i
264a6(rgyud): spyad pa spyod par 'gyu ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag bdag gis bsngags pa brjod cing / phrag dog gis gzhan dag la mi snyan par brjod pa yod de/ bdag la
264a7(rgyud): bstod cing gzhan la smong pa'i sems can de dag ngan song gsum po dag tu lo stong phrag mang por sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyu ro// de dag lo stong phrag du ma 'das nas// de nas shi 'phos
264a8(rgyud): nas pa lang dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / bong bu la sogs pa dung 'gro'i skye gnas rnams skye bar/ gyur/ lce ldog dang / dbyig lcag rnams kyi brdeg pa dang / bkres pa dang skem pas
264b1(rgyud): lus nyen pa dang / khal chen po bkal te lam du 'gro bar 'gyu ro// gal te brgyal mi'i skye ba rnyed na yang rtag tu rigs dma' ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ bran tu 'gyur zhing gzhan
264b2(rgyud): ming bang du 'gyuraro// gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi b+hu baiDUr+ya'i 'ang de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni dag pa'i rtsa ba des sdug bsnga
264b3(rgyud): thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyur/ dbang po rno bar 'gyur/ mkhas pa dang / gsal ba dang / yang gzhungs pa dang / dge ba yongasu sul ba la mngon par rtson pa dang / rtag tu dge
264b4(rgyud): ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa rnyed par 'gyur/ bdu dad kyi zhags pa gcod pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i/ dpas gcog pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i chu klung skems par
264b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ skye ba dang / rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags na/ don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba // 'khrug pa rnams las yongasu thar por 'gyu ro// 'jam
264b6(rgyud): dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag phra ma la mngon par dga' zhing sems can dag phan tshun 'thub dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed par byed du 'jug pa dag yod do// sems can dag rnam
264b7(rgyud): par rtsod pa'i semasu gyur pas lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis mi dge ba sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed do// gcig la gcig phan pa ma yin pa 'dod cing rtag tu phan tshun gnod pa
264b8(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir brtson te/ de dag nags tshal gyi lha dang / shing gi lha dang / ri'i lha 'gugs par byed/ dur khrod rnamasu 'byung po tha dad pa dag 'gugs par byed/ dud 'gro'i sku
265a1(rgyud): gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod cing / sha dang khrag za ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams mchod par byed de/ dgra bo de'i ming nas brjod
265a2(rgyud): pa'am/ gzugs byas nas der rig sngags drag po sgrub cing / byang stams dang / ro langs kyi sbyor bas srog gri bar chad bya ba dang / lus rnam par gzhig par 'dod pa la gang dag
265a3(rgyud): gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag la gang gis kyang bar chad bya bar mi nus te/ de dag phan tshun
265a4(rgyud): byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / gan dang sems med pa'i semasu gnas par 'gyur/ da rang gi bdog pas chog shes par 'gyuraro// 'jam dang
265a5(rgyud): gzhan yang 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge ba sgo ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag dang / gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag
265a6(rgyud): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas te/ lo gcig gam/ zla ba gsum du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams 'dzin cing / gang dag gi bsam pas bdag gis dag
265a7(rgyud): paba'i rtsa ba 'dis nub phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar shog shig ces smon lam de lta bu btab pa dang/ 
265a8(rgyud): las gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' brkyang rngu
265b1(rgyud): 'phrul gyis lhags nas lam ston par 'gyur te de dag der pad+ma tshon kha dog sna tshogs rnams las brdzus te skye bar 'gyu ro// gang la la dag lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag
265b2(rgyud): ni/ der skyes nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de zad par mi 'gyur zhing / ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang mi'i 'jig rten 'dir gling bzhi po'i dbang phyug 'khor
265b3(rgyud): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par 'gyur ro// gzhan du na yang rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po/ 
265b4(rgyud): lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag dang / khyim bdag shing das la chen po lta bu'i khyim ngag dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / 
265b5(rgyud): mdzod dang / bang ba mang po 'byor pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / dang nga phyug phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog phun sum
265b6(rgyud): tshogs pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtul pod pa dang / chen po chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyu ro// bud med gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos shing bzung ba
265b7(rgyud): de'i bud med kyi dngos po de tha ma yin par shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slang ma
265b8(rgyud): tshe slang ma'i dus ma gang dag mdo 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag bar ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol bang/ 
266a1(rgyud): glegs bam la bris te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rnams kyis bkur stir bgyi ba'i rigs kyi bu
266a2(rgyud): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan rnam pa sna tshogasu bsgrag par bgyi'o// tha na rmi lam du yang sangs rgyas
266a3(rgyud): kyi mtshan rna lam du nye bar bsgrag par bgyi'o// tshon sna lnga pa'i tshon rnams kyis dkris te phyogs gtsang mar bzhag na/ gang ni mdo sde 'di gnas pa der rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcwa
266a4(rgyud): ba dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan yang mchi bar 'gyu ro// gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe rags pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od 'ong de'i mtshan dang / sngon gyi
266a5(rgyud): smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo 'di 'dzin pa de dag dus ma lags par 'gum par mi 'gyur/ sus kyang mdangs 'phrog por mi nus te/ phrogs na yang slar 'phrog
266a6(rgyud): par 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te ji skad smras pa bzhin no// 'jam dpal dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag de bzhin ga
266a7(rgyud): bde la mchod pa byed pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku gzugs bya/ nyin zhag bdun du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas
266a8(rgyud): par bya'o// kha zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lus legs par bkrus te/ gos bzang po dri ma meng pa bag zhing / phyogs gtsang mar me tog sna tshogs bsil ma bkram pa/ spos sna tshogs
266b1(rgyud): kyis bdug pa/ ras dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyan pa'i sa phyogasu dri ma med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / gnod sems meng pa'i se
266b2(rgyud): dang / byams pa'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / mnyam pa'i semasu bya/ rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs blang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la
266b3(rgyud): bskor bar bya ste/ de'i sngon gyi smon lam yang yid la bya zhing mdo sde 'di yang bstan na gang bsams pa dang / gang smon pa'i bsam pa de thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gal
266b4(rgyud): te tshe ring por smon na ni tshe ring por 'gyu ro// gal te long smr-i dad dang ldan par smon na ni long spyod 'byor par 'gyuraro/ 8// gal te dbang phyug dang ldan par smon na ni tshigs chung ngus rnyed
266b5(rgyud): par 'gyu ro// gal te bu 'dod na ni bu rnyed par 'gyu ro// ga nga dag sdig pa can gyi rmi lam rmis sam/ gang du/ bya khA dang / ltas ngan pa mthong ngam/ gnas gang du bkra mi
266b6(rgyud): shis pa brgya dag gnas par gyur pa la gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla be DU'i 'od de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkur sti byed na/ rmi lam ngan
266b7(rgyud): pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gang dag mas 'jigs pa dang / chus 'jigs pa dang / dug gis 'jigs pa dang / mtshon
266b8(rgyud): gyis 'jigs pa dang / g.yangs sas 'jigs pa dang / glang po che gtum pos 'jigs pa dang / seng ges 'jigs pa dang / stag gis 'jigs pa dang / ngom dang / dreng dang / sbrub
267a1(rgyud): gdug pas 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa dang / rkang lag brgya pas 'jigs pa de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas na 'jigs pa thams
267a2(rgyud): cad las yongasu thar par 'gyu ro// gang dag pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang / rkun pos 'jigs pa dang / chom pos 'jigs pa de dag gi yang de bzhin gshegs
267a3(rgyud): bde la mchod pa bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang drang ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi mo gang dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'dzin cing lha gzhan mi 'dzin
267a4(rgyud): pa dang / gang dag yang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag 'dzin pa dang / gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi bcu po dag 'dzin pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i ston pa bslab pa'i
267a5(rgyud): gzhi bzhi brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang / khyim gyi gnas nas byung ba'i dge slong gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi nyis brgya/ lnga bcu po dag 'dzin pa dang / dge slong ma gang dag
267a6(rgyud): bslab pa'i gzhi lnga brgya po de dag 'dzin pa dang / gang dag ji ltar yongasu bzung ba'i bslab pa'i sdom pa de dag gi nang nas bslab pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig las nyams par gyur
267a7(rgyud): te/ ngan 'gro ngan song gis 'jigs skrag pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na/ de dag la ngan
267a8(rgyud): song gsum gyi sdug bsngal med par shes par bya'o// bud med gang la la bu btsa' ba'i dus na sdug bsngal ma rungs pa drag po mi bzang ba myong ba de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
267b1(rgyud): gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la mchod na de myur du yong su thar par 'gyu ro// bu yang yan lag yongasu tshang bar btsa' zhing gzugs bzang ba dang / mdzes pa dang / blta na/ 
267b2(rgyud): sdug pa dang / dbang po rno ba dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / nad med cing gnod pa nyung bar 'gyu ro// de la mi ma yin pas mdangs 'phrog par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe/ 
267b3(rgyud): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i yon tan brjod par khyod dang ngam yid che
267b4(rgyud): sam/ yang na khyod sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab mo 'di lade yid gnyis sam/ som nyi 'am/ the tsom za ba ma da dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / de nas
267b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos rnams
267b6(rgyud): la yid gnyis sam/ som nyi 'am/ the tsom 'tshal ba ma mchi so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa yongasu ma
267b7(rgyud): dag pa mi mnga' ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das gdugs dang dgung zla 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis ni dog sa la ltung yang gda'/ ri'i rgyal po
267b8(rgyud): ri rab ni gnas nas 'pho yang gda'i/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' ni gzhan du mi 'gyur lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags kyis kyang / sems can
268a1(rgyud): dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba dag mchis te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul 'di thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ de bzhin
268a2(rgyud): gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'di dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar shin tu yon tan dang phan yon du 'gyur snyam nas/ de dag mi dad cing yid ches shing spong bas/ yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi sman
268a3(rgyud): pa dang / mi bde ba dang / log par ltung bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan su'i rna lam du grags par gyur pa dngan 'gro ngan song
268a4(rgyud): du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni gnas med de go skabs ma yin no// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni yid ches par dka' ba'o// kun dga' bo khyed
268a5(rgyud): dad cing yid ches pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'i mthu yin par blta'o// byang chub sems dpa 'o sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams
268a6(rgyud): ma gtogs par/ 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma yin no// kun dga' bo mir 'gyur ba ni rnyed pa rnyed par dka'o// dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus pa yang rnyed
268a7(rgyud): par dka'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa yang rnyed par shin tu dka'o// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i byang chub sems
268a8(rgyud): dpa'i spyod pa ni tshad med // thabs la mkhas pa yang tshad meng ngo // smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa yang tshad mang ngo // nga de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal
268b1(rgyud): pa'am bskal pa las lhag par rgya cher yang dag par bshad par 'dod kyang bskal ba zang bar 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'ong de'i sngon gyi smon/ 
268b2(rgyud): lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mtha' rtogs par mi 'gyu ro// yang de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskyab grol zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ blagos
268b3(rgyud): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
268b4(rgyud): to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das slang ma'i tshe slang ma'i dus na sems can bro nang sna tshogs kyis yongasu gzir te/ yun ring po'i bro nad kyi lus kyi sha bas shing bskos pa dang
268b5(rgyud): skom pas gre ba dang mchu ni bskams/ 'gum pa la ni ma don du phyogs/ mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / sna ga gi gnyen mtshams du ba rnams kyis ni bskor// phyogs
268b6(rgyud): rnams ni mun par mthong // gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis ni drangs te/ de'i lus 'di na nyal yang rnam par shes pa chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i mdun du khrid cing mi de dang lhan cig skyes
268b7(rgyud): pa'i lha slad bzhin 'brang ba gang lags pa des dge ba dang / mi dge ba bgyis pa de thams cad legs par yi ge la bris nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la phul ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po
268b8(rgyud): gshin rjes de la dris shing brtags nas dge ba 'am mi dge ba ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du bsgo ba las/ gang dag nang pa de'i don du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla
269a1(rgyud): beDUR+Ya'i de la skyab su mchi'i zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor bas mchod pa 'gying na de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing rmi la marnaMs pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyi 'chal pa'i
269a2(rgyud): gnas der mchi ste/ yang na ni gdugs bdun/ yang na ni gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig/ yang na ni gdugs sum cu rtsa lnga/ yang na ni gdugs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la de'i rnam par shes
269a3(rgyud): bslar ldog cing dran pa rnyed la/ de dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur te/ srog gi slang yang sdig pa'i las mi bgying ngo // de lta lags
269a4(rgyud): bas dang po'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos de bzhi na gshegs pa de la mchod par bgyi'o// de nas tsha de dang ldan pa kun dga' bos byang chub sems dpa' bskyab
269a5(rgyud): grol la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'ad sang bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od du la ji ltar mchod par bya// byang chub sems dpa' bskung
269a6(rgyud): grol gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo// gang dag nad chen po las yongasu thar par 'dod pa de dag gi nad pa de'i don du/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das
269a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od nga'i mtshan yid la bya'o// mdo 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu gdon par bya'o// zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar ma bung par bya'o// sku gzugs
269a8(rgyud): bdun bya'o// sku gzugs ra re'i spyan sder yang mar ma bdun bdun banago/ mar me re re'i tshad kyang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du byas te/ ci nas kyang zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar
269b1(rgyud): mi mi zad par bya'o// tshon sna lnga pa'i ba bcu rtsa dgu las lhag par bya'o// btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la/ nad kyi gnod pa
269b2(rgyud): 'am rang gi dmag tshogs sam/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gnod pa 'am/ rgyu skar gyi gnod pa'am/ gza' zla ba'i gnod pa'am/ gza' nyi ma'i gnod pa'am/ dus ma yin pa'i
269b3(rgyud): rlung dang / char gyi gnod pa 'am/ than pa'i gnod pa yang rung ste/ gnod pa dang nangad 'gro ba dang 'khrug pa zhig nye bar gnas par gyur na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de
269b4(rgyud): sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sem su bya/ ba con du bzung ba rnams btang bar bya zhing gong du smos dpa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman
269b5(rgyud): gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de la da lta bur mchod pa byas na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang / bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i
269b6(rgyud): sngon gyi smin lam gyi khyad par gyis// yul bde ba dang / lo lags par 'gyur rlung dang char dus su sdang zhing lo tog 'grub par 'gyur// yul da na gnas pa'i sems can thams
269b7(rgyud): cad kyang nad med pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ro// yul der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma rungs pas sems can rnams la gtse bar mi 'gyur ro// / 
269b8(rgyud): ltas ngan pa thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyuraro// rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// 
270a1(rgyud): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos byang chub sems dpa' bskyab grol la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu ji ltar ni tshe yongasu zad nas/ yang mngon par bya/ 
270a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bskyab grol gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu yod par khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa las ma thos sam/ de'i phyir sngags dang
270a3(rgyud): sman gyi sbyor ba rnams bstan to// sems can nad kyis btab pa la nga nang tshabs mi ches kyang sman dang rim gro byed pa dang mi ldan nam/ yang na sman pa sman ma yin par byed pa yang yod
270a4(rgyud): de 'di ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang po'o// dus ma yin/ par 'chi ba gnyis pa ni/ gang dag rgyal po'i chad pas da'achi ba'i dus byed pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba gsum
270a5(rgyud): pa ni/ gang dag ha cang bag med bag med par gnas pa de ngag la mi ma yin pa dag gis mdangs 'phrog pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba ban pa ni gang dag mes tshig ste
270a6(rgyud): 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba lnga pa ni gang dag chus 'chi ba'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba drug pa ni gang dag seng ge dang / stag dang / wa dang / sbrul dang / gcan zan
270a7(rgyud): khro bo'i nang du chung nga 'chi ba'o// dus yin par 'chi ba bdun pa ni/ gang dag ri kha nas g.yang du lhung ba'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad pa ni gang dag dug dang byang dang / ro langs
270a8(rgyud): kyi sbyor bas gsod pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu pa ni gang dag zas dang skom ma rnyed nas bkris pa dang skom pas nyen te 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o// mdor na 'di dag ni de bzhin
270b1(rgyud): gshegs pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba chen por bstan pa ste/ gzhan yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni grangs med/ dpag tu med do// de nas 'khor der gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
270b2(rgyud): po bcu gnyis 'dus par gyur te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgya 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin
270b3(rgyud): gyi sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung dang / gnod sbyin gyi snga dpon chen po gnas bcas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin dong / 
270b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btung 'dzin dang / gno dang sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang / gnod sbyi dan gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi
270b5(rgyud): sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde da bon chen po rdzogs byed de/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po dag go// gnod sbyin gyi snga dpon chen por
270b6(rgyud): re yang g.yog gnod sbyin bdun 'bum bdun 'bum yod pa ste/ de dag gis tshig gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis bcom
270b7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos te bdag cag la'ang ngan 'gror mchi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// de nas bdag cag lhan cig tu 'thun
270b8(rgyud): par ji srid 'tshe'i bar du sangs rgyas la skyabasu mchi'o// chos la skyabasu mchi'o// dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi'o// sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du/ 
271a1(rgyud): spro bar bgyi'o// bye brag du ni grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ dgon pa'i gnas gang na mdo sde 'di spyod pa dang / gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
271a2(rgyud): gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan 'chang ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa'i sems can de dag la bdag cag gis srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi// gnod
271a3(rgyud): pa thams cad las yongasu thar par bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po de dag la lag so zhes bya
271a4(rgyud): ba byin te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dag gang gi phyir khyed bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de la byas pa gzo zhing rjes su dran la/ sems
271a5(rgyud): can la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa lagaso leg so// de nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla go/ sa phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
271a6(rgyud): sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming
271a7(rgyud): ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi
271a8(rgyud): smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa ces bya bar zung shig/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes dam bcas pa ces bya bar yang zung shig/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong
271b1(rgyud): zhing rab thams cad yongasu skong ba ces bya bar yang zung shig/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis kyis dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de
271b2(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
271b3(rgyud): ngag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman
271b4(rgyud): gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas dpa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogas+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rje
271b5(rgyud): na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+ha ye shes snga la sogs pas zhus shing bsgyur te/ skad gsar bcas kyis kyang bcos shing gtan la phab
271b6(rgyud): ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga ta be DUR+Ya'i pra b+hA nA ma ba la d+ha na sa mA d+hi d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin gyi
271b7(rgyud): stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdug gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
271b8(rgyud): ldan 'das sman gyi gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs
272a1(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos
272a2(rgyud): lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / me tog gi cha re dpag tu med pa bab po// de bzhin gshegs pa bdun 'khor dang bcas pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs te/ de bzhin gsheg
272a3(rgyud): pa'i sngon gyi dge pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i sang ge'i khri la bzhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni bskor/ lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam
272a4(rgyud): lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rgyal po dang blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis yongasu bskor bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
272a5(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bstan las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// de ba/ zhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongasu gsol// sems
272a6(rgyud): can thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang / nang thams cad bsal ba dang / re ba thams cad skad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tshan dang / 
272a7(rgyud): sngon gyi smon lam gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lag so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam
272a8(rgyud): dpal lag so leg so// legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la/ deng bzhin no zhes gsol
272b1(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan lags par yongs grags dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po
272b2(rgyud): che dang zla ba dang / pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa'i
272b3(rgyud): rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan meng mchog dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po la
272b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho ma chog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa da'i rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi
272b5(rgyud): bla be DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag
272b6(rgyud): 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
272b7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed la phyag 'tshal
272b8(rgyud): lo// byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po zla ba ltar rab tu bsil byed la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po la phyag 'tshalo// byang
273a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub
273a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa don yod la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub
273a3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta na mdzes la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mun pa mun nag thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros la phyag
273a4(rgyud): 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam po legs par rnam par sems dpa' la phya dag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
273a5(rgyud): lhun po brtsegs la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs la/ phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
273a6(rgyud): chen po lhun po rtse 'dzin rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa dgra bcom pa shA ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la phyag 'tshalo// dge bsnyen chen po dpal tshangs pa dang brgya
273a7(rgyud): byin la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshalo// klu'i dge bsnyen chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis
273a8(rgyud): l-i phyag 'tshalo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gsung dbyings gcig gis gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to// na ma rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ba ga wa te/ a pra ti ha ta b+he
273b1(rgyud): dz+yararA dzA ma/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ta thug tar+dz+dza mU g+hu me g+hu me/ i mi nri mi hI/ ma ti ma tI/ sapyA ta thug ta/ sa mA d+yad+hiSh+Tita/ a tam te/ pA la pA ba sho d+ha ni/ sar+b+ba pA ba na shas/ 
273b2(rgyud): ma ma bud+d+ha bud+d+ho ta ta mai/ u me ku me/ bud+d+he k+Shi tra pa ri she d+hi ni d+ha me ni d+ha me/ me ru me ru/ me ru shi kha re/ sarba a kA la mri tu ni wA ra Ni/ bu d+d+he su bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ta na rak+Sha tu me/ 
273b3(rgyud): sar+b+ba de bA sa me/ a sa me/ sa mi nA ha ran+ti mi/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twasha me sha ma?/ pra sha mran+ta me/ sarba i t+yu pa dra ba byA d+he ya pU rA NaM su pA ra Ne/ pU ra ya me/ sarba A sha
273b4(rgyud): me bai DUR+YA pra ti b+ha se/ sarba pA pAk+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/ oM b+haM da Sha dz+ye b+he Sha dz+ye/ ma hA b+he She dz+ra b+he She dz+ye sa mung+ga te swAhAng / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang / gzungs 'di bka
273b5(rgyud): stsal pa'i tshe snang ba chen po byung ste sa chen po yang g.yos nas rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dag snang ngo // 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang spos dang bdug
273b6(rgyud): pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod nas lagaso zhes bya ba gsol ta lan gdun bskor ba byaso// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po dag mi snang bar gyur nas/ 
273b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal rgyal ba shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang gzungs 'di 'dzin
273b8(rgyud): ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa des gtsang mar byas la phyogs gtsang mar 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan par byas la sems can thams cad mchog tu snying / 
274a1(rgyud): rjebs sa ga la bab pa'i nya nas brtsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku gzugs byas la tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang bco lnga la smyung bar gnas pas
274a2(rgyud): gzungs 'di dag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'am/ stong rtsa brgyad ngam/ stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur 'don cing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / mar me dang / phreng ba dang / rol mo
274a3(rgyud): sgra dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du mchod pa byed na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur/ 
274a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sems par 'gyur/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen da po bzhi dang / klu'i dge bsnyen chen po dag gis kyang yongasu
274a5(rgyud): skyong bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rdo rje 'dzinathams cad kyis yang dag par srung bar 'gyur/ ma tshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams
274a6(rgyud): cad yongasu byang bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad kyis mi gtab par 'gyur/ ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las yongasu thar bar 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang / 
274a7(rgyud): dgra dang dgon pa'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ dgra bo thams cad kyi dbang du mi 'gro bar 'gyur/ ci bsams pa'i bsam
274a8(rgyud): pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyu ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
274b1(rgyud): ming ci lags// 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
274b2(rgyud): bskyed pa bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi gzungs zhes bya bar zung shig/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thag cing sbyong ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi rnam pa
274b3(rgyud): 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
274b4(rgyud): ngag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin pa/ shegs pa ting 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa'i bai DUR+Ya'i 'od ces
274b5(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / su ranA bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ba na d+he ye shes
274b6(rgyud): sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shri dz+nyA na dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas tho ling gser khang du skad gsar chad kyis btso
274b7(rgyud): nas gtan la phab pa'o// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
274b8(rgyud): sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo// tad+ya thA/ oM b+hai Sha dz+ye b+he 'adz+re/ ma hA b+he Sha dz+re bi Sha dz+ye/ sa mud ta swAhA/ sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gtab pa
275a1(rgyud): rdzog s+ho/ bkra shis dpal 'bar chab sring rgyas par shog/ rgya gar skad du/ tri sa ma ya thA t+ta rdza na ma tan+ta/ bongasad du/ 
275a2(rgyud): dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa'i dge
275a3(rgyud): 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// dbus dang mtha' med yon tan ri bo dpagi meng dang // mchod rten mtha' meng mchod pa'i mchog tu 'khrungs// mchod chen 'phags pa'i
275a4(rgyud): 'phags pa chen po'i bdag/ dus gsum 'khrungs pa de'i bde gshegs tshogs la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i
275a5(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang rdo rje chen po'i nye 'khor/ rdo rje 'chang chen po nye bar 'du ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhag par dgyes pas rnam par rol pa/ dbus dang mtha
275a6(rgyud): med pa'i rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo mthon po'i rin po che'i rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyu las gyur pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i pho brang chen po'i mchog na byang chub sems dpa' sems
275a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po'i tshogs kyi bskor ba'i sang+ge'i khri la bzhug so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
275a8(rgyud): rgya chen por byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/ thogs pa meng pa don yod par grub pa gsungs te/ na mas+t+rai ya d+hi kA nA ta thA ga tA nA/ sar+b+ba tA pra ti ha tA bAp+ti/ d+harma tA ba lI na/ 
275b1(rgyud): a sa ma sa ma sa man+ta to// a nan+t+ra pA b+hi/ shA sa na ha ra ha ra/ sma ra sma ra Na/ bi ga tA rA ga bud+d+ha d+harma te/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ma ba la/ ha sa ha sa/ tA ya tra ya/ ga ga nA ma hA ba
275b2(rgyud): ra Na la k+Sha Ne/ dz+wa la dz+wa la na/ sa ga re swA hA// de la rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'ang ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/ byang chub sems
275b3(rgyud): dpa' thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa/ sngags kyi sgor byang chub sems dpa'i spyang pa spyod pa 'di las grang zhig byed par 'gyur ba de ni bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin gshegs pas
275b4(rgyud): bstan par mi spyod kyi/ gzhan du mdor bsdus nas gsungs pa yino// 'dis skyes bu dam pa de ni sgom datha' yas sems can thams cad kyi rjesu 'gro zhing / de
275b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhag par dmigs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa rnam par tha ra ba'i sgo sna tshogs pa'i rjesu zhugs pa/ sems can
275b6(rgyud): 'dul ba'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas gnas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba/ las thams cad rjesu dran pa'i cho ga yang dag par sbyor ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur zhing / san
275b7(rgyud): gyi khams dang mos pa dang rje su 'thun pa'i gzugs sna tshogs pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi
275b8(rgyud): stobs dang / stobs sna tshogs mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i sgo sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i mos pas snying po 'di bzlas na gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyu ro// mdor bsdus na/ 
276a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa yang mthong bar 'gyu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor yang 'byin pa
276a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gsar dang nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa'i char yang mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro// sems can gyi khams thams cad du yi dgas rnams la bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang
276a3(rgyud): btung ba yang mngon par rab tu 'bab par 'gyu ro// dmyal ba rnams kyi grang ba la dro ba yang yang dag par skyed par byed do// dud 'gro rnams gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal
276a4(rgyud): yang rab tu zhi bar byed do// sems can mos pa'i sgo sna tshogs pa'i yul can gyi sems can gyi kham/ nas rnam par sbyong bar byed do// byin gyis rlob par bying // 
276a5(rgyud): yongasu 'gegs par byed/ yongasu smin par byed/ rnam par 'dul bar byed/ nges par sbyong bar byed/ rab tu sbyong bar byed/ rnam par 'phel bar byed// dag
276a6(rgyud): bar byed/ so sor 'god par byed/ rnam par grol bar byed/ byang chub kyi theg pa la lhag par mdzeg par byed/ myur du ldog par 'dzeg pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i/ 
276a7(rgyud): man ngag kyang ston par byed/ mdor na mthar gyis byang chub la gzhol zhing so sor 'god par byed/ dge ba skyob pa la gnas pa bskyed par byed/ sdug bsngal dang nyon mong
276a8(rgyud): bzad par byed/ rnam par 'joms par byed/ rnam par sel bar byed/ 'dren par byed/ 'joms par byed/ mdor na sems can gyi khams thams cad du/ de bzhin
276b1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i mdzad pa yang byed par 'gyuraro// rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs
276b2(rgyud): kyis 'dir yang sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis don yongasu ma nyams pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sngags 'dzin pas dang por re shig/ byang chub tu sems bskyeng pa'i
276b3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rnyed pa 'di nyid la bdag nyid ngang par bya'o// sgrub
276b4(rgyud): pa po'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos snga dro dang dpo la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor du dang bcas pa thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste/ 
276b5(rgyud): bdag ming che ge mo zhes bgyi ba chos kyi dbyingasu gtog sa pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khro/ ra dang bcas pa thams cad la bdag dbul bar bgyi'o// 
276b6(rgyud): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de rnams kyis bdag la rnam pa thams cad dang / dus thams cad du byin gyis brlab dang / yongasu bzung bar gyur cig bdag la grub dang mchog
276b7(rgyud): stsol cig/ de nas sdig pa so sor bshags par bya ste/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug las skyes pa'i sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas
276b8(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thugs bskyed pa gang gis bshags pa mdzad pa'i sems bskyed pa nges bshags par bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa
277a1(rgyud): lngar nges kyang ji tsam du bshags par nus pa de tsam du bshag par bya'o// de nas bsod nams la rje su yi rang bar bya ste// gang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i
277a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byang ba/ sems can gyi khams yongasu sbyong bar byed/ 
277a3(rgyud): pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa de dag thams cad la rje su yi rang ba bla na med pas rje su yi rang bar bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas mkhyen pa
277a4(rgyud): ltar des kyang ji ltar rje su yi rang bar nus pa de ltar rje su da yi rang bar bya'o// de nas mchod pa'i bya ba bya ste/ sa dmas can gyi khams na gang nga'i ba med cing yongasu bzung
277a5(rgyud): ba med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga de thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchod po'i phrin las kyis dbul bar bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas dang / 
277a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang bdag gi gsod nams kyi stobs dang / rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
277a7(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mchog tu rgya che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog rgya chen po'i gong ma las bla mar mngon par bsgrub pa'i
277a8(rgyud): mchod pa'i sprin rab tu 'bab par 'gyur bar bsam pa'am/ brjod la mchod pa chen por mngon par sgrub por byed pa rig pa'i rgyal mo chen po 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o// nam
277b1(rgyud): sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sar+b+ba thA/ ung+ga tres+pha ra na hi maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ji ltar mngon par bsngos pa ltar de bzhin
277b2(rgyud): du nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// mchod pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mkhyen to// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang
277b3(rgyud): bcas pa thams cad la yon tan dang / bsngags pa dang grags pa sna tshogs kyi glu'i sprin rgya mtsho rab 'byam tshig tu brjod pa 'am/ bsams la 'di lta bu'i bstod pa depe med pa ngas
277b4(rgyud): par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di lan brgyad brjo dpar bya'o// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA/ sar+b+ba tra saM ku su mi ta a b+hi dz+nyA rA shi ni na mo stu te swA hA// de nas
277b5(rgyud): de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yon tan bsngags pa brjod pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho rang tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur yang dad par bya'o// de 'i/ 
277b6(rgyud): 'og tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi sprul pa'i sprin sems can thams cad kyi dmig pa las byung ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sdug
277b7(rgyud): bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba thams cad myur du stsol cig pa'am/ yang na sems can thams cad kyi zag pa med pa'i dge pa 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yang dag par
277b8(rgyud): 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de dag gis thob par gyur cig ces de lta bu la sogs pa sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa yid la byed
278a1(rgyud): pa'am/ ngag tu brjod de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin mngon par sgrub pa'i rgyu dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa
278a2(rgyud): dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/ na mo stu ta mahA badz+ra saH
278a3(rgyud): satwa hi kaM kA ra/ tiSh+Tha sarba tra/ sarbi shaM d+har+m+ma NA/ a d+hiShA ya swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di brjod pa tsam nyid kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyi byin gyis
278a4(rgyud): brlabs kyi stobs kyis de dag gi sprul pa'i sprin rgya cheb mos pas mngon par bsgrubs nas/ mdor nas dmas can gyi khamasu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
278a5(rgyud): dnga' thams cad kyi mdzad pa yang bying par 'gyuraro// byang / chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyi de ngag la yang dag bar dang bar bya'o// de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub
278a6(rgyud): sems dpa' kho nas mkhyen to// de nas de dag thams cad bla na meng pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / rje su yi rang ba la sogs pa bla na meng ba yang dag par
278a7(rgyud): ba'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu bdag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad du byin gyis
278a8(rgyud): brlab pa dang / bdag la grub pa'i mchog stsol cig ces brjod par bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / dmigs pa dang / badz+ra/ 
278b1(rgyud): ba dang / nan tan du bgyis pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi dngos grub la sogs pa grub pa thams cad la rje su yi rang ba dang / mig
278b2(rgyud): pa dag la goms pa'i sems kyi bla na med pa'i snying po 'di ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa nga srid bzlas pa bzla bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / 
278b3(rgyud): bla na med pa'i sang+ga'i sgra sgrogs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sems can gyi don bla na meng pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po'i sku yongasu sgrub par 'dod
278b4(rgyud): pas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas ldang bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa sdong po
278b5(rgyud): bkod pa la sogs pa rig pa rgya chen po'i mdo sde rnams ma ngon par mchod cing / klog pa 'am/ tha na phyagabyas nas zas bza' bar bya ste/ dang po zas la sngags
278b6(rgyud): 'dis lan brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ kham gyi dang po lha nyid la dbul zhing / de'i 'og tu zas bza' bar bya'o// de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha pa
278b7(rgyud): satwA nAM/ oM bi la dA te dzo mA li ni swA hA/ kha zas kyis dub pa spangs nas kyang snga dro'i bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad phyi dro'i yang bya ba yin no// nyal na yang yan lag thad
278b8(rgyud): kyis dang por sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas bstod de mal stan la 'dug cing / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
279a1(rgyud): kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / bla na med pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog bdag la stsol cig/ rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol
279a2(rgyud): zhes gsol ba yang gdab par bya'o// mtshan gyi dang po dang tha ma la mi nyal ba'i sbyor bas dam pa'i chos 'don pa la sogs pa bya'o// sgrub pa po'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
279a3(rgyud): des de bzhin du nyi ma ra re zhing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dang por phyag bya ba dang / nyin re zhing bdag 'bul ba dang / de bzhin du sdig pa so sor bshags
279a4(rgyud): pa dang / 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa'i sa dngas rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 8 bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la rjes su yi rang / 
279a5(rgyud): ba dang / sems can thams cad la rang gi bsod nams bstab pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam la phyag byas nas bcang ba dang / klog pa'am/ sgom pa
279a6(rgyud): dang / tha na mchod pa byas nas dad pas snying po 'di bzla bar bya ba yin te/ ri 'am/ lha khang ngam/ khyim 'am/ brang khang la sogs pa'i gnas gnas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
279a7(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la lhag par dmigs shing bzlas pas sems can thams cad yongasu srung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis stobs bcu mkhyen pa'i sa don du gnyer zhing
279a8(rgyud): mngon par 'dod pas 'bum bzla bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyur zhing de'i ting 'dzin dang / gzugs la sogs pa 'am/ 
279b1(rgyud): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bzhugs pa'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pa de dag gi bzlas pa'i cho ga yin no// gal
279b2(rgyud): te rig pa 'dzin par gyur cig ces yid la byed na/ bzlas pa 'bum yongasu rdzogs par byas nas bco lnga 'am/ bcu gsum mam/ bcu bzhi'i nyin mtshan la gso sbyong byas la/ 
279b3(rgyud): ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas me tog gi gcal bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ mchod rten nam lugs sku'am/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bdun du bzhag la/ ku shi'i khres
279b4(rgyud): po 'am/ gcal du bkram pa la 'dug pa 'am/ lo ma la nye bar 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub semasadapa' thams cad la mchog slong bas/ sangs rgyas
279b5(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba dang / dmigs pa dang / bzlas pas lcags kyi 'khoralo lags pa la thogs la// ji srid du bzlas pa byas
279b6(rgyud): na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing sa chen po 'gul bar 'gyur te/ rig pa 'dzin pa de dag thams cad 'dus shing de dag gis dbang bskur bar 'gyu ro// byang chub sems dpa' rig pa 'dzin
279b7(rgyud): pa'i rigasu bsod nams ji lta ba dang / rang gi skal pa ji lta ba'i gnas rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa yang 'thob par 'gyurate/ 
279b8(rgyud): de la lus nyams par yang mi 'gyu ro// thabs mkhas pa nyid kyis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la long spyad kyang gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa nyid du 'gyuraro// 'khor lo'i rim pa ji lta
280a1(rgyud): pa de bzhin du rdo rje dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / rtse gcig pa dang / gtun shing dang / dbyig pa dang / sta re dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / gri gug dang / chu gri dang / 
280a2(rgyud): lcags kyu la yang bsgrub par bya'o// thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing sems can yongasu srung ba'i blo can lus dang srog la ltos pa med pa/ thams cad du rjesu 'gro ba'i yid la byang
280a3(rgyud): pas lcags dang / gser dngul dang / lcags gsum dang / tsan dan dang / rdo dang / tha na/ shing dang / sa las byas pa 'am/ ta la'i lo ma'i rang bzhin las byas pa la sngar smos
280a4(rgyud): pa'i tsho gas gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ 'bum bzla/ das pas bsgrubs na gong ma bzhin rig pa 'dzin par 'gyu ro// ldong ros sam/ lig bu mig gam/ ba bla 'am/ 
280a5(rgyud): gi wang la sogs pa lo ma'i bar ram/ gos kyi bar ram/ lcags kyi kha sbyar du bcug la bsgrub par bya ba'/ ma/ gos sam rgyal mtshan nam/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig
280a6(rgyud): gi 'phreng ba la sogs pa rgyan rnams sam/ pad+ma 'am/ ut+pa la la sogs pa me tog khyad par ram/ ska rags sam/ lhung bzed ngam/ chos gos sam/ khar sil la sogs pa'i
280a7(rgyud): yo byad lag par chud pa 'am/ lo ma 'am/ gos sam/ zhags pa la bsgrubs na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyu ro// ji snyed kyi grogs 'dod pa de skad kyi grogs dang
280a8(rgyud): lhan cig 'phur zhing 'gro bar 'gyuraro// thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa'i snying po 'di yang bsod nams dang ldan pa 'am/ bsod nams dang mi ldan pas kyang rung 'grub par 'gyuro// 
280b1(rgyud): tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang rung / tshul khrims dang mi ldan pas yang 'grub par 'gyuraro// thabs dang ldan pa'am/ thabs dang mi ldan pas yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mkhas kyang rung
280b2(rgyud): mi mkhas kyang rung / nges par don yod par 'gyur/ gzhan du dad pa meng ba dang / byang chub tu sems me bskyed pa rnams kyi ma yin no// bris sku meng kyang rung / mchod kyang rung / 
280b3(rgyud): mchod pa med kyang rung / khrus la sogs pa med kyang rung / phyi'i gtsang sbra spyod pa la sogs pa med kyang rung / nya sha dang sha dag la sogs pa ma spangs kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// sangs
280b4(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs dpa goms pa'i sems kyis 'gru'o// gal te bris/ sku la sgrub pa byed par 'dod na thang ka la/ bcom ldan 'das
280b5(rgyud): rin po che'i ri ba la/ rin po che'i pad+ma'i stengs na bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logasu' pags pa rdo rje 'dzin dbus mo gtsugs nas pad+ma sa la
280b6(rgyud): bzhugs pa rdo rje dang bcas par thal mo sbyar ba ut+pa la'i lo ma'i mdog gam/ s+thi yang sku ltar sngo sangs sam/ gsar gyi mdog can bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas
280b7(rgyud): log su rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin gser gyi mdog can ral pa dang cod pan can/ gos ser po gyon pa/ lag pa g.yon gyi lcags kyu yongasu 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og
280b8(rgyud): tu 'bar ba'i snying po can khros shing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba/ gzhon nu zur phud kyi rgyan pa ming mtha' med ces bya ba tshogs a sho ka dmar po'i mdog can lag pa na gri gug dang zhag
281a1(rgyud): ba thogs pa bri bar bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa de'i 'og tu gzhon nu ma groyon zur phung gcig pa/ nag po sngo bsangs rol par gyur pas 'khor la dga' ba dang bcas/ 
281a2(rgyud): pas lta ba/ gos sngon po gyon pa/ lag na me tog gi phreng ba thogs pa/ mtha' mang ma zhes bya ba bran mo bri bar bya'o// 'dir yang bris skul gzhan du yang las de dag nyid dang / sgrub
281a3(rgyud): pa de dag nyid bya ba dang / rtogs pa thams cad kyi cho ga'i sbyor ba 'am/ yid la 'dod pa'i cho ga'i sbyar bar bya'o// dur khrod du 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin 'ongs nas lag pa nas
281a4(rgyud): gzung ste lcang lo can du 'dren par byid// des rdo rje rigs dkyi gzhon nur gyur pa thob par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'a/ dzin pa'i sa dngos po gri la sogs pa la bsnyen pa byas pa
281a5(rgyud): des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rgya mtshor zhugs nas 'bum bzlas na klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnasu phyin par 'gyur zhing klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyuraro// 
281a6(rgyud): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus rab tu thob par 'gyur// yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'am/ rdo rje 'am/ ral gri'am/ 'khor lo 'am/ rin po che la sogs pa de rnams
281a7(rgyud): kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang por 'gro ba dang 'ong nus par 'gyur ro// klu'i rigs thams cad blo 'thun par 'gyu ro// char chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa
281a8(rgyud): mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro// klu'i mtshe'u gang du 'bum bzlas na klu'i gnas der rab tu 'jug par 'gyur zhing der gang 'dod pa nga rnyed par 'gyur ro// gang gar zhugs shing 'bum
281b1(rgyud): bzlas la 'bum yongasu rdzogs nas de nyid du mchod rten brtsigs la sbrang rtsi dang / 'o ma dang / yungs kar dang bcas pas sbyin sreg byas na klu thams cad skrag pas lhags par 'gyur
281b2(rgyud): zhing gang smras pa de byed par 'gyu ro// dur khrod du yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin gong ma bzhin byed par 'gyu ro// ri'i lha ra khu dang / tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis sam/ 
281b3(rgyud): nags kyi gnasu rig pa 'dzin pa la sbrang rtsi dang / paM pi ling gi sbyin sreg byas na thams cad 'dus par 'gyur zhing / dus thams cad du rjesu dran pas bka' lung bsgrub par byed do// 
281b4(rgyud): shing gi grib mas shing gzhan la ma phog pa ni shing gci dog go/ shing gcig gi drung du rjesu dran pas mchod rten byas shing 'bum bzlas la mdun du a shwang thal
281b5(rgyud): byas pa'i rtsa gsum pa byas la nyin mtshan smyung bar 'a/ dug ste/ nya la dris bskus shing ci 'byor pa'i ma/ chod pa byas nas/ ji srid du 'bar bar gyur gyi bar
281b6(rgyud): du mtshan rangs pa sgrub pa byas na/ gdul dka' ba 'dul bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de gling bzhi po'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro// sku gdung
281b7(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la bzlas pa 'bum byas la nya la 'khor lo'i phyag mtshan nam/ rdo rje'i phyag mtshan nam/ rgyal mtshan blangs nas ji srid 'phur ba de srid bzlas ni des kun
281b8(rgyud): tu 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// chu bor zhugs te bzlas pa 'bum byas nas sa la byas pa'i mchod rten gyi rtsar nya la sogs pa'i nyin zhag la ji skad bshad pa'i gnasu cho
282a1(rgyud): ga snga ma bzhin lag pas nor bu blangs te/ ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid bzlas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'chang ba'i rigs pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// yang
282a2(rgyud): de nyid lag pas blangs te bzlas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bur 'gyu ro// zangs ma'i bum pa la cho ga 'di nyid kyis sgrub par byas na bum pa gang bar 'gyu ro// slongs mos 'tsho zhing lkug
282a3(rgyud): kyi rdo rje lag par blangs te/ ji srid 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi smra bar bya ba ston par byed pa de srid ba zlas pas chos gang nyan par 'dod pa de mngon par ston par 'gyur/ 
282a4(rgyud): de'i steng du bsgrubs na 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'bar bar gyur/ dpas lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigasu 'jug par 'gyur ro// rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lcags
282a5(rgyud): kyu dang / glegs bam lag par blangs te bsgrubs pas/ rdo rje'i rigasu 'jug par 'gyur zhing thams cad du/ thogs pa med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu
282a6(rgyud): 'am gzhon nu ma legs par khrus byas te/ rgyan gyis brgyan pa la sngon du bsnyen pa byas la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te/ nyin mtshan smyung bar mchod rten nam/ lugs sku 'am
282a7(rgyud): glegs bam mam/ bris sku 'am/ gzhan dag gi mdun du ku shi'i gcal bkram pa la 'dug nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dro ba'i rnams la thal mo sbyar ba byas
282a8(rgyud): nas gsol ba btab la/ de nas tsan ngan na ma/ ga bur ram/ gu gul la ma/ du ru skas du ba meng ba'i me 'dag la sbyin bsreg bya'o// nga dag med skyil mo dkrung gis 'dug ste/ 
282b1(rgyud): lag pas de dag gzung la ji srid gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pas rab tu 'bar zhing 'bur bar 'gyu ro// lag pas blangs pa de dag dang bcas
282b2(rgyud): par rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bud med legs par khrus byas shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa la ji srid skyes par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dur khrod du bris pa 'am/ shing ngam
282b3(rgyud): sa las byas pa'i sang ge la ji srid 'gro bar gyur pa nga srid bzlas pas de la zhon zhing gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyuraro// gal te nyin re rtag tu bzlas na gang du 'gro ba'i sa phyogs de
282b4(rgyud): srung ba byas par 'gyur ro// gal te nyin mtshan du sgrub pa byed na ni srid zhag lnga 'am// drug gam brgyad dum lhag ma'i zla ba phyed kyi nang du yar 'phags par
282b5(rgyud): 'gyur zhing lha rnams las kyang rgyal bar 'gyu ro// de la zhon na gang du 'dod pa der 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du rta 'am/ glang po che'am/ khyu mchog gam/ 
282b6(rgyud): ma he 'am/ ra skyes sam/ lug gam/ ri dgas la bzlas na de dag thams cad nyid gang du ji srid 'dod pa de srid tu bzlas par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyu ro// me tog gis rab
282b7(rgyud): tu gtor ba'i dkyil 'khor la dur khrod kyi shing la me sbar la mar dang yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg byas na zla ba phyed kyi nang du nges par mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyu ro// dur khrod du ji lta ba bzhin
282b8(rgyud): du ri la sogs pa la yang gcig tu dben par 'dug ste/ sgrub pa'am/ ngang pa la sogs pa bya la sgrub pa 'am/ cho ga 'di nyid kyis shing khri 'am/ mchil lham la sogs pa la yang
283a1(rgyud): yid la 'dod pas cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// shing mya ngan med kyi yal ka la 'jus nas ji srid na mkha' la 'gro ba dang mi snang bar gyur pa de srid du/ 
283a2(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// de bzhin du shing a shwang tha dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang / nA ga bus pa'i shing dang / shing til dkar dang / a mra dang / dur khrod kyi shing la 'dzegs te/ ji srid mi snang bar
283a3(rgyud): 'gro ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de ltar mi snang bar gyur pas lo stong 'tsho bar yang 'gyur zhing khru gang tsam gyis sa la ma reg par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bsod snyoms kyi 'tsho bas dur
283a4(rgyud): khrod du ji srid du mi snang bar gyur pa nga srid du bzlas par bya'o// dur khrod du zhag lnga 'dug ste/ bzlas rapa byas nas phyis de nyid du sa'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten
283a5(rgyud): byas nas/ dar me tog gi dkyil 'khor byas te/ thal ba lag pa'i kha sbyar du bcug ste/ ji srid du ba thul/ ba nga srid du bzlas pa byas nas/ nges 'dzum ris gsum
283a6(rgyud): byas pas mi snang bar 'gyu ro// sha ma ta la'i rtsa ba skam po phye mar byas te/ dur khrod du me tog gis mngon par gtor ba'i dkyil 'khor byas la lag pa kha sbyor ram/ kham por
283a7(rgyud): kha sbyar du bcug ste/ ji srad du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas la ngas mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyu ro// de bzhin du 'gro na pus pa dang / a ti ba lA dang / oMn+d+ra ba ru ni rnams kyi
283a8(rgyud): rtsa ba'am/ shu dag gam/ a ba ra tsi ta 'am/ a pa ra ta ni 'am/ pad+ma shu ka 'am/ daN+Di pa la 'am/ ud pa la'i me tog gam/ mi'i sha 'am/ rma bya'i sha 'am/ cha ba gas
283b1(rgyud): mam ra dza ba ta'am/ gzhan dag phye mar byas te/ kham por kha sbyar ram/ lag pa kha sbyar du bcug ste/ ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas pa des mig la bskus na mi snang
283b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod du sbrang rtsi la lan stong mngon par bsngags te/ mig la bskus na ma mthong ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// dgon par mchod rten gyi legs la shing
283b3(rgyud): rta bris la ji srid zla ba phyed kyi nang du 'gul bar gyur pa de srid nyin mtshan bzlas la de le zhon na kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ba bla blangs te dben pa'i mchod rten nam/ dgon pa 'am/ 
283b4(rgyud): ri la sogs pa la ji srid dngos grub gsum grub par 'gyuradar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de bzhin du gi wang dang / lig bu mig la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya'o// dge
