361a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'dir 'di'i dam tshig ni 'di yin te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems yongasu bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i
361a2(rgyud): mchod rten gyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas pas bdug la/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid
361a3(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o// yon lag thams cad sa la phab pa 'di skad du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa bdag
361a4(rgyud): yongs su bzung du gsol// bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol zhes bya ba'i ngag kyang brjod par bya'o// de na des spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ nam/ 
361a5(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAM/ ga ga ne ga ga ne sngags dang / phyag rgya'ang dag gis rig pa 'dzin pa'i dam tshig la gnas par 'a gyur ro// dam tshig 'di dag gang yang rung ba ma nyams
361a6(rgyud): par bya'o// cho ga 'di dag gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing cho ga 'di nyid kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di dag ni spang bar bya'o// sems can 'dul bar
361a7(rgyud): byed pa la gnod par byed pa dang / skyon thogs par 'gyur pa'i las byed pa dang / bstan pa la gnod pa sgrub par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang
361a8(rgyud): ldan pa'i khrim pa dang / rab tu byung ba la mngon spyod kyi las byed pa dang / mi smra ba'i sbyor bar byed pa dang / gzhan bsod nams ma yin pa la sbyar bar mi bya bar gsol ba gdab par
361b1(rgyud): bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'dir 'di dag dam tshig yang dag par bsrungs par 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang / sngags kyi
361b2(rgyud): sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgor 'jug pa don yod par grub pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam 'dren par byed pa'o// rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba btab pa rdo rje'i
361b3(rgyud): rigs kyi rtog pa'i snying por 'gyur ba'o// dad pa can brtson 'grus dang ldan pas nges par 'grub par 'gyuraro// tshe 'di nyid la khyad par thob par 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems
361b4(rgyud): dpa'i sku thob par 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'isku nges par sgrub par 'dod pas dben zhing stong pa'i gnas su sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnam
361b5(rgyud): la dmigs pa'i sbyor ba byas nas sngags gang yang rung ba bzla/ sa pa bya'o// dben par dam pa'i chos gdon pa/ dang / sems pa yang rung / nus pa ji lta ba bzhin phyag 'tshal
361b6(rgyud): ba yang byas la mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi mdun du ri dang / chu klung dang / mtsho dang / gling dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / nye ba'i tshal la sogs pa rnam su 'am/ gtsug lag khang gi gnas
361b7(rgyud): dang / sku gdung dang bcas pa'i sa 'am/ lam gyi mdo 'am/ tha na gtsug lag khang gi brang khang du'ang rung / dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du 'am/ sangs rgyas la dmigs pa
361b8(rgyud): 'du 'dzi spangs la snyoms las dang bral bas dam pa'i chos la bla mar byed pas sgrub pa byas na mtshan gcig gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyu ro// bco lnga pa la skyil mo krung ma bshig par
362a1(rgyud): mngon par bsngags shing legs so zhes bya ba yang gsol bar mdzad do// kha cig gis ni mthong ba yang gsol bar mdzad do// kha cig gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med
362a2(rgyud): pa 'phel bar byed cing 'bebs par yang byed do// byin gyis rlob par mdzad par 'gyur/ tshad med pa'i yon tan nyid la yang rab tu 'jog par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub
362a3(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyi mtha' yas shing mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams kyis yon tan rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyu ro// mthu chen po yang rab tu thob par 'gyu ro// de ltar 'di ni de
362a4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi chos kyi tha ma yin zhes bya'o// de ltar na yang sngags kyi spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med par rab 'byam rgya che ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med cing tshad med
362a5(rgyud): pas mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i chog pa med pa dam tshig che/ na po gsum gyi rdo rje zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gsum rdo rje'i
362a6(rgyud): sgo nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa rtog pa chen po zhes bya ba gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang yin pas rdo rje 'chang las gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par bzung ba nyid ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa
362a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi dkor gyi snying po 'di sems can gyi khams ma lus pa yang dag par sbyar ba'i phyir dang / bstan pa srung ba'i phyir te/ 'di gnyis ni sngags dang / phyag rgya la spyod pa rnams la sangs rgya
362a8(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nor bu chen po'i rgya mtsho'i mchod pa'i mchog bka' bzhin byed pa zhes gsung so// sngags dang
362b1(rgyud): phyag rgya spyod pa zhes kyang gsung so// g.yo ba med pa'i nor bu zhes kyang gsungaso// yon tan mtha' yas pa zhes kyang gsung so// dam tshig srung ba po zhes kyang gsung so// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
362b2(rgyud): smon lam 'dzin pa po zhes kyang gsungaso// bstan bsrung ba po zhes kyang gsung so// stobs chen po zhes kyang gsung so// don yod pa 'di la som nyi dang bral bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dngos
362b3(rgyud): sgrib pa la dad pas nan tan du bya'o// 'dir de lta bu'i bstod pa rmad du byung ba gang bdag gis sngon dbyangasu blangs pa de dbyingasu brjod pas de dang 'thun pa'i dngos grub rje su thob par 'gyuraro// 
362b4(rgyud): namas+t+rai ya d+hi kA nAM/ ma hA kris b+h+yaHa sa ma a tsa la/ sa ma tA sI ra/ d+harma Na kA ru Na et+ma ga dza ga tI duHkha hA r-i// a si man+ta/ sar+b+ba gu na sid+d+hi/ sa ma lA/ a tsa lA/ sa ma
362b5(rgyud): bA ra e gra d+harma Ni gas na sa mo pa ma ga ta/ na bid+yA te/ gu na la sha re Na tu ki ta ke pya/ shi me kaM sa d+ha sar+b+ba d+hA sh+tsa ba ra/ sid+d+hi d+hA yiSh+Ta bi ga to// u pa me Shu/ a sa man+ta/ 
362b6(rgyud): sid+d+hi shus ta tAM/ a ma lA/ kA ru Na be ga to/ ud thi ta pre ni d+ha nA/ sid+d+hi ra ni d+har+m+matA/ dza ga to ar+tha sad+ha na pa raM/ a sa maMn+di nI/ sha tA tA bi ri tsi ta ma hA/ kr-i pa At+ma na/ na nai ro d+ha taM kA ru NAM/ 
362b7(rgyud): tsa ra kA/ a tsa la pra dza te kr-i lo kaM/ d+ha ra sid+d+hi d+ha yi ka/ a mI ti a mI te Shu su sa ma pA ti tAM/ ga ti shwa bi/ a ho su d+harmA tA/ tri sa ma ye a gra/ sid+d+hi ba ra d+ha na te/ maM ba ra d+ha na tA a gra ti titi/ 
362b8(rgyud): ta/ sa d+hi sa ka lA/ tri lo ki ba ra d+ha a gra/ sad+ha nA nA a ra thA/ ste yang d+hi kA tI kA/ A nA pro tA/ nA saHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ e mo g+ha e tsi/ a pra ti ha taM/ e hi a tsa lA/ tse Ta a nan tAk+Sha/ 
363a1(rgyud): tiSh+Tha/ tsa rutsa ru/ ta Ti tatiTi/ tAn traT/ big+h+nAn/ g+ha ta ya/ mA ra ya khA da ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ sha tA tA tsa me/ a nu ban+d+ha adz+nyA kA ru/ a sa rbad+ha na a gra kaT+Ta ka Ta/ h+ye
363a2(rgyud): atI bA lA/ e hom gu khi ra \u0f7f/ nAn+dan Ta/ a bi she a bi she/ a tsa la tse Ta sar+b+ba tra a nud ShAr a ka tsa tra Ta tIn+da/ dmangs/ pa~MT phaT+Te/ sehA/ bal po mo gso ba'i snang ba'o/ 
363a3(rgyud): dam tshig gsum bkang ba'i rgyal po chen po las thun mongs gi cho ga rdzog s+ho// / dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las
363a4(rgyud): thun mongs gi tshig rdzogs// rgyu gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Dita dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing nus te gtan
363a5(rgyud): la phab pa'o// / rgyu gar skad du/ ar+yA maHNi bi pu la bi mAn bi shwa su pra tiSh+Tha ta gu h+yan par ma ra ha s+yan kalpa rA dza nA ma d+hA ra Ni / bod skad du/ 
363a6(rgyud): 'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs// 
363a7(rgyud): bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'dus pa dang po
363a8(rgyud): la bdud bye ba pham par mdzad/ dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa thams cad dang / mu stegs can gzhan rnams kyang btul nas pham par mdzad de/ 'khor
363b1(rgyud): ba'i skyon 'khor ba'i chu bo'i pha rol tu gshegs so// gang gi tshe bdud kyi sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma g.yog bdud kyi sde phrag dkrigs pa can dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling ba
363b2(rgyud): bde'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyisas rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ sems can de dag gi 'jigs shing 'jig su rung ba'i sgra yang ma thos shing mtshon cha'i char de dag thams cad kyang me
363b3(rgyud): tog sna tshogs su bab par gyur to// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sum mdo'i dbus de'i sa de yang rdol nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma mdab ma stong pa/ rtsa ba ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i
363b4(rgyud): gser/ sdong bu ni bai DUr+ya/ snying po ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ ze ba ni rdo'i snying po// srid ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du thug pa/ 'od dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ pad+ma de
363b5(rgyud): byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas// de nas pad+ma de las nor bu rdo rje mchog ldan zhes bya ba'i ga zungs kyi bskul ba'i sgra 'di byung // phyogs bcu na bzhugs/ 
363b6(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// oM ma Ni badz+ra hri dra ya badz+ra mA ra saM n+ye bi dra ba ni/ ha na ha na/ badz+ra gar+b+he trA sa ya tA sa ya/ sar+b+ba mA ra ba ba na ni hA hU~M/ 
363b7(rgyud): saMd+ha saM d+ha ra/ bud+d+ha me tri sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ badz+re kalpa a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA// pad+ma de las yang legaso zhes bya ba'i sgra grag ste/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
363b8(rgyud): smras bkang nas/ shAkya thub pa srid pa'i dgon pa las ni brgal/ bdud ni bcom// nyon mongs pa'i rdul ni spangs/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs ni dral/ chos kyi sgron ma chen po ni slar te
364a1(rgyud): gang gi phyir gzungs 'di'i mthus sa rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas bdud 'di bcom pa legaso leg so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje spu zing shes byed cing
364a2(rgyud): lus 'dar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rigs sngags chen mo 'di 'dus pa dang po la 'dzin
364a3(rgyud): bu'i gling du byung lags/ bcom ldan 'das rigs sngags 'di 'jig rten du sngon byung bar ma thos lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag/ 
364a4(rgyud): na rdo rje nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa/ gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
364a5(rgyud): 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/ mtshon cha'i char 'bab pa'/ de yang me tog sna tshogasu gyur te 'bab bo// gzungs 'di 'i mthus bdud kyi 'khor bcom nas srog chags bye ba
364a6(rgyud): btul to// 'di'i mthus sum mdo'i dbus su pad+ma 'di byung bar gyur to// lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di med par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi nus/ bdud bye ba pham par ma yin/ 
364a7(rgyud): nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems par ma yin te/ chos kyi sgron ma spar bar mi nus so// lag na rdo rje ngas dka' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du/ sprad na/ ji srid gzungs 'di mnyan pa dang
364a8(rgyud): mngon par brtson pas brtson 'grus ma byas kyi bar du/ ngas sangs rgyas nyid thob par ma nus kyi/ phyis ngas sangs rgyas nyid tho'o// lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba
364b1(rgyud): yin no// lagan rdo rje 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid yang dag par sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs sgrub pa yin no// lag na rdo rje 'di'i ming bzung bcam gyis de bzhin gshegs
364b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mtshan bzung bar 'gyuraro// brjod cing bzlas pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom
364b3(rgyud): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes me tog sna tshogs dang / dri dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom
364b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs lag tugs nas bcom ldan 'das dal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de na yon tan gyi khyad par ci 'dra ba
364b5(rgyud): dag gda' ba bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag pa'i chos kyi gzhi 'di dag la sa gzhan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam gyis ni sems can
364b6(rgyud): rnams kyi tshogs bsags par mi bgyi lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje sems can de dag ni snyoms las
364b7(rgyud): can brtson 'grus dman pa/ gti mug gis rmongs pa/ 'dod pa'i dregs pas rmongs pa/ yid ches par dka' ba/ par mi 'dzin pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin
364b8(rgyud): pa rigs kyi gtso bo la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ste/ des ni gzung 'di lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur zhing / bsod nams chung ba skal ba chung ba/ blo zhan pa rnams kyis kyang nyan par mi 'gyur/ 'chang
365a1(rgyud): par mi 'gyur zhing / sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzugs 'di la dad pa bskyed par mi 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod
365a2(rgyud): sprin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nga ni 'di nas shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang / mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas
365a3(rgyud): kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba grong khyer gyi kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa'i ra ba rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ 
365a4(rgyud): rgyas pa/ bde ba/ nyams dga' ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / da mi mang pos gang ba/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u da dang / bu mo dang / skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rgyan thams cad
365a5(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa nyid snang zhing nor bu dang / gser 'bar ba'i mgo rgyan sna tshogs kyis mgo brgyan pa/ lha'i gzug sa can mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa/ shes nyen
365a6(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa/ rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pa snang bar yod par 'gro'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de na rgyal po nor bu sna tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ blon po bye ba
365a7(rgyud): phrag brgyad cus yongasu bskor cing / btsun mo dam pa gsol byed ma zhes bya ba bud med nyi khri'i 'khor can lha'i bu mo thams cad kyi lus la 'gran pa zhig yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de na yang
365a8(rgyud): me tog gi shing dang / 'bru'i shing dang / trang chu'i shing dang / dri'i shing gang yin pa thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yino// chu las skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams cad
365b1(rgyud): kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin no// thang las skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi rang bzhin no// mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri thub
365b2(rgyud): te thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon pa dad pa yi no// rgyal po de yang chos dang 'thun pas rgyal srid skyong bar byed kyi chos dang mi 'thun/ 
365b3(rgyud): pas ni ma yin te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa can yi no// 'jig rten gyi khams de na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor
365b4(rgyud): bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba/ rab gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongasu bskor cing / rigs sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang pos yongasu bskor nas sangs
365b5(rgyud): rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni gser/ gyi kha dog gi sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe bya// de bzang po brgyad cu mnga' ba/ 'od 'dom gang gis kun nas
365b6(rgyud): bskor ba/ 'od rin po che sna bdun ltar shin tu dpa' ba yino// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog go lus 'od 'phro ba/ mtshan dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma
365b7(rgyud): gdan la 'dod pa ste/ thams cad kyang spobs pa mi zad pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes spyod yul ba/ rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pas 'di lta ste/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med
365b8(rgyud): khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sems shing gzungs de nyid kyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par 'di byung bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang gzungs 'di
366a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad la rab tu ston to// sems can de rnams kyang gzungs 'di'i mthus bde ba nyams su myong ba ste sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba
366a2(rgyud): dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi ris rnams las yongasu thar par 'gyuraro// ngan song gi sgo thams cad kyang bcad par gyur to// mtho ris kyi sgo rnams bye'o/ 
366a3(rgyud): bde 'gro'i sgo thams cad phye ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhug so// 'jig rten
366a4(rgyud): gyi khams de na sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems kyis gnas te/ 'di lta ste chu dang / 'o ma gcig tu gyur dpa bzhi no// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang sngon byang chub/ 
366a5(rgyud): sems dpar gyur pa na/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba 'di sgrub pa na/ smon lam 'di skad ces/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
366a6(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig/ ces smon lam btab bo// 
366a7(rgyud): gong dag gzungs 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / 'don pa dang / sems dpa' dang / sgrub par byed pa dang / chung ngu na ming nyan par byed dam/ 
366a8(rgyud): lag pas reg gam/ lus la 'chang ngam/ mig gis mthong ba tsam 'am/ glegs bam la bris pa 'am/ ras la bris pa 'am/ rtsig pa la bris pa mthong ma 'tshams med pa lnga byas pa
366b1(rgyud): 'am/ mnar med par gzhol ba 'am/ dam pa'i chos spangs pa 'am/ 'phags pa la bskur ba btab pa 'am/ shan pa'am/ gdol ba 'am/ rngon pa'am/ bya ba 'am/ long ba 'am/ 'on pa
366b2(rgyud): 'am sha bkra can nam/ bkren pa'am/ zhar ba 'am/ sgur po 'am/ smad pa dang / sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i sgrib pa can nam/ myong bar gyur par ma nges pa'am/ bdud kyis zhags
366b3(rgyud): pas bcings pa 'am/ lta ba ngan par lhung ba 'am/ log 'dren gyis zin pa 'am/ rgyu skar dang / gza' gnod par byas pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
366b4(rgyud): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// chung ngu dan dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa ri dgas dang / bya dang / sbrang bu ma chu ring dang / sha sbrang dang / byi ba dang / grog sbur rnams
366b5(rgyud): dang gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs sgro nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal nas skyes pa 'am/ drod gi sher las skyes pa 'am/ brdzus te skyes pa la sogs te/ de dag
366b6(rgyud): thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
366b7(rgyud): kyi tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor de dag thams cad dga' zhing ba spu'i khung bu rnams g.yos par gyur to// lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang
366b8(rgyud): man da ra ba dang / man dar ba chen po'i char yang rab tu bab po// lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byino// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi rang rang gi lus las 'od ce/ 
367a1(rgyud): byung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang brtseg ma bkra ba/ lta na sdug pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ nyams dga' ba/ ka ba bzhi zug
367a2(rgyud): pa sgo bzhi bstod pa/ tham skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ 'od 'bar po/ gre bzhin nor bu rin po che chen po bzhi nyi ma ltar 'od 'bar ba/ nor bu dang / rin po che dang / mu tig gi dra ba du ma spangs pa/ dril
367a3(rgyud): bu mang pos mdzes par byas pa/ dar gyi ba dan mang pos kun nas rgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs du ma'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa zhig byung ngo // sa 'di yang rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos
367a4(rgyud): te 'gul ldeg la sgra 'byin cing mtho ba dang dma' b.ragyur to// lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'od kyis snang / bar byas te lha'i gnas na gnas pa thams cad bskul to// 
367a5(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi yang bskul to// rig sngags 'cha gi gnas thams cad kyang bskul te/ lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig
367a6(rgyud): tu gyur pa dang bar chad byed pa'i log 'dren thams cad sngangs skrag te cho nges 'debs shing phyogs bcur bye ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ 
367a7(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas snang bar byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams bskul nas/ 
367a8(rgyud): slar dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la leg
367b1(rgyud): so zhes bya ba byin te/ bcom ldan 'das legaso leg so// bcom ldan 'das khyod de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma de gzigs pa dang / phyag bgyi ba
367b2(rgyud): dang bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing bzhud pa'i dus la bab kyis bzhud la/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs te yang rgyas pa gson
367b3(rgyud): cig bcom ldan 'das gzungs de ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lag so// gzungs de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags te/ gang la la zhig nyan tam// 
367b4(rgyud): chung ngun ming ngam/ lag pas reg na yang phyir mi ldog pa ngar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de na
367b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ni nga thams cad nas gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das rnams kyis gsol ba btab par thugasu chud
367b6(rgyud): nas/ yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bkye ste/ ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de la bos nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu tshur sheg/ de bzhin gshegs pa
367b7(rgyud): brda byung ba ni 'di yino// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi gdan las bzhengs pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dus su rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri byung nas/ khri de'i steng du rin po che'i pad+ma
367b8(rgyud): bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ sdong po ni gser/ pad+ma'i snying po ni mu tig dmar po can zhig byung ste/ de la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thag tu
368a1(rgyud): sa chen po 'di che thang du g.yos par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang nor bu chen po dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'khor thams cad
368a2(rgyud): dbugs phyung nas/ steng gi na mkha'i dkyil du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khod de 'khor mang po dang / 'khod pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs chen po dang
368a3(rgyud): rnam par sprul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i 'khor dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 
368a4(rgyud): mi dang mi ma yin pa mang po dang / rig sngags 'chang bye/ ba phrag mang po'i 'khor dang / gsang ba'i bad// ga po lag na rdo rje dang thabs gcig tu/ brgya byin dang / 
368a5(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / rgya la po chen po bzhi dang gshegaso// de dag thams rtse da shar phyogs logasu dong ba dang / tshad med pa'i gang
368a6(rgyud): ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das nas nor bu sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su phyin par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das
368a7(rgyud): kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to// 'jig rten gyi khams der byon ma thag tu/ namakha' las babs nas/ bcom ldan
368a8(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab tu gnas gtsang ma de'i drung du gsheg so// der gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa mi mnga' 'am/ bskyod pa yang / 
368b1(rgyud): ngam bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsungs nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma ma dab ma stong pa zhig byin// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang ma 'khor dang bcas
368b2(rgyud): pa bzhugs pa dang / des phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/ zab cing zab pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de yang
368b3(rgyud): par dgyes par mdzad de/ khang pa brtse ga ma de nyid du bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi chos kyis 'khor lo legs par bskor lags sam
368b4(rgyud): khyod kyis bdud dpung dang gzhon par bcas pa bcom la/ gas sam/ khyod kyis chos kyi sgron ma sbar lags sam/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sbrengs lags sam/ chos kyi rnga brdungs
368b5(rgyud): lags sam/ chos kyi dang rab tu bus lags sam/ bcoM/ ma ldan 'das khyod kyis 'jig rten du sangs rgyas la byung / bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa/ mkhyen par bgyis
368b6(rgyud): lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis deng 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo chos kyi gter lan gnyis su bskor mdzad cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu/ 
368b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ 
368b8(rgyud): kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem che ma rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu che mche ma ste/ me tog gi cher chen po rab tu bag/ rdzu 'phrul gyis tshe
369a1(rgyud): 'phrul chen po yang snang / sil snyan rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin/ steng gi na mkha'i bar snang gi lha'i bu rnams kyang / lha'i sil snyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba/ yan lag lnga
369a2(rgyud): pa dag dkrol bar byed/ klu chen po gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs par byed/ dri'i phye ma sna tshogs dang / tsan dan gyi tshe sna tshogs kyi cha
369a3(rgyud): yang 'bebs par byed/ gos sna tshogs dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub sna tshogs kyi char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i mu tig dmar po dang / pug dang / nor bu rin po che chen po rnam par
369a4(rgyud): snang byed dang / nor bu rin po che chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang / chu she ril dang / me shel dang / dpal gyi snying po'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / kun
369a5(rgyud): da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i 'dza ma bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i me tog dang / lha'i dngul/ 
369a6(rgyud): las byung ba'i me tog gi char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i me tog gi phreng ba'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ namakha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang a la la we
369a7(rgyud): sgra snyan par 'byin cing dbyangs kyang rjesu sgrogs par byed/ leg so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par byed/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis su
369a8(rgyud): bskor ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas
369b1(rgyud): pa gsang ba'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo chen mo 'dzam bu'i gling du rab tu spyod par bgyis pa legaso leg so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
369b2(rgyud): nor bu bzang po// rnam par bkra ba/ rab gnas gtsang ma'i mdzod bu nas 'od zer sna tshogs bkye ste/ 'od zer de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
369b3(rgyud): thams cad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bskul cing snang bar mdzad de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang snang bar mdzad/ lha'i gnas thams
369b4(rgyud): cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / dud 'a dgro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha da ma yin gyi ris rnams su yang bskul zhing snang bar mdzad de/ 
369b5(rgyud): slar log nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shA kya thub pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas sla ra yang gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhug so// de nas phyogs
369b6(rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad nas/ 
369b7(rgyud): tshad med pa'i gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gshegs nas so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa
369b8(rgyud): brtsegs ma dag sprul nas khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri dag byung ba de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad
370a1(rgyud): rang rang gi 'khor dang / khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkru ba rab gnas gca
370a2(rgyud): mas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos legs par mchod rang rang gi seng ge'i khri la bzhug so// de nas
370a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan
370a4(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lnga na 'das sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po yang rab tu ga
370a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / 
370a6(rgyud): mi ma lags pa'i 'dus chen po thams cad kyang rab tu gda'/ rigs sngags 'chang gi tshogs 'dus pa chen po yang lhags nas 'di lta ste/ lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po
370a7(rgyud): tshogs kyang lags/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po yang gda' lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba rab tu bstan
370a8(rgyud): pa'i dus ni 'di lag so// tshad ni 'di lagaso zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
370b1(rgyud): rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkrab rab gnas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu song la de bzhin gshegs pa dag
370b2(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gsol ba thob shig dang / des khyod la rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying
370b3(rgyud): po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ 
370b4(rgyud): spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying pos 'di skad ces/  gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal
370b5(rgyud): mod khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba 'dis sems can tha mas cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rab tu bstan tu ga/ sol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
370b6(rgyud): thub pas gsol ba btab par thug su chud nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po song la 'khor mang po 'di'i dbus kyi sa phyogasu rdo rjes sa la bsnun cig
370b7(rgyud): de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/ 'khor gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus gang na ba der song nas sa phyogs de la rdo rjes bsnun te/ 
370b8(rgyud): sa la bsnun ma thag tu de nas gru bzhir gas so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// g.yos ma thag tu sa phyogs der rin po che sna
371a1(rgyud): // bdun gyi khang brtseg ma// gru bzhi pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ sgo bzhi btod pa/ mnyam pa/ nyams dga' ba/ shin tu rnam par bye ba/ chas mdzes par byas pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ 'od 'a
371a2(rgyud): pa them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad gsum yod pa/ rgyar dpag tshad lnga yod pa zhig byung ngo // khang pa rtseg ma'i dbus der yang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i mchod rten nor
371a3(rgyud): bu dang / rin po che dang / mu tig gi dra ba du mas rgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ dril bu du ma 'phyang du bcug pa/ dar gyi chun po du mas mdzes par
371a4(rgyud): byas pa/ me tog gi chun po du mas mngon par rgyan pa zhig byung ngo // mchod rten de'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhug so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
371a5(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyis khang pa brtsegs ma de la mchod pa ma dzid de/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de yang / khang pa rtsig pa de dang / mchod rten la mchod par byed/ rjed par byed// 
371a6(rgyud): me tog dang / gdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / phyag 'tshal bar byed do// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gno/ 
371a7(rgyud): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor mang po de dag ngo mtshar skyes te/ ya mtshan du gyur/ spro bar gyur
371a8(rgyud): nes khang pa brtsegs ma dang / mchod rten 'di ci'i phyir byung bar gyur zhes/ ca co dang gzhi'i sgra mthon por 'byin cing / mchod rten dang khang pa rtseg ma de la bskor ba byed mchod par byed// 
371b1(rgyud): rjed par byed/ me tog dang / gdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis mchod par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / 
371b2(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas 'khod de/ phyag 'tshal bar byed do// de nas khang pa brtsegs ma de las sgra byung ba/ kye 'khor mang po dag par snang la ci snang ltos
371b3(rgyud): shig ltos shig/ de nas ji ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis bar snang la bltas te/ bltas ma thag tu bai DUr+ya dang / nor bu rin po che chen po las byung ba'i sprin gyi phung po
371b4(rgyud): chen po zhig byung ngo // de nas sprin gyi phung po'i steng du nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yi ge gser gyi
371b5(rgyud): dog tu bris pa mthong ngo // na mkha'i dkyil de nyid nas sgra byA nga ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad nor/ bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas
371b6(rgyud): pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs klag tu gsol klag tu gsol/ sgra byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar sprin gyi phung po la bris pa byung nas/ 'di skad ces kyang dbyangs su
371b7(rgyud): sgrog so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshalo// phyag 'tsha lo// mchod rten mchog 'di sgo phye shig/ mchod rten de'i dbus su ni de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku gzhugs
371b8(rgyud): te/ de'i mthus tshe 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa'i khyad par chen po 'ong sdang shing de kho na'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa yang snang / ni bu chen sa
372a1(rgyud): rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang cho ga dang rig sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad dang bcas pa
372a2(rgyud): mtha' dag rdzogs shing rgyas par 'khor gyi dbus su legs par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ro// de nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/ 
372a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsung so// bcom ldan 'das mchod rten rin po che 'di dang / 'di na bzhugs pa 'di
372a4(rgyud): lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal po me tog rgyal ma chen dang / nor bu rnam par bkra ba dang / rdo rje 'phags pa'i rgyal po
372a5(rgyud): zhes bya ba de dag bstan pa'i skabs dbye bar mdzod cig/ de na sa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos/ khang pa brtsegs
372a6(rgyud): ma'i mchod rten gang na ba der bzhud de/ phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis rgyan pa brkyang nas/ mchod rten mchog de'i sgo'i sgo 'phar phye ste/ de bzhin
372a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku rnams bstan to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa leg so leg so// deng khyod
372a8(rgyud): kyi 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor ro// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri 'di nyid le bzhugs shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mchod rten gyi nang du khri/ 
372b1(rgyud): de nyid la bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag khang pa
372b2(rgyud): brtsegs ma'i mchod rten gyi nang du ci'i phyir byung / gang nas ni gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lag na rdo rje// sngon byung ba bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med pa/ dpag
372b3(rgyud): tu med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ gzhal gyis mi lang pa/ tshad gzung du med pa/ tshes grangs med pa na/ gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / 
372b4(rgyud): skye bo dang mi mang pos gang zhing ma rmos pa/ btab pa'i 'bras das lu byung ste/ bdag gi ba med cing yongasu bzung ba me da de/ 'jig rten thams cad bde ba dang ldan pa de'i tshe/ 'dzam bu'i
372b5(rgyud): gling na sangs rgyas med do// de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po rin po che ri bo zhes bya ba de la dang song gsum zhig gnas te/ ga cig gi ming ni nor bu'i gtsug tor/ gnyis pa'i ming ni gser
372b6(rgyud): gyi gtsug tor// gsum pa'i ming ni rdo rje'i gtsug tor zhes bya ste/ de rnams bdag cag ji ltar sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
372b7(rgyud): pa'i byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur snyam zhing // gcig tu sangs rgyas yid la byed/ chos yid la byed/ dge 'dun yid la byed/ de nas drang srong de rnams de snyam du bsams nas/ 
372b8(rgyud): yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar gyur cing sems pa na/ de rnams kyis sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i byams pa/ rnam par bkra ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin tho/ 
373a1(rgyud): cing / lha'i mig skyes pa nas ji tsam na steng du bltas na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bar sdang la sgra 'byin pa/ skyes bu ngam padag legs leg so// khyed 'di lta ste/ sgra
373a2(rgyud): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni leg so// kye skyes bu dam pa dag nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas par gsang ba sngon
373a3(rgyud): gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du gsungs pa thos pa tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/ 
373a4(rgyud): bar thob par 'gyur/ chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ gzu dngas kyi sgo thams cad mngon du 'gyur// bdud tham das cad las rgyal bar 'gyur/ chos thams cad kyi sgron ma
373a5(rgyud): spor bar 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur 8/ dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
373a6(rgyud): 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi chos rnams las yongasu thar par 'gyur// skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
373a7(rgyud): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongasu thar par 'gyur ba thob nas phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na sems can gang dag par mi 'dzin pa dang
373a8(rgyud): mar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / mi dge ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la bskur ba 'debs pa dang / mnar med par
373b1(rgyud): gzhol ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sgru ba dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / bram ze gsod pa dang / ba lang gsod pa dang / chom rkun
373b2(rgyud): byed pa dang / g.yon can dang / sho gam dgugs pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par spyod pa dang / phra ma smra ba dang / gzhal ba la rgyu byed pa dang / 
373b3(rgyud): gzhal blugs la sgyu byed pa dang / srang la sgyu byed pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / gtams pa bsnog pa dang / bshes pa lo 'khu ba dang / sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa zin pa dag 'byung
373b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad gzungs 'di'i 'thus/ thos pa tsam 'am/ bklags pa tsam 'am/ kun chub dpar byas pa 'am/ lus la thogs sam/ bris nas 'chang
373b5(rgyud): ngam/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la 'dogs sam/ glegs bam du byed dam/ ras la bris pa 'am/ dar la bris pa 'am/ rtsig pa la bris pa 'am/ ra ba la bris pa 'am/ chung ngu na sgra
373b6(rgyud): nyan pa 'am/ lag pas reg gam/ grib mas phog gam/ sems can gzhan gyis reg na yang / de dag thams cad gdon mi za bar phyir mi ldog par gyur nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
373b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la yang yon tan brgya stong mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyuraro// sdig pa thams cad dbral bar 'gyur
373b8(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ bdud thams cad mthar byed par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'o su 'gyur// 
374a1(rgyud): rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po dang / btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ dge sbyong dang bram ze thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar
374a2(rgyud): 'os par 'gyur/ rtag tu lag pa dang rkang pa gzhon sha can 'gyur/ tshig mnyen zhing snyan par 'gyur/ bkren par mi 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar mi 'gyur/ lus la
374a3(rgyud): dug gis mi tshugs te/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ me yis ma yin/ chus ma yin/ de la gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs te/ mi rgod kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa
374a4(rgyud): ma yin/ kla klo'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ lam dang lam gol dba'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa das ma yin/ 'byung po'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ srin po'i 'jig
374a5(rgyud): bas ma yin/ sha za'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pas ma yin te/ sbrul gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / lus la rims kyis mi tshugs te/ zhag gcig pa
374a6(rgyud): 'am zhag gnyis pa 'am/ zhag gsum pa 'am/ zhag bzhi pa 'am/ rtag pa'i rims sam/ rims thamam cad kyis lus la mi tshugs par 'gyur/ mig gis nad mi 'byung ste/ rna ba'i nad ma yin/ 
374a7(rgyud): sna'i nad ma yin/ lce'i nad ma yin// kha'i nad ma yin/ so'i nad ma yin/ mchu'i nang ma yin/ 'grin pa'i nad ma yin/ rna bar zug pa ma yin/ lag pa'i nang ma yin/ rgyab kyi nad ma yin/ chu so'i
374a8(rgyud): nid ma yin/ gzhang 'brum gyi nang ma yin/ gcin nadang ma yin/ 'khru ba'i nad ma yin/ shu ba'i nang ma yin/ brla'i nang ma yin/ byin pa'i nang ma yin/ rkang pa'i nang ma yin/ nad thams cad ni
374b1(rgyud): 'byung 'o// 'di lta ste/ bas blags dang / ldog pa dang / me dpal dang / ljon pa dang / gastan pa dang / phol srig dang / khyi jo dang / mdze dang / rkang shu la sogs pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'byu
374b2(rgyud): klad ban pa ma yin/ gzhog phyed na ba ma yin/ long bar mi 'gyur/ zhar bar ma yin/ sgur po ma yin/ pha rol gyi mthus 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ 'on par mi 'gyur/ sha bkra can du mi 'gyur/ 
374b3(rgyud): brnyas shing gnas par mi 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag chos dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i tshe na yang spobs pa mi zad par 'gyur/ sems 'khrugs pas dus
374b4(rgyud): byed par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad na/ dal mngon sum du bstan nas dbugs 'byin pa mdza/ dad par 'gyur/ lus la byad dang / g.yengs byed kyis mi tshugs
374b5(rgyud): lus la sngags kyi sbyor bas mi tshugs/ bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur/ rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas brgya stong mthong bar 'gyur/ de
374b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs po byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur te/ gsang ba'i gzungs kyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu 'byung zhes smra ba mthong
374b7(rgyud): ngo // de nas drang srong de rnams chos kyi dga' ba snying la reg cing spro ba thob nas/ mar gsar gyi gong bu bzhu ba bzhin du lus zhig nas/ zhu ba'i khu ba de sa'i nang du thim mo// de nas sa gzhi de las
374b8(rgyud): smag ma'i mde'u gser gyi kha dog can rtsa ba rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ lo ma gser las byas pa/ rtse mo mu tig las byas pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ stobs dang ldan pa/ gzi brji
375a1(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ dri zhim pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba gsum skyeso// smyug ma'i mde'u de rnams zla ba bcu lon pa dngags te/ de rnams kyi dbus nas khye'u gzugs bzang po
375a2(rgyud): mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa gsum byung ngo // de nas khye'u de rnams phyogs de nyid du de'i drung na skying mo krung bcas te sgom zhing 'khod do// ji tsam na zhag
375a3(rgyud): bdun lon pa'i nyin mo byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te gser gyi kha dog gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras
375a4(rgyud): pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis kun nas rgyan par gyur to// smag ma 'i mde'u de rnams kyang khang pa rtsog mar gyur to// nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu
375a5(rgyud): gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di yang na mkha' la ga/ ser gyi yi ger snang ngo // rgyal po chen po bzhi yang steng na gdugs 'dzin cing me tog gi gtor te/ 'di skad
375a6(rgyud): ces/ 'jig rten du sangs rgyas byung ngo // zhes dbyangs su sgrog cing / 'di lta ste/ klu'i bdag po rgyal po chen po gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba dang / grul bum gyi bdag po rgyal po nor bu'i snying po
375a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba pa dang / brang 'gro'i bdag po rgyal po nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rgyal po chen po nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bcom
375a8(rgyud): ldan 'das de la mchod pa byed do// sa phyogs de yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur to// me tog gi shing thams cad kyang rin po'i rang bzhin du gyur to// lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus kyi
375b1(rgyud): tshe/ drang song smyug ma'i mde'u rnams las byung ba byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam du de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lag na rdo rje
375b2(rgyud): ngag ni khang pa brtsegs ma'i mchod rten gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag yino// sa phyogs kyang 'di yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'di yino// smyug ma'i mde'u'i khang pa rtsegs ma yang / 
375b3(rgyud): 'di yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa yang 'di yin no// de rnams drang srong du gyur pa na gzungs 'di thos pa tsam 'am/ snying po sems la bsgoms pa tsam gyis drang srong gi
375b4(rgyud): lus spangs nas/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya so// lag ni rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus kyi na mkha'i dkyi/ dal na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzungs 'di'i
375b5(rgyud): yon tan gyi khyad par bsngags pa smra ba gang yin pa de gzha na zhig yin snyam na/ de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhan
375b6(rgyud): gyur to// lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus na gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba gang gis drang srong de rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams la bkur sti dang / rim gro byas pa gang yin pa de gzhan
375b7(rgyud): zhig yin snyam na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab tu gnas pa
375b8(rgyud): 'di gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i rim gro bar gyur pa na/ de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin
376a1(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la legaso zhes bya ba byin to// shAkya thub pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di 'dra bas sngon gyi
376a2(rgyud): sbyor ba gsungs shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di yang dag par bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gzungs 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa thad
376a3(rgyud): kyi yum de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying
376a4(rgyud): por gshegs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha dmas cad kyi rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri la gshegs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul
376a5(rgyud): gyi cho 'phrul gyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa'i gas nga ga/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi
376a6(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'i dgongs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i gnas kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs
376a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer bye ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i
376a8(rgyud): mtha'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi seMs
376b1(rgyud): kyi rgyun gyi gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas kyis thams cad la rab tu 'god pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin rtogs par thug su drung pa'i gas
376b2(rgyud): pa sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i gsang ba 'di gsungs pa leg so leg so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ dgangs pa dang ldan
376b3(rgyud): zhing mkhyen bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gzigs nas/ 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan
376b4(rgyud): dang shel dang / dngul gyi mdog dag bkye ste/ de rnams 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su dong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/ de bzhin ga
376b5(rgyud): pa thams cad bskul nas/ slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ dbu'i gtsug tor gyi gseb du zhug so// 'od zer de dag zhugs ma thag tu/ bcom
376b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs chen pos bkang nas/ rig sngags chen po 'di gsung so// oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta ma Ni sha ta dIp+ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa li/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ ma Ni mai Ne ma hA ma Ni ta thA ga hr-id
376b7(rgyud): da ya ma Ni swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu ri dang tshal dang nags tshal du bcas pa'i sa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// sangs rgyas bcom
376b8(rgyud): ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa khyod kyis mchog tu gsungs pa ni legs par gsungs te legaso legs// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las
377a1(rgyud): kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i sprin chen po na mkha'i dkyil du chag so// phyogs bcu kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyi char bab bo// tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye
377a2(rgyud): ma'i char yang bab bo// u dum pa ra'i me tog gi char yang bab bo// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ gzhan yang me tog sna tshogs pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / 
377a3(rgyud): dri ngang ldang pa dang / mnad ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / me tog mdog mdzes pa dang / mdog mdzes pa chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / yid 'ong dang / pa ri sha ka dang / me
377a4(rgyud): tog tsam pa ka'i char dag bab po// bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu 'bar bar gyur te bdud kyi rigs kyi lha bdams cad skrag cing spangs par gyur to// bgegs dang / log
377a5(rgyud): 'dren thams cad kyi lus rdul cing lus dri mi zhim par gyu ra nas phyogs bcur rab tu 'bros par brtsam so// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang dag
377a6(rgyud): yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis kyang rang rang gi gzhal med kha
377a7(rgyud): rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phul lo// de nas nor bu rab srung sems la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong nor bu dang rin po che sna tshog
377a8(rgyud): thogs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su mchod pa byed do// de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma ras bcos bu'i gos brgya
377b1(rgyud): stong gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed// rgyal po chen po bzhi yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du ma me tog sna tshogs dang bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa pa/ 
377b2(rgyud): phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bye'o// tshangs pa la sogs te tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / brgya byin la
377b3(rgyud): sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi res kyi lha'i bu brgya stong dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la brtson par byed do// de bzhin du sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang
377b4(rgyud): po dang / gang ba bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha la sogs pa yang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba yang na mkha'i dkyil nas bcom ldan 'das la
377b5(rgyud): mchod pa byed do// dpal lha mo chen mo dang / lha mo chen ma dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo dung can ma dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma yang 'khor brgya stong dang / 
377b6(rgyud): lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma dang / rdo rje nag mo dang / me tog so dang / lha mo chen mo pho nya mo dag kyang rang rang gi gzhal med khang rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// 
377b7(rgyud): dri za'i ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dag kyang sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa brgya stong bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson pas dkrol bar bye'o// klu'i rgyal po brgya stang
377b8(rgyud): brag dum 'dus pa 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / chu lha dang / shin tu rab gnas dang / gtsugan nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po rnam pa
378a1(rgyud): nas rdzogs pa'i 'od dag kyang rin po che nor bu skar 'od sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// 'khor chen po yang 'dus par gyur to// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
378a2(rgyud): rgyal po chen po de yang blon po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / btsun mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas shing / bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang bas yongasu bskor te mdun gyis
378a3(rgyud): blta so// sa de yang rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur to// de nas 'khor chen po de nyid kyi dbus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la rtol nas rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma mdab ma stong pa zhig byung ste/ pad+ma
378a4(rgyud): de'i steng du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa/ mu khyud dang bcas pa/ lte bo dang bcas dang/ lhag pa'i 'od 'phro ba nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba zhig byung
378a5(rgyud): de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi kha mas snang bar byas nas/ 'khor lo de'i lte ba'i nang / nas sgra byung ba/ shAkya thub pa gang 'di 'dra ba'i gzungs kyi
378a6(rgyud): gsang ba rnams gsung ba ni legaso legs so// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po// byang chub chen po'i snying por gshegs pa'i rig sngags de bzhin gshegs pa tham
378a7(rgyud): cad kyi rig sngags kyi snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di/ bcom ldan 'das yang gsungs shig/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med
378a8(rgyud): khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya bar gsungs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba'i snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams// 
378b1(rgyud): cang bskul cing / 'khar gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang pa gsung ba'i dus ni 'di lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sa sa rgyas/ 
378b2(rgyud): nyid sgrub pa'i rtsa ba/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyi mtsho skems pa/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las nges par 'byin pa lags 'di ni chu bo chen po las sgrol pa
378b3(rgyud): lags te/ gzungs 'di ma mchis par sangs rgyas nyid sgrub par rngo mi thogs lag so// 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis bon lags/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lags
378b4(rgyud): 'di ni chos kyi sgron ma spong ba// lags/ 'di ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba lags/ 'di ni chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa lags/ 'di ni chos kyi
378b5(rgyud): rdung ba lags/ 'di ni chos kyi seng ge'i khri la mchis pa lag sa te/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis cho gzhib mo 'i rgyal po chen po 'di'i dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor cho ga
378b6(rgyud): dang bcas pa/ gsang ba dang bcas pa/ phyag rgya'i le'u dang bcas pa/ ras bcos bu zung dang bcas pa/ yo byad dang bcas pa'i cho ga legs par rgyas par gsungs shig/ de nas lha dang / klu
378b7(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor 'dus pa rnams ya mtshan du gyur/ spro bar gyur nas// 
378b8(rgyud): thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta zhing 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba yang dag pa 'di dang / gsol ba btab pa gnas
379a1(rgyud): nas rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di rgyas par bka' stsal to// bskul ba'i le'u ste cho ga dang po'o// / 'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i
379a2(rgyud): gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba dam pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po gnyis pa// de nas sdig pa kun ni sel byed pa'i rig
379a3(rgyud): sngags lus kyi dri ma med byed pa// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med pa yi// cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po dge bar bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// oM bi pu la gar+b+he/ 
379a4(rgyud): ma Ne pra b+he/ ta thA ga ta ni rde sha ne/ ma Ni ma Ni/ su pra b+haM/ bi maHrale sA ga ra gam+b+hI re/ hUM hU dzA la dzA la/ bud+d+ha bi lo ki te/ guh+ya a d+hiSh+Thi ta gar+b+he swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis noH/ 
379a5(rgyud): bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas/ pa gsang ba dam pa'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/ na/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rin po che'i
379a6(rgyud): char chen po bab par gyur to// me tog gi char chen po bab po// 'khor thams cad kyang 'dus te/ thams cad kyis ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra phyung nas thams cad sa bcu la gnas par gyur
379a7(rgyud): te/ thams cad dge ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis shAkya thub pa la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa gang byang chub
379a8(rgyud): kyi snying por 'gro ba'i gzungs 'di lta bu gsungs pa leg so leg so// thos pa tsam gyi mdo la sdig pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di dran pas de bzhin
379b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la lha'i na bza' dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang byug pas mchod par 'gyuro// bklags pa tsam gyi mod la phyir mi ldog par gyur nas bla na me
379b2(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa bskal pa'am/ 
379b3(rgyud): bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa steng ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong du yang brjod par mi spyod de/ de ltar gzungs phan yon che ba lag so// bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyi bar chad bya ba
379b4(rgyud): mi nus te/ bgegs kyis bya bar ma yin/ phyir rgol bsam yin/ mi mdza' bas ma yin/ 'byung pos ma yin// don gyis ma yin// gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/ srin pos
379b5(rgyud): ma yin/ mi dang mi ma yin pas bklags rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ lan gcig dran pa tsam gyis kyang de ltar yon tan gyi
379b6(rgyud): phan yon mang por 'gyur na/ shin tu bya ba mang po byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das ga
379b7(rgyud): la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sems can de rnams srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyang
379b8(rgyud): par bgyi'o// spro bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ byang chub
380a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhag nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de rnams la dbugs phyung ste/ ngas gzungs 'di btang ngo do// sems can de
380a2(rgyud): de yang btad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di dang / sems can yongasu brkyang ba'i slad du yongasu gzung lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzung
380a3(rgyud): kyi snying po bka' stsal pa/ oM ma Ni badz+re hUM/ 'di ni snying po'o// oM ma Ni d+ha ri hUM phaT nye ba'i snying po'o// rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyi cho ga ni/ tshes grangs ma yin rgyu skar min/ srung ba yang ni bya
380a4(rgyud): mi dgos// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sam/ mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i// drung du bzlas pa rjod 'ba' zhig khri byas nas tshwas bco lnga'i zla ba nyal
380a5(rgyud): shin tu khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i drang du ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas te/ mar me bani dbul bar bya/ dri dang ma
380a6(rgyud): tog la sogs pa yang dbul bar bya'o// zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// mchod rten la bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de nyid kyi drung du
380a7(rgyud): nyal na/ nam langs kyi dus tshun chad de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje yang mthong bar 'gyu ro// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// 
380a8(rgyud): gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro// gal te 'tshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa zhig yin na yang des dus gsum du bsgrubs na gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyu ro// som nyi dang yid gnyis
380b1(rgyud): bskyed par mi bya'o/ nang par langs te bzlas brjod brgyan brgyad byas na dan thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ de'i lus la dug gyis rmugs par mi 'gyur / sbyor ba ngan pas ma mi su hA/ 
380b2(rgyud): yis ma yin/ me yis ma yin/ chom rkun gyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur te/ lus la nad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur/ dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyuraro// de'i lus la nad mi 'byung ste/ mi
380b3(rgyud): nad ma yin/ sna nad ma yin/ lce nad ma yin/ rna ba'i nad ma yin/ so nad ma yin/ klad nad ma yin/ yan lag dang nying lag gi nad ma yin/ rims ma yin te/ zhag gcig pa 'am/ zhig gnyis
380b4(rgyud): pa 'am/ zhag gsum pa 'am/ zhag bzhi pas lus la tshug das par mi 'gyuraro// sbrul gyi 'jigs pa ma yin zhing / ga can zan khro bo'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ lus la byung
380b5(rgyud): kyis tshugs par mi 'gyu ro// gzungs 'di ni yon tan de bu dang ldan pa yin te/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa yin/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig
380b6(rgyud): par byed pa yin/ yon tan thams cad grub par byed pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par byed pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid grub par byed pa yin te/ gzungs
380b7(rgyud): 'di ni bklags pas grub pa ste las thams cad byed do// ri khar 'dzegs te bzlas brjod byas na mig gis gang du bltas pa der sems can rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ 
380b8(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba thams cad kyang thar par 'gyuraro// lha khang du zhugs te bzlas brjod byas na lha thams cad des ci bsgo/ 
381a1(rgyud): pa bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas su zhugs te bzlas brjod byas na klu rnams dbang du 'gyuraro// nyi ma la kha bltas te bzlas brjod byas na nyi ma mngon sum du babs nas
381a2(rgyud): mdun na 'dug cing mchog ci smras pa de sbyin par byed do// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na mchog thams cad ster cing mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// shu dag la sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
381a3(rgyud): nas de zos nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyuraro// ci smras pa de sbyin par byed do// na le sham gyi 'bru la lan bdun bzlas te khar
381a4(rgyud): bcug na ci smras pa ster bar byed cing dbang du 'gyuro//  dngas kar la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te na mkha'/ la gtor na rlung dang ser ba thams cad bkag par 'gyur// 
381a5(rgyud): lan tshul lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te bram ze rnams la byin na/ gang dang gang gi lan tshwa zos pa de dang de khra na dbang du 'gyuraro// rgyal rigs dbang du byan/ yungs kar
381a6(rgyud): gyis sbyin bsreg bya'o// gu gul la sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gang dang gang gi gdon la bdugs na de dang de nyid la 'bar bar 'gyur// gdugs na gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur
381a7(rgyud): char mi 'bab pa'i tshe klu'i gzugs byas te gnas gru bzhi byas la/ bser mo'i lci bas klu mgo gsum pa byas la/ snying khar gser gyis glan par bya'o// lus ni li khris byug par bya'o// 
381a8(rgyud): gnas kyi gzhi ni sngon pos bsku bar bya'o// gnas gru bzhi ni shing pa la sha ltar kha dog sngon por bya'o// bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o// bog por bzhi bzhag par bya'o// bum pa bani
381b1(rgyud): bzhag par bya ste/ gcig ni 'om/ gcig ni 'o// gcig ni 'o thug/ gcig ni zhun mar bu ram can no// ba'i lci bas gling bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// grwa bzhi ru byes pad+ma bri bar
381b2(rgyud): bya'o// mda' bzhi gcugs la mtshon skud sna lngas bskor bar bya'o// tshen sna lnga'i ba dan gdags par bya'o// bdug pa bzhi po gu gul dang / lce dpog dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka bsreg par
381b3(rgyud): bya'o// sa bon bdun gtor bar bya'o// kha dog lnga'i gtor ma bzhag par bya'o// 'bras bu dang / me tog bzhag par bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa kha shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas rig
381b4(rgyud): sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs ka ra re re nas spyi dpor brdeg par bya'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang par bzlas na/ de nas klu rnams char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed do// klu tham
381b5(rgyud): cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// yungs kar la bzlas brjod bya sa te klu'i mtshe'u ru gtor na/ char gyi rgyun 'beb/ sa par byed do// seng sdeng gi phur pa la bzlas brjod byas te
381b6(rgyud): klu'i gnas su btsugs na rlung dang ser ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur/ yungs kar la brgyan grangs yang byas te log 'dren gyi klad par btab na log 'dren thams cad bcings par
381b7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// 'o mas bkrus na phyis sos par 'gyu ro// las gang dang gang kho na bya ba'i las de dang de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya te/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i rig sngag
381b8(rgyud): kyi cho ga'i tshul yin no// gnyis pa'o// da ni snying po'i las rnams 'byung ste/ bzlas brjod 'bum byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyuraro// nyis 'bum byas na sangs
382a1(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// sum 'bum byas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyu ro// gsang sngags thams cad grub par 'gyu ro// bzhi 'bum
382a2(rgyud): byas na rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// lnga 'bum byas na lha ma yin gyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyuraro// klu'i gnas thams cad 'byed par 'gyuraro// drug 'bum
382a3(rgyud): byas na gter thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod bdun 'bum byas na tshe rabs thams cad dran par 'gyuraro// bzlas brjod brgyad 'bum byas na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin
382a4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod dgu 'bum byas na byang / chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzlas/ 
382a5(rgyud): brjod sa ya byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin ga she gas pa thams cad dang phrad par 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa gong
382a6(rgyud): nas gong du yon tan khyad par thob par 'gyu ro// mtshams med pa lnga byis pa 'am/ 'phags pa la bskur ba btab pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spangs pa 'am/ mnar med par gzhol ba yang
382a7(rgyud): rung / de dag thams cad kyis bzlas brjod 'bum byas na/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ skye ba dran par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
382a8(rgyud): kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// mig rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba rnam par dag pa dang / sna rnam par dag pa dang / lce rnam par dag pa dang / dbang po yongasasu dag pa thob par 'gyur te/ de ltar gong
382b1(rgyud): nas gong du yon tan gyi khyad par dang / gong nas gong du lus rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi dngos grub tu bya ba rnams 'grub par 'gyuraro// de kho na grub pa bla na
382b2(rgyud): med pa ldong ros la bsgrub pa bshad do// shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ zas dkar gsum bza' bas ldong ros blangs te zangs kyi snod kyi nang du bzhag nas/ sangs
382b3(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshes bcu gsum nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du bzlas brjod 'bum byas na/ de nas rnam pa gsum 'grub par rig par bya ste/ gal te nag por gyur na
382b4(rgyud): dpral ba la thig le bya'o// des ni mi snang ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi sgo thams cad du 'jug par 'gyu ro// gnas thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ gang 'dod
382b5(rgyud): pa byed par 'gyur ro// gal te dud pa byung na des mig/ bsku bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ lag na rdo rje'i gnas
382b6(rgyud): thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ nor dang 'bru thams cad rnyed par 'gyur te gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'bar bar gyur na na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyura'abar ba'i
382b7(rgyud): sgron ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ lha'i gnas su sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur/ gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur/ ri'i rtse mor
382b8(rgyud): 'dzegs te bzlas brjod 'bum byas na 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor 'gyur/ gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad ci bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// 
383a1(rgyud): mtshor zhugs te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bus na klu thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// yungs kar blangs nas sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas namakha' la gtor nam
383a2(rgyud): chen po 'bab par 'gyur// klu thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyuro// bum pa chus bkang ste hab shang che'u dang / shing pa la sha dang / 
383a3(rgyud): yungs kar dang / gur gum dang / tsan dan rnams lhan cig bum pa der blugs la bzlas brjod khri byas pas nad chen po thebs pa bkrus na nad thams cad med par 'gyur/ nad tham
383a4(rgyud): cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ de'i sdig pa thams cad kyi dang 'jig par 'gyur/ byad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ dpal thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// mdze'i nang
383a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis thebs pa bkrus na/ mdze nad las yongasu thar par 'gyuraro// sha bkra'i nad kyis thed sa pa yang bkrus na sha bkra'i nad las yongasu thar par 'gyuro/ 
383a6(rgyud): bud med bu 'dod pa rnams des khrus byas na/ bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// dngos gru ba med pa khrus byas na dngos grub chen po thob par byed do// de la sogs pa gong nas gong du 'jig rten gyi dngos
383a7(rgyud): grub tu bya ba rnams kyang grub par 'gyu ro// gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur ro// nye ba'i snying po'i las rnams 'byung ste/ bzlas brjod 'bum byas na/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad
383a8(rgyud): rkang pa la gtugs nas/ kye rig pa 'dzin pa bdag cag skyobs shig/ bdag cag gi srog chud ma gsan cig dang / bka' ci stsal ba de bgyi'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod
383b1(rgyud): nyi khri chig stong byas na lha thams cad dang / klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur// rig sngags thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur/ ci bsgo bde byed par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod sum khri byas na 'byung po
383b2(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod lnga khri byas na gang dgug pa de khugs par 'gyur te/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ na mkha' lding ngam/ 
383b3(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang / lha ma yin dang / rig 'dzin nam/ bud med dam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ sa bdag gam/ blon po 'am/ btsun mo'am/ khrom gyi ru ba 'am/ mdun na 'don nam/ gzhan
383b4(rgyud): yang sems can sna tshogs khugs par 'gyur ro// gu gul da dang / nyungs kar gyi sbyin sreg drug khri byas na dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// bdun khris ni rig 'dzin
383b5(rgyud): gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// brgyad khris ni la/ ga na rdo rje 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa mdun na sdod par 'gyur ro// dgu khris ni byang chub sems dpa' thams
383b6(rgyud): cad kyi dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// 'bum tshang bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu khyed gsang sngags thams cad dang bstan bcos thams
383b7(rgyud): cad 'grub kyis gang 'dod pa der song shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pas phyir mi ldog cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
383b8(rgyud): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gnang gis/ 'jig rten pa 'am 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa gzhan dag kyang ci 'dod pa bzhin khyod kyis
384a1(rgyud): las thams cad byos shig ces ston par 'gyur// oM ma Ni kuN+Da li hUM hU~M phaT swAhA// gdan gyi sngags so// oM ma Nibi dza ye d+ha rA hU phaT swA hA// dkyil 'khor gyi sngags / 
384a2(rgyud): yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas paso// oM dza li ta ma Ni ru tsi rA gri Ni hUM hUM phaT/ yungs kar dang dri chu ba sres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ phyogs bzhir bcing ngo // oM ma Ni pra/ 
384a3(rgyud): b+hA ba ti ha na ha na hUM phaT swA hA/ thal ba dang chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas log 'dren bcing ngo // oM badz+ra ma Ni tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ lan bdun bzlas te gtsug tor bcing // oM ma
384a4(rgyud): Ni bi pu le di ri di ro hUM phaT/ gos kyi sngagaso// oM bi du ma tiHda ra ha ra ma Ni hUM hUM phaT/ nye reg gi sngags so// oM su niH/ laM pa ti ha ra ha ra pA pa mi li mi li hUM hUM phaT swAhA// yungs
384a5(rgyud): ka ra la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te khrus bya'o// oM ma Ni d+ha re hUM hUM phaT/ gsang gtor gyi sngag so// oM di ri di ri/ bi ma la ka ri hUM hUM phaT/ mchod phyi ri thogs kyi sngagaso// 
384a6(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa ma Ni hUM hUM phaT/ me tog gi sngagaso// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ti ga d+ha ma Ni s+pha ra Na hUM hUM phaT/ dri'i sngagaso// oM dza li ta ma Ni a pra ba ra kU Ta gA ra s+pha ra Na bi ga te hUM/ bdug
384a7(rgyud): pa'i sngagaso// oM dz+wa li ta shi kha ri ta pa li hUM hUM phaT/ mar me'i sngagaso// oM pra bar gri ba li sa ra si ra hUM hUM/ gtor ma'i sngag so// oM ma hA ma Ni pU ra ya d+ha ra d+ha ra huM hUM phaT/ mchod yin gyi sdug
384a8(rgyud): so/ oM ma hA bi ma le hUM hUM ba ra ba ra hUM/ lha bshos kyi sngagaso// oM dz+wa la s+phu ra da ga ga na pra ta ra Ni hU~M n+du/ sbyin bsreg gi sngagaso// oM ru tsi ra ma Ni pra brta ya hU~M/ bgrang breng gi sngags so// 
384b1(rgyud): sngags 'di lan bdun bgrang phreng la btab ste bzlas brjod byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags de dag thams cad bzlas par 'gyur zhing / bye ba
384b2(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma yang bzlas par yang 'gyu ro// oM badz+ra ma Ni ka ra ki ka ri hUM hUM phaT/ skyil mo krung gi sngags so// oM su pra brti ta be ge ma Ni ma Ni swA hA// bzlas brjod kyi sdug/ 
384b3(rgyud): so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta thA yu dza be ta ra ta ra hA ma ni kan ne swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul ba'i sngagaso// oM su bi bul ba re du ru du ru tsU hUM/ spyan drang ba'i sngagaso// oM sar+b+baH
384b4(rgyud): thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na tsi ta sa ra rak+Sha na badz+re hUM hU~M/ gsol ba gdab ba'i sngag so// oM su bi pu le ba da ni ha re ha ra hUM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsol ba gdab pa'i sngag
384b5(rgyud): sa// oM a b+hi sa ma ye badz+ra d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM hUM/ lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad bod pa'i sngagaso// oM ma Ni be ga ba ti hUM/ rgyal po chen po bzhi bong pa'i sngagaso// oM shu ba ma
384b6(rgyud): ni hu lu hu lu hUM/ slob ma'i sngagaso// oM sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya badz+ri Ni d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM hUM/ 'jug pa'i sngagaso// oM bI rA bI ra dze ga ga na bi he ni la hu lu hu lu hUM hUM// thams cad mkhyen par bya/ 
384b7(rgyud): ba'i sngagaso// oM ma Ni sum+b+ha ni be ga ba ti/ bdag dang che ge mo la bsrungs shig hUM/ srung ba'i sngagaso// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ku lo ti te sma ra Ni ba ga te/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM swA hA// slar gshegs/ 
384b8(rgyud): su gsol ba'i sngags so// thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// snying po 'di rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag thams cad yin te dpag tu med do// thams cad du yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad
385a1(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas te/ de nas dgos pa brtsam par bya'o// 'di bton pas ni thams cad 'grub/ 'dis ni 'gro ba'i sdig kun se la ljig padi par bye ga/ sdug bsngal kun las
385a2(rgyud): rnam par grol// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag/ lung ston 'gyur te the tshom med/ gang gis snga mar sdig pa'i las/ mang po byas pa 'jig par 'gyur/ rig pa bla med
385a3(rgyud): su 'dzin pa/ de dag myur du sangs rgyas 'grub// chos kyi 'khor lo bla med pa'i// byang chub rtogs par sra ba dang / ji ltar gang ga'i bye snyed kyi/ bsod nams dpag tu med 'thob
385a4(rgyud): bo// rig sngags rgyas par bsgrub pa'i le'u ste/ cho ga gnyi das pa'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o// sngon du sa
385a5(rgyud): yongasu brtags nas phyi nas las brtsam par bya'o// dri'i snod gtsang mar blugs pa'i tshon sna lnga'i bye/ mas dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi pa bri'o// de nas dkyil 'kho
385a6(rgyud): gyi dbus su tsan dan gyis byugs te gur gum gyis mchod par bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni khru gnyis pa'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni grwa bzhi pa rwa'i rang bzhin dang ldan
385a7(rgyud): pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang dang / sangs rgyas kyi pad+ma'i gdan bkra zhing tshon sna bdun dang ldan par bya'o// pad+ma'i snying po'i
385a8(rgyud): steng du gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa mu khyud dang lte ba dang ldan pa kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can te/ yu ba ni bai DUr+ya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la kun nas kha khyer dang / 
385b1(rgyud): ldan par bya'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgor ni khru'i tshad tsam gyi gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / tshon sna lnga'i rgya dag gi gos zung gis brgyan par bya'o// g.yon du lag na rdo rje
385b2(rgyud): bsdigs pa'i gzugs can rnga yab dang mtshon cha thogs shing bzhugs pa'o// g.yas su byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa g.yas pa na no/ 
385b3(rgyud): bu dang / rnga yab thogs nas bzhugs pa'o// zur bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya ste/ go cha dang tshem tshem bgos shing lag na mtshon cha thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad
385b4(rgyud): dang / ral pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa drag po'i gzugs can bri bar bya'o// mtshams bzhir spos chus gang ba'i gser gyi snod bzhi bzhag par bya'o// gal te
385b5(rgyud): gser gyi snod med na rdza'i bum pa tshad mi chung ba la ga ser g.yogs nas bya'o// de lta bu'i snod mi 'jag par 'o mas gang bar byas nas phyogs bzhir bzhag
385b6(rgyud): par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi g.yas lo gsu lha mo dpal chen mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// g.yon du lha mo chen mo dung can ma bzhugs pa bri'o// sgo'i dbus su lha mo
385b7(rgyud): chen mo rdo rje pho nya mo phyag brgyad pa lag na mtshon cha thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing bzhugs pa bri'o// dkyil 'khor gyi snying po phyogs bzhir dar sngon po 'phyang
385b8(rgyud): ba dang / bcud sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o// bum pa gang ba bzhi dang / mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'bras bu dang me tog sna tshogs rnams bzhag par bya'o// 
386a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ni gser las grub pa'i bum pa bzhag go// so sor du ru ka bsregs par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi snying por dngul gyi rang
386a2(rgyud): bzhin gyi bum pa bzhag go/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdug spos so// nor bu 'dzin pa'i du ru ka dang / tsan dran dang / ma hA rA dz+nyA dang / kun du ru dang / ka kA bi dza dang / spos dkar gyi bdug pa'o/ 
386a3(rgyud): dpal lha mo'i tsan dan no// dung can ma'i gu gul lo// po nya mo'i sha la'i bdug spos te so sor ba sreg par bya'o// gtor ma yang sbyin no// dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i bya ba'o/ 
386a4(rgyud): phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni sgo bzhi rnam par 'byed shing cha mdzes pa bkra shis kyi sgo bzhi gnas pa bya'o// shar gyi sgor khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa'o// lhor dbang
386a5(rgyud): phyug chen po'o// nub tu me tog so zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyi na mo'o// byang du 'jigs byed ma zhes bya ba'i lha mo dza/ tsha dang bcas pa bya ste/ na chung bdun dang bcas pa'o// 
386a6(rgyud): de nas phur bu sum cu so gnyis gdab par byas la kha dog lnga'i skud pas pur bu bcing ngo // zur bzhi mnyam par kha dog lnga'i ba dan gyis rgyan no// me tog sna tshogs dgram pa dang / gtor/ 
386a7(rgyud): ma dang me tog sna tshogs rnams ma 'khrugs pa mnyam par bya'o// bcud sna tshogs 'phrog pa'i snod bdun bzhago// rje'i snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / bye ma'i snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 
386a8(rgyud): pog phor sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / mar ma brgya rtsa brkyang bzhag par bya'o// phreng ba brgyam brgyad dang / dri yis gang ba sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o// dug pa dang kun du du sna tshogs sreg
386b1(rgyud): go// de nas sgo nas 'jug pa la dri yis gang ba'i bum pa gnyis bzhag la/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i gtor ma byin nas ji blta ba bzhin du gzhug pa'i cho ga la spyad la/ de nas oM ma Ni bi pu la pra/
